fall.Married.Sigurd.19: %Sig wraps his arms around you and dips you as he kisses you deeply.#$b#I'll be back for more of that later.$10#$b#I gotta go make sure Gun actually doesn't try to go into the mines on our birthday.$1
winter.Married.Sigurd.Chaste: Tis the season! Hmm? Oh, you know, @.$1#$b#Tis the season for you to inevitably steal all my sweaters and hoodies because you look adorable swamped in them and it's also cold as {{BearFamProfanityA}} out there.$10
winter.Married.Sigurd.24: I got up stupid early and dropped off a present for Gudrun.$1#$b#I know, I *know*, I say not to give her things because her birthday is literally the day before a holiday, but she's my kid sister.$18#$b#I am not immune to puppy-dog eyes.$10
RainyDay.Sigurd.Chaste.0: @? @, hey. C'mere for a moment. I just wanted to look at your face a bit.$1#$b#The thunder is exhausting.
RainyDay.Sigurd.Chaste.1: In Zuzu, the rain made the streets so shiny and hauntingly eerie.#$b#In Gotoro, the rain made the mud rise to your knees.#$b#Here in the Valley, it makes me want to hold you close and stay dry for just a little while longer.$18#$b#Won't you stay with me for a little longer, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}?$4
RainyDay.Sigurd.Chaste.2: The weather report mentioned the wind howling all day, so make sure you bundle up.#$b#It's a real morale killer, being wet and half froze.
RainyDay.Sigurd.Chaste.3: Saw a leak in the kitchen, so I'll be out patching the roof and checking the rest of the buildings today.#$b#I can handle all kinds of honey-do lists, rain or shine, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}, you can count on me.$1
RainyDay.Sigurd.4: Rain, throwing my whole day off. I was gonna head to the Scarp, clean out the Inn's gutters with Rosa, buy you some more flowers from Aideen.#$b#Well, in the meantime, here's what I picked out yesterday for you, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$4[591 593 595]
RainyDay.Sigurd.5: %Sig looks a little pale as he laces up his boots.$7#$b#Yeah, I hate going out in thunderstorms, but I want to check on the property and everything else I can for you.#$b#I'm your partner, come heatwave or high water.$18
RainyDay.Sigurd.6: Okay, it took several tries and I'm going to start the dishes immediately, but behold!#$b# I have successfully brewed coffee.$1[395]
RainyDay.Sigurd.Default: You know you can rely on me, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. Just because inclement weather makes me anxious doesn't mean there's nothing I couldn't do if it was for you.#$b#%Sig gives? Steals? Whichever, a warm, quick snuggle for strength.
RainyNight.Sigurd.Chaste.0: You look like you got tossed around by the storm.#$b#%Sig immediately wraps you up in a warm towel that he must've had waiting, hugging you close and tight.#$b#Hmm? Sorry, I can't hear you, did you say you want me to let go? Hearing aid must be acting up.$10
RainyNight.Sigurd.Chaste.1: Come on, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. Let’s stay inside for the rest of the night and enjoy passing time with each other.$1#$b#The rain makes me want to cozy up to my one true love and I'm so {{BearFamProfanityD}} lucky that happens to be you.$4
RainyNight.Sigurd.Chaste.2: You know, before when I had to deal with thunderbolts and lightning on my own, I thought I'd end up washed out to sea or something.#$b#Your love is my anchor in every storm I weather, now. Thank you.$4
RainyNight.Sigurd.Chaste.3: This probably sounds crazy, but I think we should go splash in the puddles for a bit.$1#$b#You, me, %pet - we'll make a family affair of it and then we can all cuddle up in dry clothes in front of whatever we find on Jojaflix
RainyNight.Sigurd.4: My mind's been a little out of it today. Like a cat walkin' on the water's edge.#$b#Don't worry, I know how to swim and if I forget, I'll reach out to your hands to help pull me back to safer shores.$1
RainyNight.Sigurd.5: Tread in rain and mud and all other debris as much as you like or want, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. I'm happy to keep house for you and I've seen a lot worse back when I got punished with latrine duty.$18
RainyNight.Sigurd.6: I wrote some poetry about %pet. Mostly odes about hijinks and shenanigans, but still, what a perfect inspiration to keep me busy on a rain stormy day.$18
RainyNight.Sigurd.Default: It's a great night to snuggle up close and watch {{SigurdHorrorFilm}}.$1#$b#I know it's scary, but I also think that {{SigurdFilmOpinion}}. Not that I'm trying to bias you.$18
IndoorDay.Sigurd.Chaste.0: Sorry, did I wake you? Couldn't sleep.#$b#No, don't sweat it. Sometimes the nightmares are unavoidable.#$b#Waking up and seeing you, safe and asleep next to me? Makes it all fade away.$4#$b#%Sig kisses your forehead.
IndoorDay.Sigurd.Chaste.1: Good morning {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. I promised Gun we'd get together for a little bit of hand to hand sparring later.#$b#Will you kiss me for good luck? I don't want to lose to my little brother.$10
IndoorDay.Sigurd.Chaste.2: I'm on chore duty today, don't worry. You'll come home to house fit for royalty.#$b#Which is what you are, the ruler of my heart.$10
IndoorDay.Sigurd.Chaste.3: I forgot, I redirected my auto Jojazon order to %farm. Here, for you [234 241 351]
IndoorDay.Sigurd.4: 'Let me tape pieces of me to pieces of you, your soft edges aligned to my tattered corners -'#$b#Hey, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}} Just a little bit of poetry to start the day.
IndoorDay.Sigurd.5: Maybe tonight we should head to the Inn or the Saloon together?#$b#Any discomfort I'll feel from the crowd is nothing compared to the delight in being with you, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.
IndoorDay.Sigurd.6: %Sig offers you a bright smile and holds out his phone, showcasing an adorable photo of %pet being silly.#$b#Look at this creature. Sometime it blows my mind that we just have a little fellow who lives with us.$1
IndoorDay.Sigurd.Default: Morning {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}! Don't panic, I did not cook this, I would not do that to you. I picked it up from the Saloon for your lunch.$1#[197 206 237]
IndoorNight.Sigurd.Chaste.0: Could you feel it, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}? I spent all day mentally broadcasting how much I missed you while you were out.$1#$b#%Sig pulls you into an embrace, burying his face against the crook of your neck.#$b#And now that you're home, I'm afraid I just can't let you go.
IndoorNight.Sigurd.Chaste.1: I'm sure you had a full, busy-bee day today, so I picked up dinner for us from the Saloon.#$b#I just want to make your life easier, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.[224 235 200]
IndoorNight.Sigurd.Chaste.2: %Sig wraps you up in a warm, soft hug. He smells like clean laundry and snow cover pine trees.#$b#You know how Bears are, if we go without hugging for too long we start wither away into nothingness. ...Missed you, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$4
IndoorNight.Sigurd.Chaste.3: Ah, the love of my life finally alights home once more and thus alights joy within me.$4#$b#%Sig hugs you softly, happy to let you rest in his embrace for as long you could possibly want.
IndoorNight.Sigurd.4: Hey @! There's a game on tonight so I thought maybe I'd order in from Gus's and we could do that cutesy sports-husband and their long suffering partner schtick today.$18
IndoorNight.Sigurd.5: %The house is sparkling clean from top to bottom, and Sig has sweat beading across his forehead.$#b$Don't sweat the small stuff, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}, we're a team.$1
IndoorNight.Sigurd.6: I might step outside for a smoke in a bit.#$b#No, it's not anything you did or didn't do. I'm sorry, I've just been stuck in my thoughts all day.#$b#You coming home helps a lot, but I want to be as grounded and present with you as I can be, and a smoke break should help that.$1#$b#Don't worry, I'll just go to the property line, and I won't leave any butts on the ground, I promise.$10
IndoorNight.Sigurd.Default: I can't deny it, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}, I'm beat.#$b#I'm really looking forward to the part where we hold each other all through out the night... It always recharges me for the next day.$4
Outdoor.Sigurd.Chaste.0: 'Give me solitude, give me Nature, give me again, O Nature, your primal sanities!'#$b#Too on the nose? You missed the part about the serene-moving animals.$1
Outdoor.Sigurd.Chaste.1: %Sig waves his cellphone around before shoving it in his pocket.#$b#No more screen time, just the beautiful outdoors and beautiful you.$1#$b#What? I can't spend the whole day staring at you? Fine, fine. I'll be writing to the Governor about this though.$10
Outdoor.Sigurd.Chaste.2: %Sig slides his arm around you, pulling you into the safety of his side.#$b#I don't know what I like more, waking up to you, or waking up this view.$4#$b#Naw, who am I kiddin'? Waking up to you is the best part of every morning.$10
Outdoor.Sigurd.Chaste.3: Y'know, my gran worried about me marrying a gold-digger; she never counted on me marrying a crop-field-digger.$10#$b#You're astounding and I love living here on %farm with you.$4
Outdoor.Sigurd.4: Once we're done for the day, we should go wander up the mountain together. Say hi to Robin and the family, skip rocks at the lake... bring Linus lunch.#$b#Just nice neighborly things together.$1
Outdoor.Sigurd.5: I think there's a downed nest over more westernly - I'm going to see if I can get it back up in the tree.#$b#If you don't hear from me ever again, it's best to assume the {{SigurdBirdsDescriptor}} abducted me.$18#$b#And that I still love you. Please always assume that.$4
Outdoor.Sigurd.6: Some trash blew all the way over here from the high way so I'm going to try and gather it all up and foist it off on Gudrun.#$b#No way no how am I letting %farm get tore up after all the hard work you've done with the place, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$18
Outdoor.Sigurd.Default: You know, we could both skive off our chores and errands today and hop the bus.#$b#Where to? On a day like today with my love at my side? The sky's the limit, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. Sure, Pam probably can't drive the bus into the sky, but who's stop us from goading her into trying?$18
Good.Sigurd.Chaste.0: %Sig leans forward and rubs his nose against yours, a ticklish sensation.#$b#Just when my day couldn't be any better, there you are, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. I adore you.$4
Good.Sigurd.Chaste.1: %When Sig pulls you into a hug, he rests his chin on your shoulder.#$b#Sometimes I just gotta do this so I can feel your heart beating against mine... Really love being able to feel that.$4
Good.Sigurd.Chaste.2: Wow.$4#$b#Hmm? Sorry, I was just, thinking about you and then you appeared. You're magic, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$1
Good.Sigurd.Chaste.3: It appears some of the bees have followed me into the house.$15#$b#I'll fix it! I promise! It's just - they followed me to the sweetest flower, and obviously, that's you, @.$3
Good.Sigurd.Chaste.4: %As you get closer to Sig, you realize he's reciting poetry.#$b#...'waiting for the fire, and I, attendant upon you, shaken by your beauty.'$4
Good.Sigurd.5: Good morning {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}! Did some real solid chorin' around %farm all day, I hope this is useful. [388 390 709]$1
Good.Sigurd.6: Had a very productive day substitute teaching for Penny. I miiiight've accidentally taught Vincent a new bad word, but I think Jas and Eloise won't rat me out.$10
Good.Sigurd.7: %Sig has a bunch of lesson plans in assorted, slightly messy piles.#$b#Y'know, I was warned this work would be hard, but sometimes I really do crave the ability to just copy and paste my knowledge into other people's brains.$11
Good.Sigurd.8: If I'm the poet, then you're the poem, and life here at %farm is our own personal book. Let's keep writing it together, hm?$18
Sigurd.RomanticHints.1: If you need some help with any chores, just holler at me. Yoba knows I'm good for the labor.$1
Sigurd.RomanticHints.2: %Sig has a book of romantic poetry in his hand, but when he spots you, he drops it and looks slightly embarrassed.#$b#...Ah, yo @.$4
Sigurd.RomanticHints.3: If you wanna go stargazing on a clear night, let me know. I don't know a {{BearFamProfanityD}} thing like what Maru knows, but I can tell you the Nors myth for any constellation you find.$18
Sigurd.RomanticHints.4: Make sure you take it easy, @. No need to overwork yourself when you got a guy like me in your back pocket, ready to be put to work.
Sigurd.RomanticHints.5: Gus was on my case again about my abysmal cooking skills. I think Auntie set him on me... Anyway, my attempt turned out to be actual trash, so I swiped Gus's version just for you.[649]
Sigurd.RomanticHints.6: Sometimes I get the vibe that you really turned the Valley on it's head, @... Just got a magic touch, I reckon.$18
Sigurd.RomanticHints.7: They're re-running the holiday special episode of 'Beware the Mothman' later this week.#$b#We can make a little watch party of it, just the two of us, if you're interested.$4
Sigurd.RomanticHints.8: %Sig knocks you over when he runs into but before you can do much more than lose your balance, he effortlessly picks you up and sets you back upright properly.#$b#...Aw {{BearFamProfanityA}}, sorry, @.#$b#Don't let me bully you. Unless you're into that sorta thing.$18
Sigurd.RomanticHints.9: Need to catch a break for a bit? Come read with me. I have a lot more than poetry on my shelves, and my room's usually pretty quiet if you just wanted to nap or something instead.
Sigurd.RomanticHints.10: %Sig seems to be pretty preoccupied but he smiles when he sees you and makes sure to nudge your shoulder gently with his - as if he was making sure you were solid and not a figment of his tired imagination.
Sigurd.RomanticHints.11: @. Make sure you stay safe when you're off playing adventurer in the mines. You're {{BearFamProfanityD}} good at what you do, but if I get even an inkling you're in trouble, I'm tearing down the whole {{BearFamProfanityD}} mountain.
Sigurd.RomanticHints.12: %Sig holds out an offering.#$b#Don't read too much into it, if you don't want to.$4[MadDog.HashtagBearFam_SlicedPeaches]
Sigurd.RomanticHints.13: Are you busy? Do you want some help around %farm? I'm yours to command.
Sigurd.RomanticHints.14: Hah? Oh, @. That explains why I've been in such a good mood today, huh. Must've known I'd see you.$18
Sigurd.RomanticHints.15: If you're bored on a Wednesday night, we can go skulk at the Saloon together. It's not too busy usually, and I'll let you win the first round of pool.$18
Sigurd.GiftReaction.Bouquet.NotYet: The optimism is truly admirable, but no. Give it time.
Sigurd.GiftReaction.Bouquet.Ready: Everyone - I mean *every*one wants a Bear for a partner.$4#$b#But this Bear in particular only wants you for a partner. Let's go steady, @.$1#$b#%Sig takes your hand and presses a soft kiss to your knuckles.
Sigurd.GiftReaction.Pendant.NotYet: Oh, that's neat. Is it real?#$b#Oh good, I'd hate for you to propose to your sweetheart with a knock-off.$8
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Remark: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this first Sig message.
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Question: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this second Sig message.
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Message: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this third Sig message.
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.AdoptedKids.Rem: What if I just gave the agency MORE money to make the adoption go faster? Think that'd work?$18#$b#I'm looking forward to this next step with you, @.$4
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.AdoptedKids.Que: %Sig looks pensive but hopeful.#$b#Hey, @... Have you ever considered parenthood with me? We could adopt... $1
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.AdoptedKids.Mes: During the night, the adoption agency brought your new baby.
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.NaturalKids.Rem: Absolutely wild to me that we're having a baby.$8#$b#@, is there anything else I can do to make things go smoothly before our little one arrives?$1
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.NaturalKids.Que: %Sig looks pensive but hopeful.#$b#Hey, @... Have you ever considered parenthood with me? I think we're ready for a mini-us... $1
Sigurd.Dialogue.Children.NaturalKids.Mes: During the night, your new child was born.
SigDialogueTerenRH.1: Teren keeps waking up way too early in the morning to make breakfast.$1#$b#For the record, when we were deployed together, it was a nightmare trying to wake him up in time for anything important.$18#$b#Man's got very specific priorities, near as I've ever seen.$4
SigDialogueTerenRH.2: I gotta find out when Teren's mother is visiting. She's way too sweet to be related to Teren, go figure.$18#$b#But thanks to that, I want to make sure she has a nice visit when she stays with us.#$b#Gotta prove I'm taking care of her baby boy, right?$1
SigDialogueTerenRH.3: Teren's scared of the bees. I don't know why, they've never stung me... Or is that I never noticed them stinging me?$8#$b#I mean, they won't sting him. He's too much of a pretty boy for them to sting him.$18#$b#Hm? No, I'm not being sappy, he's just a pretty guy, right?$4
SigDialogueTerenRH.4: %Sig is scribbling away in a notepad but looks up when he nearly runs into you.#$b#Oh, hey @. Teren wants me to put together a card list for the holidays.#$b#I guess Haley planted the idea of 'couple photos' in his head and now he won't let it go.$11#$b#Oh, I'll do it, but I'm NOT gonna smile. Not without making him fight for it.$18
SigDialogueTerenRH.5: Teren's stolen three of my sweaters so far... it's not even cold enough for him to be wearing *my* sweaters!$9#$b#And of course, he looks ridiculous in them because the sleeves are too long, but that doesn't stop him. S'like living with a bandit, @.$18
SigDialogueDylanRH.1: Take it easy on Dylan if you see him today. He woke up on the wrong side of the bed.#$b#Or maybe he just got that way after I teased him for leaving the book he borrowed at my place again. Who knows?$18#$b#Well, he didn't forget it so much as he left behind when he took off in a huff after one too many crude jokes... What can I say, he's fun when he's mad at me.$18
SigDialogueDylanRH.2: I swear Dylan would forget his own head if it weren't attached, the way he gets too deep into his research.$11#$b#He's lucky I don't mind running to Gus's to pick up lunch for us both - but I always feel bad when Gus doesn't have his favorite on hand...#$b#And lord knows I'd end up killing the poor kid if I tried to cook for him instead.$18
SigDialogueDylanRH.3: I think I misplaced all those {{BearFamProfanityD}} notes I took the other day for Dylan. Ah, {{BearFamProfanityA}}, I'll pay for that later.$11#$b#Y'know, most people are pretty easy to bribe, but *he's* too noble and won't let me just buy him expensive things. Terrible trait of his.$18
SigDialogueDylanRH.4: Hey @, feel free to stop by for dinner tomorrow. I already know Dylan will be stopping by, and Auntie loves feeding people.#$b#Although I swear, she loves feeding Dylan most of all. I'm starting to think he's her favorite.$1#$b#Pretty cold-hearted of him, stealing *my* Aunt. He even steals my bed whenever he spends the night. Can't trust a marine biologist.$18
SigDialogueDylanRH.5: Dylan's got me running around collecting a bunch of things for something he's scheming.#$b#He even placed an order with Gus for me to go pickup, and told me to meet him later on 'or else'.$8#$b#I don't have the slightest clue what he's up to but I guess if you don't hear from me after a few days, assume he finally gave in and drowned me in the sea for being annoying.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.1: I lucked out because I got to serve with my best friend for the entirety of my deployment...#$b#The only downside was when Barnes became my squad leader.$11#$b#Not that he'd ever pull rank for anything that mattered, but every time I got a care package, he sure was first in line with a knowing smirk to see what treats were in it.$9#$b#And the {{BearFamProfanityQ}} always stole my new socks.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.2: One thing Barnes hates is when I mention his middle name. The problem is, he uses the initial, which is what creates all the mystery in the first place.$18#$b#He even signs his letters with it, like he's some pretentious dork. How many Teren Barnes does he think exist?$11
Sigurd.AboutTeren.3: One time we had a bit of leave in a nice quiet village so of course Barnes and I got ourselves into trouble.$18#$b#It's not what you were thinking.#$b#Barnes decided he was a parkour master and chose to take a running leap - directly into the mayor's cabbage cart.$1#$b#Yep, spent a night in the local Adventurer's Guild jail for that escapade.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.4: Barnes to this day owes me money from our final card game while deployed.$11#$b#He's actually a decent card shark but having lived at his hip for almost a decade, I can read him like an open book.#$b#He's a good book though, so I guess there's that... except for the not paying me back part.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.5: A lot of times, Barnes gets a harebrained recipe idea in his head when he's got absolutely none of the ingredients or tools on hand for it.#$b#I distinctly remember a point while we were camped way out from any villages where he took it upon himself to make bread and used all the {{BearFamProfanityD}} flour in camp... The {{BearFamProfanityQ}}.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.6: Teren got so lost when we first return to Ferngill that he called me at 3 in the morning while I was *still* hospitalized, asking for help.$8#$b#Of course, if the nurses would've let me go, I'd have gone and helped him but that was a bust.#$b#So instead I tried to give him directions over the phone... but we *both* had been deployed for nearly a decade, of *course* Zuzu had changed drastically while we were away.$9#$b#Anyway, I got him more lost and he wound up sleeping on a park bench that night.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.7: Barnes and I were once put in charge of morale for our main encampment - a terrible idea, as you can imagine, since my idea of fun involves poetry and his idea of fun involves burning cookies -$11#$b#So we wound up setting up an inter-squad gridball tournament. Even managed to con Commander Shepard into sponsoring a three day pass in the capital.#$b#Of course, I had a gridball scholarship back in the day and Barnes was no slouch either... so our squad swept the whole {{BearFamProfanityD}} thing...$1#$b#Not that we chose gridball on *purpose* or anything.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.8: I might've mentioned it before, but Barnes and I weren't always best friends - {{BearFamProfanityA}}, we didn't even know each other until we bunked together.$18#$b#My first impression of him was 'oh, that kind of pretty boy will definitely cause trouble'.#$b#Sure enough, two generals' wives and one lieutenant's brother later, I was right! And he still causes me trouble to this day.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.9: Barnes was raised by his mother and only his mother. She's a short lady, maybe a little taller than Auntie.$1#$b#And the first time I met her outside of the hospital, she whooped my ass in an arm-wrestling match, which Barnes has *never* let me forget.$18#$b#She's probably the whole reason Barnes is such a pain in my {{BearFamProfanityF}}, now that I think about it.$11
Sigurd.AboutTeren.10: The first week of deployment, it rained for five whole days and nights, and Barnes somehow managed to talk through all five of 'em.$11#$b#If I didn't know any better, I would've thought it was some kind of endurance test from our commanding officer at the time but no.#$b#Barnes just never shuts up, he's genuinely *that* exhausting.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.11: During deployment, most folks had photos of their partners they left behind or maybe pin-ups that they kept in their gear...#$b#Barnes had a mini promotional poster of Cora Loft from Necropolis Bandit. It remains the funniest thing I know about him and I refuse to let him forget about it.$18#$b#I mean, he won't forget it anyway, he's still trying to find a way to get it autographed by the voice actress.$1
Sigurd.AboutTeren.12: Barnes struck out horribly on dating apps all the time. He's got the worst luck alive.#$b#He's great in person - could probably charm the rose away from the Beast in person -$18#$b#But over text he just bombs out. I mean, *I* text him and he seems normal? Although I'm not the best judge of normal...$9#$b#Anyway, I think at this point he tries dating apps just to prove he's not a weird texter.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.13: If there's a game with a recruitable dog in it, Barnes knows about it.$18#$b#Actually, he told me most dogs rank higher than me when it comes to friendships.$8#$b#I'd tell him that my bees rank higher than him, but I just know he'd bring it up ALL THE TIME whenever we bicker if I said that.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.14: Barnes can't stand spicy food. During the first year of our deployment, he'd try putting on this tough, macho guy act.#$b#So of course, when one of the women we were encamped with received a spicy sauce from her folks in a care package, he was the first to try it.#$b#Of course, he was also the first to go hide in his bunk for the rest of the night, face bright red and eyes watering the whole time.$18#$b#He doesn't bother with the 'tough guy' thing anymore... nor does he bother with spicy food.$18
Sigurd.AboutTeren.15: I think Barnes stole most of my clothes towards the end of deployment...#$b#No, like, not like *that*, just - he hated doing his laundry when we were encamped.$8#$b#But the problem was - and still is - that he's significantly shorter than I am.#$b#He was just running around, barking out orders, trying not to trip over the hem of MY pants or fighting the sleeves of the jacket he stole from me so he could actually use his hands.$18#$b#At least he'd stopped forgetting to swap the name tags by then.#$b#Must've got tired of hearing our squadmates say stuff like 'Oh Sergeant Bear, you've lost weight. And height!' all the time.$18
SigDialogueED.1: Eli keeps asking me to spar with him. I don't know WHY he enjoys getting planted in the dirt regularly but I reckon it's his funeral, so who am I to deny him?$18
SigDialogueED.2: Dylan threw my last pack of cigarettes away.$9#$b#He means well but that's not going to stop me from hoping he wakes up with sand in his bed.$11
SigDialogueED.3: %Sig looks like he's in pain.#$b#Hey @. Eli just scared the {{BearFamProfanityA}} outta me by sneaking up on me. Dunno how he got the drop on me but on top of that my hearing aid's messed up again.$11
SigDialogueED.4: Dunno how people like Gudrun or Dylan can stand being out in the heat just to muddle about by the sea.#$b#Well, I suppose it's Dylan's job. Hm, well if it makes him - and her - happy, I guess they'll be fine.
SigDialogueED.5: Decided Gun and I haven't had a proper just us bros night in ages, so I ordered a bunch of junk food from Gus and we're going to stay up late playing video games like we're kids again.$1#$b#Even listened politely to Eli's cryptid-commentary so I could borrow a couple of multi-player games off of him.$18#$b#Don't be shy if you want in on some pepper poppers or President Weevil 5 co-op.$18
SigDialogueED.6: I want something new to play.#$b#I'd bum something off the Morays but they've got some sketchy titles and I feel like we'd have to sanitize the console afterwards.$8
SigDialogueED.7: I thought Dylan was going to throttle me.#$b#One of the seabirds swiped his pen from his hand and I started laughing at him.$18#$b#In my defense, I didn't think he'd hear me, and it was *hilarious* watching him try to reason with a bird.$18
SigDialogueED.8: Sometimes just to piss him off, I call Dylan 'Professor' while teasing him and watch him get conflicted about whether or not he should yell at me.$18#$b#It's about the little things in life, @, like tormenting the marine biologist next door.$18
SigDialogueED.9: Eli asked why I use a sword when he and I have our practice fights and I think he was pretty {{BearFamProfanityD}} disappointed to learn I'm far better with an axe.#$b#Ah well, he'll be hard-pressed to find anything more dangerous than a Bear in his misadventures, I'm sure.$18
SigDialogueED.10: Spent an unnecessary amount of time teaching Eli the finer points of Nors runes.#$b#I tried to explain they don't *do* anything but you know how he is, head in the clouds tryin' to find Bigfoot.$11#$b#Don't let him carve anything rude on your fence-posts if he offers, @.$9
SigDialogueROB.1: %Sig is carrying a large box of baked goods - clearly Rosa's handiwork. He stops when he sees you.#$b#Take one, they're for a poetry reading with Elliot and Rodney later and I definitely ordered too many.$1 [731]
SigDialogueROB.2: %Sig is carrying a book. When you get closer, you see it's one of Rodney's novels.#$b#Oh, hey you. Finally running out of things to read so I'm giving Rodney's works a try...#$b#It *is* scifi so y'know, gotta deal with that, but can't judge a book by the topic? Cover? Both.$18
SigDialogueROB.3: Rodney's helping me pick out some books to donate to the library.#$b#He's great with fiction and I'm alright with poetry, so together we're getting a pretty good mix of everything.$1
SigDialogueROB.4: Someone put scifi novels in my to-be-read pile.#$b#That pile is for poetry and poetry only, I'm bad at reading scifi, I think up too many world-building questions and break my own immersion.$11
SigDialogueROB.5: Rodney offered to draw a tarot reading for me and then looked very pensive about whatever cards he pulled...#$b#I have *no* idea what they meant but he just tutted at me and shook his head.#$b#So I'm sure whatever it is, it's terminal.$18
SigDialogueNtH.1: Nora's a lifesaver. Her hearing aid uses the same battery as mine; she is MUCH better at having spares on hand however.$1
SigDialogueNtH.2: %Sig appears to be practicing sign language.#$b#Oh, hey you. Nora's got me learning sign so I'm trying to make it stick.#$b#Mostly I want to find out if she's saying things about me to Stupid or Pinkie Pie in a different language.#$b#Sure, reptiles can understand sign language, why not?$18
SigDialogueNtH.3: Thought Nora was going to beat me up - I didn't see a little microscopic gecko on the path and almost stepped on it.$8#$b#She gave me one {{BearFamProfanityB}} lecture.#$b#*Can* Nora beat me up? Sure she could, she's got fighting spirit. And she's an academic - never underestimate academics, @.$18
SigDialogueDitR.1: Seems like there's been awful lot of snails about lately... I'd say it's Trace's fault, but that's hardly fair.#$b#The kid's a great cook, they can't be *that* slimy, right? I've had their cooking!$8
SigDialogueDitR.2: I gotta remember to ask Eve what kind of treats Waffle's allowed to have next time I cross her path.#$b#Can't let a good dog go through life without bonus treats, right?$18
SigDialogueDitR.3: Sometimes at the town festivals, I feel like something's watching me.#$b#But then I turn around and all I see is a jellyfish or a pumpkin.#$b#Jellyfish *do* have eyes, right?$8
SigDialogueSnS.1: Mateo dropped by because they found Gun's sword lost in the mines again. We had a short chat about his terrible luck, but they seem positive he'll improve over time.$1#$b#Hopefully Gun doesn't get in their way too much, lost weapons aside.
SigDialogueSnS.2: Anytime Mateo hits me with one of their ridiculous puns, I strongly consider if moving to the Valley was a good idea.$18#$b#I'm sure that's why they share 'em with me.$18
SigDialogueSnS.3: Every once in awhile when I've been planting new greenery in the cellar for the bees, I'll come across something weird.#$b#Without fail, Mateo will tell me exactly what it is and shoo me off to Gunther.$18
SigDialoguePFAF.1: One of Plum's sheeps escaped briefly, so I pointed at it and yelled 'anonymous sheep!' because I didn't know it's name.#$b#She laughed, although I don't know if that was at me or the sheep.$18#$b#And I *still* don't know the sheep's name.$8
SigDialoguePFAF.2: Plum mentioned she did proof reading sometimes, as long as she got to enjoy the writing.#$b#I'm sort of tempted to take her up on the offer, but I don't like imposing on her time when she's busy with the sheep.$11
SigDialoguePFAF.3: Y'know, I swear I heard of Eden Forrest-Perry before, and after some digging, I *do* know her from somewhere.#$b#She recommended several bouncers for one of the family business ventures. I think we even retained most of 'em.$18'
SigDialogueMGC.1: Promised Camie I'd stop by and taste test her latest batch of mead.#$b#It's an excuse to get tipsy and trade tattoo stories, to be honest. We have fun.$18
SigDialogueMGC.2: I took so many notes from Camie I could probably ghostwrite a how-to book for her.#$b#She pretty much held my hand through the process of being a decent beekeeper.$1
SigDialogueMGC.3: Every time I lock eyes with that blasted chicken of Camie's I feel an ominous foreboding weight across my shoulders.#$b#It doesn't make any sense, it's a *chicken*. I could take a chicken in a fight.#$b#Probably.$8
SigDialogueMGC.4: Camie's off once again not taking enough breaks. She's determined to run herself into the ground and too proud to ask for help.$9#$b#So I end up just 'working' around her. What's she gonna do? Stop me? Heh.$18
SigDialogueMGC.5: You'd think Camie would get lonely being so far out on the Scarp but she's just a quiet soul.#$b#She needs time to herself - even a blockhead like me knows when to piss off if she needs space.$18
SigDialogueARV.1: Mia tossed a fruit at me and told me to stop looking so sour.#$b#It did not escape my attention she gave me a lemon. But she got what she wanted because I wound up laughing.$18
SigDialogueARV.2: Between you and Henry, I'm starting to think farming's not for the faint of heart. Or weak of back.$18
SigDialogueARV.3: Sterling's incorrigible but harmless. Well, he could probably do some harm, but that one's too kind hearted to consider it.$18
SigDialogueLuc.1: Clint looks mighty skittish sometimes but he's been getting better. Maybe the power of friendship's been helpful after all.$18
SigDialogueLuc.2: Listening to Alex rant about how ripped the spooky demon is never gets old.$18#$b#He's so stressed about trying to get into better shape - hopefully he won't over exert himself in his goal for swole.$18
SigDialogueLuc.3: I try not to stick around Lucikiel too much. I don't know what his deal is, but my hearing aid just goes nuts if I linger by him too much.$8
SigDialogueLav.1: Gudrun skipped her chores again. If she keeps leaving the dishes for me, I'm going to toss her over that broken bridge and make her hang out in that spooky haunted abandoned orchard.$9#$b#What? It *is* haunted? Well... maybe she'll make friends with the ghost.
SigDialogueLav.2: Wild how many slimes are over in that old orchard.#$b#Probably a good thing no one lives there... Although I guess you can sometimes hear little voices. But the Valley's wide and low, echoes can carry from anywhere, really.
SigDialogueLav.3: Gudrun left a bunch of her old, unused toys out near the orchard.$8#$b#It's not like her - you know her anti-littering tangents by heart now, I'm sure.#$b#I wonder what the kid's up to now?$11
SigDialogueYtA.1: The Lodge has been in the family for like a million years, but it was really out of repair because we all stopped visiting after Gudrun was born.#$b#We hired Yri to update the place and she did amazing, as you can see. She was super patient with Auntie being so {{BearFamProfanityD}} indecisive, too.$1
SigDialogueYtA.2: Yri fled Gotoro, so I always tend to feel bad about being deployed there.#$b#She's never really been like 'hey, how dare you' or anything, but I would absolutely accept her judgment if she chose to be upset with me.$2
SigDialogueYtA.3: Yri has a lot of brilliant architectural ideas.#$b#I think if I were to leave the Valley, I'd commission her to draft up a house. Something with lots of windows and natural light.$1#$b#Although, knowing her, she could probably design that in her sleep.$18
SigDialogueSVE.1: I think Aunt Sondra would be pretty similar to Ms. Olivia if she'd grown up with money instead of married into it.#$b#I like Auntie just the way she is, obviously, but Ms. Olivia has better taste in wine.$18
SigDialogueSVE.2: Was out in the woods for a bit and wound up catching up with Andy.#$b#Good ol' boy traded me a growler of strawberry ale for something a little more standard.$1#$b#I can appreciate a fella who prefers the classics, even if the classics are boring to me.$18
SigDialogueSVE.3: I wonder how Susan stands that racket, what with living next to the train tracks. It'd drive me up the wall and back down.#$b#Of course, she's got her hands full between her projects and the farm, but still.$8
SigDialogueSVE.4: I wanted to talk to Suki the other week but I feel like I'm just a bad omen.#$b#I wonder what region of Gotoro she's from... Better not ask, I reckon.$9
SigDialogueRSV.1: Wound up chatting with Shiro about the weather change and how it affects our war injuries.#$b#He had some solid advice from Philip for pain management, here's hoping it helps.
SigDialogueRSV.2: I think Shiro, Ezekiel and I are getting together to talk about our difficulties with adjusting to civilian life.#$b#I appreciate their points of view even if I have hard time following along myself.
SigDialogueRSV.3: I always forget Paula's out of the FAF.#$b#The FRA is more for anybody who passes boot, the Ferngill Armed Forces are for highly trained specializations.#$b#And I'm sure you can see pretty clearly, she's a highly trained medic.$18
SigDialogueRSV.4: Boy, I gave the FAF medics tons of trouble while I was still hospitalized over in Gotoro.$18#$b#Paula probably would've put me right out for talking back, quick as anything.$10
SigDialogueFCAND.1: Barron loaned me so many books right away when I came to bother her.#$b#She's got a far better selection than Gunther, thank the stars above for that.$1
SigDialogueFCAND.2: John's got a lot of insight on world religion.#$b#You tend to stereotype followers of one faith to only know that one faith, but he's incredibly well-read. I tend to look forward to chatting with him when we manage to meet up.$18
SigDialogueFCAND.3: Every time I want a new book, I worry that Barron's driven off to better pastures.$8#$b#My luck hasn't run out so far, but you know one of these days I'm going to prepare to pester her and she'll be who knows where.$18
SigDialogueFCPC.1: Was leaving Robin's shop and met up with Lyell on accident. We didn't talk, but I don't think we needed to, to be honest.#$b#Just studied the river together and enjoyed the silence.$18
SigDialogueFCPC.2: Wound up stopping by Lyell's place to chat briefly... But he's got an interesting perspective and plenty of cold beer, so I wound staying later than I expected.
SigDialogueFCPC.3: Lyell suggested we meet up at the Saloon but I'm not as outgoing and social as he is.#$b#Hm? You think that's funny? Well, he's made of sterner stuff than I am, is all...$18
SigDialogueFCPC.4: That white stray cat's kind of ornery... reckon it's best to keep some fresh fish around for it, hm...
SigDialogueFCPC.5: Nikolai's up to something... He seems pretty invested in his charity efforts, so I reckon it's best to wait and see what he does.
SigDialogueFCPC.6: Nikolai and his mother live up near the cemetery. I wonder if they ever see any ghosts?
SigDialogueVMV.1: Reckon I need to make my way out to Glimsap again... Aster's got a lot of seeds that I'm pretty sure my bees prefer exclusively.#$b#I don't have a knack for growing things like she does, but she's patient enough to tell me what to do when she sells to me.$18
SigDialogueVMV.2: Vapius isn't too bad to hike, but I might be too much of a shut in to appreciate the sights... Reckon I should bring someone along once I get out that way.
SigDialogueVMV.3: Just my rotten luck, last time I was up in Vapius I didn't have enough coins to pick up a replacement battery from Helia.$8#$b#Now I remember to bring a handful on me just in case so Helia doesn't have to listen to me complain.$18
SigDialogueDTZ.1: Can hardly see the top of the Joja building, it's so {{BearFamProfanityD}} tall. Sure, I like the soft drinks, but {{BearFamProfanityA}} if that skyscraper ain't living up to it's name.
SigDialogueDTZ.2: When I came home and landed at Zuzu International, they kept me for four hours trying to find my luggage.#$b#Luckily, one of the flight attendants, Sadie, wasn't due for her next flight and managed to get everything squared away.$1
SigDialogueDTZ.3: I can't imagine working in one of those Joja Mini Marts, too confined.#$b#They always are willing to order in what they don't carry though, so at least they're useful. But I'd rather just shop online or go to a full service one.$11
SigDialogueDTZ.4: Attack of the Killer Crepe was filmed on location in downtown Zuzu...#$b#The scene where they flatten the crepe with the giant donut? That's Pink Cake Bakery's giant donut.$1
SigDialogueDTZ.5: Joja Pharma's one of the few chains that made it successful overseas... You can fine 'em all over Gotoro if the town's about the same size as Pelican Town, actually.
SigDialogueAPT.1: One thing I can give Thompson credit for is whenever he performs, he certainly tries.#$b#Although maybe I don't quite remember the lyrics to his songs as well as he does, hm...
SigDialogueAPT.2: Bought some flowers off Thompson a few days ago for Auntie. Made both him and her happy... He's got an eye for flower arrangements.#$b#I wonder if he picked that up from Evelyn or if he's just a natural?$1
SigDialogueAPT.3: Ah {{BearFamProfanityA}}, I promised Thompson I'd stop by and help him film a video.$8#$b#He's usually fine on his own but somehow me being just a tiny bit taller than 'im is going to be super useful for capturing this performance.$9
SigDialogueCPF.1: Marcus and I get along like a house on fire. He makes me laugh, mostly.$1#$b#He's also got great taste in music - he's loaned me a few mix tapes that I've already demanded Barnes get me my own cuts of.$18
SigDialogueCPF.2: Stopped by to help out Marcus - and Mora, technically - but we wound up wrestling in the field.$9#$b#Pretty sure Mora's plotting our mutual demise now...$8#$b#And he got me in one {{BearFamProfanityB}} headlock.$18
SigDialogueCPF.3: I gotta remember to ask Mora to let Marcus out for a bit.#$b#Auntie makes a mean candied bacon burger with duck fat fries. Tastes just like you're back in the city.#$b#Marcus and I both have favorite diner spots back in Zuzu; I'm sure Auntie's cooking is as close as it gets for either of us.$18
Sondra.GiftReaction.Love.1: おぉ、@！ええもんくれるやん！お返しせなアカンなぁ。$10
Sondra.GiftReaction.Love.2: わざわざ持ってきてくれて、あんたえらいなぁ...商売上手やわ、@。$3
Sondra.GiftReaction.Love.3: センス抜群やんか、@！ほんまありがとな！$6
Sondra.GiftReaction.Like.1: あんた、ええ子やなぁ、@。気ぃつかってくれておおきに。$1
Sondra.GiftReaction.Like.2: ほんま気ぃきくわ、@。こういうのが後で効いてくんねんで。$1
Sondra.GiftReaction.Like.3: ありがとさん、@！損はせぇへん気ぃするわ。$1
