GunnarKnownB: I wouldn't normally ask this, but did someone put you up to this? Leighton maybe? No.
GunnarBotherA: Just a reminder, 'no' is a complete sentence.#$b#I don't need to explain why, but you do need to accept my answer.$5
GunnarBotherB: *Stop*. I said no. I meant no. I don't like you badgering me like this; at least in the city I could ghost you easily.
GunnardatingSig: It's so *weird* to think about people dating my big brother. So I'm not going to think about it!$6
GunnarmarriedSig: Congratulations. You really make him happy, y'know?$4
GunnardivorcedSig: %Gunnar offers you a tight-lipped smile but it's clear his mind is on his brother.
GunnardatingTeren: He practices SO MUCH cooking so he can impress you, y'know.$1
GunnarmarriedTeren: Oh sure, take the other capable chef of our household, why don't you.#$b#Jokes aside, congratulations, I'm really happy you two found each other.
GunnardivorcedTeren: %Gunnar lets out a quiet sigh when he spots you and hurries off, more concerned with Teren.
Gunnarfarmermarriedoneweek.false: Crazy, how time flies! It feels like you and %spouse have been married for years already!
Gunnarfarmermarriedoneweek.true: It's already been a week? No way, it's been like... ten, twelve minutes, tops. I love you, @!$4
Gunnarfirstrailroad: I finally made it up to the train station.$1#$b#The space seems... lonely, huh? Practically liminal. Nevermind the bathhouse.
Gunnarfirstsewer: You entered the sewer?#$b#Oh boy, that's not a task from Marlon, is it?
GunnargotPet: Does %pet ever escape from the farm?#$b#In the city you'd seel all kinds of 'escaped pet' posters, but every critter here seems pretty comfortable in their own space.
GunnarSquidfest: You can be certain that Gudrun has NOT stopped ranting yet. Squids are one of her top ten creatures, after all.$6
Gunnarfarmermarried.false: Hey! Congratulations on the wedding! I'm really happy for you and %spouse.#$b#Make sure you guys take plenty of time for yourselves, okay?$1
Gunnarfarmermarried.true: Hello, hello! It's me, your husband! I am NEVER gonna get tired of saying that.$4
Gunnarhouseupgradefirst: Robin mentioned she'd been working on upgrading that house your grandpa left you.#$b#It sounds like it went well - are you going to set up a gaming rig now that you have some extra space?
Gunnarachievementlotsfish: Hey, would you say the fishing's been good around here? I feel there's plenty of challenge to keep it interesting, at least.$1
Gunnarachievementdonatemuseum: It's like a whole different museum nowadays, you really put in some hard work for Gunther.
Gunnarwonicefishing: Oooh, I swear Pam almost had you, @! Great work. Maybe I'll give it a shot next year, that might give you a challenge.$1
GunnarpurchaseGoat: Hypothetically, how large of a breast plate would a goat need? Don't suppose you have any measurements handy, @?
GunnarbuiltSlimeHutch: You built a *what*? Why? C'mon, don't raise more of the gross little guys - there's already so MANY down in the mines.$2
GunnarbuiltFishPond: You're not going to fish in your own pond, right? Sounds like it would take all the thrill out of fishing if you know exactly what would be on the end of the hook.
GunnarmineSkull: Hey, you've been through that desert cave, right? That place is no joke.#$b#I came home one night and even my bruises had bruises!$6
Gunnarminefloor40: Boy oh boy, that mine feels like it's endless, huh?$6#$b#I gotta upgrade my gear a bit before I go further, god only knows what else is down there.
GunnarpurchaseDino: Marnie mentioned you... you have a dinosaur in your coop?#$b#Is it a pepper rex? Are you keeping a pepper rex with your chickens and ducks?
GunnargrewPumpkin: Oh shoot, that reminds me! @, you've got pumpkins ready for carving, right? Can never make enough jack-o-lanterns, am I right?$1
GunnargrewSunflower: I've been trying my hand at making sunflower oil to touch up my armor.#$b#The trick is to not use too much, but the oil's so light I keep thinking I'm not using enough!$6
GunnarcaughtBlueDiscus: Oh, how's the fishing on Ginger Island? Is it nice?#$b#A tropical vacation for fishing does sound pretty delightful, actually.$1
GunnarcaughtSpookFish: Did you catch something interesting - oh, a *what* fish?#$b#Wow, it lives up to it's name.$6
Gunnar.caught.SVE.Bonefish: Oooh, heard you caught a bonefish! That means you've been to the Badlands, huh? It's a ROUGH area, I don't know if I'd be calm enough to fish around there, haha.$6
Gunnar.caught.SVE.Undeadfish: The Crimson Badlands sure are a wild environment out there, huh?#$b#The fish out in those parts are something else.$6
Gunnar.caught.MNF.brain_slug: I bet I had a brain slug stuck to me last time I tried to brew a NON explosive potion, haha.$6
Gunnar.caught.MNF.barreleye: Hey, those barreleye fish are kind of spooky, right? I don't think we were meant to see that much of the inner workings of a fish...$7
Gunnar.caught.MNF.brief_squid: How'd you manage to hook a brief squid? Those things are so tiny. Nice job.
Gunnar.caught.MNF.vampire_squid: They should be allowed to drink blood, right? What's the point of being a vampire squid if you don't get to drink blood?
Gunnar.caught.MNF.stubby_squid: Stubby squids look so scared all the time. It's like, what'd you see, little buddy? It'll be okay.
Gunnar.caught.MNF.mimic_octopus: Do you think mimic octopi follow other fish around and mimic them while imitating their little fishy voices? 'Stop copying me!' 'Stop copying me!'$1
Gunnar.caught.MNF.dumbo_octopus: Gudrun once told me if I got a fish tattoo it had to be a dumbo octopus... I don't know what she meant to imply by that, but it probably wasn't anything nice.$6
Gunnar.caught.MNF.blue_ringed_octopus: Yikes - be careful around those blue ringed guys, @. They can really mess you up if you're not careful.$7
Gunnar.caught.MNF.void_evilpus: The evilpus looks like it's ready to throw-down. I don't think I'd beat it in a fight, it's got WAY more arms than I do.$6
Gunnar.caught.MNF.holy_grenade_starfish: Then shalt thou count to three, no more, no less. Three shall be the number thou shalt count - oh, it's not THAT kind of holy grenade, is it?$1
Gunnar.caught.RSV.Pebble_Back_Crab: Oh, the pebble back is absolutely friend shaped. Why can't *those* be all over East Scarp, darn it?
Gunnar.caught.RSV.Fixer_Eel: Do you think fixer eels are any good with wrenches and hammers? Or are they more adept with power tools?
Gunnar.caught.Void.charcoalbetta: Charcoal bettas are like soot sprites, but for the water... and they're probably not as squeaky, either.
Gunnar.caught.Void.fairyflossbetta: I think the fairyfloss betta is probably the prettiest fish I've ever seen... it's almost enough for me to want a tank!
Gunnar.caught.Void.sheephead: Is the sheephead one of the wrasses that can smash open sea urchins with rocks? Scary.$6
Gunnar.caught.Void.sunrisebetta: I feel like you could make a sunrise betta gummy candy and it would sell like crazy.
Gunnar.caught.Void.sunsetbetta: The scales on sunset bettas make me kind of sleepy - like it's time to wrap up the day and nap... Do bettas nap?
GunnarResEnter: We used to get a lot of family vacations when I was kid before my parents were too entrenched in the family business.#$b#Now that I'm an adult I can come here whenever I want - as long as Willy is available, haha.$1
GunnarResLeave: First, a shower to wash off all the sand and sunscreen. Then a second shower to actually get clean. Totally worth coming here though!$1
GunnarResShore: Would you look at the view? I'll have to bug Sig for some sort of tropical poetry because anything I can say is going to be inadequate.
GunnarResUmbrella: I think I'm getting more blond the longer I stay in the sun.$6#$b#%Gunnar fastidiously touches his hair with a look of concern.
GunnarResWander: %Gunnar carefully cradles a pretty seashell.#$b#Do you think Gudrun will like this one?$1
GunnarResWander2: So... are there like, caves I can wander into? Like, volcanic caves? 'Cause I'm down to get lost in a volcano, that sounds awesome.$1
GunnarResChair: Man, I can't find my favorite sunglasses anywhere! I wonder if I lost 'em?
GunnarResBar: Bahama mama slushie, I love youuuu~$1#$b#%Gunnar might be a little tipsy.
GunnarResTowel: %Gunnar has located a distressingly large coconut crab.#$b#'I was a drab little crab once', come on, sing the line -#$b#hey @! This place is paradise, isn't it?$13
GunnarResTowel2: We should get the town together and have a big beach bonfire... drinks, volleyball, the whole spring break scene.
GunnarResTowel3: Ran out of sunscreen. Absolutely going to pay for it later but I'm so very comfortable.
GunnarResort: Yo, you built a home here? Are you farming here, too? @, you are an unstoppable force of agriculture.
Gunnar.PolyMod.CantDate: Oh - oh gosh - I - well, I don't want to be cruel to your partner, y'know? They're monogamous, after all.$12
Gunnar.PolyMod.CantMarry: Isn't your partner monogamous? I don't think - well, I don't want to be a home-wrecker, y'know.$12
Gunnar.RejectBouquet.AlreadyAccepted.Eng: Er... I mean, I sure won't say no but I hope we're still getting married.$6
Gunnar.RejectBouquet.AlreadyAccepted.Mar: We kinda moved past that stage, @. Don't you remember our wedding? You were there!$13
Gunnar.RejectBouquet.AlreadyAccepted.Def: Oh, this one has more pink flowers than the one you first asked out me with, nice.$4
Gunnar.RejectMermaidPendant.AlreadyAccep: Oh, does... does this mean I should do two sets of vows? Uh-oh...$6
I dunno, @, your husband might be a little worried you're trying to marry me.$13
Oh are you re-proposing? I thought the first time you asked was rather sweet, y'know. Wouldn't change a thing.$4
Gunnar.Dialogue.Summit.2: Sure was worth the hike, huh? Whole {{BearFamProfanityD}} world just a-waiting at our feet.$13
Gunnar.Dialogue.Summit.3: I know I've given you more headache, heartache, and backache than you ever predicted I would...$6"/pause 1000/speak spouse "But I sure hope it's been worth it to you, because every trial, tribulation, and frankly questionably brewed potion we've encountered together has been worth it to me...$4#$b#I know, the potions part is all my fault, heh.$6
Gunnar.Dialogue.Summit.4: But we've come awfully far together, right?
Gunnar.Dialogue.Summit.5: I think everything in my life - my familial expectations, Sig going somewhere I couldn't follow, moving out here on a whim after nearly failing college again?#$b#I think it was all for this moment. Getting to stand at your side and look out to what's waiting for us next over that big blue horizon.$4#$b#I love you, @. I'd do it all over again just to be your man.$4
Gunnar.Dialogue.Children.1: I'm going to do so right by {0}... our house will be filled with love and laughter forever.
Gunnar.Dialogue.Children.2: If I could bottle up {0}'s little smile and carry it with me, I'd never be afraid in the mines again.
Gunnar.Dialogue.Children.Second.1: I think there's something wrong with my heart... it's overflowing with love... our kids are the greatest... I love our little life.
Gunnar.Dialogue.Children.Second.2: Two kids is brilliant. We should've tried this way sooner; our home's bursting with joy now.
Gunnar.Dialogue.Engagement.First: %There's a noticeable red mark on the back of Gunnar's hand.#$b#Hm? O-oh, I've been uh... pinching myself, in case this is a dream, y'know? Being engaged to you...$4#$b#But so far, I haven't woken up~$1
Gunnar.Dialogue.Engagement.Second: Things are going to be different once we exchange vows, huh? But in all the best ways.#$b#Fighting for the blankets in *our* bed, tidying *our* house up before you're done with your work...#$b#All the soft things I used to only dream of.$4
Gunnar.Dialogue.Engagement.Third: Today is taking SO long... I just wanna be your husband already!$10#$b#Well, I guess I like every title I get that means I'm yours, so that's probably why I'm all excited with anticipation.
Gunnar.PlayerKilled.Mines.03: {{CPGunnarSpouseNameB}}! You scared me half to death! I know you know your stuff when it comes to combat, but you gotta stay safe!$2#$b#Let me take care of whatever you brought you here this time so you can head home and heal up, okay?$12
Harvey.Gunnar.PlayerKilled.Skull.03: Gunnar got you to me in the nick of time, @...$2#$b#Things were a bit hectic but I think I've stitched you up quite well.
Gunnar.PlayerKilled.Skull.04: {{CPGunnarSpouseNameA}}... When I stumbled upon you in the Skull Cavern... I think my heart broke.$7#$b#I can't stand seeing you like that...$2
Gunnar.PlayerKilled.Skull.05: Hey, Dr. Harvey? {{CPPNI}} {{LPPN1}} going to be okay? Is there anything else we can do ease {{LPPN3}} pain, speed up recovery?$7
Harvey.Gunnar.PlayerKilled.Skull.06: Now, Gunnar, I've done everything medically that I *can* do, but what's going to help {{LPPN1}} best now is *rest*.$2
Harvey.Gunnar.PlayerKilled.Skull.07: I'll let you talk while I update your chart, @. Don't even think about getting out of that bed!
Gunnar.PlayerKilled.Skull.08: {{CPGunnarSpouseNameC}}... {{CPGunnarSpouseNameB}}... I know I'm not the best person to have as your shield, but {{BearFamProfanityD}} it, take me with you next time!$2#$b#I know you're safe now but I love you too much to let you be at risk again...$2#$b#So please {{CPGunnarSpouseNameA}}, rely on me? I promise I've got you, til the end of time.$8
Gunnar.Dialogue.Marriage.1: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if {{LPPN1}}'d fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Gunnar.Dialogue.Marriage.2: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I officially and happily declare you two wedded soulmates.
GunnarSpring18: Auntie's birthday is tomorrow. I think it's appropriate that she has a spring birthday, don't you?$1
GunnarSpring27: Some people are nigh impossible to shop for but Teren's just happy with a wish.#$b#But he's friends with me and Sig so he's getting some new fancy bakeware tomorrow anyway.
GunnarFall1: I don't want to go into the mines too much right now because I want to make sure Sig's bees are set before the frost hits.#$b#He loves those buzzy little fellas.
GunnarFall18: Hope to see you at the Inn tomorrow night. It's Sig's birthday; we even paid Rosa to make a cake. Oh yeah, it's mine, too.$1
GunnarWinter23: Realistically, Gudrun gets plenty of presents for Winter Star, so there's not really a reason to give her anything tomorrow for her birthday.$1
GunnarWinter28: Last year Gunnar had *no idea* he'd spend so much time underground by choice.#$b#I don't think he'd be too disappointed, either.$1
GunnarSpring12: I'm going to eat so many hard boiled eggs tomorrow, you'll have to roll me out of the way for the hunt.
GunnarSpring23: Oh man. Did Sig participate last year? Did he dance with someone? Hahaha, what a dork.$1#$b#...I had to take dancing lessons after I got engaged, but even though that crumbled, I still have the advantage over him, heh.
GunnarSummer10: Tomorrow's kind of a weird party to be having, right? We all just trust each other to not make the world's grossest soup?#$b#I don't even trust my siblings not to spit in my food.$7
GunnarSummer27: ...I wanna catch one of those jellies. Just think of it, a glowing jellyfish in a tank, bringing back summertime memories whenever you need a pick-me-up. Brilliant!
GunnarFall15: I'm willing to put my potions and my cave loot on display, but {{LewisOrLouise}} said that's a bit gruesome for the Fair.
GunnarFall26: I wanna wear something practical tomorrow like knight armor or a ranger costume, but Sig and I have always worn matching outfits...#$b#Hmmm, decisions, decisions.
GunnarWinter7: Gudrun's trying to make me feel bad for participating in tomorrow's contest.$2#$b#it's a catch and release tournament, and I'm a master bai-#$b#Wait, that's not the best way to say that.$6
GunnarWinter.1: There's a deep sea fishing expedition! The only thing cooler than going deep into the mines is going deep into the ocean and finding cool fish!
GunnarWinter.2: I got yelled at. For fishing. On the fishing expedition! It's in the name, for god's sake!
GunnarWinter.3: So Sig and Gudrun have had their fill of the sub and Auntie bought a hideous painting... Guess that leaves befriending the mermaids, huh?
GunnarWinter24: One more sleep til... Winter Star!$1
Gunnar.Birthday.ED.Eli: Make sure you make time to say happy birthday to Eli tomorrow. Although, I wonder if he'll remember?$6#$b#I mean, it definitely feels like he'd forget his head if it wasn't attached, sometimes. His own birthday doesn't seem to be that far of a stretch.
Gunnar.Birthday.ED.Dylan: I asked Gudrun what kind of cool fish I should catch for Dylan - because SURELY the marine biologist would like a nice birthday fish.#$b#And she punched me hard enough in the arm that I couldn't even cast my line.$7#$b#So I'm giving him a card with money tomorrow.$6
Gunnar.Birthday.ROB.Rodney: I figure I'd just stay out of Mr. O'Brien's way since it's his birthday and he's old -#$b#$7#$b#Er, not that I think people his age ARE old or anything - like Auntie - I just meant - he's kind of cantankerous - er - I mean - ah {{BearFamProfanityA}} -$12#$b#Alright. I'll get him something nice. Don't - don't tell him or Auntie that I called him old, please.$6
Gunnar.Birthday.NtH.Nora: I hope Nora doesn't judge my attempt at wrapping her present.$6#$b#I found the full DVD collection of 'The Lizards of the Mists of Avalon', a King Arthur retelling starring various reptiles.#$b#I thought she'd appreciate it, and it arrived just in time for her birthday!$1#$b#Of course, the *appearance* of the present leaves a lot to be desired...$6
Gunnar.Birthday.DiTR.Eve: Eve Day tomorrow. You know what that means.#$b#'Boom'!$13
Gunnar.Birthday.DiTR.Trace: Last time I was in Zuzu I picked up some spare guitar string for Trace's birthday. And a metric ton of guitar picks shaped like rocks.#$b#All the better for them to play rock music, right?$1
Gunnar.Birthday.SnS.Mateo.true: I made a special edition version of my potions for Mateo.#$b#Since their birthday is coming up, I thought making them a bit more palatable by making them all pumpkin flavored would be neat.$1#$b#I even tested each one to make sure I wouldn't accidentally give them something toxic.$6
Gunnar.Birthday.SnS.Cirrus.true: Oh, hey, it's Cirrus's birthday tomorrow... What do you get a woman who once stood on top of the world?#$b#Maybe I can pay Gus to whip up something 'Zuzu style' for her...$6
Gunnar.Birthday.SnS.Mateo.false: I think I should buy a pumpkin tomorrow... No reason, it just *feels* right, you know?
Gunnar.Birthday.SnS.Cirrus.false: I'm kind of feeling melancholy... I wonder if I should put on some glam rock or something to energize myself?$2
Gunnar.Birthday.MGC.Cambria: Hopefully Cambria takes it easy tomorrow. I mean, if a person doesn't rest on their birthday, when will they?$7
Gunnar.Birthday.SVE.Marlon: What am I doing for ol' Marlon tomorrow? Staying the {{BearFamProfanityA}} out of his way, for sure.$1
Gunnar.Birthday.RSV.Philip: The special cover variant of IncrediMan issue two came just in time. I'll have to run it up to the Ridge tomorrow.$1
GunnarSaloonEntry3: I could definitely use a cold one right now...
GunnarSaloonEntry4: Hey Gus, pour me a round!
GunnarMuseumEntry2: Hey Gunther, I found that book I lost!
GunnarMuseumEntry3: Hey Gunther, brought ya a coffee.
GunnarTownEntry2: Wait did I forget - oh no!
GunnarTownEntry3: Wait, what was I doing today?
GunnarTownEntry4: Huh? Did I drop my wallet?
GunnarMineEntry4: Hope I find something good today.
GunnarBlacksmithEntry2: Hi Clint, is the forge ready?
GunnarBlacksmithEntry3: Hi Clint! Ready to get started?
GunnarAdventureGuildEntry2: Hey Gil, you won't believe this...
GunnarAdventureGuildEntry3: Oh, hey, Marlon, look, I can explain...
GunnarESVillageEntry1: I think I cracked my sword...
GunnarESVillageEntry3: Huh... didn't I have more bombs on me?
GunnarESVillageEntry4: Don't you bother me today, crab!
GunnarDialogue04.1: Do you ever get worried life's a never-ending cycle of not knowing what you want for dinner for the rest of your life?#$b#I mean, I know I want fish tacos but Gudrun would *never* go for it, the brat. Adulting's rough.$2
GunnarDialogue04.2: Auntie's a huge music fan, and she tries out every genre. It's how she met Uncle Wulf, actually.$1#$b#I'm a general rock kind of guy, but I can't listen to music when I'm in the mines because I already don't pay enough attention to my surroundings, haha.$6
GunnarDialogue04.3: Almost burned off my eyebrows last night. Made some bombs but they're - uh, too dangerous. For anyone.$6
GunnarDialogue04.4: I'm sure telling Farmor - I mean gran - that I've been sparring with a dashing old man from the Adventurer's Guild will go over like a lead balloon.$10#$b#That old goat hates it when we deviate from her perfectly planned life path.$6
GunnarDialogue04.5: You ever have those days where you just want to stay home and play video games all day?#$b#That's why I had to do over most of my sophomore credits in college, actually.$6
GunnarDialogue04.6: I think a lot of my problems in life would be solved if I were taller.$7#$b#...But on the other hand, Sig has to duck to enter some doorways, so I'm the real winner here, aren't I?$1
GunnarDialogue04.7: I've been badgering Gunther for weeks because I realized, *I've* never seen a duggy's whole body.#$b#Surely there's a diagram out there somewhere. Right?$7
GunnarDialogue04.8: Was planning on binning my uni text books but Gudrun spotted me near the trash can and told me off.$5#$b#I mean, I was keeping the one Auntie wrote.#$b#Hm? Yeah, Auntie taught me freshman year!$1#$b#Honestly, I think being her nephew was the only reason I passed her class...$6
GunnarDialogue04.9: Do you think the Tom that invented tomfoolery wished he was taken seriously?#$b#No, this thought doesn't keep me up at night, that would be so very weird of me, right?$6
GunnarDialogue04.10: Hey, got a letter from my folks! They're still way up north managing that portion of the business. Doing well, though!$1#$b#The business? Oh, Sig never told - ah, the Bjarnarson Hotels and Resorts chain, subsidiary of Bjarnarson Holdings?#$b#My great great grandfather changed our last name to Bear but the chain name stayed the same.$6
GunnarDialogue04.11: Really wish Sig would just give in and come down through the mines with me.#$b#I'm not afraid to go by myself, but having company is nice, right?#$b#Plus he's a lot bigger and scarier than most of the stuff I encounter down there.$6
GunnarDialogue04.12: I very carefully and specifically put my bag away so I'd remember to bring it into the mines and now I can't find it.#$b#I know what you're thinking, how is this any different from you normally not being able to find it?#$b#I assure you, it is not different at all.$6
GunnarDialogue04.13: Ugggh. You know that medieval torture rack where they stretch you out on a big wheel?#$b#After my last trip to the mines, I think that's the only thing that'll fix my back.#$b#Is this what getting old is, complaining about back problems? Oh no. I'm still so young.$7
GunnarDialogue04.14: What do I do when we go to visit Farmor - grandma?#$b#Once I'm done getting lectured I either go hangout at my old place or visit with college friends.#$b#...They've all got city jobs, though, with cubicles and profit margins and HR write-ups.#$b#So we don't really have anything in common these days, haha.$6
GunnarDialogue04.15: ...Gil and Marlon actually complimented me. Not like - a backhanded one or good thing, bad thing style, either.$7#$b#I really want to join the Guild. It'd be cool to do something that I *chose*, instead of what's been expected of me as Sig's replacement.$2
GunnarDialogue04.16: You know how you always see cows being abducted in media? Hear me out, cows are *from* space. They get delivered via flying saucer tractor beams.
GunnarDialogue04.17: I'm in that nebulous space between 'short king' - because I'm 5'8, and 'tall' - because I'm 5'8. I am *just* a guy.
GunnarDialogue04.18: This place has such a different vibe. Lots of wide open space. Makes me feel like I can do anything.#$b#I wonder how hard it is to make a bomb.#$b#Wait, not - not for nefarious purposes! Just kinda... talking out loud...
GunnarDialogue04.19: Inevitably, my sister or I will use the word 'farmor'. It's grandma.#$b#Our Grandmother has very specific rules about how we refer to her.#$b#So remember, if you hear 'farmor', we mean grandma.
GunnarDialogue04.20: Emily looked at me - all five feet nine inches of me - and actually thought I've hunted bears before. If by 'hunted bears' she meant 'got startled by a slime', then yeah. Absolutely.
GunnarDialogue04.21: I usually don't check on the shop on Fridays. - Aunt Sondra takes Gudrun and I to see the family every Friday despite our wishes otherwise.
GunnarDialogue04.22: I saw something skittering around the mine when I opened the shop this morning...#$b#Like a little kid or something. Who's letting little kids play in that musty ol' place?
GunnarDialogue04.23: I've brought home so many amanita mushrooms.#$b#I think they're pretty fly myself, but -#$b#Sorry, was that too mush? Okay, I'll stop, I'll stop.#$b#Anyway, red mushrooms, super useful for my potion trials.#$b#Toss 'em my way, if you need to offload poisonous mushrooms somewhere.
GunnarDialogue04.24: I thought the crabs on the beach were like... edible. Not malicious. Very disappointed.
GunnarDialogue04.25: I saw a slime with a pompom that looked like a star... I may have screamed a little when it squelched at me.
GunnarDialogue04.26: Have you been donating stuff to the museum, @? That's very kind of you.#$b#I found a neat rock the other day and then dropped it when a bat flew to close to my head, so I haven't brought Gunther a single thing.
GunnarDialogue04.27: Leighton wrote to me to congratulate me on the shop. I mean, it's barely a shop, but it beats loafing around on my family's dime.#$b#I wonder who I can get training from on the potions making front, since Marlon and Gil are already whipping me into combat-shape.
GunnarDialogue04.28: There's a lot of people in town who make terrible jokes, isn't there?$7#$b#I don't have a punchline, I've just been bombarded with one liners and dad jokes all day and wanted to make sure I wasn't the only one.
GunnarDialogue04.29: I bought a microwave meal from Joja and got yelled at by my baby sister because capitalism, so my day is going just grand.$2#$b#Anyway, it was a buy one, get one deal, so here.[215]
GunnarDialogue04.30: %Gunnar is sweating and looks exhausted when he spots you.#$b#Yo, @, how's it going? Hm? Oh, I'm fine.$3#$b#Just sorta over exerted myself trying to mine up some ore for Clint. It's this whole training regime from Gil! I'm beat, to be honest.$10
GunnarDialogue04.Spring.1: %Gunnar's nose is bright red and he's clutching a handful of tissues for dear life. When he sees you, he mumbles 'tree pollen', looking downright miserable.
GunnarDialogue04.Spring.2: Saw a massive opossum earlier. Didn't even play dead, it just looked at me like I was trespassing. ...Maybe I am?#$b#Maybe the Scarp belongs to him? That doesn't bode well for most of us, then.$7
GunnarDialogue04.Spring.3: I keep getting told the weather's too nice to stay cooped up inside playing video games, but the problem is that I *like* video games.#$b#And I don't like sneezing all my brains out thanks to pollen.$6
GunnarDialogue04.Spring.4: You know, seasons never really effect the caves. I'd expect to maybe see more bats or something.#$b#Spring *should* be a prime-time for like, wild creature mating season, right?#$b#Actually, scratch that - the idea of stumbling into a slime mating scene is enough nightmare fuel to last me a lifetime.$7
GunnarDialogue04.Spring.5: On a warm spring day I just want to skip work entirely.$6#$b#Maybe go out and do some shopping, eat lunch somewhere casual - you know, just live life.#$b#I guess I *can* do that still, but I'd feel bad for slacking off when I've given myself so much to do.
GunnarDialogue04.Summer.1: Took a beating in the mines, but Linus must've heard me groaning and stumbling because he came and helped out.$3
GunnarDialogue04.Summer.2: What was I doing before summer hit? Oh, technically I'm a college student.#$b#I have my bachelor's degree but in order to be a part of the family business I have to get my MBA.
GunnarDialogue04.Summer.3: The fact that there's ice cream being sold just shortly before you hit the beach is some kind of conspiracy, I just haven't figured it out yet.#$b#{{BearFamProfanityJ}} good ice cream, though.
GunnarDialogue04.Summer.4: I'm really glad there's no school for Gudrun right now.#$b#I've tried to help her with her homework before but I've got a brain like a sieve, I don't remembering anything from high school.
GunnarDialogue04.Summer.5: Caught a pufferfish, which is super cool.$1#$b#*No*, @, I didn't get stung by it. That would be very silly of me.$6
GunnarDialogue04.Fall.1: %Gunnar has a fishing rod over his shoulder and he's looking pretty satisfied with himself as he waves at you on his way by.
GunnarDialogue04.Fall.2: I am unreasonably excited about eating farm fresh produce. Harvest season *rules*. We should have this in the city.$1
GunnarDialogue04.Fall.3: Farmor - er, grandma - really ripped into me about not re-enrolling for college.$2#$b#Said I could just buckle down and apply myself and I'd 'get that degree'. I wish she'd understand that I'm not smart like Sig or Gudrun.$2#$b#%Gunnar crosses his arms as he turns away, face pensive
GunnarDialogue04.Fall.4: Slipped on some wet leaves in front of Aideen. She was polite enough not to laugh at me but I still feel like a dork.$6#$b#And she gave me a sunflower to cheer me up, which was really cool and sweet of her.$1#$b#The duck definitely laughed at me. Offered no flowers, though, which is how I can empirically prove Aideen's better than most ducks.
GunnarDialogue04.Fall.5: How do you have enough hours in the day, @? I'm exhausted just thinking about trying to manage a harvest season.$6#$b#You're a pretty determined person, huh? That's really cool. Maybe I could learn a thing or two from you.
GunnarDialogue04.Winter.1: Ugh, I can't wait for spring. Yes, I know winter just started but I'm so cold.#$b#Auntie loves it, I don't know why.
GunnarDialogue04.Winter.2: So, Sig shoveled around the Lodge and the main paths in East Scarp because he's a filthy do-gooder, which was really cool.#$b#...I slipped on my way up to the mine - look, it's not a real path, it's sort of my fault but still - I'm his little brother.$2#$b#He could've shoveled a route for me.$5
GunnarDialogue04.Winter.3: Hey, just learned it's very hard to swing a sword with mittens on. ...I wish Marlon had warned me at practice. If you see a sword stuck in a tree, it's mine.$2#$b#...Yeah, it completely slipped from my be-mittened hands.$6
GunnarDialogue04.Winter.4: The upside to the mines is that it's dry, but I'm still cold whether I'm down there or outside.#$b#But I if try to put on more layers, it gets way harder to move.$2
GunnarDialogue04.Winter.5: %Gunnar has a giant snowball in his hand. When you draw closer, he raises it - is it he going to throw it at you?#$b#Hey @. Y'know, as a guy who trips over nothing pretty regularly, the snow's made a great back up ice pack.$6#$b#%Gunnar holds the snowball to a bruise on his face sheepishly.
GunnarDialogue610.1: I wonder if the calcium carbonate in seashells could help counter slime acid?#$b#Like, that's what antacids are, right? Calcium carbonate?#$b#I gotta find some ugly ones on my next fishing trip so Gudrun won't yell at me.
GunnarDialogue610.2: A lot of old medicine sounds like a bunch of folklore.#$b#Recite Yoba's Prayer three times over the fire? Get real.#$b#But... it's more about the timing. The fire would build and burn hotter over the course of those three recitations.#$b#Haha, it comes in handy outdoors, but I suppose I could just turn the oven to a certain temperature at home.
GunnarDialogue610.3: So with enough red mushrooms and some muscle remedy, you'll see the hat man.#$b#I don't remember what happened after that, though. Also, I do *not* recommend it.$6
GunnarDialogue610.4: Come to think of it, Abby's doing online classes, isn't she?#$b#Maybe I should look into that, get Farmor - granny, sorry - off my case. Do you think the mine would get a strong cellular signal?$7
GunnarDialogue610.5: 'Be the bigger person, Gun' - I can't be! I'm only five foot nine and he's six foot five.$5
GunnarDialogue610.6: Typically, I'm embarrassed by everything I've ever said or done, and I'd rather you forget it all.#$b#But man, I'm getting *so good* at smithing. Maybe I can be Clint's retirement plan, if the Guild doesn't want me.$1
GunnarDialogue610.7: I wonder if Marnie'd let me train a goat for battle... A combat goat... A goatiator, if you will.$13
GunnarDialogue610.8: Apparently they're remaking the first President Weevil games.$1#$b#I love those games, I'm so pumped.
GunnarDialogue610.9: Sig can be kind of prickly, and honestly I think Gudrun takes after him. No, I'm not admitting that I'm being picked on by both my older brother and my baby sister.$6
GunnarDialogue610.10: ...I don't think I could beat an alien in physical combat.#$b#I - sorry - just thinking out loud! Are aliens even real? Who knows!$12#$b#Really, considering my track record there's not a whole lot of things I can beat in physical combat.
GunnarDialogue610.11: %Gunnar's holding his bicep and wincing. When he sees you he offers a smile with gritted teeth but doesn't stop to talk.
GunnarDialogue610.12: One of my favorite things to do on campus was cut class and hangout with the ducks on the northeast lawn.#$b#I'm glad I can do that here, too if I get bored.$1
GunnarDialogue610.13: It's crazy what you can get just by asking but it's *so hard* to ask for things.#$b#I spent two days psyching myself up to ask Sig to cover my chores today so I could pop into the mine early and he just went 'yep' without even arguing. Wild.$7
GunnarDialogue610.14: Well, dropped my sword while running from some mutant flies.#$b#Emily took pity on me for once and didn't even lecture me about unnecessary hunting. Have a drink![395]
GunnarDialogue610.15: It's a little strange living with my family again, but I'm adjusting well enough.#$b#Leighton and I had an apartment in the city. No roommates, just us and a pair of fat lovebirds.#$b#She kept the birds, I kept the apartment... Such is life.$2#$b#At least Auntie can cook; we used to order food pretty much every night.$6
GunnarDialogue610.16: I think Sig's tattoos are so sick.#$b#Do you think I'd be cool if I had a tattoo?#$b#Don't answer that, actually.$7
GunnarDialogue610.17: Maybe I should donate some of my old games to the library section of the Museum.#$b#Like, people in the city would check out video games, it's totally a thing.#$b#...But what if someone checks out something I wanna play? Oh man, I didn't think about that.$7
GunnarDialogue610.18: Farmor - my grandmother, I mean - asked about the potions.#$b#I guess I'll have to pack some of my stuff up and bring them to her next week.#$b#Be real funny if I brought one of the less stable ones, if she's thinking about trying to market them.$1
GunnarDialogue610.19: %Gunnar's bleeding. You get worried until you realize he pricked himself on a fish-hook he was taking off a tackle.
GunnarDialogue610.20: The science behind a lot of medicine is the same in folklore remedies.#$b#Hm? Oh, well of course, you can't just *claim* that something works for this or that ailment.#$b#You have to be able to prove it in multiple cases and rule out other things that may have impacted the recovery.#$b#But everything is made of chemicals, right? You, me, plants, pharmaceutical medicines. So that's where the science comes in.#$b#Chemicals don't willy-nilly change just because they came from a plant instead of a pill bottle.#$b#Anyway, I'm babbling, sorry. Enjoy your day!
GunnarDialogue610.21: Really, when you think about, it's probably good that I'm not the kind of person that lights up a room.#$b#They're always out there getting murdered in true crime documentaries.#$b#Bullet dodged... literally.$1
GunnarDialogue610.22: I think I might expand the shop offerings. I know Marnie took those gross cave carrots off my hands the other day, maybe other folks want some of the things I've found?
GunnarDialogue610.23: I guess the live action version of Desperado Jazz wasn't too good. I loved that show as a kid, it's shame.$2
GunnarDialogue610.24: All I can think about is fishing sometimes - the call of the sea! Or lake, or river, or pond - you know how it is, right?$1
GunnarDialogue610.25: Clint offered to show me how an advanced method of melting down the ore I've found, but he quickly regretted that when I managed to catch my sleeve on fire.$6
GunnarDialogue610.26: You know what I super enjoy, @? Really out there conspiracy theories.#$b#The moon's hollow? Basic! But what if - the moon's a giant eyeball studying us under a giant microscope?$13#$b#No? Not going for that one? Aww, okay.#$b#But... what if?$7
GunnarDialogue610.27: I think I talked Jessie's ear off the other day.#$b#She knows a ton about plants and herbs, honestly, I should just ask her to teach me.#$b#But every time I think about asking her she just gives me a look and says that 'I'll figure it out if I'm patient'.#$b#I know, me, be patient? Impossible!$1
GunnarDialogue610.28: One thing that's frustrating about having a younger sibling is they quote memes and slang I've never heard of in my *life*.#$b#Usually while I'm in the middle of something that requires full attention, thus distracting me and possibly melting Auntie's favorite coffee cup.
GunnarDialogue610.29: Admittedly, I don't think I like having to kill the monsters... I mean, I'm the invasive species, they *live* there.$2#$b#I guess if I want to be a part of the Guild, I have to, don't I?$2
GunnarDialogue610.30: I know I grew up there, but I'm really starting to hate going to the city.#$b#Like, the convenience is nice but I don't know if it's worth the traffic, the lectures, or the grime.$2
GunnarDialogue610.31: Fell into that freaky cave lake.$2#$b#Oh, how? Ah, well, I was watching a video on my phone and not looking where I was going...$6#$b#Don't tell my brother. Or my sister, for that matter.$7#$b#...Or Gil, because - he probably already knows somehow anyway!$12
GunnarDialogue610.32: I think I left my copy of Cry of Responsibility back home. Hm...#$b#Oh! I left it because I thought it'd bug Sig, but he doesn't seem to care that much.$7#$b#Maybe I can dig out Killer's Oath 4 or something instead, then.
GunnarDialogue610.33: %Gunnar looks a little green. He must've tested one of his less safe concoctions. Best give him some room today.
GunnarDialogue610.34: Until he joined the Army out of high school, I kind of assumed I'd follow Sig everywhere.#$b#I'm not complaining, for the record; it was a new experience entering a place he hadn't already earned a reputation at.#$b#It was kind of cool, getting to be the most recent Bear on campus. Like a micro celebrity.$1$#$b#Hopefully Gudrun sets a better precedent then I did when she enrolls, oops.$6
GunnarDialogue610.35: Really starting to get the hang of the smithing thing.#$b#Clint's a real decent teacher, doesn't beat around the bush but doesn't leave things half-explained.#$b#He could do with a less clumsy student, I'm sure, but he hasn't banned me from the shop yet.$1
GunnarDialogue610.36: I don't know how I feel about an open world Quick the Quokka game.#$b#What if the physics are too floaty and I go zooming off a cliff or a ramp?$7#$b#But I really *want* a new game! Awww man I can't decide if I should buy it or not!$6
GunnarDialogue610.37: So, sort of wondering... how long does someone or something have to be dead for it to qualify as archeology and not grave robbing?$7#$b#Asking for a friend who may have just stolen something from a ghost.#$b#Definitely *not* me, I would never.$6
GunnarDialogue610.38: I got a letter from my parents. They included a bunch of local remedies from the home country.#$b#I just need to translate the Nors.$6
GunnarDialogue610.39: I made way too much racket in the mines. A whole buncha flying bugs swarmed me, I definitely thought I was in trouble.
GunnarDialogue610.40: Do you ever like, *see* the mine fill up with that creepy mist? Like an eerie preamble before you get bombarded by bats. It's so spooky when it happens, I feel like I'm an extra in 'Beware the Mothman'.
GunnarDialogue610.41: I swear the eradication list gets longer every time I check it. How many skeletons do they think are down there?
GunnarDialogue610.42: I promised Gudrun I'd teach her some basic sword techniques but Auntie said we had to ask Sig to supervise. I'm capable! Sort of.
GunnarDialogue610.43: Ack! I dropped my cell phone when I was wandering through the mine and cracked the screen. I'll have to wait til we go to the city to get a new one.
GunnarDialogue610.44: My favorite boots are absolutely covered in bug guts. Yeah, I fell into a whole pile of grubs before they cocooned up. It was really gross.
GunnarDialogue610.45: I checked out a weapon shop in Zuzu last Friday and wow, it does not compare. Clint's stuff is top notch.
GunnarDialogue610.46: I got a letter from my folks! They're super worried about my adventures into the mine...#$b#They offered to send a bodyguard.$6
GunnarDialogue610.47: Seven for a secret, never to be told.#$b#%Gunnar pantomimes zipping his mouth shut and waves you off. How strange of him.
GunnarDialogue610.48: My parents sent me a sword. I don't know how they managed to get it through international shipping.#$b#Probably lots of money.$6
GunnarDialogue610.49: Probably the most cliche thing about us Bears is that we drink mead. Well, Gudrun doesn't, she's a kid. But still, we're kind of stereotypes, aren't we?
GunnarDialogue610.50: You know in action movies how female leads can do awesome stunts in like, stiletto heels?#$b#I tripped. Crossing my bedroom floor. In slippers.$6
GunnarDialogue610.51: I think I'd perish in a zombie apocalypse. Not like, intentionally, but it's a lot of work and I'd for sure goof up somewhere.
GunnarDialogue610.52: I hate in video games how its always either a fuse or a valve handle you need. Sometimes both!#$b#I want a game where you can just buy those at a shop like ammo or health items.
GunnarDialogue610.53: Emily's stitching up my armor. She's awfully good at it.#$b#I kind of wonder if she's ever thought about selling bespoke clothes outside of Pelican Town?
GunnarDialogue610.54: Emily put some fashion game on my phone. She says its because I have unlimited data, but I think she's just using my account to boost her own.$6
GunnarDialogue610.55: They say it's not science unless you write it down but somehow I don't think my multiple sticky note reminders are especially scientific.
GunnarDialogue610.56: I like the idea of a claymore but I feel like I'd topple over on my first swing.#$b#Which would be hilarious for whatever monster sees me, but imagine the shame if I fell over in front of a slime?$6
GunnarDialogue610.57: I saw a super intriguing book at the library the other day... John Be Quick? James Be Rapid?#$b#%Gunnar frowns in concentration, trying to rack his memory to no avail.#$b#Well, I didn't check it out when I was there and now it's gone. Of all the luck!$2
GunnarDialogue610.58: How am I doing lately? Oh, you know, up and not crying, at least.#$b#Hm? Oh, it's something my Farmor -uh, grandma - would say - well, she says it in Nors. I guess some phrases don't really break past the generation gap or language barrier, huh?$6
GunnarDialogue610.59: So I totally panicked once I left the mine because I found a baby owl face down in the grass - like WHAT? Is he okay? Is he alive? Super panicked!$7#$b#And then Linus came up behind me and told me to leave 'im be, he's was only sleeping.$7#$b#*Apparently* baby owls' heads are SO BIG they sometimes sleep face down because their heads are too HEAVY!$6#$b#That's the cutest most hilarious thing I've ever heard of. I want a whole parliament of baby owls now.$1
GunnarDialogue610.60: Emily and I are talking about putting together adventure gear - lightweight, roomier bags and armor that's not too restrictive or hideous.#$b#My words, not hers. She's the one with the eye for design and the know-how, I just know full chain-mail's noisy *and* ugly.$1
GunnarDialogue610.Spring.1: Whim rules the child, and weather the field.#$b#Hm? Oh, an old saying my dad used to tell Farmor -no, it's grandma - whenever she got mad at Uncle Wulf for chasing his dreams instead of falling into line.$1
GunnarDialogue610.Spring.2: %Gunnar is fiddling with something around his wrist.#$b#Hey @. Emily made flower bracelets for Haley the other day and saved one for me.#$b#It keeps making my eyes water but I don't have the heart to take it off.$4#$b#I reckon I could give it to Clint, though... He'd appreciate it *and* it wouldn't make him cry.#$b#Well, I don't think it would.$6
GunnarDialogue610.Spring.3: I've finally befriended Vincent enough for him to tell me where spring onions grow.#$b#I had to let him beat me at JunimoKart three times and then I had to help him beat a level even Sam hadn't completed yet!$6#$b#Ah well, at least now I don't have to try and guess where I'd find any.
GunnarDialogue610.Spring.4: I keep starting the day with a hoodie because it's *just* cool enough in the mornings to need it...#$b#The problem is I dropped my favorite one in the mines and a duggy yanked it into it's spooky underground burrow.$7#$b#I'm never going to see it again, am I?$6
GunnarDialogue610.Spring.5: My allergies kicked in and I sneezed when I was smelting ore with Clint the other day. I sent it flying all over the furnace.$7#$b#I told him we could just literally buy a new one and install it but he insisted I clean it all up.#$b#I guess his grandfather was a blacksmith, too, so that one's all sentimental.$6
GunnarDialogue610.Summer.1: Spent most of my college summer breaks traveling to beaches and partying.$6#$b#I mean, I can do that here too, but it doesn't feel like I *need* that break from stress.#$b#Not that I'll ever turn down a vacation!$1#$b#But, it's not the thing that drives me forward anymore.
GunnarDialogue610.Summer.2: I know summer's a great time to work on a tan... but there's a few problems with that.#$b#One, I sunburn crazy easily. Two, I'd have to like, take my top off and I *do not* have the abs nor the self control needed to have abs for that.#$b#And three, the longer I stay in the sun, the sleepier and lazier I get and I have too much to do for that!$6
GunnarDialogue610.Summer.3: Caught a pufferfish, which is super cool.$1#$b#*No*, @, I didn't get stung by it. That would be very silly of me.$6#$b#%Gunnar scurries off before you can point out you've already noticed the swelling from the sting.
GunnarDialogue610.Summer.4: %Gunnar is looking sadly at his empty water bottle.#$b#I am struggling with hydration, @. Like, a genuine battle of wills between me and water.#$b#Okay, it's not like the water is sentient, but *I* am, and I'm not good at refilling my water.$6
GunnarDialogue610.Summer.5: %Gunnar is red all over and fanning himself.#$b#Hi @! Man is it hot lately or is it just me?#$b#W-wait!$7#$b#No, that wasn't supposed to be a pick up line, I just figure you're working even harder than me, you're probably overheating all the time, huh?$6#$b#I'll shut up now.$6#$b#%Gunnar pantomimes zipping his mouth shut.
GunnarDialogue610.Fall.1: Gudrun roped me into a riverside clean up.$16#$b#I swear every time we picked up a Joja can she shot me a dirty look.$5#$b#Sig drinks 'em too!$5#$b#And also, despite the name, we're not actually animals, we dispose of our trash properly.#$b#She's such a little brat.$5
GunnarDialogue610.Fall.2: I feel like I'm not going to get enough fishing in before it ices over this year.#$b#It's been nice to watch the fish nibble at all the fallen leaves in the river though.#$b#They've got the right spirit!$1
GunnarDialogue610.Fall.3: How come they don't make like, apple or pumpkin flavored medicine?#$b#I'm tired of cherry cough syrup or berry flavored allergy meds.#$b#Bring on the cinnamon flavored aspirin, the cranberry flavored cough drops!
GunnarDialogue610.Fall.4: Emily offered to make me a blanket for the mines. She's worried I don't dress warm enough down there.$6#$b#I mean, I'll wear it like a cape I guess, but it's not like I get to hold still often down there.#$b#And what if a slime touched it!?$7
GunnarDialogue610.Fall.5: Spooky season can be year 'round if people weren't cowards.#$b#Well, with enough horror video games I can make it all year 'round.#$b#What I'm trying to say is people should leave their yard skeletons and their bat window clings up all the time, it's fun!#$b#And it's easier than getting through the Unalived Cosmos remake on hardmode.$6
GunnarDialogue610.Winter.1: Was up all night watching Auntie bake cookies.#$b#She doesn't need my help or supervision, obviously, but she'll tell stories about Uncle Wulf and sing some of his songs.#$b#It's... it felt real cozy. I could almost hear him singing along side her.$1
GunnarDialogue610.Winter.2: Potatoes are a spring crop, right? Hm, that's not quite convenient, but I suppose I can wait.$2#$b#Grow them indoors? Oh, a garden pot? Shoot, okay, I'll try that. Thanks, @! You're a lifesaver!$1#$b#%Gunnar hurries off before you can ask why he needs potatoes suddenly.
GunnarDialogue610.Winter.3: Finally sold the apartment back home.$1#$b#I'm sure I'll regret that someday when I suddenly want to move back to Zuzu, but for now it's just one less thing to worry about.#$b#That place had huge windows - it'd feel real drafty on super snowy days.$6
GunnarDialogue610.Winter.4: %Gunnar is holding a pile of shredded yarn.#$b#So it turns out, if you pull at one piece of yarn on your beanie, it will just let you keep pulling, and pulling, and pulling, and -$7#$b#Yeah, this used to be a hat. I'll have to ask Emily or someone for help to turn it back into a hat.$6
GunnarDialogue610.Winter.5: So it remains nigh impossible to safely swing a sword while wearing mittens.$7#$b#Yeah, I don't even have a clue how to get it down from that big ol' tree past Marnie's place.#$b#And you just *know* Marlon'll see it and lecture me... Darn it all!$6
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.1: Y'know, in hindsight, if I hadn't struggled through college, I wouldn't have just enough of that little bit of know-how that brought me to the Valley.#$b#And we wouldn't have even met! So I guess it was an investment in my future, after all.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.2: Sometimes I wish we could've met as kids. We would've had fun passing notes in class and hanging out on the playground after school.#$b#High school sweethearts, maybe, but we'd go our separate ways to grow as people and then reunite later like we'd never been apart.$4#$b#%Gunnar very unsubtly passes you a note - if a teacher were around they'd snatch it in a heartbeat. It reads 'u r my favorite XOXOXO'.
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.3: I used to be super into the idea of soulmates but... really, I prefer to think I love you on purpose. Intentionally.#$b#Circumstances brought us to the right place and time, sure, but I think we actively fell into each other's arms; it feels a lot more soft and sweet to think of it that way.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.4: Your smile really brightens up the darkest of days, @... and the darkest of caves, probably!$6#$b#We should go explore a cave together. You'll be my wonderful guiding light against the hordes of monsters and blackness.#$b#Which is what you are to me above ground, too.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.5: If you ever got hurt, I'd be hurt too... Not just because I'd take the hit for you - which I would one thousand percent do for you, are you kidding me? But because the idea of you being hurt at all breaks my heart.$2#$b#You've... really done a number on me, @, you better take responsibility.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.6: The only thing more awesome than your smile is when you smile directly at me.$4#$b#No pressure or anything, @, just throwing that out there.$1
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.7: Seeing you is the highlight of my day. Our conversations bring me so much joy, and you're the most fun for miles around.#$b#I'm incredibly, as the kids might say, 'down bad for you' @.#$b#And just in case a teeny little bribe helps you feel the same way, here's a neat rock I found that reminded me of you.$4#[564 565 566]
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.8: %Gunnar seems slightly frantic.#$b#Oh, no, I think I was supposed - oh! Hello @!$6#$b#%He reaches out and cups your cheek gently before bringing his forehead against yours and taking a quiet, calming breath.#$b#...Yeah, that did it, that hit the spot. You're my solid ground when my whole brain is in freefall.$4#$b#Hm? Oh, I was supposed to turn in some stuff to Gil but I uh... forgot... what it was... sort of...$6
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.9: Wanna swap stories about our day? I'm totally not angling for a reason to skip out on any tasks I may or may not be late on already.#$b#...Well, maybe a little, but my real angle is you. I wanna know how your day's been treating you, and if there's anything I can do to improve it. Help slay some monsters maybe, or even bring you something to eat.$4#$b#And don't worry, it wouldn't be anything *I* cooked, I'd get you something fresh from Gus or Teren, don't worry. I'm not a bully, after all.$6
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.10: I'd fight a dozen, no, a hundred slimes for you, @.#$b#Gunnar looks almost heroic as he says that, but you see a wobble on his bottom lip.#$b#...But if possible, maybe have me fight a hundred grubs or duggies for you instead?$6
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.11: Stop being so {{BearFamProfanityD}} cute! It's not fair! Do you know how hard Marlon roasted me 'cause he caught me mooning after you the other day?$6#$b#...Don't stop, actually. I'll take all the ribs and barbs at my expense in the whole world if means you're my wonderful {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.12: Incoming cool date idea!$1#$b#You should come take a nap with me.#$b#I've got one of those white noise machines that play every sound you could possibly want and this really nice weighted blanket big enough for four, which means even I'd be hard pressed to steal the whole thing from you while we're snuggling. What do you say?
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.13: I want to know you're the coolest, most astonishing person I've ever met and I can't believe my luck that we're together.$4#$b#Hm? No, that's it. I think you're real neat and every morning I wake up knowing I'll get to call myself yours is a blessing, that's all.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.14: It's pretty neat how things get better with you around. I might not have been here from day one, but it's clear as day how the Valley opened up when you arrived...#$b#I think I've become better and more open too, because of you.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.15: If I was an actor in a theater troupe, I'd steal you away during the play; if I maybe were a lion, I'd rescue you from time; if I were a soldier, I'd willingly fall into your garden; even if I were only a dream, I'd be your guardian to the end.
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.16: Hey, I like you. Hey, I *like you* like you. I mean - $4#$b#%Gunnar looks pretty embarrassed but delighted.#$b#Sorry I just - am not used to getting to let you know how much I like you. It's a fun new normal for me... I hope I never get used to the thrill.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.17: Sometimes when I see you I just wanna loom around you like some kind of creature...#$b#In hindsight, that's probably a crazy thing to admit, but you make me forget how to human sometimes.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.18: I'd fight like at least seven draculas for you. Maybe ten. Any more than that and I'm *probably* going to fall honorably in battle and become the thrall of some malicious undead dweeb in a cape, but for the first ten draculas, you are safe as can be.
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.19: If you ever hear me say something like 'I don't know much, but I know that I love you', dump me. Immediately. You need someone who knows at least SOMETHING.#$b#Maybe shark facts or how to build a sweet treehouse or how to gift wrap presents so you can't see the edge of the paper, y'know, literally ANYTHING.$6
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.20: If you were to kill me in a video game, I'd drop my heart for you.#$b#...Please do not kill me in real life - while I'd still have a heart to drop for you, it's a bit of a messy process to get to it... plus I'll... y'know, be kind of dead...$6
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.21: %When Gunnar sees you, he can't contain his smile for even a moment.#$b#Hey {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}, with perfect timing like always.$1#$b#I thought today'd be a bust but here you are like a breath of fresh air, making my chest feel all light and carefree. Lucky, lucky me.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.22: This is so cool. Not only am I deeply in love with you, but you're also my best friend? Jackpot!$1#$b#...Oh yeah, I'm deeply in love with you, in case I haven't expressed that enough yet.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.23: My heart totally isn't beating faster just because you looked my way, I'm not some twerp back in high school, I am a grown {{ass}} little man that's also your boyfriend.$6#$b#Okay, yes, I'll admit it, my heart's RACING, @, you really have that much power over me with just a single glance.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.24: %Gunnar's checking his phone - he's checking for messages from you.#$b#...Oh! @! Hey, I was just thinking about you. And now you're here! That's way better than just me thinking.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Chaste.25: f I sent you a bunch of pictures of things as pairs and each message said 'us', would you block my number or let me keep doing it?$6#$b#Answer fast, I've got the message queued up and ready to fire right now.
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.1: Despite handling explosives regularly, I feel like 'to smithereens' has got to be the worst way to be blown.#$b#The best way? Why @, how very forward of you. Don't worry, I'm an equal opportunity... explosives handler.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.2: Don't smile so much at me, I get all tongue tied and can't speak clearly anymore when you do that... And if anything's gonna be tying my tongue, I'd prefer it was *yours*, besides.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.3: I really wanted to go for a suave pickup line, but I got all flustered when I saw you. Can I just kiss you a bunch right now instead, please?$4#$b#%Maybe it's better to lead Gunnar somewhere with guaranteed privacy if he's going to try to kiss you into thinking he's suave; that'll take awhile.
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.4: You know @, if you miss me just say so, don't appear in my bed in my dreams trying to keep me up all night.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.5: I'm in love with you to the point of breathlessness.$4#$b#Which could mean trouble for me later.$6#$b#So, do you wanna come over one of these nights and help me work on my stamina?$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.6: Man, Marlon and Gil are really running me ragged lately, I'm beat.$6#$b#I need a whole day with you, spent in bed, just the two of us. You've got room to spare for a sleep over, right? We could even sleep during it!$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.7: You're really cute when you're focused on your daily routine. I shouldn't interrupt...#$b#Oh well. Make me pay for it later.$13#$b#%Gunnar pulls you into a distracting kiss.
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.8: %Gunnar pulls you into an almost rib-crushing hug when he sees you, resting his face in the crook of your neck for a long moment before letting you loose.#$b#...Really needed you just now, funny how that happens all the time these days.$4#$b#You should come over tonight and play strip Junimo Kart with me. It's exactly what it sounds like, @, when have I ever been subtle?$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.9: Oh this? Just a training session with Marlon gone awry... again. I'll be alright!$10#$b#Although... I wouldn't be opposed to you kissing it better since you're the balm to all my wounds... And I might just have a few more bruises elsewhere, if you've got time to spare.$3#$b#%He wiggles his eyebrows at you, pulling at the neckline of his shirt to reveal he does indeed have smoochable bruises elsewhere.
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.10: Do you think I'm weird when I say sappy things like 'you are the sun and the stars and every other good thing'?$6#$e#$y 'Do I think you're weird?_Yeah, you're weird._Ack! @! My heart!$6._I don't think you're weird, I think you're sweet._W-what? Really? Aw, @, *you're* the sweet one here.$4_Shush and let me kiss you._How about shutting me up with a kiss, @.$13'
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.11: You know, I think we ought to have ourselves a friendly sparring session. Work on my reach, work on your flexibility... {{BearFamProfanityA}}, swap it around even, I'm sure we could make a whole night of it.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.12: Oh I thought I managed to blow up something again with how hard my heart started pounding, but it must've been your presence.#$b#I'm being serious, my heart's racing, come feel!$1#$b#%Gunnar takes your hand and places it squarely on his chest over his heart. Did it just start beating faster from your touch?#$b#...Oh, maybe I shouldn't have you feeling me up out of nowhere like this, oops.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.13: Alex and Sig have been goading me to start lifting so I get better in fights but... well, barbells are boring.#$b#...Say, @, you're pretty toned from working at %farm, right? Maybe you should become my personal trainer. Whatever kind of regimen you want to put me through, I'm game and ready to be fully hands-on with.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.14: @, perfect timing, do you think you can help me handle my sword -$1#$b#%Gunnar bursts out laughing at himself.#$b#...Alright, that totally didn't work, did it? I'm sorry, I had to try it out, Marlon's got this ANCIENT adventurer's magazine with dating tips and that's one of the pick up lines in it.$1#$b#...Although, if you DID wanna help me with my sword, I wouldn't be opposed -$4#$b#%Gunnar starts giggling again, unable to finish hitting on you.
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.15: %Gunnar's looking quite beat up from a recent visit to the mines... maybe you should wrap him in bubble wrap. For now, he wraps you up in his arms and proceeds to cover your face in kisses.#$b#This could be worse, @, I could ask you to kiss me better, for instance. ...Well, you totally can if you want to.$3
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.16: %When Gunnar sees you, he takes your hand in his and carefully presses a line of kisses to each knuckle.#$b#...I'm inoculating you against cooties, trust me, I've got like six dusty folklore medicine tomes at home now.$13#$b#...You just gotta deal with having *my* cooties.$4
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.17: Hello @! How much love, kisses, and affection do I have to offer up so you'll lie to {{LewisOrLouise}} about a possible explosion in front of Pierre's?$6#$b#Ballpark estimate, I can love all night and day if needed.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.18: Y'know, I've been beaten up enough that I borrowed a massage how-to from the library.#$b#Don't suppose you'd let me massage you? I've gotten REALLY good with my hands and I distilled some really mild essential oils the other day for practice.#$b#Perfect for relaxing - or more! - with your favorite Bear.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.19: Are you tired? Come over to the Lodge. I just replaced my mattress pad so it's real comfortable now.#$b#I'll wait on you hand and foot, and when you get bored of that, you can just drag me into bed with you.$4##$b#What am I going to do, protest? No way.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.20: I thought I heard an explosion but I think it's just my heart trying to beat out of my chest to get to you.$4#$b#%Gunnar cups your face in his hands and kisses you delicately.#$b#...Mmm. Nope, still trying to escape. Guess I gotta keep going, huh?$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.21: Local amateur potions-guy WILDLY head over heels for local incredibly attractive {{LPJobTitle}}. More news at eleven - but hey, by then we should be in bed. Together, hopefully.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.22: You're my favorite person in the whole world, {{CPGunnarSpouseNameA}}... Don't worry about saying it back. I just wanna make sure I express myself.$4#$b#And when my dumb words inevitably fail me, I'll prove it with my actions... if you're into that kind thing.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.23: %Is Gunnar checking you out? That rascal.#$b#Must be something in the air over at %farm because there's not a single person dead or alive that looks as good as you...$4#$b#I want you all to myself tonight, if I can impose upon you for a while.$13
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.24: ...Do you think Gil would know if we hooked up in the mines? ...Er, wait, that wasn't supposed to be an 'out loud' thought - Um, can you -$6#$b#Well, I mean - if you were CURIOUS about that kinda thing, I've got all kinds of protection - er, protective gear - I mean - $4#$b#%Gunnar shuts himself up by kissing you swiftly, still very bright red.
GunnarDialogue810R.Spicy.25: I was polishing my sword the other day - NOT LIKE THAT!$12#$b#...How come every time I'm near you I turn into the world's biggest dork?$6#$b#...I wouldn't even USE that as a euphemism because it's stupid and also I don't even HAVE to do that because I have you now and -$4#$b#%It's best to let Gunnar babble until he runs out of steam... or kiss him into a very brief quiet.
patio.Gunnar.Spicy.1: %Gunnar is sweaty. Very very sweaty.#$b#...Oh, hey! Yeah, sorry, I've been toiling at this forever now, but this is probably a good time to pause and clean up and give you my undivided attention.$6#$b#Hm, actually, you wanna help your dirty boy get clean?$13
patio.Gunnar.Spicy.2: You know, if I kill the heat, we could always climb up on this perfectly flat surface and generate our *own* heat~ What do you say, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}? Feeling exhibitionist-y today?$13
patio.Gunnar.Spicy.3: %Gunnar pulls you in a close, hot, sweaty embrace and peppers kisses all over your face.#$b#Perfect! Now you smell like me and my smithy, so you have a reminder of who to come home to.$13
spouseroom.Gunnar.Spicy.1: It's not too late to spend the day playing strip Junimo Kart, @. I think you were up by two last time so...$13#$b#%Gunnar's quick to unbuckle his belt before reaching for the hem of his shirt to give you your 'headstart'.
spouseroom.Gunnar.Spicy.2: %Gunnar gleefully pulls you close and kisses you deeply. He smells of camphor and ozone, meaning he's been brewing something recently. When he finally breaks the kiss, it's only to allow you both to finally breathe.#$b#...Who needs an aphrodisiac with you around?$4
spouseroom.Gunnar.Spicy.3: Come to distract me from work, @? I'm supposed to brew up some new curatives for {{MarlonOrMateo}}...#$b#But here you are, looking like a dream come true. Let's see what other fantasies we can make true.~$4

He snaps a selfie of you both and holds out his phone so you can confirm you like how it turned out.#$b#I wanted to update my background so I figured today would be the perfect day. I like seeing us together when I unlock it, it makes my day brighter.$4
IndoorDay.Gunnar.Chaste.3: Sometimes I have to physically restrain myself from placing my glasses on you. You'd look so cute in them though! Well, you look cute all the time, actually. I'm totally not biased, either.$1#$b#%Gunnar pulls you into a quick embrace, but you can practically see the gears turning in his head as he plots how to get you in his glasses.
IndoorDay.Gunnar.4: I've got a lot of supplies to pack up and drop off at the Guild. Thankfully I don't have to handle addressing them all - my handwriting's so bad sometimes I can't even read my own potion labels...$6
IndoorDay.Gunnar.5: Alright, today I'm going to tackle replacing that curtain rod that %pet accidentally yanked down last week. Don't worry, I may seem absolutely dangerous with a weapon, but I'm pretty handy with regular tools. You'll come home to a perfectly hung curtain, I promise.
IndoorDay.Gunnar.6: I know, I know, I *should* go outside and get some fresh air.$6#$b#%Gunnar pulls you into a tight hug, lifting you briefly off the ground before setting you back down and letting you loose.#$b#But I've been thinking, I really need to finish my run through all the games in {{GunnarVideoGameSeries}}.#$b#I think I stopped playing after {{GunnarGameSeriesNumbered}} came out.#$b#Maybe you can help me out? You're way more {{GunnarSpouseCompliment}} than I am, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}.$4
IndoorDay.Gunnar.Default: Well, that's nice - {{MarlonOrMateo}} just forwarded me a huge brewing order. I guess I'll be elbow deep in little glass vials all day... Feel free to distract me though - you know I love skipping work to bat my eyes at you instead, anyway.$13
IndoorNight.Gunnar.Chaste.0: I had the opportunity to marry my video game romance but... Well, we decided to remain friends. You're the only one I can give my heart to. ...Well, I guess Garrus would give you a run for your money, too...$13#$b#%Gunnar presses a kiss to the back of your hand but you can feeling him grinning at his own self-admitted crush.
IndoorNight.Gunnar.Chaste.1: Every night you come home to me I fall for you just a little bit more.$4#$b#I dunno how I'm going to contain all this love for you. Soon it'll breach containment and cover all of Ferngill.#$b#Well, I can count on you coming where I know we'll be secured and protected together safely.$1
IndoorNight.Gunnar.Chaste.2: Who's ready for an hour of cuddling followed by eight of the most restful hours of sleep ever?#$b#%Gunnar grabs your hand and raises it with his own.#$b#We aaare!$1
IndoorNight.Gunnar.Chaste.3: Hello, hello, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}!#$b#%Gunnar hugs you and lays his head on your shoulder for a few moments.#$b#I went and picked up dinner for us so we just have to settle in for the night and take it easy ... okay, fine, I want to try beating you at Shapetris Score Attack, too.$13[237]
IndoorNight.Gunnar.4: I hope it gets dark faster - I want to abscond with you so we can go look at the stars. We can make up new constellations and myths together just for the {{hell}} of it. I'm going to call one the {{CPJobTitle}}.
IndoorNight.Gunnar.5: You came home just in time. I had to bathe %pet because they met the business end of a skunk and I REALLY didn't want you to come home to something that smelly. I think we both came out of it smelling like roses though, at least.$6
IndoorNight.Gunnar.6: Do you feel up to rewatching the first season of {{GunnarShowTitle}}? When I was sweeping earlier I was absolutely struggling to remember when that one-off character showed up and over-stayed his welcome, so I figured we could sit through it together after dinner.
IndoorNight.Gunnar.Default: Are you excited, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}? I've been waiting to watch this episode of {{GunnarShowTitle}} with you forever, it feels like!$1#$b#I can run you a bath if you want to relax before we dive back into our binge watching.$4#$b#Do you remember what happened on the last episode?#$b#{{GunnarShowAnticipation}}$1#$b#This is one my favorite things about marrying you - watching our little shows together... it's always something to look forward to, getting this quality time with you.$4
Outdoor.Gunnar.Chaste.0: Oh, just when I think being out here couldn't be any better, you materialize before me. What a lucky man I am.$4#$b#%Gunnar leans in and kisses your cheek.
Outdoor.Gunnar.Chaste.1: I really want to dig in and help out around %farm, but I get nervous that I'll somehow mess things up. if I do, you'd let me know, right? I'd hate to be interfering with all your hard work, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}.$6
Outdoor.Gunnar.Chaste.2: %Gunnar offers you a mug of tea.#$b#It's microwaved, sorry. You remember what happened last time, right? The ceiling still doesn't look right above the stove top.$6#$b#%Gunnar slides his free arm around your waist before clinking his mug to yours.#$b#Here's to another wonderful day together, right?$4[614]
Outdoor.Gunnar.Chaste.3: Hey, you just missed it. There was a pair of finches flying and chirping together just now, looking for nest materials around our porch.#$b#They reminded me of us, just a little.$4#$b#I'd build you a real cozy nest out of the nicest twigs, just tweet the word.$13
Outdoor.Gunnar.4: No matter where I go or what happens to me while I'm there, you're my true north. I love you, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}.$4
Outdoor.Gunnar.5: %Gunnar's hands are covered in little bruises and cuts. He must've blown up something while you were still sleeping.#$b#Hello {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}! Did you sleep well? I've got just a little bit of a mess to clean up around back but I'll have it taken care of real soon, I promise.$3
Outdoor.Gunnar.6: I have plenty of book-keeping to do for Bear Necessities, but I think I might try and work outside today after I knock out the chore list. Depending on when you come back, we can have lunch together in the sunlight. The forge makes for a great table, after all.$1[606]
Outdoor.Gunnar.Default: We should grab %pet and go hiking. I think %farm will keep without us for a few hours, and we can always grab dinner at the Saloon to follow it up so neither of us have to summon the post-hike energy for cooking.$1#$b#...Not that my cooking's *edible*, but still.$6
Good.Gunnar.Chaste.0: Sorry I get too loud sometimes, the fact that you and I get to wake up to each other every day really makes me excited to *be* awake and I can't suppress it.#$b#%Gunnar kisses your cheek before moving on with his day, humming some catchy tune from a major motion picture.
Good.Gunnar.Chaste.1: If we told college-me where I'd be now, he wouldn't believe it. And if we told him WHO he married? He'd be knocked off his feet with surprise. ...You're a wonderful surprise, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}.$4
Good.Gunnar.Chaste.2: %Gunnar hugs you from behind before turning you gently so he gaze into your eyes.#$b#Need anything extra from me today? I can go lasso rainclouds to water the earth at your feet, or bring you the moon so you always have a little light to carry in your pocket... Just name it, nothing's impossible when I'm in love with you.$4
Good.Gunnar.Chaste.3: %Gunnar presses a quick kiss to your forehead.#$b#I've got to fill an order for Clint, but I'll probably totally goof on it and be late because I'll be thinking about you. Well, Clint's used to my antics by now, at least.$17
Good.Gunnar.Chaste.4: %Gunnar takes your hand in his own, interlacing your fingers together.#$b#Well, you're stuck with me now, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}. Guess it's 'take your husband to everywhere' day, right?$13
Good.Gunnar.5: I hope you know, you're what makes our house a home, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}. I love you so much, I can hardly handle it sometimes.$4
Good.Gunnar.6: Every once in awhile, I think %farm needs about ninety million string lights strewn about the place... But then I see you and it's like the sun coming out from behind the clouds.$4
Good.Gunnar.7: It's never a dull moment in your company {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}. One day we're facing down a mighty kraken, the next we're trying to get a caterpillar to let us put it outside where it can munch all the plants it wants.#$b#But it's always a happy momeent, regardless. Thank you for all of them. I love you,$4
Good.Gunnar.8: Well, %farm is thriving, %pet is happy, you and me are in love - life really can't get any more grand, can it? ...I'll get laundry started, I bet that'd help the grandeur of it all.$1
Gunnar.RomanticHints.1: Y'know, @, I don't think there's been a single moment where you haven't exuded confidence... that's super cool of you. You're real cool.$1
Gunnar.RomanticHints.2: Anytime Pierre's got your stuff available I have to stop myself from buying it all up. I just think I do better when Auntie's used stuff from %farm in her cooking, y'know?#$b#Must be something special about you, huh?$4
Gunnar.RomanticHints.3: If you're free sometime, I'd love to have a friendly sparring session. We can test our reach and flexibility... or something.$4
Gunnar.RomanticHints.4: I like the way you wear your clothes, @.#$b#I think every time I've seen you just seem one hundred percent put together, no matter how hard you've been working at %farm.$4
Gunnar.RomanticHints.5: You're always welcome to hang out with me, as long as I'm not brewing anything too noxious. I'd feel like a real {{BearFamProfanityM}} if I made you sick!$6
Gunnar.RomanticHints.6: We should grab lunch sometime when Marlon's not kicking me around the Guild. Y'know, uh, as friends.$4
Gunnar.RomanticHints.7: Make sure you don't work too hard, @... and if you're feeling overwhelmed, come grab me.#$b#I may look like a sack of limp noodles, but I'm pretty sturdy and can probably figure out how to hoe around for you if needed.$1
Gunnar.RomanticHints.8: %Gunnar doesn't respond immediately, seemingly staring into your eyes. When he realizes it's been a few moments, he turns bright red.#$b#...Er, hey, @. How's it going?$4
Gunnar.RomanticHints.9: Are you busy tomorrow? I was thinking it'd be nice to have some good company, and you're pretty much the best around.
Gunnar.RomanticHints.10: Oh, here. I ordered extra from Gus because I was hoping I'd run into you soon.$4[207]
Gunnar.RomanticHints.11: Hey @! Auntie was trying to teach me to cook but as per usual, it went awful. But I kept the actually edible version - as in, hers - just for you, so here.$1[244]
Gunnar.RomanticHints.12: Wanna make a wager on where I lost my bomb bag this time?$6#$b#Name your prize for if you win.#$b#And if I win? ...Well, it's a secret.$4
Gunnar.RomanticHints.13: Huh. Marlon's got this super old adventurer's magazine stashed behind the counter and there's a whole section about dating as an adventurer... Would you ever date an adventurer?$6#$e#$y 'Hmm..._Well, I am an adventurer so..._Yeah, you're the coolest one I know!$1_I think an adventurer could sweep me off my feet._O-oh... like physically? Or just, uh - never mind, I mean -$4_Absolutely not._You are SO valid.$6_I want to be the adventurer in a relationship._Do you think you could ever use a sidekick?$4'
Gunnar.RomanticHints.14: I think you're marble-lous, @, I hope you know that.$4[567]
Gunnar.RomanticHints.15: I wanted to give this to you... you don't have to keep it, you can pass it on, but I just, really wanted to give this to you, y'know?$4[StardropTea]
Gunnar.GiftReaction.Bouquet.NotYet: You're a great person - but I don't think we can do this right now. I'm sorry.$2
Gunnar.GiftReaction.Bouquet.Ready: %Gunnar sneezes twice but takes the bouquet and holds it close to his face, grinning.$4#$b#Really, @? Really, truly? Yes, let's date! - *achoo!* -$1#$b#Don't mind my pollen allergy kicking in, I'm gonna keep these flowers - and your heart - forever!$4
Gunnar.GiftReaction.Pendant.NotYet: What's with the fancy seashell? You collecting things like Gudrun now?
Gunnar.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Remark: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this first Gunnar message.
Gunnar.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Question: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this second Gunnar message.
Gunnar.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Message: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this third Gunnar message.
