GudrunDialogueMGC.2: The Cove is super peaceful... like, I sometimes take it as a shortcut to get to the beach but I kind of just want to hangout and vibe, you know?
GudrunDialogueMGC.3: If I were a mermaid, I'd go hang out at the Cove, you know? Like, why bother with dealing with half of Pelican Town when you can just have a fishy get together accompanied by the sound of rushing waterfalls?
GudrunDialogueFCPC.1: Mr. Lyell introduced me to Roswell properly. He really likes his hens, they're pretty interesting creatures...$1#$b#I wonder where he first got 'em from. They're not native to the Valley, right?
GudrunDialogueFCPC.2: I think Mr. Lyell had an interesting experience in Gotoro, kinda like Sig did... they both seem pretty wistful.$13#$b#Well, if I can't cheer up Sig maybe I can at least cheer up Mr. Lyell.
GudrunDialogueFCPC.3: I found some pretty nice shells and gave them to Mr. Lyell.#$b#He appreciates the nicer things you can get from the sea, unlike SOME Bears who will not be named.$6
GudrunDialogueFCPC.4: The struggles of befriending Boxy but knowing in my heart I'm a friend to fish first... How can I ever choose?$13
GudrunDialogueFCPC.5: Boxy's pretty energetic, I bet the local bug population live in fear... but it's fun watching him climb into places he shouldn't be.$1
GudrunDialogueFCPC.6: I wish there were even more places for animals to live when the environment can't support them anymore... Especially for fish! But quadrupeds need love too.$1
GudrunDialogueARV.1: Max is SO good at fetch. Like, I think it was invented knowing a pup as great him would come along to play it.$1
GudrunDialogueARV.2: Mia's work seems pretty intensive. I don't know HOW she gets the time to make cute snacks but I am super glad I get to partake in them, hehe.$1
GudrunDialogueARV.3: Sterling SEEMS like he'd be a smoker, right? But he *knows* better because he's smart, unlike SOME big brothers around here.$6
GudrunDialogueLuc.1: Lucikiel has SUCH a valid reason for being grumpy, like, how embarrassing is it to be summoned by a JOJA person?$6
GudrunDialogueLuc.2: I wonder if Lucikiel could like, sue, Joja... I feel like there's potential to put 'em out of business for good if it were found out they were trying to take advantage of innocent demons... Hmmm.$6#$b#%Gudrun is clearly scheming again.
GudrunDialogueLuc.3: Oh, hey, if you see Lucikiel, give this to him? I promised him I'd share next time Auntie baked cookies and I don't want to accidentally lie to a powerful demon guy.$1[223]
GudrunDialogueLav.1: Hm? I'm pretty sure I know all the kids in the Scarp... but...$13#$b#%Gudrun trails off into silence, clearly concerned about something... or someone.
GudrunDialogueLav.2: I don't even know what little kids like, I don't think she wants another plush toy... Huh?$13#$b#Oh, hey @, mind your own business, won't you?$11
GudrunDialogueLav.3: If I were a ghost, I'd want to make friends too, I think. Hm? Me? I'm not the - I mean, *a* ghost, @.$11
GudrunDialogueSVE.1: Sophia's going to show me some of her cosplay ideas later... It's so cool that she makes her own costumes.$1
GudrunDialogueSVE.2: I'm supposed to be helping Sophia so we can play Prairie King later so I probably should double check and make sure my homework's done, huh?$11
GudrunDialogueSVE.3: Ugh. Every time I wanna play at the Saloon, Victor's beat me to the machines. I should ask Mr. Gus if he ever plans to expand the game room.
GudrunDialogueRSV.1: If you're going up to the Ridge, tell Mrs. Daggerkin-Bladebane I said 'hi'. She has the most interesting stories out of everyone up there!$1
GudrunDialogueRSV.2: I hope it's sunny tomorrow... I wanna see what designs Faye has available. I know overconsumption's obviously bad, but something new every once in awhile isn't harmful.
GudrunDialogueRSV.3: I like Mr. Aguar's lab but he doesn't like it if I linger around too much. It'd be really fun to intern there someday, I bet!$1
GudrunDialogueRSV.4: Maddie is so cool... I want to be as cool and calm as {{NonBinaryMaddiePronoun1}} {{NonBinaryMaddieVerbConjugation}} when I grow up and start my own research work.$1
GudrunDialogueDTZ.1: Do you know how many times I've gotten yelled at for jaywalking when I go downtown? It's not like the traffic's THAT dangerous...$6
GudrunDialogueDTZ.2: I'd much rather spend time at the Mall than to go visit Farmor - grandma, I mean...#$b#Maybe I can claim I need to stop at Hers and Sirs for a haircut and get out of it entirely...$6
GudrunDialogueDTZ.3: My parents had a layover stop last week so we wound up hanging out the Airport to see them... I wish they could stay longer, but honestly who wants to linger at an Airport?
GudrunDialogueDTZ.4: I'm hoping they have the cheesecake special next time I go to Stardrop Cafe... Of course, I'm getting a latte, but who in their right mind says no to cheesecake?
GudrunDialogueDTZ.5: When we were still living in Zuzu, I always got my birthday cake from Pink Cake Bakery. It's probably some of the best baked goods, ever!$1
GudrunDialogueAPT.1: Thompson's good with video editing and stuff, right? ... I wonder if he'd be down to make some PSAs about littering...#$b#Like, I'll pay or whatever, I just don't want to have to figure out how to make videos on top of my real homework.$6
GudrunDialogueAPT.2: I kind of like working with Kenzie when I need to petition {{LewisOrLouise}} for something. Like, yeah, she doesn't have any passion for *my* work, but she knows what she's doing at least. Chalk that up as a win.
GudrunDialogueAPT.3: Thompson's last song is kind of a bop? Like, I think it could go viral. I should try to help make that happen, huh? It's totally worth it!$3
GudrunDialogueCPF.1: Auntie likes to send me over to Mrs. Ashida to buy crops if Pierre's sold out of all of yours.$1#$b#She's always super chill to chat with. I think she and Auntie get along pretty well.#$b#It's nice that Auntie has friends that are a little more relatable, I think. Not everyone gets the trials of raising crazy nephews and cool nieces, after all.$1
GudrunDialogueCPF.2: Whoa... I saw some crows over at Coal Point trying to mess with the fields and Marcus just flung a hoe clear across the whole field!#$b#They all scattered, probably the most scared they've been since ever!$1
GudrunDialogueCPF.3: Mora was teaching me how to skip rocks the other day... Do you think she's ever managed to hit a fishie? I hope she hasn't. Mora's not mean, after all; she probably hasn't. Right?$13
GudrunDialogueGuntherReal.1: Ugh, I'm *so* tired. I was up all night chatting with Cecily. About what? Never you mind, it's a teenage girl thing, you wouldn't understand.$6
GudrunDialogueGuntherReal.2: Cecily totally beat my record at Junimo Kart so now I owe her coffee for a week. Shhh, don't tell Auntie or Mr. Gunther - we're definitely not supposed to have that much coffee.$1
GudrunDialogueGuntherReal.3: %Gudrun is texting away excitedly. She and Cecily appear to be plotting out how to convince their respective legal guardians to allow a sleepover. There will be cake.#$b#%That's all you read before Gudrun gives you a dirty look and hides her phone from you.#$b#Nosy much?$9
Teren.GiftReaction.Love.1: Aww, that's so kind of you! I'll return the favor right away, @! Thank you!$1
Teren.GiftReaction.Love.2: Oh-ho-ho, thinking of me, were you? Thanks, @. I'll try to get out of your mind soon~$1
Teren.GiftReaction.Love.3: You're the best, @. And the best @. Note the pause - you are best in two categories.$1
Teren.GiftReaction.Like.1: How'd you know I needed one of these? Just kiddin'. Thanks, @!
Teren.GiftReaction.Like.2: For little ol' me? You're too kind, @.
Teren.GiftReaction.Like.3: Hey, thanks! I never even knew I wanted this.
Teren.GiftReaction.Dislike.1: Oh... welp, I know you meant well.$2
Teren.GiftReaction.Dislike.2: Hmmm... not really my thing, but I'll try to put it to good use.
Teren.GiftReaction.Hate.1: Gotta level with you @, this is terrible.$7
Teren.GiftReaction.Hate.2: Er, I don't think I've ever wanted this...$17
Teren.GiftReaction.Hate.3: Ah, you know what? I don't really like this, sorry.$17
Teren.GiftReaction.Neutral.3: Well would you look at that? Thanks.
TerenIntroduction: Hello! My name is Sergeant Teren Barnes but please just call me Teren!$1#$b#You're in charge of %farm? Wow, there's buying local and then there's meeting the {{LPJobTitle}} that grows your produce, haha. See ya around!$1
TerenDanceRejection: There's so many fun folks around and you're picking me? Naw, I can't let you do that, @. Thank you though, you're very sweet.$8
TerenDanceSpouseAccept: Oh thank goodness, I wasn't sure if I should ask or let you do your own thing! Cut a grass rug with me, darling.$4
TerenDanceAccept: Hey now, I never promised I'd be a decent dancer, just so you're forewarned. Let's dance~$4
TerenWinterStarBeforeSpouse: Do you have ANY idea how hard it was to keep this secret? I almost blurted it out over breakfast like nearly every day until today.$1
TerenWinterStarBefore: Hi @! Surprise surprise, I'm your secret guy!$1#$b#Er, well, that sounds weird, actually.$7#$b#Well, uh, ignore all that, and here! Happy Feast of the Winter Star.$1
TerenWinterStarAfterSpouse: Did you like it? I hope you liked it! You know can be honest with me if you didn't - I will totally make it up to you.#$b#Name your price, any day, any night, I'll deliver because I'm yours, bay-beeeeee~$1#$b%He smooches you before you can even answer whether or not you liked it.
TerenWinterStarAfter: I hope I did good! I tried to pick out something useful but honestly? Everyone's definition of useful is incredibly different, near as I've ever seen.$6#$b#Enjoy the festivities, @, and stay warm.$1
TerenWinterStarReceiveGift: Oh no, you had to go out of your way for me of all people? I'm sorry @! Thank you so much though, I super appreciate this!$1
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.Beer: Oh, super nice. I'll save this to finish off the night with, thank you @. Happy Winter Star to you!$1
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.PaleAle: Did you brew this just for me? Aw, thanks @, you shouldn't have.$1#$b#You're a great gift giver, I hope you received something nice as well.
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.IceCream: You didn't even have to pack it with ice, it's so cold today.$1#$b#Thank you @, ice cream's a great treat after all the feasting I've already done.
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.Pancakes: I'm simply a sucker for a well flapped jack. Thank you @, I could never turn away breakfast food on a holiday.
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.ChocolateCak: This looks fantastic! The frosting looks delicious, I could probably just eat that all on it's own without hesitation.#$b#Thank you @, I love it.$1
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.Cookie: Nice try, mice, this cookie is for me, as a special gift from my friend @.$1#$b#Thank you @, I'll never say no to sweets on a holiday.
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.Lemonstone: I always think it's going to smell like lemon, too.$16#$b#Thank you @, a pretty rock is a perfect gift for Winter Star.$1
Teren.WinterStarReceiveGift.SanguineHear: Last winter, you gave me your heart, the very next day - actually, I hope this isn't your heart. My heart. Anyone's heart, really.$3
TerenFairJudging: Judge not lest ye be judged, ol {{LewisOrLouise}}... Aw, I bet {{LewisOrLouisePronoun1}} doesn't like ominous warnings like that when {{LewisOrLouisePronoun9}} concentrating, huh?
TerenFairPurpleShorts: @, c'mon - you didn't have to drag the man like that.$6#$b#%Teren tries to lecture you but is giggling too much.
TerenFairSkipped: I do *not* blame you. The only thing worse then having to put up a display is having to turn around and take it right back down, am I right?
TerenFairLost: 'Big corruption in small local fair, judge paid off to lie' - sorry, just getting the news headline ready after this travesty of a competition. Better luck next time, @.
TerenFairWon: Nice work, @! Knew you were a shoo-in!$1#$b#Teren gives you a hearty pat on the back in congratulations.
TerenDumpsterDiveComment: I can... make you a sandwich or something if you're hungry, @.$2
TerenHitBySlingshot: HEY! C'mon, this is a civilian area.$2
TerenGreenRain: Oh! Hey, I remember this green stuff! S'not great, but it's not bad!
TerenGreenRainFinished: Time for the post-rain clean up...
TerenGreenRain2: Oh, we're doing this green rain junk regularly now? Sure, fine. Whatever.$1
TerenHitbySlingShotBananaGood: How'd you even manage to fit that into the slingshot?!$10
TerenHitbySlingShotBanana: What are you, an assassin? Don't chuck bananas at me, there's gotta be a less insane way to off me.$7
TerenHitbySlingShotExplosiveAmmo: ...And THAT'S a war crime, @, what the {{BearFamProfanityA}}.$5
TerenHitbySlingShotArrow: The 'arrow to the knee' joke had NOTHING to do with real arrows, @!$5
TerenHitbySlingShotCornucopiaDurian: What is this, boot camp all over again? Knock it off, @.$5
TerenHitbySlingShotCornucopiaPlantain: You're really out here trying to be the death of me, huh?$5
TerendatingGunnar: Little Bear can't stop smiling because of you, y'know. You guys are super cute together.$1
TerenmarriedGunnar: He'd hang the moon and stars for you if you ask. You mean the world to him. Congratulations.$4
TerendivorcedGunnar: Hey, @. Sorry about how things went. I've been keeping an eye on Gunnar, you don't need to worry about him.$2
TerendatingSig: Y'know, you're probably the only person around who can make Big Bear blush.$3
TerenmarriedSig: Congratulations! When Big Bear makes you his number one, it's like you're the only person in the whole wide world.$1#$b#Don't go breaking his heart, now.
TerendivorcedSig: I distinctly said 'don't' go breaking his heart, @.$2#$b#I gotta get going, I don't like letting him wallow.$2
Terenfarmermarriedoneweek.false: Hey @! How is %spouse? I can't imagine how exciting it is for you two and it's only been a matter of days.#$b#Who knows where you'll be in a year!$1
Terenfarmermarried.false: I'm super happy for you and %spouse! Enjoy your journey through life together, you're perfect for each other.$1
Terenfarmermarried.true: We're so perfect for each other, @... I'm so happy to be your husband~$4
Terenfarmermarriedoneweek.true: Eee, one week anniversary! We're gonna stay together forever, @!$4
Terenfirstrailroad: Man, I totally thought I'd hear the train from inside the bathhouse, but that place is surprisingly sound proof!
Terenfirstsewer: The sewer level in a video game is by far my least favorite.
TerengotPet: Oh, tell me everything about %pet! If I had farm space I'd have a dozen dogs and two dozen cats, easily.$1
TerenSquidfest: So whose idea was the festival? Was it... was it the squids? Do they like this kind of thing?
Terenhouseupgradefirst: Big Bear mentioned your home improvement project came out well. It's nice to have a place of your own to really make perfect, right?$1
Terenachievementmorecooking: One of these days I'd love to see your cookbook, I feel like you're a master chef at this point, @.$1
Terenachievementcooking: We should do a recipe swap sometime! I bet you've got great ideas.$1
TerenbuiltStable: %Teren freezes when he spots you.#$b#So.. hay. Er, I mean hey. I mean, horses. I mean -$9#$b#Look, I did cavalry training at basic and the horse tried to eat my uniform jacket and I had to do like a thousand push-ups for my uniform being messed up that day.$7#$b#Anyway, I hope your horse doesn't eat anything important to you, is what I'm saying.
TerenpurchaseDino: You have a dinosaur?!$10#$b#That's so cool! Wait, can I come meet the dino? Please please please *please*?$1
TerengrewPumpkin: Oh your pumpkins are ripe? Pumpkin pie time, heck yeah! I'll have to snag one or two from you so I can get to baking.
TerengrewHops: Y'know, it never occurred to me you could just like... grow hops. I mean, they have to come from somewhere before they're made into alcohol, right?
Teren.caught.MNF.small_swordfish: Catching a swordfish is the first step to becoming some sort of aquatic themed medieval knight, @.$1
Teren.caught.MNF.barracuda: 'You'd have me down, down, down, down on my knees, now, wouldn't you, barracuda?'~$1
Teren.caught.MNF.electric_catfish: 'I said, ooh, girl, shock me like an electric eel'- well, an electric catfish, I suppose, but the song doesn't quite flow then.$1
Teren.caught.Void.kissingfish: Kissing Fish? Wow, @, don't you have anyone else you could kiss before you make out with a fish?$1
Teren.caught.Void.queentriggerfish: All hail the queen triggerfish - any fish that eats squids and clams has my undying fealty, at least.
Teren.caught.Void.stoplightparrotfish: I bet the stoplight parrotfish is *great* at driving. Probably could get you from reef a to reef b with zero legal troubles.
Teren.caught.Void.golddustblackmolly: Wow, that golddust molly is a real special fish, isn't it? Almost too pretty to take out of the wild... but that makes me sound like Gudrun.$1
TerenRejectMovieTicketAlreadyInvited: Ah, sorry, I already have plans to see that with someone else... sorry... raincheck?$7
TerenRejectMovieTicketAlreadyWatched: Ack, just saw that one, you know? It's pretty good though, you definitely shouldn't miss out.
TerenRejectMovieTicketNotInterested: Eh, not my favorite, sorry. I'm sure someone else will be super hyped to see it with you though, @!
TerenRejectMovieTicketDivorced: Not even if it was the last film ever made.$17
TerenRejectMovieTicketDefault: Ah, sorry, I've got some work to catch up so I'm afraid I gotta be responsible and pass this time.
Terendivorced: Hey, I'm... gonna need some space. Like, all of space. Outer space. I'd like to shoot myself into outer space now.$2
Terendumped_Boys: I mean, c'mon... c'mon @... this isn't really sustainable, now is it?$2
TerensecondChance_Boys: Like a fish hook in an open eye, I'm just drawn to you I guess. Reel me in, @.
TerenRejectBouquetAlreadyMarried: I *don't* do that kind of thing, @ - you're supposed to be happy with your partner, right?$17
TerenRejectBouquetDivorced: Outer. Space. That's how much space I want.$2
TerenRejectBouquetVeryLowHearts: Um. Pause. Let's maybe take things a touch slower? Maybe?$7
TerenRejectBouquetLowHearts: You're as divine as anything, @, but I'm an old-fashioned guy. Gotta ask my dad's permission first and all, y'know?
TerenRejectMermaidPendantDivorced: Remember my space request? Still going unfilled right now.$2
TerenRejectMermaidPendantHouseUpgrade: Well. I'm not saying no exactly but I am saying that I'm not the kind of guy who likes living on top of one another, y'know? Did that back in bootcamp, was NOT fun.$16
TerenRejectMermaidPendantNPCinRelationsh: Hey! C'mon, you know I'm with -0-! The light of my life, the boom to my firework, the horizon of my open sea.$2
TerenRejectMermaidPendantPlayerinRelatio: Yeah, you need some help @. And maybe you oughtta look at couple's therapy and try to fix things before it's too late and you lose it all.$5
TerenRejectMermaidPendantUnder8Hearts: Oh, pretty shell! I hope you make someone real happy with it, @!$1
TerenRejectMermaidPendantUnder10Hearts: Well, we're getting there, aren't we? But I need some more time... it's not a 'it's not you, it's me' thing, but it's totally a me thing.$16
TerenRejectMermaidPendantUnder10HeartsAn: C'mon, @. You're the greatest thing since sliced bread and pre-diced onions, but I want us to take things slow and really get ready for the big jump to yes.$2
TerenRejectBouquet: You're sweet, @, but moving just a little fast for me... let's pump the brakes a bit?$7
TerenRejectMermaidPendantNotDatable: Getting a little hasty, huh? I like you plenty @, but let's give it more time.$2
TerenRejectMermaidPendantDefault: W-whoa. I didn't have anything prepared... er, maybe... maybe we can wait? Please? Turning people down feels so cruel.$2
TerenAcceptBouquet: %Teren looks like he might start crying.#$b#H-hey hold on, really? You want me to be your boyfriend? I can't imagine wanting to wear any other rank than 'yours' going forward, @.$4
TerenAcceptPendant: Did you read my mind? This is all I've been dreaming about since we got together, @.#$b#I'm so grateful to have this chance to experience everything the future holds with you.$4
TerenEngaged: What's cooler than being your boyfriend? Being engaged to you. You know what's going to be EVEN cooler than that? Being your husband~$8
TerenAfterWedding: Hello @... What a wonderful day to wake up on, right after making our legal status match our heart status.$4#$b#Let's do this like, A BUNCH more times.$1
TerenSpouseFarmhouseClutter: Make way, coming through! Actually, for real, can we make way? Somehow? Some way? Pleeeeeaaaase?#$b#%Teren pouts at you exaggeratedly.
TerenSpouseGiftJealous: Awww, @, you're so nice to folks. I'm so lucky I married you, I think my karma goes up just because of how generous you are to close friends.$4
TerenSpouseMonstersInHouse: What the f- uh, darling? I'm pretty sure this thing's got to go, peacefully or otherwise.$9
TerenSpouseStardrop: So I skipped out on yet another BORING civil ceremony with some of the returning generals, but Commander Shepard had me requisition a reward for myself anyway.#$b#Which of course would be crazy arrogant of me, so instead I got you... this! Isn't it great? I love you to pieces, @. I'd blow all my honors away for a chance to brighten your day.$8
TerenWipedMemory: Anybody ever tell you you've got one of those faces? I think I've seen your doppelganger back in Zuzu or something because you seem really familiar.#$b#Well, enough of that nonsense, I'm Teren Barnes. My rank? Huh, you guessed I was a soldier just like that, huh...
TerenResEnter: Hello blue skies and sunshine~ Paradise, take me, I'm yours!$1
TerenResLeave: Awww. Why does time have to keep moving? We should be able to stop time when we're somewhere fun and cool.
TerenResShore: I bet the surfing's great here. I should learn to surf. Somebody get me a surf board before I carve one out of a palm tree or something.$1
TerenResUmbrella: I'm gonna get sun blindness if I keep wandering about without resting my eyes. You make sure to take it easy, @. And stay hydrated!
TerenResWander: If we get attacked by pirates I will be SO mad. I couldn't stand the navy back when I was combat-ready, I certainly won't put up with 'em now.$3
TerenResWander2: 'The sun is out, the sky is blue, and all I do is dream of you~ And oh my baby's gone, gone, gone, oh my baby's gone...~'#$b#...I should find someone to teach me how to play the ukulele.$1
TerenResChair: Earlier I tripped in the sand and like three little crabs saw me and I think they're *still* laughing at me so I'm probably going to become a shut-in due to embarrassment now.$16
TerenResBar: %Teren beams when he sees you and raises his glass in a mock toast.#$b#You're late! I'm already drunk!$3#$b#...Naw, I'm not. I'm being responsible, I promise. Make sure you chat up Gus and hydrate though, @.
TerenResTowel: Perfect time to work on my tan if I was the kind of guy who tanned instead of turning into the first human-lobster hybrid via getting bright red sunburn.
TerenResTowel2: %Teren is snoring. Might be a good time to bury him in sand.
TerenResTowel3: 'We have towels at home', okay, sure Big Bear, but are they beach towels spread out across the sand that allow me to absorb all the resort vibes I want and deserve? That big jerk.
TerenResort: Ahh, resort life. Mermaids, sea monsters, suntans - we can have it all! ...What do you mean the first two are a no-go? {{BearFamProfanityJ}}.
Teren.PolyMod.CantDate: You are *so* sweet, @! But you probably need to consider your partner before rushing into this, right?$7
Teren.PolyMod.CantMarry: You're just super, @! But it's not fair to your partner's wishes of monogamy, really.$7
Teren.RejectBouquet.AlreadyAccepted.Enga: Aww, you got me flowers! @, you're the perfect person to get married to.$4
Teren.RejectBouquet.AlreadyAccepted.Marr: Aw, I'd love to be your boyfriend but I hope I can stay your husband too.$8
Teren.RejectBouquet.AlreadyAccepted.Defa: You're just the sweetest, @. Even when you're repeating yourself.
Teren.RejectMermaidPendant.AlreadyAccept: The pendant's gorgeous but I don't need another one. This one's already my fave after all.$8
I know the answer to this question! Yes, a thousand times over.$4
Asking again? What, you looking for a different answer now?$3
Teren.Dialogue.Summit.2: Hear that? The hills are alive with 'hellos' for you, ringing out across this wide expanse of sky before us.$4
Teren.Dialogue.Summit.3: Thinking back through all the time we've had together.../pause 1000/speak spouse "We've gone through so much! And we've done so much! We're really kicking {{BearFamProfanityO}} at this growing together thing.$1#$b#You're my favorite person to do this all with, you know.$20
Teren.Dialogue.Summit.4: And here we stand now, hand in *loveable* hand.$4
Teren.Dialogue.Summit.5: Let's make a promise here in this endless blue sky, @.#$b#We'll wait for each other, through all that life brings us, no matter what.#$b#%Teren reaches out and taps your chest, right over your heart.#$b#I'll be waiting, right here for you, promise. ...I love you, @.$8
Teren.Dialogue.Children.1: I wasn't ready for {0}. How can anyone be ready to feel so much love so quickly?
Teren.Dialogue.Children.2: I thought there'd be more terror and tears but I think {0} simply radiates pure delight instead.
Teren.Dialogue.Children.Second.1: These kids seem so much like you... as if I need more reason to love them.
Teren.Dialogue.Children.Second.2: This is *our* family. OUR family. I don't think I'll ever get sick of saying that.
Teren.Dialogue.Engagement.First: Going to fill your house - *our* house - with so many baked goods...#$b#I'll make sure you want for nothing when you come home to me, @.$4
Teren.Dialogue.Engagement.Second: First comes love, then comes marriage - but right marriage feels like it's taking it's sweet time.#$b#We should've eloped, @~$20
Teren.Dialogue.Engagement.Third: I didn't even think when we met that I'd becomes yours and you'd become mine.#$b#I'm so happy we both wound up in here in the Valley... it's fate.$8
Message.Teren.PlayerKilled.Mines.02: {{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}! Oh no, oh no - are you okay? @!
Teren.PlayerKilled.Mines.03: You scared the living daylights out of me, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}!$2#$b#C'mon, let's get you outta here and back to %farm where you can recover... Please, for me?$17
Harvey.Teren.PlayerKilled.Skull.03: It's your lucky day, @. Teren found you outside of the Skull Cavern and brought you to me as quickly he could manage.$2#$b#Things looked a bit alarming for awhile but you're going to be just fine, now.$2
Teren.PlayerKilled.Skull.04: Holy {{BearFamProfanityA}}, @... Seeing you like that... I can't imagine how scary it was for you...$2#$b#I'm sorry, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}...$2
Teren.PlayerKilled.Skull.05: Hey, Doctor? {{CPPN1}} will be okay, right? You fixed everything?
Harvey.Teren.PlayerKilled.Skull.06: I fixed everything that I could, Sergeant. Now it's up to {{LPPN2}} to rest and recover.
Harvey.Teren.PlayerKilled.Skull.07: Let me give you two a few moments while I get your paperwork together, @.
Teren.PlayerKilled.Skull.08: Oh, my {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}... I dunno what I'd do if you didn't open your gorgeous eyes again... I can't imagine my life without you...$2#$b#If there's anything I can do to make it so you never have to step foot in that awful cavern again... Please, @... I gotta protect you however I can.$2
Teren.Dialogue.Marriage.1: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if {{LPPN1}}'d fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Teren.Dialogue.Marriage.2: @... %spouse... #$b#As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I officially and happily declare you two wedded soulmates.
TerenSpring18: How many flowers is too many flowers for the most wonderful Auntie in the world? Spoilers, no such thing! Auntie deserves it all.$1
TerenSpring27: Don't worry, tomorrow's a perfectly normal, no special events happening, summer day. I promise.$3
TerenFall18.true: Oh no, what should I get Big Bear for his birthday? He already has the greatest gift he could have - me!$3#$b#Gunnar's getting a military grade first aid kit, and I'm going to show him how to block so he stops coming home all beat up.
TerenFall18.false: Since two out of four Bears had the audacity to have birthdays tomorrow, I wound up going into Zuzu with Auntie to buy them some new games.#$b#Of course, we'll have to have some kind of gaming tournament tomorrow and how could I possibly *not* participate and beat both of them?$3
TerenWinter23: %Teren apparently has a pocket full of seashells, if the rattling he makes is anything to go by.#$b#Girls like jewelry, right? And Gudrun likes recycling... Yeah, this will totally pan out, I'm brilliant.
TerenWinter28: Spring save me. Spring. Save me spring.$16#$b#%Teren DOES look remarkably cold today.
TerenSpring12: I wonder what things other cultures hide around the public square and corral children into hunting down.#$b#Hopefully it's something cool like puppies. Or dragons.$1
TerenSpring23: 'So now I gotta cut loose, footloose, kick off the Sunday shoes'~ Well, that's not 'til tomorrow at least.$1
TerenSummer10: Grilling out in the summer time is such an essential part of my life - why limit ourselves to just tomorrow? Potluck every night, let's go!
TerenSummer27: Gudrun cornered me and threatened dismemberment if I tried to bring a fishing pole to tomorrow night.$10#$b#So, you know, just watch your back around that one.$7
TerenFall15: What if I ran away and joined the Fair folk? I'd make a great Strongman - okay, well, no I wouldn't.$6
TerenFall26: Spirit's Eve was always kind of a flop during deployment. 'Oh what are you dressing as this year? A sergeant? Wow, me too'.$6
TerenWinter7: Well, Gudrun's giving me the silent treatment, so that's neat. Now if only I could get Big Bear to follow suit for a day....$3
TerenWinter.1: Whoa, a three night party where someone is going to GIVE me coffee? Moving to Pelican Town was the most brilliant move of my adulthood, let's be real.$3
TerenWinter.2: Tried to get a mermaid's shell-phone number but I'm afraid they're simply too good for me. They were super sweet about it though.$11
TerenWinter.3: %Teren seems to be fairly hyper. It's free coffee night, after all.#$b#Hey@hopeyouhavefun!$6
TerenWinter24: Remember to dress warm and save plenty of room for feasting. I mean, it's, kind of in the name, right?
Teren.Birthday.ED.Eli.true: I had a whole date - well, kind of a date - you know - a bunch of activities! Planned for Eli but *apparently* I have to share his attention with Dylan, which is unfair and unkind to me.#$b#But Eli's all mine after sunset.$3
Teren.Birthday.ED.Eli.false: I thought about sparring with Eli for his birthday - because he likes testing himself, right? But I also don't wanna get my {{BearFamProfanityO}} kicked by a guy younger than me, y'know?$16
Teren.Birthday.ED.Dylan: I figured I'd stop by tomorrow with a home-cooked lunch for Dylan since he'd kick up a fuss if anyone ever did him anything kindly.
Teren.Birthday.ROB.Rodney: O'Brien? I'm bringing him some hot gossip about how much Gudrun actually likes his work so he can make fun of her later. I figure, it's his birthday, he ought to have a little fun, right?$3
Teren.Birthday.NtH.Nora: Tomorrow's a great day to gift a cute girl a box full of tiny wriggly geckos, you know.$3
Teren.Birthday.DiTR.Eve: I'm not giving Eve any explosives for her birthday, I'm giving myself ear plugs so she has the freedom to explode whatever her heart desires.
Teren.Birthday.DiTR.Trace: %Teren has a pair of nice shiny new red silicon oven mitts that he's trying to hide.#$b#...Oh! You scared me, @, I thought you were Trace. Shh, don't tell them you saw his birthday gift.$1
Teren.Birthday.DiTR.Waffle: I love a good dog birthday. 'Wow, you look so good for being seven years older, who's a good pupper? Awww!'$1
Teren.Birthday.SnS.Mateo.true: You know how to celebrate an anthropologist's birthday? You throw them a bone-nanza.$1#$b#Or you bring them lunch when they go caving, either way's good for 'em.
Teren.Birthday.SnS.Cirrus.true: Pretty girls who can rock the 'tar shouldn't have any stress on their birthdays.#$b#That's why I sent flowers and some freshly made bagels over to her this morning, so she wouldn't have to deal with me being a music geek at her.$1
Teren.Birthday.SnS.Mateo.false: What'd the prehistoric comedian say to the audience? 'I'm here all epoch'.$1
Teren.Birthday.SnS.Cirrus.false: I could totally go for some classic rock and roll today. A little Jailhouse Rock today, maybe a little rockabilly tomorrow...
Teren.Birthday.MGC.Cambria: What do you get the girl who has everything but those insubstantial things we all quietly crave? ...I'll pop 'round with some mead, I think.
Teren.Birthday.SVE.Victor: Ah, {{BearFamProfanityA}}, I've got to remember to have lunch with Victor tomorrow. I owe him like six re-matches gaming wise and you know what tomorrow is.
Teren.Birthday.RSV.Pika: Pika's a pretty chill guy who doesn't need a whole of lot fizz and jazz on his birthday, so what I *am* doing is submitting the restaurant to various culinary awards places so he gets all the buzz and excitement his cooking deserves.$1
TerenMountainEntry3: It's a long walk, but worth it.
TerenMountainEntry4: I should say hi to Robin.
TerenSaloonEntry2: A round for everyone today, Big Bear is paying!
TerenSaloonEntry3: Hi Gus, what's on the menu?
TerenSaloonEntry4: Hi Gus! I'm starving, what have ya got?
TerenRailroadEntry1: 'He's leavin', leavin', on that midnight train to Tanker Grove...'
TerenRailroadEntry2: 'You see them long trains runnin'... and you watch them disappear...'
TerenRailroadEntry3: 'Don't you feel like you're a rider on a downbound train?'
TerenRailroadEntry4: 'When I hear that whistle blowin', I hang my head and cry...'
TerenTownEntry1: So much to do, so little time.
TerenTownEntry3: Did I just see a walking apple?
TerenHospitalEntry2: Here to borrow your fax again, Dr. Havey!
TerenHospitalEntry3: How's it going today, Doc? Maru?
TerenESVillageEntry2: 'Good eye, sniper... Here, I'll shoot, you run...'
TerenESVillageEntry3: 'You know you do, you kill me well...'
TerenDialogue04.1: I sometimes still use army jargon even though it feels super tacky to do so. I think my biggest ones are 'a-firm' and 'good copy'.#$b#Big Bear keeps laughing at me whenever I don't catch them in time.
TerenDialogue04.2: Y'know, I never understand those people can trace their familial lineage back like five hundred years.$7#$b#My mom mentioned *her* mom's mom and I was shocked to learn my grandma didn't simply manifest as an eighty year old woman one day.$16
TerenDialogue04.3: My favorite reusable grocery bag has a hole in it. What's the point of sustainable shopping if local produce is destroying my things?$2#$b#Don't tell Gudrun I said that.
TerenDialogue04.4: I'd be unstoppable if I weren't so sleepy today.#$b#%Teren yawns so hard his jaw pops.
TerenDialogue04.5: My mom's gathering a bunch of old family recipes for me.$1#$b#It's nice of her and all but my grandma swore by her creamy grape salad recipe and I'll tell you what I'd *never* tell her. It sucks.$7
TerenDialogue04.6: I saw the fattest chicken at Marnie's the other day. Shane saw me staring but I can*not* repeat what he said.#$b#His humor would fit right in with the average soldier though.
TerenDialogue04.7: I like every animal. Some people don't like cats because allegedly they'll eat you if you die, but to me that's plain efficiency. Work smarter, not harder.#$b#Is it true? I dunno, I've never died so a cat's never tried to eat me.
TerenDialogue04.8: I used to promise myself I'd do fun things when I was less tired, but I'm never less tired.#$b#I'm starting to think it's a conspiracy.$2
TerenDialogue04.9: Why did movies stop having intermissions? I'm a simple guy, I finish my soda before the trailers end and need a bathroom break shortly after.
TerenDialogue04.10: Had a scare at Dr. Harvey's the other day. I guess my chart didn't list my latex allergy.#$b#Well, at least he's a doctor so it would've probably been fine.
TerenDialogue04.11: What do I do for a living? Oh, I work with Veteran Affairs now, I help match retired soldiers with the benefits and support they need to acclimate back to civilian life.#$b#As someone who went through the process already, it's a responsibility near and dear to me.
TerenDialogue04.12: I wouldn't trade my job for the world... but I sometimes wish it would pay a little more.#$b#I guess it could be worse, but I wouldn't be mad if it got better.
TerenDialogue04.13: Anytime I see an advertisement about 'the secret scientists don't want you to know', I know it's a lie.#$b#There's not a single scientist willing to shut up about their discoveries. Not a single one. Regular chatterboxes, they are.#$b#Demetrius bumped into me at Pierre's and gave me the most detailed insight to the common 'chub' I've ever been privy to out of nowhere.$1
TerenDialogue04.14: %Teren waves at you but doesn't stop to chat. The bags under his eyes are deep and dark. He must've had a rough night.
TerenDialogue04.15: Have you ever smelled a candle so good you struggled not to eat it?#$b#What? No, I haven't, that's *so* weird, why would I?$9
TerenDialogue04.16: I could never be a album review writer because I'd be like 'yay, new music, great job everyone' no matter the quality.$1
TerenDialogue04.17: Kittens are a top contender for the title of most cute because they consist of triangles. Triangle ears, triangle tails... they're just acute!
TerenDialogue04.18: I like casual bird watching but it's especially nice when Eloise is around and tells me exactly what bird I was watching.#$b#Don't ever tell her I can't remember the names, I'd feel terrible if she knew how bad my memory is.
TerenDialogue04.19: I get lost pretty easily. The worst time was when I got separated from my squadmates - they had all the tents and food!
TerenDialogue04.20: Oh man, I forgot to update the location on my dating profile. I was getting matches from back in Zuzu still, oops.
TerenDialogue04.21: Gus is a nice guy and all but Rosa's baking can't be beat. Another added bonus is that she doesn't mind me loitering around the Inn, distracting her by asking for cooking advice.
TerenDialogue04.22: I was today years old when I learned the blocks in Shapetris have names. #$b#My favorite's Smashboy but Blue Ricky is a close runner up.
TerenDialogue04.23: Back in the city it took a lot of self control not to order cookies for delivery.#$b#Like, A LOT of self-control. I didn't have much actually.
TerenDialogue04.24: Seeing an animal in clothes makes me so happy. Dogs in vests, birds in scarves, cats in hats, I love them all.$1
TerenDialogue04.25: One thing I really regret is that I never got to have a hot mess era. I went straight from obnoxious teenage boy to man who shaves daily.#$b#No way, I don't have the jawline for facial hair.
TerenDialogue04.26: Where do bad rainbows go?#$b#To prism. They can reflect during their light sentence.$3
TerenDialogue04.27: I love it when a store has a pet and that pet is the employee of the month. {{BearFamProfanityA}} yeah, great job Mr. Whiskers, get that payday.
TerenDialogue04.28: I'm really glad I have a desk job now. I like being active, but I think I'm just slowing down as I get older... Not that I'm old!$7
TerenDialogue04.29: %Teren looks drained.#$b#Hello @! Work's been a *lot* tough lately, I'm afraid I'm not feeling very friendly or conversational today.
TerenDialogue04.30: Sometimes I envy Big Bear's ability to ignore the army.#$b#I swear I still get calls from every commander I ever served under, and it just feels rude to block their numbers.
TerenDialogue04.Spring.1: I was watching a rabbit burrow into Aideen's garden bed, and I must've jumped ten feet when Aideen asked why I was snooping around.#$b#Telling her about the rabbit burrow didn't exactly delight her.
TerenDialogue04.Spring.2: I swear in the city, fruits and veggies would expire if you so much as looked at them funny. Totally different out here.
TerenDialogue04.Spring.3: When an animal doesn't like me, I'm haunted by what it means about me personally.#$b#Yeah, a squirrel saw me and ran like I was the devil.$2
TerenDialogue04.Spring.4: I keep forgetting to send my mom flowers. She loves daffodils so you'd think seeing them pop up out of the ground constantly would help me remember, right?
TerenDialogue04.Spring.5: I always feel like a dork for keeping my sweatshirts handy after winter, but then on a brisk day, it's just the extra layer I need to stay comfy.#$b#I guess farming means you probably work up a sweat regardless of the season, huh?
TerenDialogue04.Summer.1: I saw the softest looking cat lurking near the beach the other day.#$b#I wanted to go introduce myself but it scattered as soon as it saw me.
TerenDialogue04.Summer.2: The Lodge has great air conditioning, but every time I step outside I sweat instantly.#$b#I need to find lighter weight long sleeved shirts but I'm starting to think they're mythical.
TerenDialogue04.Summer.3: Haley suggested I put some lemon juice in my hair to help lighten it - I couldn't admit that the only time my hair gets lighter is when my grays kick in...#$b#Anyway, that's why I smell like lemonade.$1
TerenDialogue04.Summer.4: It's that time of year where my heart tells me to try surfing.#$b#Thankfully, my common sense and body tell me *not* to so I don't risk breaking a bone out at sea like a total dork.$1
TerenDialogue04.Summer.5: It's too hot to bake anything! But I really want to, you see my dilemma?
TerenDialogue04.Fall.1: I think I've almost perfected home-brewing a pumpkin spice latte.#$b#It is *significantly* easier to get one made for you, though.
TerenDialogue04.Fall.2: I was checking out things at the library earlier, and the kids were rowdy so Penny told them to sit criss cross applesauce... and like a small child, I also obeyed.
TerenDialogue04.Fall.3: Picture it. You're in a slasher film, hiding for your life, and then you see the killer trip.#$b#I'd die immediately because I'd start laughing and get caught.
TerenDialogue04.Fall.4: Going to watch the leaves fall sounds like a romantic date, right?$4#$b#But if you're like, the guy that lives in the house with the leafiest trees, you're just stuck watching a bunch of weirdos gaze longingly into your yard.#$b#Must really disrupt a person's morning coffee, when you think about it.$1
TerenDialogue04.Fall.5: How come no one ever tells you to step inside a comfier zone? It's always step outside your comfort zone.$2#$b#Miss me with that, I'm only stepping outside if I have the biggest, fluffiest, comfiest sweater from now on.
TerenDialogue04.Winter.1: You know those PSAs that are like 'if you're cold, they're cold, bring them inside'?#$b#Does that apply to wild animals like baby deer or possums?
TerenDialogue04.Winter.2: %Teren is humming something. Is that a holiday song?#$b#Oh, hey @! Ack, I can't get that song from the car dealership commercial out of my head!#$b#I'd probably have a panic attack if my partner just randomly bought us a new car for the holidays, now that I think about it...$2
TerenDialogue04.Winter.3: Seasonal depression shouldn't have that acronym. I know I'm SAD, you don't have to remind me with a specific acronym that expressly says it.$2#$b#Hm? I'm okayish. Knowing's half the battle and all that... See ya around, @.$17
TerenDialogue04.Winter.4: %Teren is singing a little made up song.#$b#Soup season, soup season, I almost cut my thumb off chopping vege-ta-bles for soup season~$1
TerenDialogue04.Winter.5: %Teren nods at you but doesn't seem to be keen on talking. Maybe the weather is bringing him down today.
TerenDialogue610.1: Had a scare at Dr. Harvey's the other day. I guess my chart didn't list my latex allergy.#$b#Well, at least he's a doctor so it would've probably been fine.
TerenDialogue610.2: I think one of the greatest feelings in the world is when someone remembers every little tiny detail about you.$4#$b#You really like %favorite, right?
TerenDialogue610.3: One time I took a girl out to dinner and when she found out I was a veteran, she started shoving breadsticks in her purse and left.
TerenDialogue610.4: I think I've almost convinced my mom to visit. She doesn't like intruding on my life because she's afraid of being a 'boy mom'.#$b#I've tried to explain to her I'm over thirty and she's never been that kind of stereotype, but she still gets anxious.
TerenDialogue610.5: Stayed up late playing The Excavation with Gun and Sig.#$b#Gudrun wouldn't stay with us; I guess scary games aren't her bag... they're not mine either, to be completely honest, I hid behind a throw pillow a lot.
TerenDialogue610.6: Sometimes I want to join in the family trip back to Zuzu, but I've met Big Bear's grandmother exactly once, and I hope to {{BearFamProfanityA}} I'll keep it that way for the rest of my life.$7
TerenDialogue610.7: Sig would make a great cowboy. Gun would be a pretty decent lawman.#$b#Oh Gudrun has absolutely robbed a train.$3#$b#You look at the eco-terrorist in the making and tell me she hasn't considered crime.$1
TerenDialogue610.8: Living with the Bears is nice because there's always someone to hang out with.$1#$b#Music appreciation with Auntie, helping Gudrun spam email mega-corporations, drinking whatever Gun's cooked up.#$b#Oh and Big Bear, of course.$3
TerenDialogue610.9: Once I got back home to Zuzu I spent a lot of time staring at the way the city lights reflected on wet concrete.#$b#After so many years of camping in mostly wilderness, it was a new kind of eerie, to be honest.$2
TerenDialogue610.10: The biggest battle I gave up on as a civilian was matching and folding my socks. Who cares if they're different? Who cares if they're wrinkled? The army, that's who.
TerenDialogue610.11: A fun thing to do is donate blood and then have a beer because you will get tipsy real fast and also help save lives.#$b#Don't do the beer part, actually, this is a joke and I am a terrible influence.$7
TerenDialogue610.12: The pizza from cartoons has to be the tastiest thing I'll never get to eat.#$b#Close runner up is the windowsill pies that make people levitate.#$b#...I guess pizza's technically a pie, huh?
TerenDialogue610.13: Like many people, I have a favorite playlist, and like many people I skip eighty percent of the songs on it.
TerenDialogue610.14: One time I went on a date with a guy who told me he traveled for work. Imagine my surprise the next night when he delivered my pizza.
TerenDialogue610.15: I tend to be listening to something all the time. Music, lo-fi beats, white noise - I love audio.#$b#We should hang out sometime and trade song recommendations.$1
TerenDialogue610.16: A real fun fact about me and Big Bear is that we played gridball together during high school.#$b#No, wait, hold on - he attended some hoity-toity private school - we played gridball AGAINST each other in high school. Didn't find out til long after we were assigned to the same squad. Funny how the world works, right?$1
TerenDialogue610.17: I used to be a real serial flirter but always as a joke... I stopped when I realized it wasn't always the kindest way to treat people.#$b#Now I just focus on being more kind.
TerenDialogue610.18: When I'm dating someone, their clothes are my clothes. I become a 'don't ask why I'm wearing your shirt, it's our shirt now, comrade' kind of guy.$1
TerenDialogue610.19: I wish my metabolism worked as fast as my overthinking.#$b#But nooooo, I have to maintain a weekly fitness routine and worry a joke I made last night was so dumb it made my friends hate me, instead.
TerenDialogue610.20: My mom signed me up for a bunch of magazine subscriptions... the most boring is Golf Courses of Ferngill. The weirdest by far is Cryptozoology Today.
TerenDialogue610.21: %Teren is limping slightly and barely manages to turn his wince into a smile when he sees you.#$b#Hey @... Ah, yeah, I was trying an advanced yoga routine and did it completely wrong. I don't know enough about muscles to know which one I pulled, but I sure regret it now.$2
TerenDialogue610.22: I'm so embarrassed. I had two long video meetings yesterday and I had *no* idea my shirt was on backwards the whole time.$7#$b#Rosa kindly informed me when I stopped by the Inn for lunch, but wow, talk about a terrible impression.$2
TerenDialogue610.23: It's nice living at the Lodge - I had an apartment when I returned to Ferngill but it was so lonely.#$b#Knowing there's other people around feels more familiar after being deployed for so long.
TerenDialogue610.24: Isn't super weird that once you're an adult, people stop asking what your favorite dinosaur is?#$b#Mine's the bambiraptor, easily. It sounds adorable! It's probably not.
TerenDialogue610.25: %Teren has two vinyl albums in his hands as he walks by you. He doesn't stop to chat; he must want to get home and listen to them right away.
TerenDialogue610.26: *Yawn*. Sorry @, I was up all night playing Cora Loft, I'm beat.#$b#I think my favorite is for sure Shade of the Necropolis Bandit, but I've been a fan of the series since I was a kid.
TerenDialogue610.27: I'm having a real fuzzy brain day. Finished my lunch break and grabbed a cupcake for dessert, then came back to my room to work... and threw the cupcake on my bed and tried to bite my cellphone. Yep. One of those days.
TerenDialogue610.28: I mean what is music taste if not teenage angst persevering?$1#$b#%Teren grins and wanders off, humming some old song you might have heard ten years ago.
TerenDialogue610.29: My biggest fear when meeting someone else's pet is that I'll accidentally try and steal it...#$b#My second biggest fear is stealing it on purpose.
TerenDialogue610.30: There are some conveniences of the city I miss. Food trucks, mostly.#$b#I got really used to going to food trucks once I finished up deployment and returned home, haha.
TerenDialogue610.31: I finally got my speaker setup exactly how I like it. If you ever want to borrow an album, let me know! I've got all the classics.
TerenDialogue610.32: Every once in a while Big Bear and I stay up into the wee hours of the morning drinking mead and talking.#$b#I don't think we've ever run out of things to talk about.#$b#We have run out of mead though.
TerenDialogue610.33: Growing up it was just me and my mom. Well, she was a grown up but you know what I mean.#$b#Things were tough sometimes but I never went without. She's a great lady.$1
TerenDialogue610.34: My favorite book is 'Where the Red Fern Grows'. Don't... uh, read it if you're a bleeding heart like me.$2
TerenDialogue610.35: Big Bear does a bulk of the household chores. He was the same during deployment, kept our camp spotless.#$b#Me? I just stay out of his way and try not to leave a mess, haha.$1
TerenDialogue610.36: If a zombie outbreak happened I'd be the first to go.#$b#I know, I was in the Army, but I'm ultimately too naive and trusting.#$b#I'd believe every bite victim was safe to let into our camp even as they were gnawing on my brain.$1
TerenDialogue610.37: One time a man took me out to a fancy restaurant and almost immediately asked if I'd be 'his good boy' and I responded by pushing my wine glass off the table like a cat and leaving.
TerenDialogue610.38: I don't think I could pick a favorite album or band if I tried. Obviously emo is my favorite genre.#$b#But there's too many solid bops in that genre to go more specific from there.
TerenDialogue610.39: I don't know how you have enough time in the day for everything, @.#$b#I barely manage to get enough exercise per week, never mind trying to run a farm day to day!
TerenDialogue610.40: I was on the phone with my mom yesterday and she finally walked me through how to make grandma's banana bread.#$b#She always get worried because I've got a latex allergy and I always react to bananas but I stayed safe. Here, I saved some for you! [(O)MadDog.HashtagBearFam_BananaBread]
TerenDialogue610.41: I could replay Empty Paladin a hundred times over. Waiting for VelvetVerse has been agony.
TerenDialogue610.42: One huge change from living in the city is the wild animals. I'd pass an alleyway back in Zuzu and get hissed at by a raccoon, and here they practically offer me food like I'm some animated prince.
TerenDialogue610.43: My mother travels more now that she's retired. She wants to see Gotoro after the ceasefire becomes a peace treaty.#$b#I think I'll go with her, show her the hidden wonders.$1
TerenDialogue610.44: I wasn't always Sig's squad leader. We were up for field promotions at the same time and I barely managed to beat him. Wouldn't trade him for the world though.
TerenDialogue610.45: When I was a kid growing up I had this big old shepherd named Sasquatch. He was my best friend, used to walk me to school. Dogs are just great.$1
TerenDialogue610.46: Ah, no, I forgot to charge my gametoy last night. ...And my phone. ...Aaaaand my laptop. My brain's like a colander sometimes, full of holes.
TerenDialogue610.47: One thing I miss about the army is the K-9 Corps. My unit worked with quite a few different dogs, but every single one was the bestest most goodest boy or girl out there.
TerenDialogue610.48: I have been stealing hoodies like crazy - but I get cold super easily. Thankfully, no one's ever called me out for it so far.
TerenDialogue610.49: So I over-roasted dinner. I guess technically the term is *burned* but I think my phrase is more kind to me.#$b#The food was not kind to anyone, but none of the Bears complained; they're real good sports like that.
TerenDialogue610.50: Admittedly, after being deployed in Gotoro for so long, I kinda stopped strictly adhering to uniform standards.#$b#And once I was made CO of my own squad, I threw those rules out almost entirely.#$b#I'll never buzz all my hair off again now that I'm completely free.
TerenDialogue610.51: When I was a little kid I wanted to marry a plucky librarian who spoke dead languages and could throw knives.#$b#No, I didn't watch one specific movie on repeat a bunch, why do you ask?$1
TerenDialogue610.52: %Teren seems very exhausted.#$b#Hello @. Sorry, had a rough night, I don't think I can be witty or engaging right now.$2
TerenDialogue610.53: I think the biggest scam I've ever pulled off was when I forged my mom's signature on a permission slip for a field trip back when I was a kid.#$b#It turns out, they don't check that against any references, they just believe whatever's there. I almost got caught once though...#$b#How? Oh, I uh... signed 'mom' instead of 'Gloria Barnes' one time, haha. Luckily, my old history teacher just thought my mom was trying to be funny$1
TerenDialogue610.54: Sometimes headphones aren't enough, I need a song to possess me and rewrite the fabric of my very being.$1
TerenDialogue610.55: One time a woman and I went on a date and I told her a joke as an icebreaker and got a text message shortly after that was just my same joke with several skull emojis. There wasn't a second date.
TerenDialogue610.56: My school years were the heyday of the emo scene. Girls with stripey hair and boys with black nail polish.#$b#I almost miss the aesthetic but at least the music will last forever.
TerenDialogue610.57: You know, I find solace in a lot of old emo albums. Like, sure there's new music and it's equally sad and thought provoking, but sometimes the classics sound more right than anything else I hear.
TerenDialogue610.58: I've had pretty terrible dating luck since my deployment completed.#$b#Well, I guess it wasn't great while I was enlisted, but I could always blame the army for that back then.$1
TerenDialogue610.59: I want to be a cool guy who can say puns all the time, but I always end up laughing too easily. It's probably the quickest way to my heart, a sense of humor.$1
TerenDialogue610.60: One of the weirdest parts of being an adult is having a favorite news station and meteorologist.#$b#Never thought it would happen to me, but here I am, a diehard KOZU 5 guy.
TerenDialogue610.Spring.1: Gunnar has the worst spring allergies.#$b#I always feel bad for laughing but watching him attempt to sharpen his sword while sneezing every coherent thought out of his head is incredibly hilarious.$1
TerenDialogue610.Spring.2: Went out past Marnie's house just looking for something to do but she's such a sweetheart.#$b#She invited me in, asked how I was adjusting from Zuzu and fed me a great farmer's lunch with fresh parsnips.$1#$b#With cooking like that, she could win the heart of anybody.
TerenDialogue610.Spring.3: The hike up to the bathhouse has been really nice lately. Wound up walking it the other day with Abigail.$1#$b#She and I chatted about her mom's uh... 'investment' in people's personal lives.#$b#Even though Abigail's not a little kid anymore, she gets the same thorough questioning as anybody else does... Maybe spring time just makes Caroline think about young romance?
TerenDialogue610.Spring.4: My mom called all excited. Not only did she receive my 'just thinking about you' flowers, but she has a *secret admirer*!#$b#She thinks it's one of her neighbors but I think it's her mailman.#$b#You know back when she broke her leg, he made sure to water her flowers for her so she didn't have to wrestle the hose while on crutches.$8
TerenDialogue610.Spring.5: My mom's got a date with some guy she won't give me any details about!$2#$b#He's taking her to see the cherry blossoms on the river.#$b#She's packing a picnic for them to share, isn't that so cute? I should plan a picnic sometime, huh?$8#$b#I gotta get intel on this guy, stat.$17
TerenDialogue610.Summer.1: %Teren is tugging at the collar of his shirt, clearly suffering in the summer heat.#$b#Hey @! Make sure you stay hydrated. And don't you just drink juice!#$b#Water's important for you and your crops, and it's too hot to have to cart you all the way to Harvey if you faint!$2#$b#It's too hot to cart me there, either, to be honest...$7
TerenDialogue610.Summer.2: How the heck does Alex manage to make ice cream making look so easy?#$b#My arm's about to fall off from all the cranking -#$b#Do *not* take that out of context, @.$7#$b#Anyway, here's some homemade ice cream that Alex taught me how to make, perfect for today. [233]
TerenDialogue610.Summer.3: So, video game quick time events, right? They *suck*.$5#$b#My hands were so sweaty I dropped the controller right before I got gored by a triceratops.#$b#There's no winning in this heat, is there?$2
TerenDialogue610.Summer.4: I feel like I go through headphones super fast... I've been jogging at night lately and they keep slipping off my big ol' head.$7#$b#So far Dr. Jacob has found them and returned them, but not before a crab's waddled over them and cracked 'em.$2
TerenDialogue610.Summer.5: I feel like every television show has a beach episode airing right now.#$b#Although, I say that, but I guess we have our own real life beach episode - the Moonlight Jellies!$1#$b#Far superior in every way to TV, besides.$3
TerenDialogue610.Fall.1: Carved a bunch of gruesome pumpkins with the Bears and then Aunt Sondra and I roasted the pumpkin seeds.#$b#I'd offer you some, but we ate them all like a pack of piranhas on a steak.
TerenDialogue610.Fall.2: I was checking out things at the library earlier, and the kids were rowdy so Penny told them to sit criss cross applesauce... and like a small child, I also obeyed.#$b#Look, I'm only somewhat *charming*, not somewhat *smart*.$1
TerenDialogue610.Fall.3: I'm one of those dorks that says he likes scary movies or games but then gets absolutely anxious watching them.#$b#Big Bear's nice enough to play the horror games for me, and he only sometimes makes fun of me for hiding behind a throw pillow for safety.$16
TerenDialogue610.Fall.4: Look I know it's traditionally turnips, but do you think I could carve a parsnip into a neepie lantern?#$b#I'm serious, this feels like it has merit. Everyone's got pumpkins, I could have both and ward off the most evil spirits!$1
TerenDialogue610.Fall.5: There was a raccoon inside of my jack'o'lantern!#$b#This is the best week ever! I named him Garth Tanooks. He's going to be a country-western music star for Spirit's Eve.$1
TerenDialogue610.Winter.1: I'm never ready for winter, it just hits me like a snowball in the back of the skull. Which is also what Big Bear did to me early this morning.$5
TerenDialogue610.Winter.2: Really relieved Big Bear handles shoveling.#$b#I get a little nervous my shoulder's too weak for ongoing manual labor. Harvey said I'm fine, but I can't help but worry.$2
TerenDialogue610.Winter.3: %Teren is wrestling with his scarf but ultimately loses the battle, unwinding it entirely to shove it into his coat.#$b#I used to be the king of striped scarves and studded wristbands back in my school days, y'know.$1
TerenDialogue610.Winter.4: They say no two snowflakes are identical but... neither are thumb-prints? So snowflakes *aren't* that special.#$b#Actually, my thumb-prints probably are identical to someone's, I've got enough scarring on my hands from my time deployed that they're for sure matchy matchy now.$7
TerenDialogue610.Winter.5: I'm a sucker for pop-punk or emo covers of holiday music.#$b#Sure, it's just a quick cash grab usually and they're still just the same holiday songs over and over, but I can't resist the gimmick.$1
TerenDialogueSASS.1: Someday I'm going to find my soulmate, and we're going to travel the world with Sassy.#$b#But I like to think we'll always be able to come home here in the Scarp.#$b#Back home to the city? No way, not when I'm like seventy. That's probably how long it'll take me to find a soulmate, anyway...
TerenDialogueSASS.2: I got Sassy's frisbee stuck in a tree and couldn't get it down so now I'm the bad guy.$2
TerenDialogueSASS.3: I was super worried because Sassy was acting like her tail hurt so I went to Dr. Jacob and he determined she sprained it from wagging it too much.#$b#My girl is TOO happy! So now I try not to hype her up too much while she recovers.$1
TerenDialogueSASS.4: Sassy stole the novel I'd had on loan and carried it to the river so a frog could sit on it.#$b#Then she brought the wet book, with the frog riding it, back to Gunther...#$b#Needless to say, I am reading e-books for the foreseeable future.
TerenDialogueSASS.5: I spent all day at the beach with Sassy the other day, it was the best day ever.#$b#I think every day I spend with my dog is the best day ever, though so don't take my word for it.
TerenDialogueSASS.6: The last storm we had knocked down a ginormous tree branch and Sassy tried to bring it inside... Big Bear helped me mop up, but I felt real bad about the mess regardless.$16#$b#She just watched us clean, probably laughing the whole time.
TerenDialogueSASS.7: Sassy locked me and Auntie out of the Lodge yesterday... Big Bear absolutely laughed at us when he came back to let us in, the big jerk.#$b#Of course, Sassy is completely innocent in all this.$1
TerenDialogueSASS.8: Sassy saw a squirrel and went after it like a shot out of a canon.#$b#The squirrel moved MUCH faster, luckily.
TerenDialogueSASS.9: Dogs are the greatest thing in the world, but Sassy's the greatest of dogs.#$b#I am *not* biased, hey.
TerenDialogueSASS.10: I'm super happy to live so close to Dr. Jacob.#$b#It's reassuring to have a veterinarian whose literally within shouting distance.
TerenDialogueSASS.11: Sassy was running laps up and down the stairs and I yelled 'barkour'.#$b#Big Bear has *never* looked so disappointed in me.
patio.Teren.Spicy.1: Wanna sit with me and meditate to the water? ...Wanna sit on me and get louder than the water? It's not quite the relaxed state I thought I'd achieve today but I'm willing to chase that ecstatic high with you.$1
patio.Teren.Spicy.2: %Teren pulls you into a tight hug, nuzzling his face into the crook between your neck and shoulder and worrying his teeth against your skin.#$b#Probably shouldn't start something out here when just about anybody could walk by and see... but you are temptation incarnate, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
patio.Teren.Spicy.3: Hello my adorable {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}! Come relax with me for a little bit - I'll keep my hands to myself, I promise. Of course, *you* don't have to keep any such promise if you want.$20
spouseroom.Teren.Spicy.1: We should throw a random record on and dance until we collapse, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. It takes two to tango after all, and you're the one for me so that makes two~#$b#%Teren wraps you in his arms and dips you dramatically, taking the time to cover your face in kisses in the process.
spouseroom.Teren.Spicy.2: 'Turn off the lights and light a candle... Tonight I'm in a romantic mood, yeah'~$4#$b#%Teren's sensually singing along to the jazzy song playing... it sounds like he's got some ideas for your evening together based off the lyrics.
spouseroom.Teren.Spicy.3: 'Tantric lovemaking' isn't really a thing... it's kind of, anti-tantric actually.$16#$b#We can just have regular awesome lovemaking, no need to misrepresent another culture in the process. C'mere, let me prove it~$20
spring.Married.Teren.Spicy: Birds do it, bees do it, even educated fleas do it, let's do it, let's go hurtling straight into the nearest crop field and make out.#$b#What did you think I was going to say?$3
summer.Married.Teren.Spicy: I still get a little antsy about running around shirtless, but in the house I'm happy to be half-off one hundred percent of the time for you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.
fall.Married.Teren.Spicy: What's cookin', gourd-lookin'? You and me should go get to work on putting the spice in pumpkin spice latte.$20
winter.Married.Teren.Spicy: Winter wouldn't be so bad if it weren't for the wind. Good thing I'm big enough to block it for ya.#$b#That one didn't do anything for you? Okay, let me try again.#$b#Are you winter? Because you'll be coming soon.$20
RainyDay.Teren.Spicy.0: %Teren kisses your temple, then your forehead, then the tip of your nose before planting an obnoxiously loud smooch on your mouth.#$b#Sure the rain can get you soaked or whatever but can it do that? I don't think so.$3
RainyDay.Teren.Spicy.1: You sure you don't wanna go back to bed with me? That storm's got me feeling some kind of way... like I ought to get on my knees and pray maybe - and here you are, oh so deserving of worship.$20
RainyDay.Teren.Spicy.2: Just you watch, you'll be out in the rain all day, you'll come home, drenched to the bone, and I'm going to have to be on my best behavior to help you out of your cold wet clothes instead of just ravishing you in the door way like I'll be tempted to. Really, I'm suffering already and the day's just started.$20
RainyDay.Teren.Spicy.3: A day like today would be perfect for building a pillow fort together in our jammies... and knocking it over on ourselves later when we inevitably get too hot inside of it and help each other out of those previously mentioned jammies.$20
RainyNight.Teren.Spicy.0: %Teren kisses the raindrops away from your face gently before wrapping a towel around your shoulders.#$b#Let's get you into a hot bath like yesterday. If you want, I can rub your shoulders while you soak for a bit? I've love to help you unwind, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
RainyNight.Teren.Spicy.1: Called into Welwick's line on a whim and got our fortune told... The fortune read that...#$b#%Teren takes a deep breath before speaking really fast.#$b#`Teren's going to smooch @ ten thousand times!'$1#$b#...Well, the night is long and rainy and we're both right here, so I guess I better start on those smooches. C'mere {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$20
RainyNight.Teren.Spicy.2: Aww, my poor {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}! Running around all day in the rainstorm!$2#$b#Let me coddle you for a bit and wait on you hand and foot until you get annoyed and then let me make *that* up to you somehow, some way. Probably with lip service, if I had to guess.$20
RainyNight.Teren.Spicy.3: Looking forward to going to bed with you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. Not only are you the most gorgeous soul walking around, but the weather's kind of gotten me down - I just know losing myself in you would be the balm to soothe that all away.$4
IndoorDay.Teren.Spicy.0: %Teren wraps his arm around you, cupping your hip and tracing nonsensical patterns you can feel even through your clothes.#$b#...You feel so right when I hold you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, I don't think I'll get my fill.$4#$b#Well, I guess I can try again tonight to, at least.$20
IndoorDay.Teren.Spicy.1: If you're going to be out and about, I'm probably going to blast music all day. And if I can convince you to stay home with a few well-placed kisses or more, let me know now so I can get started on my favorite part - the 'kissing you' part, not the 'blasting music' part, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$20
IndoorDay.Teren.Spicy.2: I've scoured recipe blogs for hours and I *think* I've got some good ones to try out and tweak. Feel free to volunteer as my taste tester!#$b#I of course will reward you.$20#$b#%Teren starts puckering his lips at you, as if that's the part that will convince you to be his guinea pig.
IndoorDay.Teren.Spicy.3: 'I, I love you like a love song, baby~ And I keep hittin' repeat-peat-peat-peat-peat-peat'~#$b#%Teren seems to be in a very cheerful mood as he gently grabs you around your waist and serenades you before finishing off with a loud kiss.
IndoorNight.Teren.Spicy.0: Nope, no way. Last night simply wasn't enough {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, I'm going to need to taste you again and again tonight so I can really make sure I've got you memorized.$20
IndoorNight.Teren.Spicy.1: I've got a wicked headache from staring at my work computer all day... I think I'll need to lay down. Say, you've got a nice lap for me to lay my poor aching head in, right, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}?#$b#I'll even be on my best behavior until you beg - I mean - ask me otherwise.$20'
IndoorNight.Teren.Spicy.2: %Teren kisses you soundly, not loosening his hold on you for a long aching moment.#$b#Been craving that all day, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. Love you beyond the moon and back.$4
IndoorNight.Teren.Spicy.3: %Teren wraps you up in his arms, glancing around the space as if to determine what was the best flat surface to put you against.#$b#Really need my dose of vitamin you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, don't suppose you'd let me take you to bed right now, hm?
Outdoor.Teren.Spicy.0: %Teren is humming a song. It's excessively suggestive and when he meets your eyes, he winks at you before starting the chorus out loud.#$b#`You and me baby ain't nothing but mammals~$20
Outdoor.Teren.Spicy.1: Anytime I wander around %farm at night, I think about making a wish on a star... but then you come home and make all my wildest dreams and fantasies come true. So I guess I'll just keep eagerly waiting for you instead.
Outdoor.Teren.Spicy.2: %Teren gently wraps his hand around the back of your neck, tugging you close enough to start kissing a trail from your mouth to your throat.#$b#All this fresh air really invigorates a guy, y'know? C'mon, let me show how vigorous I'm getting.$20
Outdoor.Teren.Spicy.3: You wanna go apple-picking? It's the original sin you know. Well, if you want to do other kinds of sinning with me, I'm your apple-eatin' heathen, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. {{BearFamProfanityI}}, we could even sin in the hypothetical apple orchard.
Good.Teren.Spicy.0: %Teren smooches you and when you break the kiss, he immediately steals another kiss.#$b#One for silver, two for gold, or something like that. Love you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
Good.Teren.Spicy.1: I wanna love you in the lover way and in the friend way, in the spiritual way and the physical way.$8#$b#But most of all I wanna love you more than I did yesterday so you know just how fulfilling it is to be yours, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
Good.Teren.Spicy.2: If I ever annoy you, let me know so I can stop that behavior ASAP. And if I amuse or arouse you, let me know so I can keep repeating that behavior for all of time.$3#$b#I just wanna be your blessing, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
Good.Teren.Spicy.3: %Teren pulls you in a soft hug, pressing little kisses to your lips. Between kisses, he speaks.#$b#That's for stealing the covers last night, that's for using your favorite spoon to mix up a cake batter, that's for that joke you said that made me breathe in my water, that's for you not laughing at me when I got tongue-tied singing along with Fall Out Boy -$4#$b#...Did I miss anything? Ah, what the {{BearFamProfanityA}}, and another.#$b#%Teren gives you many more kisses before he frees you.
Good.Teren.Spicy.4: I woke up today so in love with you I thought my heart might leap from my chest to get to yours. No pressure or anything.#$b#%Teren kisses you happily, humming an old familiar love song against your lips.
OneKid.Teren.0: I've been trying to clean up my language around %kid1 so I've relied on the tried and true 'uh oh spaghettios' a lot lately... so they repeat me of course, but say 'meanie macaronis' instead? So... that's a development we get to enjoy together.
OneKid.Teren.1: I was trying to explain a book we were reading together to %kid1 and landed on 'see what I mean string bean' and now they're calling me 'chili bean' - which, hey, they don't like spice either so where'd they learn about chili?$16
OneKid.Teren.2: %Kid1 tried to convince me they're too old for stuffed animals now so I claimed the dalmatian stuffie for my own. *I'm* still filled with joy and whimsy, and that way when they inevitably change their mind tomorrow, I can return Spotto to them, safe and sound.
OneKid.Teren.3: I was trying to get %kid1 to hurry up and get dressed so we could get our day going, so I hit 'em with `don't take too long bird song` and now they won't stop singing 'This is the Song That Never Ends'... I'm real sorry about that one, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$16
OneKid.Teren.4: I pointed out that we needed to get started on chores, y'know, 'gotta clean house, little mouse', and now %kid1 is trying to convince %pet to lead them to the mice's cheese storage.$16
TwoKids.Teren.0: I was trying to convince %kid1 to help %kid2 tidy up and hit them with the ol' 'I'm the boss applesauce' so now they're BOTH calling me apple-boss. This is probably fine.$16
TwoKids.Teren.1: %Kid2 was crying so I of course asked 'what's the trouble, bubble' and now BOTH of them are afraid of playing with bubbles, which used to be the silliest and easiest part of doing dishes.$16
TwoKids.Teren.2: I was making up a protein shake for my workout later and the kids accused me of 'hoarding the big juice cup'. I think I'd actually be better at drinking protein shakes if they came out of actual big juice cups, where can we get one and can it be delivered?
TwoKids.Teren.3: %kid1 told %kid2 'that's why I'm the goat'... but %kid2 didn't realize it stood for something and has been bleating all day. Three bleats for macaroni and cheese, just a head's up. I've cracked the code.$1
TwoKids.Teren.4: %kid1, %kid2 ... Really, I never thought life would be this awesome, but I think you and I are doing real well on this whole parenthood and married life thing. Who knows, maybe we'll make up a third one at some point.$3
Neutral.Teren.0: The blood moon rises... the dishes I did yesterday have reappeared in the kitchen sink.
Neutral.Teren.1: What do you call a lunch prepared for you by your husband? ...A hus-bento.[240]
Neutral.Teren.2: I'll be a little late - a package of mine got delivered to the Lodge... I'll probably hang out for a bit unless you need me home on time.
Neutral.Teren.3: Auntie said she'd do the accounting for %farm alongside Caritas, if you wanted?
Neutral.Teren.4: Make sure you take it easy, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. You seem frantic almost lately and it makes me worry.
Neutral.Teren.5: Love you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. If you need anything, just let me know. I'm yours to command.
Neutral.Teren.6: Maybe I should prepare a picnic for us soon? We could use some downtime together, right?
Neutral.Teren.7: If you have time later, maybe you can help me pick another charity to support through Caritas? ...If you get the time, I mean. No pressure.
Neutral.Teren.8: My mom asked about you. She says she hopes you're doing well... She and me are the same sometimes - we both just want the best for you.
Bad.Teren.0: You doing alright? I could set us up with a therapy session. It *could* do wonders... if we tried.$2
Bad.Teren.1: %Teren's got his headphones on. It sounds like 'My Chemical Romance's Our Lady of Sorrows'. He doesn't seem like he wants to talk right now.
Bad.Teren.2: %Teren's got his headphones on. It sounds like 'Dashboard Confessional's Screaming Infidelities'. He doesn't seem like he wants to talk right now.
Bad.Teren.3: I think I might head into Zuzu soon. The scene's good there... and the people might be mean, but they're honest at least.$2
Bad.Teren.4: I'll be late a few nights this week. I've got extra time scheduled with my therapist... Well, you can probably guess why.$2
Bad.Teren.5: Re-enlistment sometimes sounds appealing. It'd get me out of here, right?$2
Bad.Teren.6: %Teren's got his headphones on. It sounds like 'Brand New's The Boy Who Blocked His Own Shot'. He doesn't seem like he wants to talk right now.
Bad.Teren.7: %Teren's apparently swiped a pack of cigarettes from Sig. He'd kicked that habit awhile ago but things and feelings change.
Bad.Teren.8: Sorry, did you say something? No? Of course you didn't.$2
patio.Teren.Chaste.1: Really hoping I don't come off sounding like a creep, but watching you sleep makes me feel so warm and safe. You, at rest or in action, are the most comforting thing in my world.#$b#And good morning, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, I love you.$4
patio.Teren.Chaste.2: Hey! Do you remember these plants? You're the one who gave me the seeds! I've been nurturing them carefully just like I do my love for you.$4
patio.Teren.Chaste.3: There's always room for two out here, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. You're welcome to vibe for as long as you want, I'll be happy to sit at your side.$4
spouseroom.Teren.Chaste.1: %Teren takes you into his arms and dances you around the room to the record playing.#$b#You're the best {{BearFamProfanityD}} dance partner I've ever had, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.
spouseroom.Teren.Chaste.2: %Teren probably should re-sign on to his laptop, but he's too busy beaming at you instead. He kisses your cheek.#$b#I have a few video calls today but I'll be on mute for most of the time so hopefully I won't be too annoying.
spouseroom.Teren.Chaste.3: I made you something for lunch so you don't have to stress later.#$b#%Teren presses a carefully wrapped meal into your hands and kisses your cheek.#$b#And of course, there's always more here at the house if you need it. Love you.
funLeave.Married.Teren.1: Time to go be the best little baker I can be. Well, I'm usually only the best when I'm making stuff for you, so everyone else will just have to settle for the next best thing.$3
funLeave.Married.Teren.2: If you have time come visit me at Caritas. I know it's a long walk but I love you and miss you all day when I'm there.
funLeave.Married.Teren.3: Sassy and %pet will hold down the fort while I'm away... So I made sure to give them extra treats and head-pats when I got up this morning.$1
funReturn.Married.Teren.1: %Teren smells like fresh baked bread when he comes up and hugs you.#$b#I've been on my feet for hours but I think I've got plenty of fuel in the tank if you want to get up to something, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.
funReturn.Married.Teren.2: It was a record sales day at the shop! I'm always excited to be doing well but I still swear I wouldn't be where I'm at now without your love and support.$4
