funReturn.Married.Teren.3: %Teren hugs you tightly.#$b#I feel like I was gone forever! We should curl up and watch something light-hearted tonight, really take it easy.
spring.Married.Teren.Chaste: Flowers in bloom, %pet frolicking after bugs, and the way you look at me? {{BearFamProfanityG}} life I'm living. Love you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.
spring.Married.Teren.19: I did some meal prepping for Auntie's birthday so she wouldn't have to work at all. She *should* let me cook for her, right? I mean, it's her birthday!
spring.Married.Teren.28: You know what today is, right, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}? That's right - I'm turning another year old, thus setting me up for another year of being hopelessly in love with you. I'm so excited.$8
summer.Married.Teren.Chaste: %Teren hugs you lightly.#$b#Alright, time to be sweaty all night and day. Don't worry about making shorter cuddles and hugs - I know *I'm* an absolute beast when it comes to being too warm.
fall.Married.Teren.Chaste: Oh, why do we call it fall? Because leaf fall down? That's silly. Come on, @, let's go take a nap in a leaf pile and drink pumpkin spice lattes.
fall.Married.Teren.19: Time for Bears! Reckon they'll realize I made them the same kind of cookies?$3
winter.Married.Teren.Chaste: Better stay layered up like an onion, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. I promise I won't even dice you into a tasty stew, I'll just make sure you're cosy all season long.#$b#%Teren kisses the tip of your nose.
winter.Married.Teren.24: Small Bear day. We got her some aquarium passes -  I think she's going to love us more than she loves Big Bear or Gun for it, hehehe.$3
RainyDay.Teren.Chaste.0: I hear you in all my favorite songs, and in the songs the rain writes, so that would explain why I get distracted at work so often.$4
RainyDay.Teren.Chaste.1: If you think for just one second you can bat your cute eyes at me and get whatever you want from me - you're absolutely right, what do you want and should I bring an umbrella to protect it?
RainyDay.Teren.Chaste.2: Hello {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, I got these for you. They need sunshine to grow, but I figure in your hands they'll get plenty.$4$action AddItem (O)595 6
RainyDay.Teren.Chaste.3: I just know Sassy'd be in every mud puddle if she got out - thankfully she's staying inside to keep %pet company. Speaking of keeping company, feel free to linger today.#$b#Teren winks at you and kisses your cheek.
RainyDay.Teren.4: I hope the rain doesn't knock the power out... I've got a few things I'll need my laptop for and that battery never holds a charge.#$b#Well if it does, I'll just focus on making a nice warm dinner for you to come home to instead.
RainyDay.Teren.5: Might put on my {{TerenAlbumTitle}} vinyl and jam out for a bit while I sweep and mop before that virtual meeting with my boss.#$b#It's one of my favorite albums but don't ask me to name my favorite song off it, I could never choose.$1
RainyDay.Teren.6: Listen to that rain! I'm undecided if it'll drive me batty all day or if it'll make me doze off after lunch time... Or maybe that's just old age.#$b#You don't think I'm old, right {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}?$16
RainyDay.Teren.Default: You know my whole life I've gone without owning an umbrella? In hindsight, now that we live just a little isolated from town, I should probably change that, huh?$16
RainyNight.Teren.Chaste.0: %Teren's holding a fluffy towel that he wraps you up in with a hug.#$b#You've been running through my mind all day, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}} - hope you're not too tired to watch our show together.$4#$b#%He kisses the side of your head and frees you from his hold.#$b#You want to go dry off and change into something comfy while I grab our couch blanket?
RainyNight.Teren.Chaste.1: I hope you're doing better than I am, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}...$16#$b#I took %pet and Sassy out to their business and managed to slip and fall not in one, not in two, but in three different puddles!$2#$b#On a totally unrelated note, I wouldn't be opposed to falling into bed with you early tonight and I also wouldn't be opposed to being the little spoon.$4
RainyNight.Teren.Chaste.2: Oh, I'm glad to see you. I mean, I'm always glad to see you, but there's something spooky lurking around %farm that only seems to come out in the rain.$16#$b#But now that I have my brave @ to protect me, I'm ready for anything.#$b#%Teren kisses your cheek.
RainyNight.Teren.Chaste.3: %Teren hugs you tight, lifting you off your feet briefly.#$b#Oh, you *feel* chilly. {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. Here, let's get some hot tea in your hands while I get dinner put out for us.[614]
RainyNight.Teren.4: Well, it's as good a night as any to plan tomorrow's breakfast. Hmm... I'm thinking freshly squeezed {{TerenFruits}} and maybe {{TerenBreakfast}}? What do you think, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}} - does that sound like a plan? You're welcome to join me in the kitchen in the morning, too.$1
RainyNight.Teren.5: Don't worry, I left plenty of hot water for you. How about you go relax for a little while I finish up dinner? Made your favorite~$1
RainyNight.Teren.6: Honestly, once it gets really dark and overcast, I kind of dread the idea of going outside. I know it's dumb, but it almost... feels a little too closed in, like a cave.#$b#%Teren rubs the back of his neck self-consciously.#$b#Well, for now I guess I'll stay under our cozy little roof with you instead. You're always my safe space, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
RainyNight.Teren.Default: Oh, I'm glad got the kitchen cleaned up before you made it home - I accidentally used too much dish soap and had suds everywhere!$16#$b#But here you are, back to a house that's nice and tidy, with dinner ready and waiting for you.$1[MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TerenMakes_VeggieSkewer]
IndoorDay.Teren.Chaste.0: %Teren links your pinkies together, 'trapping' you.#$b#You're skipping work today to hang out with me, right? I'll skip work too, we can be delinquents together!$20
IndoorDay.Teren.Chaste.1: How do you feel about hosting a listen party? I know most folks throw 'watch parties' for like, season premiers, but you know I get more excited about new albums dropping. There's so many coming out soon, too.#$b#%Teren lists off what seems like twenty new albums at once before rubbing the back of his neck self-consciously and shutting himself up with a kiss to your forehead.#$b#Stop letting me babble, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, you know you don't have to indulge me.$4
IndoorDay.Teren.Chaste.2: %Teren gazes adoringly into your eyes, not speaking for a moment.#$b#...Sorry, I got lost in your eyes again. You really need to hand out a map one of these days, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$20
IndoorDay.Teren.Chaste.3: Don't worry, I've got a full plan to make the house look amazing for you by the time you come home. I may not be able to build you a palace but I can still treat you like royalty.#$b#%Teren makes an elaborate bow at you and kisses the back of your hand.
IndoorDay.Teren.4: I'm going to work on some recipes Evelyn sent me, see if they're viable for us or for Caritas. Don't worry, she's getting full credit if they get sold at the shop, I'd never consider doing anything less.$1
IndoorDay.Teren.5: I think I want to set up one of my speakers in the kitchen so I can hear whatever I've got playing on my record player out here. You wouldn't be opposed as long as I kept it tidy and out of the way, right, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}?
IndoorDay.Teren.6: I'm planning to be at my PC for a few hours, queuing in line to get us tickets to see {{TerenMusician}} at {{TerenFestival}} when they play in {{TerenConcertSpot}}. Make sure you clear your schedule so we can have a great concert time together!$1
IndoorDay.Teren.Default: It's already turning out to be a great day - I don't think there's a single thing that could happen to change that.#$b#Why? Well, because I woke up as yours.$4
IndoorNight.Teren.Chaste.0: I was sorting through some old boxes from when I moved in and found a bunch of photos of us. Do you want to look them together? I've already got all the snacks we'd need ready by the couch.$8
IndoorNight.Teren.Chaste.1: Here, I've got us sorted for dinner already, so we can dive straight into watching that movie you told me about.#$b#%Teren kisses your cheek.#$b#...And you're sure it's not scary, right?$16[237]
IndoorNight.Teren.Chaste.2: %Teren presses a soft kiss to your temple.#$b#Love you like a bread dough loves rising, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
IndoorNight.Teren.Chaste.3: %Teren pulls you into a quick hug, snapping a selfie right when he plants a kiss on your temple.#$b#Sorry, I was looking at old photos of us and wanted to expand... Does it look cute to you, too?$4
IndoorNight.Teren.4: Sometimes I think you work too hard and over-exert yourself. Let me take care of you for the rest of the night. I'll bring you food, drinks, %pet - you name it, it's yours.
IndoorNight.Teren.5: I can't decide on dinner for tomorrow. Too many ideas and not enough days to cook in. How about we have {{TerenDinnerMain}} with {{TerenDinnerSide}} on the side? And for dessert we can enjoy {{TerenDessert}}? ...Hmm, or maybe something else.#$b#%Teren will be thinking about this all night.
IndoorNight.Teren.6: I almost vacuumed up a spider - I felt really bad when I realized that it was a friend and not a piece of dust! I put it outside where all the tasty bugs live, but -#$b#How do I know bugs are tasty? You do strange things in the Army, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, especially if it's on a dare.$16
IndoorNight.Teren.Default: Yay, you're home! I missed you all day. I came up with a few new lunch ideas for next week so you can feel extra special when we're apart.$4
Outdoor.Teren.Chaste.0: %Teren slides his arm around your waist and pulls you close, laying his head on your shoulders. Neither of you speak for a moment, just enjoying the day and each other.
Outdoor.Teren.Chaste.1: %Teren wraps his arms around you from behind and rests his chin on your shoulder.#$b#I've got plans to take %pet and Sassy out on a walk towards the mountain path... We'll pick you some nice flowers while we're gone, okay?$4
Outdoor.Teren.Chaste.2: It's shaping up to be a good day, isn't it? Well, it's even better because now you're here with me.#$b#%Teren kisses your cheek and passes you a drink.#$b#Here, I hope I didn't disturb you earlier when I was making this for you.[MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TerenMakes_TooMuchFruitSmoothie]
Outdoor.Teren.Chaste.3: I really love it out here... I don't know if that has much to do with %farm specifically but I know *you're* the reason I wake up smiling every day, at least.#$b#%Teren presses a kiss to the side of your head.
Outdoor.Teren.4: You won't believe what I saw when I was {{TerenAnimalLocation}}! I had to be really quiet because there was {{TerenAnimalSpotted}} and I didn't want to cause a commotion and scare it away. I took pictures for you, though, come look!$1
Outdoor.Teren.5: I figure leaving my headphones at home is like the office worker equivalent to an adventurer forgetting their sword... {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, *you're* an adventurer, is it the same? Have you ever forgotten your sword after you've made it to the mines?
Outdoor.Teren.6: I *think* we might have a soil drainage issue... I'll get it taken care of, but if you spot any areas where you think it's staying wet too long, let me know. I don't want any funky fungi growing around here and scaring off %pet.$3
Outdoor.Teren.Default: I saw the roundest baby raccoon earlier... @... {{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}... Can we adopt it? Pretty please please?$8
Good.Teren.Chaste.0: You know what they say, @. You speak of what you love.#$b#Then I must love you most of all because your name's on my tongue all the time.
Good.Teren.Chaste.1: %Teren places a soft kiss on the back of your hand.#$b#If I'm a prince, I hope it's a prince of your heart. As it is, being with you makes me feel like royalty, so maybe that's already true?$4
Good.Teren.Chaste.2: %Teren wraps an arm around your waist, tugging you against his side.#$b#Time for another day of conquering the world... or at least %farm. Remember, I'm your partner - if you need anything that I've missed, just tell me and I'll jump into action.
Good.Teren.Chaste.3: {{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}, I had a dream about you... I was so excited to see you in my dream that when I woke up I was *almost* disappointed... but then I rolled over and saw you and got all excited again.$4
Good.Teren.Chaste.4: I love you so much {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}... I wish I could just rearrange the universe in the way that makes you happiest because I would do it in a heartbeat.$4
Good.Teren.5: I'm going to postpone any paperwork on my docket so I can do a deep clean of the kitchen. I know we keep it tidy, but I like rolling up my sleeves and getting to work sometimes... and I hate paperwork.
Good.Teren.6: Ooh, I timed that just right. Here, I made this for you. I hope it keeps you nourished through anything you encounter during your day today, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.[MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TerenMakes_GarlicSquoodles]
Good.Teren.7: I picked up a new album yesterday - we should listen to it together soon. It's got a few songs that make me think of you, so it's pretty important to me.$4
Good.Teren.8: I might do some online shopping... I kind of want a few new pans, but I don't want to go bonkers on spending on money. I figure I'll do some research and then you can tell me what you think when you get a moment, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}?
Teren.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Remark: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this first Teren message.
Teren.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Question: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this second Teren message.
Teren.Dialogue.Children.NoKids.Message: Tell Bearfam author Mad Dog if you see this third Teren message.
Teren.Dialogue.Children.AdoptedKids.Rema: I feel like I've checked the mail to see if the agency's replied like twelve times already. The sit and wait period is the worst!$6#$b#Maybe I oughtta go take another look in the mail box though - what if the letter got stuck to the side and I just didn't see it?$7#$b#...Am I driving you mad yet with my fussing? I'm sorry, @. I'm just so excited for us.$8
Teren.Dialogue.Children.AdoptedKids.Ques: I'm definitely a lot nervous about this... but I think you and I could handle being parents together... Do you think we should adopt?
Teren.Dialogue.Children.AdoptedKids.Mess: During the night, the adoption agency brought your new baby.
Teren.Dialogue.Children.NaturalKids.Rema: There's a million things I want to do with you and the baby, if our baby would just hurry up and get here already!$1#$b#Well, I can at least do one of them right now.#$b#%Teren pulls you into a warm hug.#$b#I just want to hold my family as close as possible for as long as possible.$4
Teren.Dialogue.Children.NaturalKids.Ques: I'm definitely a lot nervous about this... but I think you and I could handle being parents together... Do you think we're ready for a baby of our own?
Teren.Dialogue.Children.NaturalKids.Mess: During the night, your new child was born.
Teren.AboutSigurd.1: If I had to go back and choose, I'd pick the care packages Big Bear was sent over the ones my mom sent.#$b#Don't get me wrong, I love my mom, she's the most awesome mom in the world, but the amount of 'not actually permitted' items he got his hands on was astounding.$1#$b#And very tasty, which is honestly more of a factor in my life choices than I care to admit.
Teren.AboutSigurd.2: When I first met Big Bear I was a lot intimidated. He's literally built like a folklore troll and he NEVER smiled at me.#$b#It's enough to give a guy complex.$3#$b#Turns out, I'm not even that special, he never smiles at anyone, the big gruesome jerk.$1
Teren.AboutSigurd.3: %Teren is muttering to himself under his breath.#$b#And Sig wants the brown bread with goat's butter this time, because of course anytime I memorize his Saloon order he goes and changes it because he *sucks*.$2#$b#Huh - oh hey @! Hope you're well.$16
Teren.AboutSigurd.4: Y'know how people in offices have work wives or work husbands?#$b#Sig was my work jester during deployment, always making me laugh in the most inopportune moments.$1#$b#He's the reason we had to move camp to the desert after he made cackle during some big important rallying speech...$2#$#Of course, he regretted it the first day he woke up with a scorpion in his boot.$3
Teren.AboutSigurd.5: Big Bear's probably one of my favorite people in the world.#$b#Oh sure, we're best friends and all, but that's *not* why he's my favorite.#$b#Despite being the biggest, toughest man's man I know, he's afraid of worms. Like, earth worms.$11#$b#The LEAST threatening thing in the whole world and all I have to do is pluck one off the ground in a rainstorm and chase him around with it!$6#$b#Don't tell him I told you.$3
Teren.AboutSigurd.6: Dogs are my favorite animal, obviously, but a side effect of that is whenever we are - or {{BearFamProfanityA}}, were - out and about getting up to no good, Big Bear points out every dog to me.#$b#I know, it sounds like paradise, right? But some of those dogs are inside fences or cars and I *can't* pet them!$2#$b#And Big Bear CLEARLY can tell before pointing a dog out to me whether or not I'll be able to go pet it, but he does it regardless!$2
Teren.AboutSigurd.7: I really wanted to learn of Big Bear's family recipes... but as I'm sure you've long since discovered, he canNOT cook to save his soul.#$b#The worst thing is, he EATS whatever he ends up creating. It's horrifying.$2#$b#At least I can make him meals that aren't burnt beyond recognition, but you'd think a guy like that would be a picky eater, right?#$b#...Well, he did ask around and give me a bunch of his family's recipes, at least.$4#$action AddItem (O)MadDog.HashtagBearFam_DronningMaud
Teren.AboutSigurd.8: One of the worst things that happened to me and Big Bear during deployment was the time we got ran out of a small village by a group of residents with torches and pitchforks.$10#$b#Yeah, real medieval style, even. It turns out they'd had a pair of bandits roaming the area, disrupting train lines and blowing up their water tower.$17#$b#So when two strangers, armed to teeth and clearly unfamiliar with the area wandered in bold as blue jays, they reacted with force.$7#$b#We wound up having to march the whole squad to the next village over before we could re-supply safely - it was exhausting!
Teren.AboutSigurd.9: Big Bear's one {{BearFamProfanityB}} cardshark. I don't think it's because he's some kind of card game savant, either.#$b#He's just too cocky. I know what you're thinking. 'Teren, how cocky is he?'$3#$b#The whole squad had been losing all night to the local tavern keeper, a real sharp lady - and Big Bear decided he had to even the win-loss record.#$b#Unfortunately, he'd been spotting me all night for cash so the only thing left to wager... was one of the Ferngill Republic's jeeps. ...More specifically, a three star general's jeep.$6#$b#Yeah, not his brightest move... got three months of his pay docked for that and a permanent mark on his record.$3
Teren.AboutSigurd.10: One time during deployment, Big Bear and I rigged an inter-squad gridball tournament to win.#$b#We did win the thing honestly, but we never got to use the prize. It was a three day pass to the capital city.$2#$b#Commander Shepard filed the paperwork but the person who usually filed those things kind of... well, hated my guts.$7#$b#She was sweet on a sergeant from another squad, and he and I got along like a house on fire, so *of course* that meant I was muscling in on her 'man'...$11#$b#Never did get to bring Big Bear to the capital before we left Gotoro, either. Doesn't that just beat all?
Teren.AboutSigurd.11: My mom adores Big Bear. Sometimes I think she likes him more than she likes me.$4#$b#I guess she knew we'd be thick as thieves from the first letter I mentioned him in.#$b#Mind you, my letter was full of complaints about how this big scary rich kid hated my guts and wouldn't talk to me for the whole first week we were bunked together.$1#$b#It rained the entire week and I just kept trying to be friendly with him, and all he'd do is drip water all over my cot and scowl at me!$3#$b#...But he's not all bad... Not bad at all, either.
Teren.AboutSigurd.12: You know, I only found out when we finally got sent home from Gotoro what Big Bear's middle name is.#$b#He doesn't even have one! He's basically got three first names instead. Now, I know what you're thinking.#$b#'Teren, that sounds like he has one first name and two middle names' - but you'd be incorrect!$3#$b#His government name is Sigurd Haakon Ruud Bear. 'Rude' suits him, doesn't it?$11#$b#Ahhh, don't tell 'im I said that, he'd probably cut holes in all my jeans or something in retaliation.$1#$b#...My middle name's not any better, so I guess I shouldn't poke fun too much, besides, oops.$16
Teren.AboutSigurd.13: I think during deployment, Big Bear and I only ever got into one actual physical fight, and it was a real mean brawl out.$2#$b#The most embarrassing thing is, it was over a romantic interest, who of course, was not interested in either of us.$17#$b#We blamed each other for that disinterest, called each other names, and then before we knew it, fists were flying!$16#$b#Looking back on that... it was super shameful of us both, but once we'd gotten it out of our systems and got slapped with latrine duty by our CO, we pretty much immediately made up.#$b#And of course, we suckered some other poor jerk into covering latrines for us, with Commander Shepard none the wiser!$3
Teren.AboutSigurd.14: When I was still a fresh-faced young man - hey, you're supposed chime in and say that I still am right there, by the way - I used to be VERY good at parkour. Like, I could've been a stunt double in a spy movie or something.#$b#I learned everything I could from my hero, the one, the only, Cora Loft, Necropolis Bandit!$1#$b#...She's a video game character. She's like, the most video game character of all time. C'mon, don't be like Big Bear, don't play 'Not Mapped' - y'know, that big mean dork thinks he could cosplay Draken Nate? Pfft, as if.#$b#I could totally pull off Cora Loft though.$3
Teren.AboutSigurd.15: This will probably sound silly, but I kind of miss stealing Big Bear's battle dress jacket. The benefit to stealing any of his clothes is that they're so much bigger than I am - and I'm not a small guy by any means!#$b#That means I can layer it over top of all my stuff for even more warmth when the weather blows.#$b#Plus stealing it back then meant he had to come find me, and it's always nice to feel wanted. Even if 'wanted' in that case tended to mean 'chased through four acres of wheat before dawn'.$3
TerenDialogueEliRH.1: The other night I finally got Eli to sleep for a bit but halfway through the night, he woke up.#$b#He then kissed me on the forehead and said 'hope you have a nice day at work love' before shoving me off the bed.$3
TerenDialogueEliRH.2: Every time I send Eli off with a packed lunch, he comes back with the bag completely empty, nary a crumb left! Do you think I'm feeding him enough? I sure hope he speaks up in case I'm not.$16
TerenDialogueEliRH.3: I kept Eli waiting the other night because I had a last minute virtual meeting with a new veteran. He and Sassy had a lot of fun playing fetch at least, but still, I hope he lets me make it up to him with breakfast or something.
TerenDialogueEliRH.4: %Is Teren wearing one of Eli's shirts? That looks like it came fresh out of Eli's closet. Well, stranger things have happened, surely.
TerenDialogueEliRH.5: Someday I want to visit Port Drake with Eli.#$b#I think both of us are happy to be where we are now, but the idea of traveling the world is pretty romantic... and what better place to start than the place that gave me Eli?$8
TerenDialogueSigRH.1: Big Bear came through and stole all my cold, half-empty coffee cups and zero kisses and this is exactly why I encourage Sassy to tackle him when she sees him.
TerenDialogueSigRH.2: I think I'm supposed to meet up with Big Bear later for a surprise... I wonder what he has in store? I just hope it's not his cooking again - I told him I can take care of that for both of us.
TerenDialogueSigRH.3: %Teren has a few travel brochures in his hand.#$b#Y'know, it's hard being the planner in a relationship because you WANT to ask your partner to help but also, they totally do it ALL WRONG.#$b#At least Big Bear's good at making sure I have fun on these trips.$20
TerenDialogueSigRH.4: I think I mention Big Bear too much. Some of my co-workers have started calling me out on it in meetings... like, hey guys, sorry you've never known TRUE LOVE before and you're a bunch of bitter berries!$4#$b#%Despite his complaints Teren looks pretty pleased that his coworkers care so much.
TerenDialogueSigRH.5: I think my biggest concern with being with Sig is if our friendship will ever change, but so far he's still the guy that tricks me into watching horror movies and remembers what foods will be spicy when we go out to eat...#$b#It's really nice, knowing things like that haven't changed and probably never will.$8
TerenDialogueED.1: I brought the apple from my lunch to my checkup with Dr Harvey as an after-treat for myself and he gave me a look then said 'that won't work on me.'#$b#'And be sure to tell Eli it won't, either.'$1
TerenDialogueED.2: I don't miss the army per se as much as I miss camping out with my dearest friends.#$b#I wonder if Eli would like to go camping.$1
TerenDialogueED.3: Caroline and Jodi give me a lot of great feedback on my cooking. I swear without Jodi I'd never figure out how exactly to batter fish.#$b#Gudrun hasn't found about the fish yet; Eli's usually brave enough to taste test my cooking so I use him to hide the evidence.
TerenDialogueED.4: My ideal person is someone who would give me pancakes regardless of the time of day.#$b#Right now, I can count on Eli for that, at least, he's surprisingly capable with pancake batter.$1
TerenDialogueED.5: Eli was nice enough to let me borrow a hoodie but the one I nabbed had a dark passenger... Yeah, Soot came home with me, oops!$1#$action AddConversationTopic SootPocketAdventure#
TerenDialogueED.6: Eli's a riot. He's always up to go wandering with me - AKA, stop me from getting lost in who knows where.#$b#He's also really fast - stopped me from walking into a bramble bush by lifting me out of the way, and he was already ten paces ahead of me!
TerenDialogueED.7: Y'know, I don't know if Dylan likes me much... I keep trying to cook for him and Eli when I'm over, since it's the least I can do... But I think he holds me to Auntie Sondra standards, and that's nigh impossible to meet.$16
TerenDialogueED.8: Dylan absolutely schooled me and Eli in kart racing earlier - video games, not, like, actual karts. He's so smug too!$1#$b#I gotta find a way to beat him. Eli might be a casualty in our battle, but sometimes, you gotta do whatever it takes!$3
TerenDialogueED.9: Dylan's surprisingly computer savvy... Or maybe it's not a surprise, maybe he learned it at fish school... Do fish use computers? Do marine biologists?#$b#Anyway, he showed me how to load some mods in for Realm of Rebellion. Don't worry, it's just cosmetic, I'm not trying to get banned!$1
TerenDialogueED.10: I feel like such a jerk. I stopped by to say hi to Eli but only found Dylan.$2#$b#He was in the middle of some delicate work with his fishtank and I barged on in and interrupted him.$2#$b#He said everything's fine, but I'm sure I've bungled something up for him.$7
TerenDialogueROB.1: I like reading books but I never can stay focused for very long.#$b#Even with THE Rodney O'Brien around. You'd think if anything him being my neighbor would inspire me!
TerenDialogueROB.2: I wonder if I could convince Rodney to do a tarot reading for me... Maybe he could find out why my love life is so lousy!$1
TerenDialogueROB.3: Rodney sure is fashionable... I kind of want to ask him for advice, but let's be real. I could *never* look as good as he does. AND I can't grow a beard.$1
TerenDialogueNtH.1: I almost bowled Nora over early, she's so small!#$b#You'd think her pretty smile would've alerted me but nope, just me clumsily running into her.#$b#I'll have to catch up to her and apologize soon.$7
TerenDialogueNtH.2: Nora showed me some frankly ominous looking snake she found when we were both headed back to the Scarp for the day.#$b#Snakes are really cool, but this one felt a little cold.#$b#Nora says that reptiles are *cold* blooded, but I have my suspicions.
TerenDialogueNtH.3: Spent the other day making fancy lattes with Nora. She has such good ideas. We drew animals in each other's cups.$1
TerenDialogueDitR.true.1: I've been trying to arrange doggy play dates. I think it's important for Sassy to have friends she picks out on her own.#$b#She gets along with Waffle pretty well, I've discovered.
TerenDialogueDitR.true.2: I get deeply spooked that Sassy might try and chase Pipo... mostly because I think Pipo could kick Sassy's butt.$16
TerenDialogueDitR.true.3: I watched in mostly complete fear as Waffle and Sassy teamed up to chase one squirrel...#$b#Thankfully the squirrel moved faster.
TerenDialogueDitR.false.1: Eve let me play fetch with Waffle the other day. Wait, that makes it sound like Eve took turns throwing the ball at me and at Waffle, doesn't it?$16
TerenDialogueDitR.false.2: There's a lot of talented musician-slash-chef people in town... I gotta pick up my game if I want to be as cool as any of them.$1
TerenDialogueDitR.false.3: I had a dream that there was a snail in my bed... So I took apart my whole bed and frame just to make sure something didn't sneak in.#$b#I'd hate to insult Jeremy by washing one of their friends the next time I did my laundry or something.$10
TerenDialogueSnS.1: If you ever see a big black wolf hanging around, tell him or her I wanna be friends. Every time I get near, poof! Gone in an instant. It's tragic, really.
TerenDialogueSnS.2: I've been listening to a lot of glam rock lately... Man, getting Cirrus's autograph would be pretty cool someday.
TerenDialogueSnS.3: I was getting stalked by a rock crab and Mateo popped outta nowhere and sliced that thing clean in half... They really seemed familiar with crab-killing, actually. Well, regardless, what a hero, am I right?$1
TerenDialoguePFAF.1: What weighs more, me or a sheep? I should go chase down Plum, she could tell me.
TerenDialoguePFAF.2: Frisk got stuck in a tree the other day and was meowing like crazy, so I OF COURSE rushed to help him down... and he just hopped right out. He was faking the WHOLE time!$5
TerenDialoguePFAF.3: If I were sick, Plum would be the first person I call, because she'd bring me like six different soups and eight different crackers before I could even hang up the phone, and that's kind of friend I want to have and want to be.$1
TerenDialogueMGC.1: When Sig first wrote to me about Camie, I admit, I was a little jealous.#$b#I mean, I don't keep bees or have a homicidal chicken, what if he replaces me as his best friend?
TerenDialogueMGC.2: Jupiter deserves all that space to roam free because he's the best boy in the whole world! Yes he is!$1
TerenDialogueMGC.3: Picked up some mead from Camie, she sure knows how to pack a punch in a bottle.
TerenDialogueMGC.4: I don't think Camie's chicken likes me. I don't think Camie's chicken likes ANYbody.$16
TerenDialogueMGC.5: Climbing around the ruins near Camie's place, I can't help but wonder a lot of things. I gotta pick her brain when she has the energy for chitchat and find out the history behind the Cove one of these days.
TerenDialogueFCPC.1: I've traded Boxy a few fish for a few bottle caps... Honestly, I think he paid me *too* much, I'll have to make sure to get him more fish next time.
TerenDialogueFCPC.2: Hm, I wonder what region Kaia was deployed in... There's so many veterans milling about these days, now that I think about it. Something about the Valley, I reckon.
TerenDialogueFCPC.3: Nikolai's a huge animal lover - I totally get that. He's really kind to animals, too... it's always nice to meet a fellow creature appreciator.$1
TerenDialogueFCPC.4: The absolute size of some chickens around here... That one I saw the other day cleared the top of my head, easily.$16
TerenDialogueFCPC.5: Ol' Lyell's got a different view on Gotoro. It's interesting to hear him talk about it although I don't think we saw the same regions.
TerenDialogueFCPC.6: Hm... Lyell's a bit of an old soul. An incredibly well-traveled one at that. Knows a lot about a lot, it seems.
TerenDialogueARV.1: Aw, I keep forgetting to give Mia back her tupperware.#$b#She shared some amazing crab croissants with me after I accidentally mentioned I'd skipped lunch a few days in a row...$6
TerenDialogueARV.2: Boy, Sterling sure is a flirt. Pierre's got appreciate having such a smooth talker on staff, I'm sure even if folks are used to it, they enjoy the banter.$1
TerenDialogueARV.3: Oh, Mia sent me a few recipe ideas to try out, I reckon I should let Auntie know she can take a break while I try out some of Mia's specialties.
TerenDialogueLuc.1: Who do you think would win in a fight? Lucikiel or Clint? Isn't Lucikiel like, subservient to Clint? Seems like that'd give him a fighting chance, actually.$3
TerenDialogueLuc.2: Gunnar could just like, pay Lucikiel for combat training, huh? Like, sure, he'd get absolutely demolished... but it's an option!
TerenDialogueLuc.3: I opened a tab for Lucikiel and Clint on Big Bear's dime, just to see what would happen.#$b#Generosity is it's own reward and all, but more importantly, I'm curious to see if Gus stocks enough booze to get a demon drunk.$3
TerenDialogueLav.1: Do I believe in ghosts? Tricky one to answer. If I say yes, I look crazy. If I say no, I get haunted by a little kid in old-fashioned clothing carrying a spooky doll. It's a lose, lose situation right?$1
TerenDialogueLav.2: Sometimes when I'm out really late, I hear children's laughter from the playground.... but it's not like any of the neighborhood kids stay out crazy late... right?#$b#I hope I'm not being haunted, I've been trying to avoid repossession my whole life.
TerenDialogueLav.3: I thought I recognized all the little kids and their parental figures but there always seems to be an extra one out of the corner my eye... or maybe I need more sleep. It's probably that.
TerenDialogueSVE.1: Olivia's so friendly, she reminds me of my mom. Mind you, Olivia could buy my mom's whole apartment building several times over, so they're still world's apart, but still. She's a delight.
TerenDialogueSVE.2: Victor's probably wondering where I got off to with his copy of the 'The Legend of Lonk: Lonk Asleepens' guide book. It's not my fault I got stuck.$16
TerenDialogueSVE.3: Never really thought I'd be a wine guy, but Blue Moon sure is making me change my tune. Think I'll need see if Sophia plans on hosting a sampling event anytime soon.
TerenDialogueRSV.1: Pika's going to teach me a few new tricks in the kitchen... That guy always makes me feel welcomed whenever I make it up to Ridgeside. He's great.
TerenDialogueRSV.2: Aw man, I feel terrible. I ran into Maddie earlier and {{BearFamProfanityD}} near knocked {{NonBinaryMaddiePronoun2}} off {{NonBinaryMaddiePronoun2}} feet.$2#$b#{{NonBinaryMaddiePronoun1}} sure {{NonBinaryMaddieVerbConjugation2}} shy about telling me off for it, either!$16
TerenDialogueRSV.3: Keahi got me again. I swear, you'd think after the third 'kick me' sign, I'd learn not to turn my back on the little rascal.$7
TerenDialogueDTZ.1: I think the kid at the Joja Pharma didn't call my doctor to fill one of my prescriptions last time I picked up my meds...#$b#That's kind of irritating, but hopefully they'll have 'em on hand when I go into the city next time.$2
TerenDialogueDTZ.2: It's probably kind of silly but I like going in to browse at places like Furnisure. I mean, yeah, I can't buy anything, but a guy can dream, right?
TerenDialogueDTZ.3: You can only get 'Prismatic Gel-ly' hair gel in the city...$2#$b#It's a pain in the {{BearFamProfanityF}} trying to look this good sometimes, @. Here's hoping it's worth it.$3
TerenDialogueDTZ.4: Big Bear and I've been arguing for like four days now what the old building near Zuzu International used to be. I swear it was a video rental shop.$3
TerenDialogueDTZ.5: Last time I was at the Zuzu Mall I watched a kid wade into the fountain and reach down to grab the coins tossed into it... and then the kid ATE them.$10
TerenDialogueAPT.1: I feel so bad for Thompson. Pierre has got to be the most exhausting landlord. I bet he gets all up in his business with surprise inspections and goofy 'no fun after sunset' rules.$2
TerenDialogueAPT.2: Been checking out some of Thompson's videos... He's got style and flair for days, that's for sure. He's *not* quite my favorite genre but I've never turned my nose up at tunes, y'know?
TerenDialogueAPT.3: Oh, hey @, have you seen Kenzie around? She bummed my lighter earlier and I wanted to put more fuel in it before I forget to again.#$b#Hm? Naw, I don't smoke anymore, I just keep befriending smokers, haha.$16
TerenDialogueCPF.1: Really wish there were a court around here... Yeah, Sig, Marcus, and me can play gridball pretty much anywhere, but there's not a single place to shoot hoops and I *think* I might be able to outscore at least one of those two.$3
TerenDialogueCPF.2: It's been nice chatting with Ashida about her husband. It gives me a good perspective of what it's been like for the folks at home while the rest of us are off in Gotoro.#$b#I hope was able to ease some of her concerns.$2
TerenDialogueCPF.3: Oh, hey, have you seen Mora? She found a weird mixtape that she wanted to check out with me. We're going to see if between the two of us we can figure out all the songs on it.$1
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.1: Do you think %pet would want to go on a date with Sassy?#$b#...Do you think *you* wanna make it into a double date? We could make it a picnic!$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.2: Y'know, it might not have been love at first sight, but since meeting you, falling in love with you felt inevitable. It was always going to happen; it was meant to happen...$4#$b#You're loveable and I have so very much love to give you.$8
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.3: You know what they say, there's only time to turn towards what you love... %Teren turns to you with a cheesy grin.#$b#Hello {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}~$1
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.4: Hmm? Why do I look so well rested? Well, I had a dream and you were in it, @.#$b#So I slept a little longer so we could spend more time together, of course.$8
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.5: Y'know when I don't see you all day I build up a surplus of questions.#$b#How is your day going, did you have something tasty for lunch? Where did you go and who did you see?#$b#And the most embarrassing by far... did you think of me?$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.6: Home has always been my favorite place.#$b#First with my ma, then with Big Bear and the squad during deployment.#$b#But now it kinda feels like wherever you are, that's where I wanna call home.$8
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.7: Oh there you are. I had a dream about you. Full of unlimited sunlight and endless horizons and unbridled joy.$4#$b#But when I woke up, I missed you something fierce. Isn't that silly, when I knew I'd see you today anyway?
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.8: What do you have there, clutched safe in your hands?#$b#Ah, just my heart that you stole. Well there's no better place for it than with you.$8
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.9: I had a virtual meeting yesterday and it was pretty boring. And when I'm bored, I doodle.#$b#My boss said I had a dopey grin the whole time and when I looked at my paperwork, it was covered with our initials in little hearts.$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.10: Oh... hi @. I'm sorry. I was up all night trying to come up with a new recipe to make for you, but all the good things have been invented already.#$b#I know it's not the same as a dessert in your honor, but here. [MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TerenBakes_RainbowCake MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TerenBakes_RainbowChipCookies]
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.11: I've been working on a new playlist. It's full of all the songs that make me think of you.#$b#It's not perfect yet, but I'll share it someday, when I know it finally covers how astounding you truly are and all the multitudes of things you make me feel.$8
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.12: Sassy likes you better than me. That makes sense, though. I also like you better than anyone, when it comes down to it.$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.13: I can't get enough of you, @, no matter how much time we have together.#$b#We could spend quite a few eternities together and I'd still be craving more.$4#$b#Only if you wanted to spend that much time with me of course! I wouldn't wanna make you feel smothered after like, the third or seventh eternity.$1
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.14: You're the type of person I'd ruin my whole week's schedule for.#$b#You could roll up like 'Teren, when are you free?' and I'd be like, 'Yes.'$1#$b#Even if I had every day til next year Spirit's Eve booked, I'd clear my calendar for you because the chance to make time for you is too important to pass up.$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.15: If you're busy at %farm tomorrow, can I come over and linger far beyond propriety would allow?#$b#I miss your face like oxygen and I think being your inobtrusive shadow for a bit would fix all that ails me.$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.16: Do you ever wonder if we've met in another lifetime? ...Maybe we were two little monkeys hanging from the same branch or a pair of color complementing sea anemones bobbing along on the same reef.#$b#It's one of my favorite ponderings, but I think this lifetime just might be my most favorite.$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.17: Rejoice! For I have assembled a playlist of cheesy love songs just for you and me!#$b#Oh, you *know* every great hair ballad from history is on there, would I ever let you down like that?$3
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.18: Oh, I forgot to tell you all kinds of things the last time I saw you!$1#$b#Things like I love you, and I wake up with you as my first thought of the day, and I don't know if I'll ever ne able to truly show you how much I adore you being in my life, @.$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.19: I'd love to learn how to make your favorite dish for you... {{BearFamProfanityA}} I'd even make a three AM grilled cheese for you if you woke me up out of a dead sleep.#$b#Not trying to flirt or anything - well, that's a lie, I totally am. Is it working?$3
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.20: You make me feel like your co-star in a chick-flick romance, @.#$b#This is absolutely tragic only in that my ego's going to get massive from feeling that high all the time when we're together.$4#$b#Don't worry, we're the kind of cinematic masterpiece that ends up being timeless, I can promise you that.
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.21: Uh oh @, hold still for a second.#$b#%Teren leans super close to your face, eyes locked on yours.#$b#...Hmm, nevermind. I thought you had something caught in your eyelash but it turns out it was just me, getting lost in your eyes once again.$1#$b#%What a cheeseball!
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.22: Y'know, I think I really annoy Big Bear with how much I incessantly babble about you.$4#$b#I just can't restrain myself, I'm excited to be here in this same time and space as you that I gotta let everyone I see know.#$b#Maybe I'll switch it up and start talking Gus's ear off next.$1
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.23: Have you eaten today? Did you get enough rest? Maybe you should come spend some time with me and take it easy. I'll make sure you don't have to raise a single finger, you know.#$b#And besides, I've come up with a new recipe just for you... I'd like to share it with you so I can better take care of you.$4
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.24: %When Teren spots you, he opens his arms wide as if for a hug.#$b#Hey, if you wanna get away from it all, may I suggest disappearing straight into my arms?$4#$b#I'll spirit you away from any responsibilities and all woes for as long as you need.#$b#You make me wanna perform magic tricks like that.$8
TerenDialogue810R.Chaste.25: %Teren seems a little tired but despite that, his smile lights up like ten thousand watts when he spots you.#$b#Hey @. You sure are the highlight of my day. Just seeing you's changed the whole trajectory for me.$8#$b#%He brushes his shoulder against yours gently, as if making sure he didn't imagine you up, his expression wistfully fond.#$b#What a treat you are, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}...$4
TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.1: I saw a post on the internet that suggested the sexiest thing a man can know how to do is cook delicious meals.#$b#Well, @? Am I sexy? Is my cooking good enough to label me as sexy?$4#$b#Should I be cooking in only an apron? That sounds risky, but if it's for you, I'd do it.$3
TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.2: If you think I'm cute now, @, you should see me on my knees.$3#$b#Of course I meant for the full effect of my big brown deer eyes looking up at you in love and adoration, whatever else could I be referring to?$3
TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.3: I was trying to think of a joke about yoga, but they're kind of a stretch.$1#$b#Oh come on, if you don't love me at my dumb yoga jokes, how are you going to appreciate my flexibility later?$3
TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.4: Oooh, that outfit looks real good on you today, @. You know what though? It would look really good *off* you too, if you've got some time to waste with me.$3#$b#%Teren winks at you and pantomimes taking his own shirt off as if that's going to tempt you.
TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.5: I've had four cups of coffee today and have been work-shopping some pickup lines if you'll endure for a moment, @.#$b#'They call me coffee because I grind so fine.'$3#$b#No? How about, 'they call me coffee because I keep you up past 2 AM.'?$3#$b#%Maybe you should sneak him some decaf.
TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.6: You know now that we're dating, your clothes are my clothes too. Maybe you later you can find out what I've got on under my jeans today~$3

TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.10: Every time you kiss me I have to stop myself from melting away into nothing because you're simply just that hot.$4#$b#But who cares if you make me melt, kiss me and promise me forever while you're at it, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$8
TerenDialogue810R.Spicy.11: I had no idea what yearning meant before I found you... now I find myself daydreaming at work, *yearning* for your touch, your kiss, your everything.$4#$b#So please stop by and distract me some more, and maybe we can even work on making my daydreams come true~$3

Teren.RomanticHints.7: If you're free next weekend, we ought to get together and watch a movie. Maybe have a little sleepover. I'll do all the cooking, and I can totally try to help out with any chores you have.#$b#I promise I'm super good at playing house with cute folks like you.$8
