CT.Jas.SigTeacher: When Mr. Bear covers for Miss Penny, he likes bringing us out into the grass for lessons... I like it too because sometimes there's flowers!$1
CT.Jas.GudrunComesHome: Yay! I missed Gudrun a lot!
CT.Jas.GudrunVJoja: I'm glad Gudrun and Mr. Pierre scared that mean Joja man away.$2
CT.Jas.GudrunCollegeIdeas: I hope Gudrun doesn't go to college soon...$2
CT.Jas.TerenSelfEsteem: Uncle Shane bought me a brownie that had a frosted heart on it!$1
CT.Pam.SigConvosAndCraftBeer: I don't know why I let that crazy soldier talk me into these things, gah.
CT.Pam.SigBefriendsPenny: Siggy dropped off some books for Penny... he better not be sweet on her! She can do better.$1
CT.Pam.SigTeacher: My Penny's so clever, she's teaching OTHER teachers how to teach.$1
CT.Pam.GudrunOnCampus: I wish I could'a sent Penny away to college... She deserves the whole world. She is my whole world.$2
CT.Pam.GunnarCellarBomb: GAH! WHAT WAS THAT RACKET FROM EAST SCARP!?$3
CT.Pam.TerenCaritasBakery: Teren's a smart one. He always has my order ready to go before I even get through the door. Penny and I deserve a little treat, after all.$1
CT.George.SigandHonors: That Sig Bear is a dead ringer for his grandpa Torsten. Shame Torsten couldn't be here with us... nor Wulfram.$2
CT.George.SondraRememberWulfram: Bears always come in threes - Torsten and his sisters Astrid and Birgit, Wulfram and his brother Arne and sister Yrsa... Well, Wulf and Sondra seemed like they were happy despite not having three of their own, at least.
CT.George.SondraAndTheTab: *I* slipped some cash into Gus's tip jar, before Sondra even saw, heh.$1
CT.George.ASongforSondra: Oh what a racket... The song Wulfram wrote was decent, at least.
CT.George.GunnarAriseKraken: I could have told ya there was a Kraken down there! All us miners knew about it back in the day!$1
CT.George.GunnarTalkofTheTown: Gunnar's got a soft heart - that's Wulfram's influence. Good thing Sondra's there to toughen him up for stuff like this.
CT.George.GunnarCellarBomb: Everyone's complaining about an explosion - but I'm telling you, I heard absolutely nothing!$5
CT.George.JojaAccusations: Joja's got their lackey sniffing around again... they better not open another store!$5
CT.Wizard.SondraTurnsFiftyAgain: Hmm... The oldest magic of all is make believe, and I see that Sondra Brazier-Bear has mastered it.
CT.Wizard.GunnartheLost: If Marlon had informed me immediately, I could have found the boy before his circumstances went poorly.
CT.Wizard.GunnarCellarBomb: Young Gunnar Bear meddles in many things, but at least he's limited to only mundane explosives.
CT.Wizard.GunnarMysteryCave: A friend has informed you and Gunnar have be poking around places you ought let rest quietly. Be wary, @.
CT.Wizard.GunnarFailure: Marlon is right, but Gunnar still has a choice - to improve or to wallow in failure. You chose success for yourself, @, let's see if your friend can do the same.
CT.Wizard.GunnarAriseKraken: His name has been lost to time, but the Kraken is not your foe, I assure you.
CT.Wizard.GunnarTalkofTheTown: See to it that the Kraken gets his reward as well.
CT.Wizard.GunnarSucceedsNoMateo: It gladdens me to see Marlon make the right decision... Perhaps my old friend can let his sword arm rest finally.
CT.Wizard.GunnarSucceedsMateo: I'd hoped Marlon would see the value in training younger people to step into role... It does relieve me that Mateo was able to make the correct call, at least.
CT.Wizard.GudrunAbigailMine: Those fools! The metal royal court is enraged - it will take decades to settle the peace with them once again!$1
CT.Wizard.TerenCaritasBakery: Unlike the mortals of the town proper, I can simply teleport over for a lunch. Sergeant Barnes is most generous.
MorrisCTSondraFundraiser: Charity cases can be a bit of pain, but if you can get your brand recognized, it's worth it, heh!
MorrisCTGunnarCellarBomb: This is why the JojaMart was built in this part of Pelican Town.
Morris.CaughtJojaJelly: A jojellyfish? That can't be the true name... I'll speak with our legal department.$2
Morris.CaughtColaCrab: These cola crabs... they LIVE in the shells? ...I have a brilliant marketing idea!$5
CT.Morris.GudrunVJoja: They sent Dobson? But *I* called it in!$2
CT.Morris.JojaAccusations: %Morris seems almost obnoxiously cheerful. He must've done something.
CT.Gunther.SigRecovery: I've set aside some of Sergeant Bear's favorite poets... Just a little light reading while he recovers.$2
CT.Gunther.SigFuture: Between you and me, our esteemed Sergeant Bear would excel as a museum curator, also.$1
CT.Gunther.SigBefriendsPenny: Between Miss Penny and Sergeant Bear, my entire fantasy selection will be cleaned out. What a fortuitous problem to have.
CT.Gunther.SigandHonors: Perhaps Sergeant Barnes will restrain himself from goading Sergeant Bear into any more stunts now that they're both free of military responsibilities.$4
CT.Gunther.SigTeacher: Sergeant Bear's got a loan out on all of Miss Penny's favorite teaching text books. I suppose we'll need to acquire more eventually.
CT.Gunther.GunnarTalkofTheTown: There's been an increased demand for books about nautical myths ever since they discovered that Kraken. The wait list is six people long now.
CT.Gunther.GudrunCollegeIdeas: Pelican Town certainly fosters brilliant minds, doesn't it?
CT.Gunther.GudrunArtsandCrafts: Miss Gudrun managed to glue a poster board to the floor. She cleaned up and apologized profusely, of course, but...$2
CT.Marlon.SigtheHero: Those Bear boys are cut from the same type of foolish fabric.$2
CT.Marlon.GunnarGuildTryout: I put you through a test and you came through with flying colors - I can only hope for the same in Gunnar's case.
CT.Marlon.GunnarMissing: The boy's been slacking in his guild duties once again.$2
CT.Marlon.GunnartheLost: That blasted Bear! I never should have sent him on that test!$1
CT.Marlon.GunnarFailure: Don't go arguing Gunnar's case, @, the decision stands.
CT.Marlon.GunnarSucceedsNoMateo: That boy's going to turn my hair grey.$2
CT.Marlon.GunnarSucceedsMateo: That boy's going to turn Mateo grey before they even realize it's happening.$2
CT.Marlon.GudrunAbigailMine: A metal prince slime? This close the surface? ...An unsettling omen, indeed.
CT.Lance.GunnarFailure: Marlon should listen to me - I've told him a dozen times to hand Gunnar over to me so I could whip him into shape.
CT.Lance.GunnarAriseKraken: They encountered a beast of legend over in East Scarp and didn't invite me? I'll simply make the journey myself then.$1
CT.Lance.GunnarTalkofTheTown: I still think I should be allowed to take Gunnar and really train him in the art of combat... Someday I'll get him.$5
CT.Lance.GunnarSucceedsNoMateo: Now there's no room for argument, Gunnar's going to come and work under my supervision for a bit, we meed to hone him like a prized blade.$5
CT.Lance.GunnarSucceedsMateo: I'll talk Mateo into loaning me Gunnar for a bit - we could always make use of another medic.
CT.Claire.BearFamTimeForBees: サンドラさん、Jojaとピエールの両方にすごい量の注文を入れてるのよ...。#$b#いったい何を育ててるのかな？クマでも飼ってるのかしら？
CT.Claire.SondraAgingGracefully: I should ask my manager about if we'll ever offer delivery services... but I don't want to be the delivery girl.
CT.Claire.GunnarOpenForBusiness: My manager was really alarmed about another shop opening up so he wants one of us to scout it out.$2
CT.Claire.GudrunAgainsttheMachine.false: This isn't the first Joja Mart to get protested...
CT.Claire.GudrunAgainsttheMachine.true: That fish kid really likes making noise, doesn't she?$2
CT.Claire.TerenSelfEsteem: Teren doubled my order at no extra charge... I must've been the lucky shopper of the day.$1
CT.Martin.GudrunAgainsttheMachine.false: I saw Gudrun making those posters but I forgot to warn my manager Morris... Oops.$2
CT.Martin.GudrunAgainsttheMachine.true: I should ask Gudrun if she'll let me join in next time. I don't have anything to protest, but it looked fun.$1
CT.Martin.TerenSelfEsteem: I wonder what Claire bought at the bake sale... Maybe Teren will give me the recipe if I ask nicely.
CT.Victor.SigHatesCrowds: One time Sig was in such a hurry to leave the Saloon that he paid for everyone's order at once. It's certainly the easiest way to avoid a long line!$1
CT.Victor.SigatHome: I've been around the Bear Lodge, playing pool with Sig and his kid sister. The Lodge is nearly as nice my house, I don't mind the trek at all.
CT.Victor.SondraSaloonJukebox: Maybe it'd be easier to just replace the jukebox for something newer and updateable? I wonder if Gus would be interested.
CT.Victor.GunnarCellarBomb: Was it Gun who caused that explosion? He best watch out, my mother was livid.$1
CT.Victor.GudrunEcoFriendly: My mom pays Gudrun to handle our recycling... Well, she would if Gudrun would accept money.
CT.Victor.BakingSergeantTeren: I managed to catch Teren before he returned to the Scarp and got the last of his cupcakes.$1
CT.Olivia.SondraAerobicsAttempt: Oh, poor Sondra. I should send our maid service to the Lodge to help her out while she recovers.$2
CT.Olivia.CheeringUpMissSondra: I just got back from visiting with Sondra - she seems to be in brighter spirits...$1
CT.Olivia.SondraFundraiser: Of course I've donated a bit to Sondra's plans. I love the idea! Let me help out some more~$1#$action AddMoney 500
CT.Olivia.GunnarCellarBomb: I can't believe someone related to Sondra would be that awful and loud!$5
CT.Olivia.GudrunCollegeFears: My, I wonder if I should talk to Sondra about her plans for Gudrun's future... I'm sure she'd appreciate a kind word of advice.
CT.Olivia.DatingSergeantTeren: Caroline was too hasty. I know a very sweet young lady who just got her doctorate from Ember Island University - I'll call her up and give her Teren's number.$1
CT.Susan.BearFamTimeForBees: サンドラさんが、甥っ子さんのハチミツを分けてくれたの。#$b#朝のコーヒーにぴったりで、とってもおいしかったわ。$4
CT.Susan.GunnarCellarBomb: An explosion? Everyone's lucky they don't live as close to the tracks as I do - people would be waking up nightly otherwise!$1
CT.Sophia.SigHatesCrowds: I found Sig to be a bit, um, scary...$2#$b#But he's very polite and very generous with his free time, so maybe he's not so bad?$1
CT.Sophia.GudrunandtheSea: Gudrun's going to invite me on the next boat trip as long as the Vineyard can spare me! I can't wait!$8
CT.Sophia.GudrunComesHome: Gudrun's home? Oh thank goodness! I'll have to make her hang out and we can catch up on anime together now that things are back to normal.$1
CT.Andy.SigAndCigarettes: Sergeant Bear's a real good man. Sure he's got a few bad habits, but we all do, don't we?$1
CT.Andy.SigConvosAndCraftBeer: Sig brought by a few cases of Joja Lite and we worked on fence mending all day. I knew he'd get tired of that non-alcoholic crap!$1
CT.Andy.SigImprovement: Reckon Sig wouldn't be opposed if I brought by some Joja Lite and we chatted a spell. Nice to have someone treat ya like normal after all.
CT.Andy.SondraSaloonJukebox: Maybe Mrs. Sondra can get some of the country classics that make the Republic so great. Wailin' Jennings, Johnny Card, Thank Williams, Dolly Pardon - you know, all the greats.
CT.Andy.GunnarCommunityMember: Gun's a bit of weird one, but he always pays for any forage I can bring 'im, so he's good in my books.
CT.Andy.MeetSassy: Haha! That Sassy dog of Teren's treed 'bout four raccoons all while leading that boy on a wild chase around Fairhaven. Smart dog!$1
SamCTGudrunVideoGames: Gudrun's terrifying when she plays arcade fighters. Like, I think I'm good at games, and Abby's amazing!#$b#But Gudrun is downright scary.$8
AbigailCTGudrunVideoGames: Gudrun beat my Prairie King high score... That's not fair, I should at least be better at it than a kid!$2
PierreCTGudrunStudentA: Gudrun and Abigail are very much alike in that they excel in their online classes but are next to impossible to get to stay focused on those classes.$2
PierreCTGudrunStudentC: Always appreciate Mrs. Sondra stopping by!#$b#She's always glad to take a look at my sales trends with me and let me bounce ideas off of her.#$b#Of course, I don't need much advice, but just having a knowledgeable ear helps tons.$1
JodiCTGudrunStudentB: When Gudrun's in the library for her homework, she always helps keep Vincent on track. They're both youngest siblings, maybe that's why they get along?$1
SebastianCTGudrunStudentB: Aw {{BearFamProfanityD}}, I borrowed Sig's lighter the other day when he was helping out my mom and forgot to give it back to him.$2#$b#The walk to the Scarp is so long, too... well, he could just buy another one.
DemetriusCTGudrunStudentA: It's been rewarding watching Maru share some of her insights with Gudrun...#$b#My baby girl's all grown up and influencing the next the generation!$1
DemetriusCTGudrunStudentC: Gunnar popped by to bring some interesting impure ores he found in the mine. He might be a little air-headed but when he tries, he does darn well.
EmilyCTGudrunGrades: Sometimes I wonder if my sister should be such a big influence on Gudrun... but I'm sure it's fine!
WillyCTGudrunGrades: That Bear girl's a menace but she knows what she wants to know and I'm sure my pappy'd get a kick outta her smart remarks.$1
HaleyCTGudrunPhotographyA: I feel like a celebrity around Gudrun sometimes, she's so determined to learn what I can teach her about photos and fashion.$1#$b#And it's nice to be able to have shared interests, even if she's a little clumsy still with holding the camera steady.
GusCTGudrunPhotographyA: Still trying to find a food that's too hot for Sig - one of these times I'll get him!$1
HaleyCTGudrunHaleyEmilyJewelry: I like showing off the stuff we got from our great grandparents, but I want the pieces we have to remain unique.#$b#Our great grandmother picked out specific pieces for both me and Emily, actually.$1
EmilyCTGudrunHaleyEmilyJewelry: I never thought I'd branch out into jewelry making, but it's been really fun working with Haley to create some our family heirlooms.#$b#Clint's been super helpful with advice, too, even though I feel like I end up bugging him daily now!$1
ClintCTGudrunHaleyEmilyJewelry: Emily's been visiting me at work a lot more often...$4#$b#I asked Gunnar to save the best copper and gold ore he could.#$b#Uh-uh no reason in particular!$4
AbigailCTGudrunHaleyEmilyJewelry: Gunnar offered to forge me a sword!$1#$b#He said he wouldn't even charge for it - he 'needs the practice'.#$b#Well, it's one way to bypass my dad at least, haha.$1
StringsLodgeSigPhotos1: It's a bunch of photos from Sig's army unit. They're a very close-knit group, and they're all young and happy looking.
StringsLodgeSigPhotos2: These photos were taken at an airport. It's Sig's unit, but there's only a handful of them present, and everyone looks older and sadder.
StringsLodgeSigPennant: A Tunnelers pennant covered in autographs.
StringsLodgeSigTrunk: Sig's gear trunk from deployment. It's padlocked shut.
StringsLodgeSigBoots: Combat boots. Despite how he feels about the army, Sig keeps these very clean and polished.
StringsLodgeSigFootlocker: Sig's footlocker from deployment. There's bullet holes in the lid. It's locked up tight.
StringsLodgeSigHelmet: Sig's gridball helmet from high school.
StringsLodgeSigGridball: Sig's gridball is a little worn.
StringsLodgeSigPC: Sig's computer won't power on, it just beeps loudly.
StringsLodgeSigReminder: A list of names with dates beside them. You realize it's his fellow soldiers and the dates they passed away. You decide not to look further.
StringsLodgeSigHoney2: Peach blossom honey, with Bear family commentary. Sondra says it's too light colored, Gudrun says it's too sweet tasting, and Gun says it's juuuust right!
StringsLodgeSigPoetryBox: This cardboard box is full of various volumes of poetry. You wonder what his favorite poem is.
StringsLodgeSigCollegeBox: There's a bunch of Zuzu University stuff in this box. On top is an old scholarship offer to play for ZuCU! Sig wasn't bragging, he really was good in high school.
StringsLodgeSigMeds: Sig's prescription medications. None of the seals are broken, and they're dated for quite awhile ago.
StringsLodgeSigBookshelves: You never realized there was that many poetry books out there. You grab a book at random and grimace. Ick, romantic poetry!
StringsLodgeSigPoetryBook: It's high enough that only Sig could reach it, but you wonder what secrets it holds. Maybe Sig writes his poetry about people he knows?
StringsLodgeGunPoster: A poster for 'The Zuzu City Express', with torn corners as though Gunnar stole it from a theater.
StringsLodgeGunPotion1: The bottle is labeled: for emergencies only! It smells very pungent.
StringsLodgeGunSwords: Gunnar's bought a lot of weapons from Marlon - he must be taking his training seriously.
StringsLodgeGunTrials: Lots of potions and ingredients that seem very noxious. Are they safe?
StringsLodgeGunCandy: It looks like this is melting into the carpet. Very sticky!
StringsLodgeGunPotions2: Assorted potions that are half empty. Gun's experiments must not be going too well.
StringsLodgeGunGear: Gunnar's monster fighting gear. It's all grimy... and it stinks!
StringsLodgeGunShoes: Gunnar's cleanest boots, but that's not saying a whole lot.
StringsLodgeGunWedding.false: This is a beautiful engagement ring... But Gunnar's single, right?
StringsLodgeGunWedding.true: Gunnar has a bunch of old game guides in here from Prema Vesta. They're well used.
StringsLodgeGunBear: A bear for a Bear brother! It's a little ragged.
StringsLodgeGunPizza: A single serving of Gus's famous pizza!
StringsLodgeGunConsole1: A gaming console. It's still warm to the touch, like Gun had been playing just recently.
StringsLodgeGunConsole2: A gaming console held together by duck-tape. Despite it's age and condition, there's a cartridge loaded ready to go.
StringsLodgeGunBadge: Gunnar's badge, signifying that he IS good enough to be a member of the Coastal Adventurer's Guild, gifted to him by Guildmaster Mateo.
StringsLodgeGudrunShelf1: Gudrun's most favorite seashells have a place of honor here.
StringsLodgeGudrunShelf2: There's a very loved Midnight Squid plush on the shelf. Is that Gudrun's favorite fish?
StringsLodgeGudrunBooks1: Marine biology books. They're covered in bright highlighter marks and cute sticky notes.
StringsLodgeGudrunPearl: This pearl glimmers in the light.
StringsLodgeGudrunBooks2: Elementary school workbooks, with the owner's name scribbled out.
StringsLodgeGudrunPC: Gudrun's laptop. There's a moving wallpaper of a fishtank, and the desktop folders are little sea urchins.#A post-it note by the trackpad has the parental control password in Gun's scribbled handwriting. You wonder if Sondra knows Gunnar's given it away.
StringsLodgeGudrunShoes: Gudrun's sneakers are a custom pattern with - you guessed it! - fish all over.
StringsLodgeGudrunPlushie: A limited edition Joja brand beanbag baby! It's wearing a military uniform.
StringsLodgeGudrunBed: It looks like Gudrun remembered to make her bed today.
StringsLodgeGudrunNote1: A list of rules from Grandmother Bear. Most of them have been struck through, and you wonder who did it, Sondra or Gunnar or Sig?
StringsLodgeGudrunDresser: There's a wide variety of expensive clothes in Gudrun's dresser. There's no rhyme or reason to the styles, though.
StringsLodgeGudrunHomework: This textbook was flung across the room. You hope Gudrun figures out her homework soon.
StringsLodgeGudrunVanity: There's lots of nail polish here, and magazine pictures of different hair styles for women and men.
StringsLodgeGudrunShark: Did... Did Gudrun paint this shark herself? On purpose? Well, at least her protest signs look better than her sea creature attempts.
StringsLodgeSondraPhoto: These are wedding photos. Sondra looks beautiful and Wulfram can't take his eyes off of her.
StringsLodgeSondraRadio: When you turn on the radio, it starts playing a Zuzu City traffic update. Sounds like it's pretty busy downtown by Joja HQ.
StringsLodgeSondraStars: These stars glow in the dark. It looks like Sondra tried to pull them off but they're pretty stuck.
StringsLodgeSondraTypewriter: Sondra's custom letterhead is preloaded in case she needs to type up a note.
StringsLodgeSondraPlant: You've never seen such a green plant before. Maybe you should ask Sondra for her secrets.
StringsLodgeSondraLetter: This is a letter from Frida Bear, current CEO of Bear Enterprises.#'Dear Sondra, thank you for staying with the children during their time in the Valley.#Despite your protests, I have wired a lump-sum payment to your account.#Please expense everything related to the children to the family account, not your personal one. Wishing you well, Mrs. Torsten Bear.'
StringsLodgeSondraMusicStand: There's a book of sheet music, written by Wulfram Bear. The book is titled 'My Heart Sings for Sondra'.
StringsLodgeSondraPiano: It looks like Sondra's trying to record some keyboard music but she hasn't gotten very far.
StringsLodgeSondraBarbell: A barbell. It's the perfect weight for light aerobics.
StringsLodgeSondraBooks: These are accounting records from Sondra's city job. Maybe Sondra can help you with your taxes if you ask nicely?
StringsLodgeSondraTable: No alarm clock? Sondra must have a lot of self-discipline to wake up without one!
StringsLodgeSondraBed: This comforter is so heavy! Oh, it's a weighted blanket.
StringsLodgeSondraDresser: Sondra has a lot of souvenir t-shirts from traveling around the Ferngill Republic.
StringsLodgeSondraCloset: This walk-in closet is huge! And packed with clothes.
StringsLodgeSondraLaptop: Sondra's computer. She has lots of tabs open, like 'dealing with PTSD', 'advice for parents of bullied children', and 'first aid for the beginning explorer'.#She cares a lot about her niblings.
StringsLodgeTerenPoster: Teren's music tastes haven't changed since he was a teenager. Come to think of it, neither has his style.
StringsLodgeTerenHeadphones: These look new. You wonder how Teren managed to lose the old pair.
StringsLodgeTerenCups: Suddenly you remember you need to take the cups and bottles out of your room when you get home.
StringsLodgeTerenComputer: The background on the laptop is of Teren with an older lady. They're both beaming brightly, and it appears to have been taken recently.#Of course it's password protected though, Teren's got confidential client files after all!
StringsLodgeTerenYoga: This yoga mat looks abandoned over here. Teren must not be any good at keeping his New Year's resolutions.
StringsLodgeTerenGrassCrown: What's this? A dried crown made out of woven grass? Whoever made it was kind of clumsy, it looks pretty lopsided... but maybe it's really special to Teren.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordA1: It's a battered album of 'Domestica' by Cursive.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordA2: 'A Fever You Can't Sweat Out' feels almost... too mainstream for Teren? But Panic! At the Disco does have catchy tunes.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordA3: Weren't there pretty mixed reviews on Weezer's 'Pinkerton'? Well, Teren must enjoy it.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordA4: The sleeve for 'Intersections' by Into It.Over It. has very big Zuzu City vibes
StringsLodgeTerenRecordB1: The robots on the cover of 'Something To Write Home About' by The Get Up Kids seem rather likeable.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordB2: Fall Out Boy's 'From Under the Cork Tree'. You probably shouldn't be surprised to find this album at all.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordB3: 'Tell All Your Friends' by Taking Back Sunday. Where are they taking Sunday back to? It's a mystery.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordB4: The sleeve is worn and faded but it reads 'Diary' from the band Sunny Day Real Estate.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordPlayer: There's frankly way too many switches on this thing. Maybe you should introduce Teren to the magic of MP3.
StringsLodgeTerenRecordBox: You're pretty sure Teren has some of these just for show. Wow, what a poser!
StringsLodgeTerenSpeakers: There was a huge billboard for these back in the city. How'd Teren manage to afford a pair? They're crazy expensive but a must-have for audiophiles.
StringsLodgeBearBreakfast: Well, the food's burned but at least it's fresh.
StringsLodgeBearBathroom1: That's a bathroom on the left. Don't be a creeper.
StringsLodgeBearBathroom2.false: That's a bathroom on the right. You've probably seen one before.
StringsLodgeBearBathroom2.true: There's a bathroom on the right. There's a sticky note asking the 'boys' to please use the other one.
StringsLodgeBearBulletin.false: There's random reminders pinned to it for both Sondra and Sig, and a calendar to the left.
StringsLodgeBearBulletin.true: Encouraging notes for Gudrun about her schoolwork alongside a calendar on the left. Gunnar and Sig are very supportive.
StringsLodgeBearFamilyPhotos.false: An old family photo of Sig with what might be his siblings. Sig's wearing his army uniform.
StringsLodgeBearFamilyPhotos.true: Sig and Gunnar with a very small Gudrun with short hair. This photo must be from right before Sig's deployment, because he's wearing his uniform.
StringsLodgeBearBlade.false: This is a very shiny unused sword laying around, how weird.
StringsLodgeBearBlade.true: There's some kind of ...residue... drying on this sword. Gross!
StringsLodgeBearYoba: This Nors shrine is quite dusty but it seems to be humming. When you get close you swear you see unusual shapes and colors, but they vanish when you blink.
StringsLodgeBearBooks1: Books about pollinator gardens and fancy editions of collected poems. These must belong to Sig.
StringsLodgeBearBooks2.false: There's a lot of books on different topics but they look untouched. Just for show?
StringsLodgeBearBooks2.true: Adventurer's guide books, about monsters, foraging, and how to survive in the wilderness. These probably belong to Gunnar.
StringsLodgeBearBooks3: These are text books about accounting. Oh! These are textbooks written by Sondra. She used to tutor math and economics.#One title reads 'Making Math Sensical, Seventh Edition'. It probably doesn't make much sense for non-maths people, though.
StringsLodgeBearBooks4: Children's lesson books for playing piano. You pick up one at random and a note falls out. 'Wulfram, what do I do without you? Music isn't the same anymore.' You quickly put the note back.
StringsLodgeBearShelving: These shelves are filled with souvenirs glasses from Sondra and Wulfram's travels together. They seem to see more use than the fancy china they're mixed in with.
StringsLodgeBearPlant: Oh! This plant is real and very healthy! Sondra has a very green thumb.
StringsLodgeBearRunesB: Othila. Dagaz. You have questions but no answers.
StringsLodgeBearSign: Bear Crossing! You're not going to cross these Bears, are you?
StringsLodgeBearMonster: You don't know what this is. You're pretty sure NO ONE knows what this is. You hope it doesn't come back to life in the middle of the night and destroy the town.
StringsLodgeBearRadio1: The radio is playing a mixtape labeled 'Gudrun's favorite songs':# 'I keep my fist raised up full time against the world...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio2: The radio is tuned to 104.1 Chicken Country, the Valley's local radio station.:# 'Life is old there, older than the trees...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio3: The radio has a Kavinsky tape in it.:# 'I'm gonna show you where it's dark, but have no fear...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio4: The radio is tuned to radio station in a language you didn't expect.:# 'Vitkar allir frá Vilmeidi...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio5: The radio has a cassette labeled 'songs for Gun':# ''Cause I can't fight this feeling anymore...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio6: The radio is tuned in to Zuzu CU's 'College Station Classic Slowdown, ZuCU CSCS 98 AM!'# The college kids in charge are talking about violins.
StringsLodgeBearRadio7: Sig left one his tapes in the radio:# 'You say you miss me and I wanna say I miss you so much...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio8: You can't read the label on the tape in the radio because Gunnar's handwriting is terrible.:# 'Love's an excuse to get hurt...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio9: This looks like an older tape with a title you're not familiar with.:# 'Laat mig bli din skugga, och du bli min...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio10: The radio crackles for a moment before the song plays clearly.:# 'I'll return like a phantom, swallow cities to feel alive...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio11: Top Ten Bops, the tape is labeled.:# ''Til we're stripped down to our skeletons again, 'til we're saints just swimming in our sins again...'
StringsLodgeBearRadio12: The tape's got a warning that says it's property of the Ferngill Republic Army.:# 'And won't you think I'm pretty, when I'm standing top the bright lit city...'
StringsLodgeBearRec2: There's a lot of alcohol on the shelves. This rec room was really meant for winding down after a hard day's hunt.
StringsLodgeBearRec3.false: It looks like people play pool regularly at the Lodge.
StringsLodgeBearRec3.true: Gudrun's pool cue is laying on the pool table.
StringsLodgeBearRec4.false: These pool cues are labeled. You recognize Sig's scrawled name on one of them.
StringsLodgeBearRec4.true: These pool cues are clearly labeled, Sig and Gun.
StringsLodgeBearRec5: This fancy china looks like it never had a chance to be used.
StringsBearFamSpecialBook1: It's a book titled 'The Village of Quality and Quantity' - the back reads: 'It takes heart and soul to build a village on the ridge - the inspiring story of Rafseazz.'
StringsBearFamSpecialBook2: It's a book titled 'Recapture that Magical Feeling' - the back reads: 'Expanding minds through exploring and rediscovering Stardew Valley - the thrilling tale of FlashShifter.'
StringsLodgeBearLiving1: Ah! It's a bear! ...Oh, like Bear Lodge. Like Bear Family!
StringsLodgeBearLiving2: A fresh can of peach Joja cola, left behind by Sig.
StringsLodgeBearLiving3: One of Sig's Joja colas, left out overnight. Yuck!
StringsLodgeBearLivingTV1: The TV's playing cartoons. You wonder who's favorite show this might be.
StringsLodgeBearLivingTV2: Kozu 5 is playing. Wow, that newscaster seems to be rushing through the house fire story..
StringsLodgeBearLivingTV3: 'Your medical license is revoked, Dr. Practice! Get out of my hospital!'#Now how will Dr. Malcolm Practice be able to save the President with the life saving surgery only he can perform?
StringsLodgeBearLivingTV4: Is that last night's episode of Beware the Mothman? Creepy! They're doing a crossover with Weirder Items.
StringsLodgeBearLivingTV5: Oh, it's a recording of Iridium Chef! Chairman Kaga's theme ingredient was Hot Pepper. And it looks Iridium Chef Ferngill won the battle!
StringsLodgeBearLodgeGreenRain: Looks like the streaming service isn't functional...
StringsLodgeBearLiving5: Ah! It's a bear! ...Oh, like Bear Lodge. Like Bear Family!
StringsLodgeBearKitchen1: Tea, ready to serve at any moment!
StringsLodgeBearKitchen2.false: A chore list with Sig doing a majority of the chores.
StringsLodgeBearKitchen2.true: A chore list with Sig doing a majority of the chores. Notably, dishes are assigned to Gudrun.
StringsLodgeBearKitchen3: This jar is full of burnt misshapen cookies. They probably would taste bad if you tried one.
StringsLodgeBearKitchen4.false: Someone forgot to put this away.
StringsLodgeBearKitchen4.true: Gudrun's novelty aquarium cup. It has a very silly straw.
StringsLodgeBearKitchen5: There's lots of voice-mails waiting to be listened to.
StringsLodgeBearKitchen6.false: Cases of Joja Cola, delivered by JojaZon. Sig's favorite drink!
StringsLodgeBearKitchen6.true: Cases of Joja Cola, delivered by JojaZon. Sig AND Gunnar's favorite drink!
StringsLodgeBearKitchen7: Clean mugs, ready and waiting for use with Sondra's gourmet coffee machine. It has so many settings and buttons!
StringsLodgeBearKitchen8: There's takeout containers carefully labeled with contents and a big warning 'Sondra's leftovers, do NOT touch!'
StringsLodgeBearKitchen9: Vitamins and supplements from Joja's Graceful Aging line.
StringsBearRadioGreen: The radio plays an eerie, distorted static.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeGarden1.true: No flowers, the bees are sleeping.
StringsLodgeBearLodgePeach: This peach tree is as old as the Lodge itself.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeHives1.false: The bees in this hive are buzzing happily.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeHives3.false: These hives look sturdy and well made, maybe Sig got them custom built from Robin?
StringsLodgeBearLodgeHives1.true: The bees are dormant for the season.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeHives2.true: The bees are dormant for the season.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeHives3.true: These hives look sturdy and well made, maybe Sig got them custom built from Robin? The bees are probably pretty cosy inside.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeHoneyJar: In Sig's tidy scrawl, the label reads 'peach blossom honey, not for sale'. Doesn't he know sharing is caring?
StringsLodgeBearLodgePeachBasket.false: You've never seen such juicy peaches before!
StringsLodgeBearLodgePeachBasket.true: The tree is dormant for winter, no free peaches for now..
StringsLodgeBearLodgeCola: This cola machine has been here for awhile... but it's clearly getting used these days.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeGrave: 'Here lies Freyja and Odin Bear'#It's dated from over a century ago!
StringsLodgeBearLodgeRecycleMachine.fals: Sig doesn't seem like a big recycling guy, how strange.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeColumn1: These columns are surprisingly brand new and quite sturdy. That's probably a good thing!
StringsLodgeBearLodgeColumn2: There's a invoice taped up to this column. 'Structural improvements'... 'architect and inspector, Yri'. It looks like it's been paid in full.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeColumn3: In Sig's messy handwriting it reads: save some nice flowers for Auntie's birthday.
StringsLodgeBearLodgeRecycleMachine.true: Gudrun's very diligent at recycling the trash she gathers up around town.
StringsBearCellarCaveIn: That explosion was so loud, you feel like it's still echoing somehow even hours later. Hopefully Gunnar learned his lesson about setting off bombs in the cellar, at least.
StringsBearKrakenCave.false: 'Danger!! Kraken!!'#What do you mean there's a kraken down here, sign?
StringsBearKrakenCave.true: 'Danger!! Kraken!!'#Wow sign, tell me something I don't know.
StringsSigSpousePhotosOld: Sig's told you the names of everyone in the photos. He's still remorseful that they're gone, but talking about them has become easier over time.
StringsSigSpousePoetry1: It's a collection of poetry by Christina Georgina Rossetti. You can recall Sig quietly but earnestly reciting some of these.
StringsSigSpousePoetry2: Snorri Sturluson's Prose Edda, The margins are filled with Sig's thoughts on skaldic poetry in general.
StringsSigSpousePoetry3: An analytical resource about the recovery of poems by Sappho and Alcaeus. Sig has been trying to get better versed in archaic poetry.
StringsSigSpousePhotosNew: Even though this photo of Sig's remaining squad mates is newer, Sig has changed a lot since it was taken. It's been a good change.
StringsSigSpouseBooks1: You spot Jane Eyre by Charlotte Brontë, Stephen King's The Girl Who Loved Tom Gordon, and a collection of works by Agatha Christie.
StringsSigSpouseBooks2: On the shelf is Michael Crichton's Eaters of the Dead, Mexican Gothic by Silvia Moreno-Garcia, and a battered copy of The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
StringsSigSpouseBooks3: With a quick skim of available novels, you find The Count of Monte Cristo by Alexander Dumas, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, and a brand new edition of Annihilation by Jeff VanderMeer.
StringsSigSpouseVideoGames1: The shelf is lined with every game in a certain franchise about catching monsters in little balls for the purpose of combat. Sig's mentioned he'd probably have an Ursaring and Combee if those little pocket monsters were real.
StringsSigSpouseVideoGames2: There's so many video games about zombies. Sig *might* have some kind of personal vendetta against zombies. Or he could just like the thrill of mowing down the undead en masse. Hard to say.
StringsSigSpouseVideoGames3: Sig's amassed quite a few co-op and party games. He might not always have a full social battery but he's always happy to be your 'player 2', no matter what.
StringsSigSpouseAxe: Sig's wood axe is sharp but has a guard on it for safety.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVOptions1: To the surprise of no one, it's tuned in to pick up the next episode of Beware the Mothman.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVOptions2: You must've watched Sig adjust the antennas at least twenty times the other night but in the end he got a clear picture for you two to enjoy together.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVOptions3: Sig keeps saying he'll give up trying to make this old TV work but scary movies are definitely better with a hint of static and scan lines.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVComfy.Spicy.1: You don't remember what you were watching the other night. Of course, that might've been because Sig hauled you into his lap and started helping you out of your top - and more - before the opening credits even finished.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVComfy.Spicy.2: Well, Sig's jeans are still hanging over the armrest but where - ah, there's your top, flung carelessly across the room after Sig let you pin him to the couch.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVComfy.Spicy.3: You've learned that Sig's surprisingly flexible, especially when it comes to crowding you down against the seat of the couch so he can put himself between your knees.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVComfy.Chaste.1: Sig's already cleaned up the snack tray from last night. He may not be a good cook, but he's watched enough internet videos to master the art of the 'movie night charcuterie board'. He had all your favorites!
StringsSigSpouseOldTVComfy.Chaste.2: Sig always leaves one of his hoodies out on the couch for you - he says he's knows it will keep you warm if you're feeling cold, and it always smells like him - rain and smoke and pine.
StringsSigSpouseOldTVComfy.Chaste.3: Last night was a slow, quiet night, and you got to spend it resting on Sig's lap with your head on his chest. You're pretty sure he didn't move an inch the whole time you dozed.
StringsSigSpouseFootlocker: Sig has lot of photos and letters tucked away in here from his deployment time. He's always willing to share them and the associated memories with you whenever you ask.
StringsGunnarSpouseGameConsole1: Super Jump Bros Fiesta is still loaded in from the other night. You won, of course, and Gunnar pouted until you pinched his cheek and made him laugh.
StringsGunnarSpouseGameConsole2: Sometimes Gunnar can't get Mystery of Mana to run because of how much wear and tear his console has suffered through, but he always pulls it out in the end so you two can have fun.
StringsGunnarSpouseGameConsole3: You're a lot better at Flurby's Fantasy Run than Gunnar is but he always gets excited to play it with you.
StringsGunnarSpouseGameTime1: Sometimes you find Gunnar hyper-focused on a round of Shapetris and you can't help but try to distract him. But how else will you finally topple his obnoxiously high score if not through nefarious means?
StringsGunnarSpouseGameTime2: The other night you and Gunnar tried a two player game that required you to pass the controller back and forth after key decisions. His logic is definitely out there when it comes to his turn to decide.
StringsGunnarSpouseGameTime3: Gunnar asked you to do the character creator for his new Dimly-Lit Spirits run. He adored the character you designed for him and has been doing really good against the bosses this time.
StringsGunnarSpouseVideoGames1: Gunnar's a huge fan of the Killer's Oath franchise, but you know better than to ask him what his favorite entry is because he can rant for *hours*.
StringsGunnarSpouseVideoGames2: Nuclear Waste Byproduct: New New York is waiting for Gunnar to make time to dive back into. He's doing a melee build this time. It's fun watching him fail speech checks.
StringsGunnarSpouseVideoGames3: Every time you two load up Empire Focii 2, Gunnar asks what the hell the plot is. His gamer reputation dwindles further each time, too.
StringsGunnarSpouseWeapons: Gunnar sure is proud of the weapons he's forged since he started training with Clint. He's done solid work.
StringsGunnarSpouseSword: Gunnar's sword is in good condition. He's gotten better at maintaining his gear all on his own, without Clint or Gil to nag him.
StringsGunnarSpouseZuzuExpress: You can hear Gunnar quoting the movie word for word each time you look at the poster. He loves it when you join the fun as his 'co-star'.
StringsGunnarSpouseExperiments1: Gunnar's notes only read 'poisonous, do not sell'. Well, at least he knows better than to try and profit off of it.
StringsGunnarSpouseExperiments2: A few of the bottles seem to be bubbling mysteriously - perhaps fermenting? Is he brewing new potions or making moonshine?
StringsGunnarSpouseExperiments3: There's burn and acid marks on the work surface - some of Gunnar's concoctions truly are meant for his enemies, not his allies.
StringsGunnarSpouseBoots: There's just a little bit of dried slime on Gunnar's boots, but he always cleans up before he steps into the home he shares with you.
StringsGunnarSpouseCouch.Spicy: The amount of times Gunnar has given up on a video game to instead turn his attention and dedication to you? Better left unsaid, perhaps.
StringsGunnarSpouseCouch.Chaste: Gunnar never takes losing in video games too seriously and he always laughs and snuggles up to you when you poke fun at his game luck.
StringsTerenSpouseFavoriteRecords1: Teren's favorite song off of Sunny Day Real Estate's Diary is Grendel.#'The rain was there to wash away my tears.'
StringsTerenSpouseFavoriteRecords2: Teren's favorite song off of Cursive's Domestica is A Red So Deep.#'They shoot the horses when they're too old to race. And so, my dear, is there room in bed for me?'
StringsTerenSpouseFavoriteRecords3: Teren's favorite song off of Weezer's Pinkerton is Across the Sea.#'Why are you so far away from me? I could never touch you; I think it would be wrong. I've got your letter, you've got my song.'
StringsTerenSpouseMusicTastes: While Teren probably can name a favorite song and artist from figuratively ANY genre, he's going to self-label himself as an emo kid for life.
StringsTerenSpouseRecordPlayer1: There's a record a-spinning, playing:#'And I tried to pin you down at three A.M.; By five, looks like you've won me over again'.
StringsTerenSpouseRecordPlayer2: There's a record a-spinning, playing:#'Your chest is a cage for my letters, and your handwriting's better than mine.'
StringsTerenSpouseRecordPlayer3: There's a record a-spinning, playing:#'Yet I'm nothing more, yet I'm nothing more, than a line in your book.'
StringsTerenSpouseAssortedPhotos1: If you look closely at the photos, you spot your wedding day among the memories. Teren's crying in the photo.
StringsTerenSpouseAssortedPhotos2: Scanning over the photos, you see various photos of Teren with all of your friends. He's a regular social butterfly, but you're his favorite person, as he tells you often.
StringsTerenSpouseAssortedPhotos3: A photo of Teren and his mother Gloria. It's from a bake sale they recently participated in.
StringsTerenSpouseRecipeBook1: Hey, this recipe looks like one you shared with him. Unlike others, he hasn't modified this one from you.
StringsTerenSpouseRecipeBook2: Teren's written down and crossed out a bunch of extra directions at least a dozen times.
StringsTerenSpouseRecipeBook3: This sounds like something off of Gus's menu. He and Teren are always cooking up something new when they get together.
StringsTerenSpouseWorkLaptop: The background is set to a photo from yours and Teren's wedding day. You're pretty sure he's changed his work password to your anniversary, too, the big sap.
StringsTerenSpouseYogaMat.Spicy: It is certainly a visual treat when you wake up in the morning and see Teren doing his yoga routine, barely dressed.
StringsTerenSpouseYogaMat.Chaste: It is certainly entertaining to watch Teren pull confused faces as he attempts to follow along with any kind of yoga instruction video.
StringsTerenSpouseSassyBed: Soft and cosy for the world's best girl.
StringsTerenSpouseTidyUp: Teren's been a lot better at not leaving half-empty mugs in his 'office'.
StringsBearFamSpareRoom: A spare room in the Lodge.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryDisplayShel: The donuts are frosted with little crooked stars and moons.
The cupcakes have neon colored frosting.
The brownies look gooey and decadent.
The slices of different pies are just waiting for some whipped cream.
The fresh loaves of bread are still warm!
There's various baked goods made with the recipes Teren learned from Rosa.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryPlantA: This plant was a shop-warming gift from Aideen. It's vibrant and healthy.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryPlantB: This plant was a shop-warming gift from Jessie. It's hardy and shiny.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryPlantC: This plant was a shop-warming gift from Evelyn. It's verdantly delicate.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryWashroom: It's a clean bathroom for visitors.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryFridge: Teren's fridge is well stocked between his ingredients and his takeout from Gus.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryHangingPlan: These hanging plants were a shop-warming gift from Rosa. They smell very green.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BakeryWindow: There's an assortment of fresh baked goods on display. Teren must've been up early to bake them.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BoysTowels: The towels are slightly rumpled like they were left in the dryer too long before being hung up.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BoysVanity: There's nail polish and men's colognes scattered on top of the counter top.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.BoysBathroom: The bathroom is clean, but there's probably better places in the Lodge to hang out.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.GirlsTowels: The towels are freshly laundered with no perfume-y detergents.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.GirlsVanity: There's make up on the vanity but it's all nicely organized.
MadDog.BearFam.Strings.GirlsBathroom: This bathroom is so clean you could eat off the floor... but who does that?
MadDog.Lodge.WaterPump.false: The water pumped up from the river is cool and sweet. Surely the Bears won't mind if you stole a sip or two?
MadDog.Lodge.WaterPump.true: The pump's frozen over! It's so cold your hand just might freeze to it if you're not careful.
MadDog.Lodge.WoodStump: Sig's left an axe in this stump as if he's not done choring for the day. It looks sharp enough to cut down a whole forest.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.1: *WHO* keeps putting the Encyclopedia of Underwater Fungal Growths back wet!?!?
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.2: Uh, I can't talk right now, I haven't attended class all year, please I am going to FAIL!
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.3: Ugh, I can't focus today... she's totally copying me, isn't she? Just let me be the FASHIONABLE one for once.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.4: My sister's TOTALLY not focusing today... she thinks the fish is copying her style, um, like hello? It's a fish.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.5: This is shrimply fascinating... Ah, sorry, I'm too busy to chat right now... but don't call me shellfish for being dedicated to my work!
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.6: I can't wait until I have my own lab... I'm going to hire an intelligent redheaded assistant and be entirely devoted to my studies.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.7: Hm, yes, quite... But will she?
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.9: Aw, man, they're out of Joja Cherry XXXTreme again? Well there goes MY dinner plans.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.10: I swear I put the Encyclopedia of Underwater Fungal Growths back, but I just can't find it... And I don't want to grab any other text books til my hands are dry.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.11: This is the Fish Rehabilitator 9000. We'd have the 10000, but our funding's kind of tight this time of year... Maybe next year we'll be over 9000.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.12: Hey, you stopped by on a good day! Usually these two are fighting.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.13: Our latest research subjects have been really irritable lately... Mind you, these were all sourced by Joja so I suspect there's a correlation. But the funding!
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.14: This mounted fish has a brass plate that reads 'In Honor of Dr. Edgar Allan Roe, Esquire'.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.15: The Fish Rehabilitator 9000 is humming along, apparently rehabilitating a rainbow trout.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.16: The scribblings on these essay pages look like the ramblings of a fish obsessed maniac... Gudrun's going to fit right in!
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.17: The Deep Blue Conundrum, Foreword by Dylan Moray. The review on the back is by Rodney O'Brien and reads 'I don't care about fish.' Inspirational!
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.18: It's shopping list. At the top is, unsurprisingly, 'fish foods'. At the bottom is 'more cases of Joja Cherry XXXtreme'.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.19: Why does the person on the cover for 'The Old Man and The Sea' look like Willy?
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.20: Most of the books on the shelves look like they've been well-used, and they all vaguely smell damp. Does no one in this major care about anything besides fish?
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.21: Why is the light blinking? Why do none of these students seem worried about the fish lights blinking!?
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.22: There's lots of scientific equipment spread around the classroom... and it all REEKS of fish.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.23: 'WET AND WILD WOBBEGONG IN YOUR AREA! CALL XXX-YYY-0000 AND FLEX YOUR FINS TODAY!' ...Well, that explains why it's in the garbage.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.24: 'Joja Corp is proud to sponsor ZuCU's Aquatic Research Department! Join Us! Thrive!'
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.25: This painting has a dedication. 'Seek lore and knowledge, and through sharing both you will always find friendship and warmth.'
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.26: The textbook and desktop are absolutely soaked with salt water. Hopefully it's at least fresh?
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.27: 'When the World Expands, so does Water', a collection of short essays from various highly acclaimed contributors such as Lemurkat, Flashshifter, Rafseazz, Lumisteria, Skellady, HarvzBack, and more!
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.28: The fish are very determined to stay out of each other's way... and the tank smells like cola. That's probably not related.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.29: There's a lot of technical read outs scrolling on the screen. The word fish appears practically every line!
GudrunOnCampus.Map.Message.30: The chemical makeup of a Joja Cola is listed on the screen. The students have been narrowing down which item might be encouraging fish to fight each other.
GudrunOnCampus.Map.SondraSpeak: Sondra: 'Oh, don't mind me, dear, I'm just keen to stay out of the way in case there's any fish-idents.'
GudrunOnCampus.Map.HaleySpeak: Haley: 'Hmmm... I'm not into marine life like Gudrun, but some of the colorings are pretty. They'd be good photo subjects if this lab wasn't so stark and soulless!'
GudrunOnCampus.Map.AbigailSpeak: Abigail: 'Wow, these shrimp look super healthy, right @? I'm glad to see the students take good care even if they aren't 'pets'.'
GudrunOnCampus.Map.PierreSpeak: Pierre: '...All this money and it's dedicated to studying fish of all things. School was different back in my day.'
GudrunOnCampus.Map.NoraSpeak: Nora: 'I hope we have time to visit the Reptile Rooms. ZuCU has some of the best facilities for animal studies, I really admire their dedication to animal welfare.'
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Fountain: Teren says the fountain helps him focus when he's attempting yoga.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.WoodAxe: Sig's axe is as sharp as ever.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.BeeBox.false: The bees are buzzing happily - Sig has never let them down.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.MeadBarrel: There's Fersken Peach Mead aging away in this barrel.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.BeeBox.true: The bees hibernating for the winter, nice and secure.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.TSBearRHTeles: On clear nights, the Bear-Barnes family enjoys stargazing together. Sig swears none of the constellations make any sense.
The Bear-Barnes family put away their telescope in favor of building a friendly snowman. Sig wanted to give it a frowny face but Teren vetoed that idea.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Radio: The radio crackles a few times before kicking in and reporting on a charity event being held in downtown Zuzu.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Trunk: Sig's trunk - bullet holes still intact - has finally been cleaned out. Probably Teren's doing.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Record.1: It's an ultra rare copy of Elvis Presley's 'Good Luck Charm'. That's one pricy record.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Record.2: It's a blue label edition of 'Legacy of Brutality' by the Misfits.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Record.3: It's a copy of Prince's 'The Black Album'. Most of these were destroyed.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Record.4: It's a very old but well preserved edition of 'The Meaning of Life' by Johnny Cash.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.SigPoetry: Poetry that Sig has written. While the book isn't locked, reading it WOULD be an invasion of privacy. They're probably all about Teren, anyway.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Dresser: Stuffed full of Teren's band t-shirts and a deplorable about of army green socks.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Pennant: A Zuzu City Tunnelers pennant. Sig and Teren like to try and attend games.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Books.1: It's a copy of All Boys Aren't Blue by George M. Johnson - Sig's kept it in meticulous condition.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Books.2: It's a paperpack edition of Margaret Atwood's The Handmaid's Tale. There's a post-it note on the cover from Gudrun, requesting Sig to read this.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Books.3: A slightly battered print of They Both Die at the End by Adam Silvera. There's a book mark on the inside cover with a note from Teren. 'This was sad, why'd you make me read this?'
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Books.4: It's a dog-eared novel titled Between Shades of Gray by Ruta Sepetys. Sig left a feather in between the pages for mysterious reasons.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Poems.1: A very worn, battered edition of Poems by Elizabeth Barret Browning. This probably should be put on display behind glass, not casually left on a shelf.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Poems.2: Poems of Lord Byron, bound in a Cosway-style, with gilded edges. This probably should be put on display behind glass, not casually left on a shelf.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Poems.3: A Third Speight edition of Geoffrey Chaucer's works. The cover has details in gilt. This probably should be put on display behind glass, not casually left on a shelf.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Poems.4: Aruthur Rimbaud's Illuminations, with original lithographs. This probably should be put on display behind glass, not casually left on a shelf.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Posters: Sig and Teren have taken a few roadtrips to get these posters autographed by the bands.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Drinks: Teren's really pushing his luck, hoarding all these dirty coffee cups instead of washing them.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.TerenLaptop.1: Teren's work laptop. There's a post it note on it.#'There's lunch from Gus in the fridge for you. -S.Bear'
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.TerenLaptop.2: Teren's work laptop. There's a post it note on it.#'Where did you leave my favorite hoodie? -S.Bear'
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.TerenLaptop.3: Teren's work laptop. There's a post it note on it.#'Pierre ordered more of that shampoo you like. Stashed it under the sink for you. -S.Bear'
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.TerenLaptop.4: Teren's work laptop. There's a post it note on it.#'Don't forget to ask Doc Harvey for a sleep specialist referral. -S.Bear'
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.TerenLaptop.5: Teren's work laptop. There's a post it note on it.#'Dinner with Auntie, Robin, and Demetrius next week, don't forget. -S.Bear'
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.SassyBed: Sassy has chewed a hole in one corner but the stuffing is valiantly trying stay in place.

BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.SassyFood: Sassy's food and water bowls, clean and freshly filled for the world's best girl.

BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.SigAxe: There's a safety guard on Sig's axe.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Bathroom: It's just a bathroom. Don't be a creeper.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Gridball: A very well-used gridball. Sig and Teren still enjoy getting together with Alex and Shane for amateur gridball.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Coatrack: If you rifle through the pockets of the jackets hanging up, you might find a pack of cigarettes.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Boots: Sig's boots are still a little muddy from the last time he went and waded into the river.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.TerenCookbook: There's a lot of modifications on this recipe. It looks like Teren's trying to make a perfect pizza crust.
This is one of Gus's super awesome Fair recipes. In the margin, Teren's noted to himself to make two versions - spicy for Sig, mild for himself.
It looks like Teren's listed five different cheesecake-techniques here. Which one has been the best so far?
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.PhotosA: Sig and Teren's old army squad. The photos are well-loved and cared for.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.PhotosB: Photos from Sig and Teren's wedding day. Everyone looks so happy. Hey, there's you!
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Closet: Teren has so many band tees that they're even filling the closet. It's a good thing neither of them are fashionistas.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Space: Leah painted a very nice space-themed mural for Adam's bedroom. Maybe he will be an astronaut when he grows up.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Soccer: This soccer ball is a little bit scuffed and dirty from the last time Adam and Sig accidentally kicked it into the river.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.MiniBookshelf: You spot the Boxcar Children series by Gertrude C. Warner. Teren must be reading them to Adam.
You find a copy of The Hobbit by J. R. R. Tolkien. Is Adam even old enough to follow along with the story?
Eric Carle's 'The Very Hungry Caterpillar'. Did... did Adam try to eat the book?
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.PileofBooks.1: The Rainbow Fish by Marcus Pfister sits on top of the pile.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.PileofBooks.2: The Little Prince by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry has been left opened and half buried in the pile.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.PileofBooks.3: Charlotte's Web by E. B. White is buried under the pile.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.MiniCloset: Adam's still just a little kid, so it's not a surprise his clothes are mostly a mess in his closet.
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.Abduction: Hey, this cow getting abducted kind of looks like one from Marnie's ranch!
BearFam.RivalHeartsStrings.KidsToys: Various kids toys tossed in the corner. Sig's been trying to teach Adam the joys of housecleaning but Adam hasn't yet found it fun.

IceFish.Gunnar.Relationship.LowHearts.1: Better watch out! I've been practicing all year - well, technically most of my life? I went fishing a lot with my dad as a kid. So I, by *law*, have to be good at this.

IceFish.Gunnar.Relationship.MidHearts.2: We should make this competition a little tougher. Let's go in with our bare arms and catch those fish with our hands, turn it into a endurance contest.#$b#No? Not, not vibing with that one? That's fair, it sounds positively insane.$6

Right?$8#$b#%Teren pouts at you optimistically. Maybe you should shove him into a snow drift later to make him cool off.
RSVEmber.Sigurd.1: I wonder if Lenny'd let me slip old paperwork into that big ol' bonfire of hers.#$b#Hm? Oh yeah, it's definitely my military papers.$18
RSVEmber.Sigurd.2: A new year already. They're not kidding, the years do get shorter the older you get.#$b#It's because the fraction's reducing, y'know. When you were five, one year was a whole one fifth of your life. My fraction's getting smaller all the time nowadays.$11
RSVGathering.FestSigurd.1: I try to buy the things the kids submitted to any of the booths. Hopefully stuff like that helps 'em feel important.$1
RSVGathering.FestSigurd.2: One of these times, Auntie's going to get on stage and they'll have to cancel the festival for the rest of time.$18
RSVEmber.Sondra.1: A bit of a somber atmosphere, isn't it? But the spirit of togetherness helps quite a bit.
RSVEmber.Sondra.2: Gudrun found the largest piece of wood she could carry, that silly girl.#$b#I'm really blessed to have these three as my family, @. And of course, a friend like you.$1
RSVGatheringFest.Sondra.1: They're going to play live music, @! Ohh, I wish I could join in the fun. Should I ask?$3
RSVGatheringFest.Sondra.2: Everyone's in such high spirits. This little sales competition is adorable. Of course, I bought something from each booth - it's only fair.$1
RSVEmber.Gunnar.1: %Gunnar's deep in thought. You want to check on him, but Sig's nearby, so he should be fine.#$b#Stay warm, @.
RSVEmber.Gunnar.2: Gudrun conned me into carrying up this massive piece of wood. I don't know, I thought she'd be against burning trees for sentimental reasons... she's up to something.
RSVGatheringFest.Gunnar.1: I think I disappointed most of the guys with my monster loot. Like, hey, I'm super bad at being in the mines, what do you want from me?
RSVGatheringFest.Gunnar.2: Auntie bought a boatload of stuff for us to carry home. Well, as long as she doesn't get on stage and start singing, that's fine.
RSVEmber.Gudrun.1: I actually hate the end of the year. Like, someday, I'll have to be out of school and in the real world...If time froze, I could just be the Bear kid sister forever, huh...
RSVEmber.Gudrun.2: I wrote the names of every mega-corporation board member on this piece of wood. What will burning it do? Nothing, but it'll make me feel good.
RSVGatheringFest.Gudrun.1: I wonder if they'll let Auntie sing? I mean, she's not... good at it, but she is passionate. That counts for something, right?
RSVGatheringFest.Gudrun.2: I tried so hard not to buy something, because like, the last thing I - or anyone - needs is more stuff but I couldn't resist.
RSVEmber.Teren.1: %Teren looks thoughtful as he surveys the wood pile.#$b#Solemn air tonight, isn't it?
RSVEmber.Teren.2: Next time I'm stealing Sig's hoodie, it's so big that I'm pretty sure I can wear it over top of my own.
RSVGatheringFest.Teren.1: My cooking is by no means decent enough to sell at the guys' booth, to be honest.
RSVGatheringFest.Teren.2: I'm so hype for the concert. There's truly nothing more fun than live music and it does NOT matter what genre plays.$1
LoveFestival.Sigurd.1: Ain't this about the cheesiest festival around?#$b#Hm? Naw, I don't mind flowers, sweets, and romance, but all the hearts dotting the landscape are almost too saccharine.$18
LoveFestival.Sigurd.2: You know @... I've been meaning to tell you...#$b#%Sig looks surprisingly nervous.#$b#That I love y... your crops. Keep on a-farmin', @.$18#$b#%What a dork!
LoveFestival.Sigurd.Chaste.1: There you are, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. You know, a gathering like this wouldn't feel right without seeing your face. You're the missing piece to my puzzle.$4
LoveFestival.Sigurd.Chaste.2: 'And in the darkness that grows around us, into your skin I whisper - 'I love you' - and you smile, finally bringing the sun' - hmm?$4#$b#I was just talking about you, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$18
LoveFestival.Sigurd.Spicy.1: %Sig catches your hand and presses a kiss to your palm.#$b#Consider this an 'IOU' for later, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}. What do I owe you? Name your price.$18#$b#You know me, there's nothing I love more than being in service to you.$10
LoveFestival.Sigurd.Spicy.2: There's my sweet {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}... Y'know I could write a dozen sonnets about you...$4#$b#But I'd rather we both get outta here so I can show you how deep my love can go.$18
LoveFestival.Sigurd.PartnerDylan.1: I asked Dylan if he wanted me to do anything special for him today and he asked why on earth would he want that?$9#$b#Let me tell you, that bruised the ol' ego just a little bit.$18
LoveFestival.Sigurd.PartnerDylan.2: Asked Dylan if he wanted to make like a pair of gouramis later on today.$10#$b#I've never seen a scientist look so regretful for sharing their knowledge with me.$18
LoveFestival.Sigurd.PartnerTeren.1: Right after our service ended, Teren wrote me a dozen letters or so. Don't tell 'im I said this, but he's a terrible poet.$18#$b#%Sig says that but he looks at Teren adoringly anyway.
LoveFestival.Sigurd.PartnerTeren.2: Both Teren and I like caramel filled dark chocolates the best...#$b#Mind you, he has NO idea that those are my favorite, too, the dork.$18#$b#%Sig watches Teren fondly.#$b#Oh, yeah, here, share these with someone special, @.$1#[(O)AvalonMFX.CPLoveFestival_BoxOfChocolates]
LoveFestival.Sondra.1: Hello dear @! It's such a lovely day.#$b#Wulf used to write me the sweetest notes in the margins of my text books.#$b#He'd even be sure to write in the chapters we hadn't covered yet, and I'd end up all a-titter in the middle of Econ 101.$4
LoveFestival.Sondra.2: I don't think there's enough paper in the whole wide world to tell everyone how beloved they are but I'm certainly willing to do my part.
LoveFestival.Gunnar.1: Hey @! This isn't quite my cup of tea, but they sure did a swell job of decorating.$6#$b#%Gunnar looks a little wistful.
LoveFestival.Gunnar.2: %Gunnar is trying to fashion a ring out of a flower but he's not having much luck.#$b#I really like the idea of writing a love letter... I'm no wordsmith though.#$b#...Or a ring smith, either.$6
LoveFestival.Gunnar.Chaste.1: %Gunnar offers you his box of chocolate immediately upon seeing you.#$b#{{CPGunnarSpouseNameA}}! Freshly purchased just for you from Pierre. Don't worry, I even checked for the one with the furthest out expiry date.$1[(O)AvalonMFX.CPLoveFestival_BoxOfChocolates]
LoveFestival.Gunnar.Chaste.2: %Gunnar has pen ink smeared all over his hands.#$b#Hey, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}! Did you rest well? I fell asleep thinking 'bout you, so I had the most peaceful night ever.$4
LoveFestival.Gunnar.Spicy.1: If you want me to write you a love letter, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}, of course I will.#$b#Your body? The paper. My hands? The pen. And if you're ticklish, I can always just switch to my mouth.$13
LoveFestival.Gunnar.Spicy.2: %Is Gunnar reading something on his phone? When he spots you, he blushes and hurriedly puts it away.#$b#It's a good thing it's cold out here, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}, because just thinking about you has me hot under the collar.$4
LoveFestival.Gudrun.1: I'm only here to haggle with Pierre on discounting the boxes of chocolate at the end of the festival, for the record.$6
LoveFestival.Gudrun.2: Yo, @! Doesn't it feel like love letters are super cottagecore and stuff?#$b#They are making your career into an aesthetic, congrats!$6
LoveFestival.Teren.1: %Teren has a pile of candy cup wrappers stacked neatly in his empty chocolate box.#$b#I'd make a joke about life being like a box of chocolates, but Big Bear'd push me into the river.$3
LoveFestival.Teren.2: Hi @! This makes me real nostalgic for my school days when we'd make little colored paper mailboxes and bring in candy to share with the class... those sure were the days.$1
LoveFestival.Teren.Chaste.1: Hello, hello! You're practically radiant today, my {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}!$4#$b#I adore you, you know that? You make every day feel like a festival.$8#$b#%Teren presses a flower into your hand.#$b#Fresh from Zuzu's hothouse gardens, just for you.$4[(O)593 (O)595 (O)421]
LoveFestival.Teren.Chaste.2: Hello, my wonderful {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}! I can and will immediately drop what I'm doing and drown you with my attention, if you'd like~$4#$b#%Teren catches your hand and holds it to his chest for a moment.#$b#Feel that? My heart started racing once you appeared.$8
LoveFestival.Teren.Spicy.1: %Teren immediately passes you a bouquet of fresh flowers.#$b#Here, my {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.%4#$b#And later on tonight, I still have even more two-lips for you, if you'd let me be so bold.$20#$action AddItem (O)591 15#
LoveFestival.Teren.Spicy.2: I mean, c'mon, abbreviating it to love fest makes it sound like I oughtta tie some nice fancy bows in certain places, right?$20#$b#Well, I suppose if YOU want to untie me later, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}~$8
LoveFestival.Teren.PartnerEli.1: Eli made heart shaped pancakes this morning to kick off the festivities.$4#$b#Well, he said they were heart shaped... I mean, they were *anatomically* correct, if you turned your head and squinted.$1
LoveFestival.Teren.PartnerEli.2: I don't mind showing up and partying but I have plans with Eli later...$8#$b#I'm doing a dramatic reading of one of his favorite romance novels.#$b#Who knows, maybe I'll follow up with a dramatic re-enactment.$3
LoveFestival.Teren.PartnerSigurd.1: %Teren is resting his head on Sig's shoulder, looking surprisingly comfortable despite the snow on the ground.#$b#Hey, @! Beautiful day for a party, isn't it?#$b#Big Bear's like a furnace so I barely noticed the snow, heh.$3
LoveFestival.Teren.PartnerSigurd.2: %Teren is testing out pieces of chocolate from his assortment. When he finds one he doesn't like, he passes it to Sig who immediately eats it.#$b#Find someone who will eat your least favorite chocolates without complaint, @.$8
FashionFestival.Sigurd.1: %Sig looks a little tired.#$b#Don't tell her I told you, but Gudrun's really nervous about trying to find 'her style'. Haley insisted she come check things out, and I'm here in case she gets too overwhelmed.$11#$e#%Sig tuns his attention to Gudrun.#$b#How about something purple? You like purple.$1
FashionFestival.Sigurd.2: %Sig is leaning down to better hear Gudrun.#$b#...I think we should just go look at the booths together and you can pick out whatever, my treat. Won't even have to touch your allowance, kiddo.$18#$e#Gudrun's kind of anxious so if she picks out an outfit that's ridiculous, don't mock her for it or I'll chuck you into the river.$9
FashionFestival.Gudrun.1: O-oh, hey @!! We're just, giving Sig some air. Y'know how he gets in big crowds...$11#$b#...Me? I'm totally not overwhelmed just because I don't know anything about fashion, that would be SO weird of me!$6
FashionFestival.Gudrun.2: %Gudrun is whispering at Sig.#$b#...Can you go take photos of that booth so I can see what's available?$13#$b#Uh, oh, hey @! Very cool and chic of you to be here.$11
MailSigurd1: Yo @,^^I'm a man of my word. Stopped by the farm and took care of some trees and fallen branches for you. Don't worry, I left my cigarettes at home.^^-Sig Bear
MailSondra1: Hello dear @!^^I am writing to inform you that you will see two new members of my lovable family around town this summer!^^My younger nephew and my niece will be visiting and staying in East Scarp with us for the next month. I would love for you to meet them both when you have time! Please feel free to stop by the Lodge and introduce yourself. They're both lovely children.^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
MailTeren1: What ho, Big Bear!!!^^Tell Auntie to set another plate at dinner because I'm coming to visit you guys! I should be arriving pretty soon after you get this letter.^^I'm fairly confident I can make my way over to the Lodge so you don't have to change your schedule just to escort me, but I wouldn't say no to seeing your friendly scowl when I arrived, hint hint.^^Your best friend^^Teren X. Barnes
MailGunnarGone: Yo @,^^You probably already know that Gunnar's been working an apprenticeship to the guild.^^Well, I don't know what happened, but he hasn't come home yet and it's been days. Meet me at the mine and we'll go looking for him. I'm sure he's fine but it's not like him to stay out for this long.^^-Sig Bear
MailGudrunInvite: Hey @,^^If you're not busy AND you like boat rides, you should totally meet me and Sig on the East Scarp beach!^^I promise it will be the COOLEST thing you see all year.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MailSigAwake: Hello @!!!^^Great news, Big Bear finally woke up!!! Dr. Harvey says he can have visitors now.^^He'll probably be free to leave soon, so you should come say hi when you get a chance.^^Your fellow Bear wrangler^^Teren X. Barnes
MailSigLessonTime: Hello @!^^I'm writing to let you know that after a few re-writes and careful research, Sig's come up with a lesson plan!^^We hope you can still attend the class to cheer him on. Stop by the Museum after lunch and we'll 'bee' waiting for you!^^-Penny
MailBeeExplanationSkipped: Yo @,^^The bees you saw me and Auntie arguing over produce honey, obviously.^^I'm kind of abysmal at collecting it all, so feel free to jar up some yourself.^^During spring and summer, you can get Fersken Peach Honey about every Sunday, like clockwork.^^But come fall the tree will be out of blossom and it'll be regular honey from there.^^But whatever's left is free for the taking, at least.^^-Sig Bear
MailSondraBotbInvite: Hello dear @!^^I am quite happy to be writing you to invite you to Pelican Town's first ever Battle of the Bands!^^Sam, Abigail, and Sebastian have been working so hard, along with our generous local contributors (including you!) and now it's time to show them on the 'big stage'!^^Please come to the Town Square in the afternoon and enjoy the fun!^^Cordially, rock on!^^Sondra Brazier Bear
MailSigDumb: Sorry to bother you @,^^You know my brother, right? Sig? Big, blue, mean? Well, he's also sort of a fool.^^I mean, he knows his own limits but he still pushes them and then HE winds up lost in the Mines like a {{BearFamProfanityD}} fool! All because I'm stuck on house rest til Harvey's satisfied!!^^Sorry, I'm a little worried. A lot worried. Anyway, do you think you can meet me at the Mine entrance to go after him?^^Scared witless,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. Teren will meet us there too.
MailGunnarInvite: So you probably heard that,^^I mean, it was PRETTY hard to miss, right? Unless you're super good at sleeping or something. Well! As you (and Demetrius and {{LewisOrLouise}} and everyone who has ever met me) probably guessed, it was my fault.^We're clearing the rubble from the cellar but Sig already told me to piss off when I suggested exploring it. (It left a pretty sizable hole to climb into!) Meet me in the cellar in three days, I'm sure it will be a totally fun time with absolutely nothing to worry about.^^That's what I'm telling myself,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. I've attached a bribe, please accept it. Please.
MailGunnarSecondInvite: Okay @, I'm ready!^^What for? You might be asking yourself as you stand at your mailbox reading this.^^The adventure of a lifetime, of course! We're going back into the creepy cave in my basement to do some hands-on research and exploration!^^I figure, worst case scenario, the fishing's probably interesting. And the best case scenario of course is that we find something REALLY REALLY cool.^^Personally Fine with Either Scenario,^^Gunnar^^P.S. I've attached a bribe, but *I* think adventure is more valuable, personally.
MailGunnarDubiousHonor: Hello {{CPJobTitle}} @^^^^I am writing to you concerning an unexpected but not unwelcome announcement. Specifically, this is an invitation to you.^^We're gathering in the Square tomorrow to celebrate the accomplishments of, well, this is the unexpected part!^^Gunnar Bear.^^^^I'm sure you're aware of the particulars of his latest excursion. I look forward to you joining the award ceremony with the rest of the town.^^Yours Respectfully^^-{{LewisOrLouise}}
MailGunnarSplitsPrize1: Sure, it's nice,^^{{LewisOrLouise}} tried to make me take a secondary payment since I gave the first reward to you.^^But @, I don't need money. It's like the one thing I consistently have going for me.^^So here, I hope you can put this towards something helpful on the farm.^^Maybe buy a goat. Goats are neat.^^Wishing I Had a Goat of My Own,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. You don't *have* to get a goat, @.
MailGunnarSplitsPrize2: Sure, it's nice,^^{{LewisOrLouise}} rewarded me with some nice stuff for whole Kraken debacle...^^But @, I don't need money. It's like the one thing I consistently have going for me.^^So here, I hope you can put this towards something helpful on the farm.^^Maybe buy a goat. Goats are neat.^^Wishing I Had a Goat of My Own,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. You don't *have* to get a goat, @.
MailSigMansplainsHoney: Yo @^^I've been thinking about how the bees only really like making Fersken peach honey at the Lodge.^^I mean, I appreciate that they like my house but that's not very helpful to anyone else.^^Anyway, asked Gunnar and he had an idea. Put one Fersken peach and one piece of coal in a furnace.^^Charring the peach will make it produce that syrup-like nectar Bears love so much.^^-Sig Bear
MailGunnarCopsSVEStyle: So It Took Some Convincing^^Guess what, @! I'm now a trust vendor of stock all the way from the Crimson Badlands.^^That's right, I've worked out a deal with Alesia, Isaac, and Camilla and now I get to sell their potions here in town!^^Honestly, I thought Isaac was going to tell me off, but once Camilla agreed, he fell right in line.^^Lucky Me, Right?^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. My first shipment will be in tomorrow!
MailGunnarCopsDandelionStyle: Dandelion and I Were Talking^^Dandelion's frankly a brilliant alchemist and I'd be a fool to ignore that.^^So I got to thinking, the adventurer caches could be a little more useful if they had some higher quality products in them, right?^^Dandelion was super cool with me including her stuff in the assortment, so! I've swapped out some of my older, less effective stuff.^^In turn, I'm raising the price to reflect Dandelion's potion quality better.^^The Trade Off Is Worth It!^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. The cache will also be available at the Lion's Mane now!
MailLonelyKraken: Do You Remember the Kraken in My Basement?^^I mean, I don't know HOW you'd forget that whole debacle, to be honest.^^Anyway, Demetrius has been checking up on it between his other projects.^^He says the Kraken could use a variety of company to encourage it's spirit after millennia in isolation. Translation: The Kraken is lonely.^^I know this is a huge ask, but do you mind visiting it every once in a while?^^I figured I'd make it less of a hassle for you and, with the Kraken's help (do NOT ask how), came up with this warp totem recipe.^^Please Visit Soon!^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. Visit the Kraken. Not me. I mean, you CAN visit me, but this is FOR the Kraken.^^P.P.S. The Kraken wanted you to have this, too. I think it's a bribe.
MailLonelyKrakenTitle: Wet, Writhing, *Lonely* Kraken In Your Area!
MailTerenLostCookbook: Hello @!!!^^I'm losing my mind, and more importantly, I've lost my favorite cookbook! It's also my only cookbook.^^I was out wandering around the beach in the Scarp, got startled by a crab, and it must've slipped right from beneath my arm when I took off.^^Any chance you can work a miracle and find it? Pleeeeeease?^^Your friendly novice cook^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
MailSigFavor: Yo @^^So I have screwed things up with Teren... a lot.^^I know, you're right, I *am* an idiot. But I'm going to fix this, somehow, {{BearFamProfanityD}} it, and I figured blindly throwing money at him is a start at least.^^I ordered a special bottle of whiskey - his favorite - through Gus but haven't been free to pick it up.^^Mind grabbing it and bringing it to me?^^-Sig Bear
MailGudrunPumpkin: Like, hey @!^^I know you're totally super busy with harvest season or whatever, but I really need a pumpkin. Or five. Five pumpkins. I need five pumpkins.^^Look, sometimes a girl's gotta stare ominously at her older brothers while scraping out the guts of a gourd with a knife, y'know? And like, I'll pay you, too, so... Please?^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MailTerenBeer: Hello @!!!^^So I see Big Bear sent you after me... You're too nice. Next time push him into the nearest body of water. It works for other folks.^^...But really, thanks.
