We don't fight often, but when we do, it sucks. I'd like to return the gesture to him, but we're too old to be drinking whiskey late into the night. Do you think you can help out with a beer run?^^Your slightly hungover neighbor^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
SpringTimeLetter: Dear @,^^Sometimes a nice simple snack is all you need to get through the day. This is exactly the kind of quick treat I whip up for Sigurd if he's feeling poorly. I hope it can cheer you up too, if you ever need it!^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
SummerSnackLetter: Dear @,^^Hot summer days in my home means I keep the oven off as much as possible. This treat is quick to whip up and your oven won't need any preheating because that's just how fast these cakes bake! Enjoy!^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
AutumnCookieLetter: Dear @,^^The Bear family has a long standing tradition of picking apples come autumn time. This cookie recipe is a great way to use up all those darn apples before - or even if - they get all mushy. Cheers!^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
WinterBarLetter: Dear @,^^While winter can be magical, it can also be disheartening and wear one down far too quickly. These bars require no special cutter or mold and will give you a nice boost of energy in spite of any snow storm. Stay warm!^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
BrazierAlfredoLetter: Dear @,^^I understand you've put in a ton of effort and money to spruce up that lovely cottage your grandfather left you.^First off, congratulations! Let me know if you need help processing the tax write-off from that, I know quite a few trade secrets.^But also, there's nothing quite like cooking your own homemade meals in your own home, and I'd like to share the Brazier Family's top secret alfredo recipe with you. The secret is far too much garlic, tell your friends. ;)^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
SigRamenLetter: Yo, @.^^Thanks for not laughing too hard at Gudrun the other night. Here's the world's most perfect ramen, as vouched for by most of the Ferngill Republic Army.^^-Sig Bear
SondraRamenLetter: Dear @,^^I sincerely apologize for all the commotion of the other night. Gudrun's spending extra time with me to polish some of her unBEARable cooking skills. But it did serve to remind me that I know quite a few college tricks for making ramen even better than ever. Here's my favorite!^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
GunnarRamenLetter: Hi, @.^^Well, we all learned something the other night, didn't we? You learned that none of us can cook and I learned that the smoke detector in the Lodge is the loudest sound on the planet. Anyway, figured I'd tell you my favorite ramen toppings in case you ever wanted a treat.^^Sorry about the noise,^Gunnar Bear
GudrunRamenLetter: Hey @,^^Look. No one's perfect, except maybe the midnight squid and the guy that runs the Stardew Aquarium. I thought I'd make up for the inevitable noise complaints by sharing the ultimate ramen flavors.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
GunnarPerfectPotionLetter: @! @!^^Okay, I know I don't have the BEST track record with the stuff. More explosions and stomach aches than anything else, really. But I've done it. This potion could probably run you to the bottom of the Skull Cavern. I'll have it for sale if you don't have time to make it, don't worry.^^In disbelief,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. I've always wanted a reason to say eureka.
GunnarNineHerbCharmLetter: Hi, @^^I know, I know, WHY is it called a nine herb charm? I don't know, I never listened to the family tales. What I do know is that it works, mostly. And it's pretty easy to make, so here you go.^^Bad descendant,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. There's not nine herbs in this.
GunnarRemedyLetter: Hi, @!^^There's been some trials and tribulations through this process, but I think I might be onto something pretty decent here. Maybe drink a glass of milk afterwards to wash the taste out of your mouth, though.^^Brushing my teeth yet again,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. At least it doesn't smell?
GunnarPhoenixDownLetter: @! Hey! So I know the cave was kind of... sketchy, to put it lightly. But I'm trying to make it up to you.^^This potion is a bit more unusual but pretty powerful.^^Perfect against any tentacle'd monstrosities we might find in the future!^^Concerned about the cellar still,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. Let me have this video game reference, please.
SigPeachJojaLetter: Yo, @.^^Yeah yeah, stop drinking joja cola, I hear ya. But consider - fruit soda is rad. Best fruit? Peaches, of course. Here's a hack to improve a can of joja.^^-Sig Bear
SigPumpkinJojaLetter: Yo, @.^^I know, you want the *best* joja hack, of course. Well, tough luck, you gotta earn it. Meanwhile, here's the flavor from the A-tier of soda hacks.^^-Sig Bear
SigFerskenPeachCobblerLetter: Yo, @.^^Kind out of the blue, I know. You've probably heard me complain about this cobbler in the past.^^It's a family recipe passed down through generations.^^Never got the hang of it myself, but maybe you can do some kinda baking reverse-engineering. Maybe then you can teach me. Til then, I hope you enjoy a treat from my childhood.^^-Sig Bear
SigSlicedPeachesTitle: Share With Someone You Care For
SigSlicedPeachesLetter: Yo, @.^^It's a long-standing tradition to cut up fruit and share it with those important to you.^^My kitchen knife skills are abysmal so I asked Auntie to make up a batch for you.^^It's simple and sweet but I think you and your someone special would enjoy it nonetheless.^^-Sig Bear
MailTerenRoseCupcake: Hello @!!!^^I didn't want you to miss out so I've included a sample of my cornbread muffins and sesame seed brown bread, fresh out of the oven.^^Your now baking neighbor,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
MailTerenBrownBread: Hello @!!!^^I didn't want you to miss out so I've included a sample of my rose cupcakes and cornbread muffins, freshly frosted and fresh out of the oven, respectively.^^Your now baking neighbor,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
MailTerenCornbreadMuffin: Hello @!!!^^I didn't want you to miss out so I've included a sample of my sesame seed brown bread and rose cupcakes, fresh out of the oven and freshly frosted, respectively.^^Your now baking neighbor,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
MailTerenCookingSkipped: Hello @!!!^^Sorry you couldn't stay long enough to try some of the baked goods, but I thought I'd mail you a sampler so you could enjoy when you have time.^^Your now baking neighbor,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
MailDietRestrictionsChosen: Hello @!!!^^I made sure to wrap these up tight so there's no risk of cross-contamination. I also sent more cookies too so you have some for yourself if you're in need of a snack. Don't worry, everything's fresh from the oven!^^Your now baking neighbor,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
MailTeren.JojaFloat: Hello @!!!^^I feel like I'm always trying to find new ways to battle the summertime heat, to be honest... Here's a classic trick from back during deployment. We had more Joja cola than probably Joja HQ in those days, unsurprisingly. I hope this helps you keep cool out in the sun!^^Your super chill neighbor,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
BearFam.CaritasOpens.Mail: Hello @!!!^^Tomorrow's the day! Caritas Bakery officially opens over in East Scarp!^^No pressure but I sure would appreciate seeing you stop by, @.^^Otherwise I'll just send you some goodies in the mail instead of handing them over in person.^^Your flour covered neighbor,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
BearFam.CaritasOpens.Title: Caritas Bakery Opens!
BearFam.TerenDatingSassyWalk.Mail: Hello @!!!^^Sassy and I were talking last night, and... we miss you! Sure, we see you all the time but nonetheless, you are missed. If you can spare the time, she and I would love it if you'd join us for a W A L K on the B E A C H. (Sassy can read those words so gotta be careful.)^^Your dog walking boyfriend,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
BearFam.TerenDatingSassyWalk.Title: Aroooo~!
MailGunnarExplosionSkipped: Hello @^^I'm sorry you had to witness that tense scene earlier but despite Gunnar trying to blow up the mountain, everything is fine.^^That boy will drive poor Emily and I into early retirement at this rate!^^We did confiscate his actual bombs before setting him off to the Guild, and I didn't want them laying around so I thought you could use them.^^Enjoy your day - Demetrius
MailGudrun.BrambleJam: Hey @,^^Honestly, Auntie knows how to make great food. Gun knows how to make things blow up. Sig knows how to make people fear for their lives. Me? I know how to make culinary disasters.^^But OTHER PEOPLE have made this recipe successfully, so give it a shot. Promise it's tasty.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MailGudrun.BrambleJamTitle: Burn Down Your Whole Kitchen With This Easy Hack!
MailGudrun.BrambleBerryPie: Hey @,^^I know what you're thinking.^^'What do I do with all these brambles?' Well, don't worry. I know what you should do. This.^^Bake this - leave out the prickly bits! - and enjoy with a nice scoop of ice cream.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MailGudrun.DronningMaud: Hey @,^^Bears can't cook. We're just awful at it.^^Yet for some reason, this recipe's named after one of us. Yeah, I don't know. I bet that old dusty relic never made it. Whatever.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MailGudrun.DronningMaudTitle: All The Way From My Great Great Great Aunt!
MailGudrun.StoneBrambleBerries: Hey @,^^Real talk... have you ever wanted to fight a berry bush?^^Cool, me neither. Anyway, here's some stone bramble seeds. They grow into very tasty berries but they come at a terrible price.^^(Prickly thorns if that's not obvious.) Sorry for being obnoxious when you stopped by the house earlier.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
BearFam.BearFamilyWelcome.Mail: こんにちは、{{CPJobTitle}}の@さん。^^うちはサンドラ・ベア。おいっ子と一緒にイースト・スカープに住んどります。お役に立てるように、この手紙がちょうどええ頃に届いたらええんやけど。^^新しいお家のお祝いに、うちからちょっとしたもん用意したんよ。いつでもイースト・スカープに遊びに来てな！あんまり無理ばっかせんと、ちゃんと顔見せに来るんやで。^^サンドラ・ブレイジア＝ベアより
BearFam.BearFamilyWelcome.Title: ペリカンタウンへようこそおこしやす！
Mail.SigurdFriendshipGift.Title: Thanks.
Mail.SigurdFriendshipGift: Yo, @^^Appreciate ya. A lot. Should say it more. Probably won't. Here.^^-Sig Bear
Mail.SigurdRomanceGift.Title: Love Ya
Mail.SigurdRomanceGift: Yo, @^^Love ya. A lot. Should say it more. Probably will. Here.^^Sig Bear
Mail.GunnarFriendshipGift.Title: This Is Neat
Mail.GunnarFriendshipGift: Hi @!^^The one thing Em's taught practically through osmosis is sewing - so I thought you'd like this little guy I made. Also, thank you. You're easily my best friend.^^No pressure on the best friends thing,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. It's friendshaped!
Mail.GunnarRomanceGift.Title: Something Special
Mail.GunnarRomanceGift: Hi @^^You're my favorite person. Ever. In history. Living or dead. Past or present. Speaking of presents. Uh, I wanted you to have these.^^Hopelessly devoted to you^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. Now I have that song stuck in my head. You're worth it though.
Mail.TerenFriendshipGift.Title: Thought of you!
Mail.TerenFriendshipGift: Hello @!!!^^We've sure been through a lot together! Remind me again, did you serve with me at some point? That's my first guess when I just click with someone. We click. I like that. I hope *you* like this.^^Your hopefully favorite best friend,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
Mail.TerenRomanceGift.Title: The Finer Things, kind of
Mail.TerenRomanceGift: Hello @!!!^^Wow. Never thought I'd know someone as wonderful as you... but here I am. In love. Head over heels. Making puppy dog eyes every time you look my way. Well, I thought youd should actually get something nice out of this whole thing, so I wanted to send you this. Hope you like it.^^Your deeply in love lover,^^Sgt. Teren X. Barnes
Mail.SondraFriendshipGift.Title: My dearest friend!
Mail.SondraFriendshipGift: Dear @!^^I was casting about for an excuse to write you, and realized I had the most important one of all right in front of me. You're a dear friend of mine and I wanted to impress upon you how true that was. I know it's not much and our friendship transcends material goods, but I wanted you to have this as a token of my affection. Be well.^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
Mail.GudrunFriendshipGift.Title: Hey hey hey!
Mail.GudrunFriendshipGift: Hey!^^I just wanted to show my appreciation - and Auntie said I needed to practice writing thank you letters - so I got this really cool designer shirt! It's made of 100% recycled materials and proceeds go to aquatic conservation efforts! Isn't that neat? Anyway... like, thanks, @. I'm glad we're friends.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MailGudrun.JojaOnAlert: To Whom It Will Concern^^Due to reports of harassment in the region of Stardew Valley, we are sending a representative to discuss the legal actions to be taken against all offending parties. If you have received this letter, you are an offending party, as outlined in init. T12489, JojaCo Allowances. Anyone willing to come forth with information on parties Pierre, Pierre's General Goods, Gudrun Bear, or all of the above may be excluded from proceedings.^^We thank you for your full cooperation with the law.
MailGudrun.BacktoSchool: @, @, @! Guess What!^^Mr. Gunther's arranged a ZuCU campus visit for me and a few others. Auntie's coming, obviously, but it would be totally cool if you wanted to visit the campus too! Meet us at the bus stop in the morning and we'll all go to fish school!^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
SavedtheKrakenMail: This letter is just a soggy wad of paper and INCREDIBLY gross to the touch. Clearly it's from the Kraken.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_1.Body: Yo @,^^I was clearing out some fallen branches around the Lodge thanks to the weather the other day and realized there was way more wood than we'd use. Robin mentioned you might need some so I figured I'd make it your problem.^^-Sig Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_1.Title: Free To Someone Else's Home
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_2.Body: Yo @,^^Willy said you're pretty decent at angling. Mentioned you even caught a pufferfish. I think eating those things might be hazardous to your health, but hey, what do I know? Anyway, here, don't eat this either.^^-Sig Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_2.Title: In a Fugu State
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_3.Body: Yo @,^^...Stop over working yourself, you're making Auntie worry. They say Gotoro wasn't built in a day, so there's no reason to run yourself ragged trying to build up your place. Take better care of yourself.^^-Sig Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_3.Title: Do You Enjoy Surprise Bouts of Unconsciousness?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_4.Body: Yo @,^^If no one's told you today, unclench your jaw, go put any dishes in your room in the kitchen so they can be washed later, and remind yourself that you aren't half-bad, even.^^-Sig Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_4.Title: Unfriendly Reminder
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_5.Body: Yo @,^^There used to be this absolute dive bar in west Zuzu that had the most amazing butter-fried potato wedges anyone's ever made. I used to sneak in when I was sixteen with a fake ID because once I hit my growth spurt they didn't look too closely at it. Did you ever go? And if so, do you remember the name?^^-Sig Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sig_Letter_5.Title: Butter Fried Memories
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sondra_Letter_1.Bo: Dear @,^^I've heard nothing but great things about your progress over there! And I thought, you yourself might get into beekeeping at some point, and it'd be the politest thing to help out with that endeavor. I picked these up from Pierre's just for you!^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sondra_Letter_2.Bo: Dear @,^^I was chatting with Gunther recently and he mentioned you'd been returning books to the Museum! You're truly one of the kindest people I've had the pleasure of knowing. I thought you deserved a little kindness in return.^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sondra_Letter_3.Bo: Dear @,^^I hope this letter reaches a happy, fulfilled you. I was just thinking of you the other day, how you seem like you've brought new life and joy to the Valley simply by being yourself... And I thought I should let you know how true that is! You're a wonderful shining star, my dear.^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sondra_Letter_4.Bo: Dear @,^^Oh, I just *knew* I shouldn't have ordered from Joja online. You see, I was attempting to order sunflower OIL for a recipe but Joja sent me sunflower SEEDS. I'm afraid I'd just waste the poor things, so I'm passing them on to you in hopes they'll serve you better.^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Sondra_Letter_5.Bo: Dear @,^^I had the strangest dream! The whole Lodge was surrounded by these friendly little fellows made pure shadow! They were knitting and reading and rummaging through the trash, all without a care in the world! Imagine my surprise in the morning when I stepped out to greet the day and I found this strange bauble on the door step! Perhaps it would of use to you?^^-Cordially,^^Sondra Brazier Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gunnar_Letter_1.Bo: Hey^^I'm sorry your favorite soap opera killed off your favorite character. Maybe his contract wasn't renewed? I dunno. Anyway, I thought some flowers would cheer you up. Ask my lunk headed brother to get the nice vases down from the top of the china cabinet, he's definitely tall enough to.^^Love ya!
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gunnar_Letter_2.Bo: Hi @,^^I've been practicing my forging and actually managed to get something decent assembled for once. I know Clint usually works on your tools so I figured I send this your way in case it'd help that process any for ya.^^Got molten metal on my favorite shoes,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. Do you think Clint and Robin have ever discussed making wrought iron furniture?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gunnar_Letter_3.Bo: Hey @^^Demetrius and I were chatting and he mentioned the other day how you had a cave for mushrooms over at your place. And while I'm sure you're WAY better at being prepared than I am, I figured it couldn't hurt to send these your way to help light up the dark as needed.^^Still wondering where my missing bomb bag went in the dark,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. A flashlight would make life too easy, am I right?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gunnar_Letter_4.Bo: Hey @^^Demetrius and I were chatting and he mentioned the other day how you had a cave for fruit bats over at your place. And while I'm sure you're WAY better at being prepared than I am, I figured it couldn't hurt to send these your way to help light up the dark as needed.^^Still wondering where my missing bomb bag went in the dark,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. A flashlight would make life too easy, am I right?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gunnar_Letter_5.Bo: @^^Huh. You sure do enjoy killing dust sprites. Well, I'm not going to try and unpack all that right now, nor am I going to rat you out to anyone, but I am going to look at you funny for a little bit. Hope this alleviates your sprite killing needs in the meanwhile.^^Building a little memorial deep in the mines,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. Are you sure you don't think they're a little cute?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gunnar_Letter_5.Ti: Things That Go Meep In The Night
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gunnar_Letter_6.Bo: @? Is that you?^^This is the LONGEST shot in the dark here, but last time you went fishing, did you happen to reel up a pair of glasses? Black with a divot in the left lens because I dropped them when I was taking out the trash the other day? Let me know!^^Squinting constantly,^^Gunnar Bear^^P.S. Gee, I hope they aren't broken!
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gudrun_Letter_1.Bo: The Big Jerk,^^There's like NO WAY there's not a doctor in town who can order in pain medication, just stop being a dork and go buy some next time!!!! I'm BUSY! Also why don't you visit with Auntie next time besides!^^See ya NEVER,^^You know who I am you gigantoid
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gudrun_Letter_1.Ti: Big Brothers Are Actually The Worst, An Essay
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gudrun_Letter_2.Bo: Hey @,^^I can't believe you've gone fishing over 1000 times! I'm starting to think you don't even LIKE fishies! You're very mean and I HOPE you see the error of your ways soon. Maybe this will persuade you.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gudrun_Letter_3.Bo: Hey @,^^Have you e’er felt a sudden lust for soup? I feel like soup gets a bad rep because people only ever seem to want it when it's cold or they have a cold. That's souper unfair. Anyway, I failed my ancient history pop quiz, keep that a secret, won't you?^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gudrun_Letter_4.Bo: Hey @,^^Do you ever wonder about the sea that used to cover the desert? Do you think it was filled with megalodons? Or giant coelacanths even bigger than the ones we know now? Or maybe just some funky starfish? I think about it a lot when I should be studying. Oh well.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Gudrun_Letter_5.Bo: Hey @,^^OH NOW YOU'VE REALLY DONE IT! YOU DESERVE A MILLION CRUSTACEANS PINCHING YOU CURSE! A CURSE-STACEAN!^^See ya around but I'm not happy about it,^^Gudrun Bear
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_1.Bod: Hello man!^^ It looks like some of your gear got mixed into mine so I wandered by the family estate to hand it over and your gran called me an orphan. I *have* a mom, I don't know why she doesn't believe me. Anyway, if you don't want it, remember to at least dispose of it safely. And call me, would ya?^^T
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_1.Tit: Something Here (This Letter) Will Eventually Have To Explode
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_2.Bod: Hey man!^^I know, I know, Auntie's probably feeding you SUPER well and you don't need or want me fretting all the way back in the city about you, but as you like to complain about, I'm a bleeding heart. I hit up our favorite food truck just for you and all you need to do is microwave 'em, no cooking required. Call me.^^T
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_3.Bod: Hello @!!!^^I'm ACTIVELY devastated right now. I swear I try to keep track of my own stuff, but I got lost wandering by the Adventurer's Guild and didn't notice when I dropped my CD player... I'm a little scared it fell into the water. You haven't uh, come across a My Chemical Romance CD recently, have you?^^Your tuneless emo-kid neighbor^^Teren X. Barnes
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_3.Tit: As Rice Grains And Roses (And CDs) Fall At Your Feet
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_4.Bod: Hello @!!!^^When I was a kid, I was exposed to everyone's favorite classic, The Mummy, and I just *knew* I'd become an open-shirted rogueish adventurer when I grew up. Well. So much for all that, huh? It was on the other day so I thought I'd tell you about baby Teren's dreams for a laugh.^^Your closed-shirted paper-pusher neighbor^^Teren X. Barnes
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_4.Tit: I May Not Be An Explorer Or An Adventurer Or A Treasure Seeker Or A Gunfighter
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_5.Bod: Hello @!!!^^Back when you worked at Joja, did you ever get antsy that they might own your soul? I was really scared about like, signing my soul away on a contract when I was a child. I really have no earthly idea why. Anyway, I hope this doesn't bring back bad memories, but have a twelve-pack on me.^^Your still-ensouled neighbor^^Teren X. Barnes
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_Teren_Letter_5.Tit: I Picked Up My Shovel And I Walked To The Mine
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Title: Wages
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.1: I put some away for a rainy day emergency, but here's this week's tutoring wages.^^Hopefully the next one's a little more so I can help out better.
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.2: Tutoring's not always great, but hopefully this portion's enough to help out.^^I wanna make sure I earn my keep and help you out however I can, @.
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.3: This could be a little better. I'll look around, see if I can get a few more students to tutor.^^I hope it's enough to support all that you do.
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.4: Most of my inheritance is tied up in investments, but sometimes those stupid accounts pay out finally. I know it's not quite the same as hard-earned money, but I want to put it towards our household regardless, so here.
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.5: A lot of distracted students this past week. Maybe it's my teaching style? I guess I could try being nicer. But really, you're the only person I like being nice to, so... oh well. Here's this week's pay, at least.
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.6: I think I ought to take on more students. It'd be nice to be of more help to you, however I can. Maybe I can pick up some other part time work eventually... But not too much, I don't want to be kept away from you forever, after all.
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.Closer.1: Love ya, see you at supper.^^-Sig
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.Closer.3: Looking forward to supper with you, lover.^^-Sig
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.Closer.4: My heart beats for you alone.^^-Sig
Sigurd.WeeklyWage.Mail.Closer.5: You're my favorite person to come home to.^^-Sig
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Title: Shop Profit Share!
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.1: You'll never believe who stopped by to make a few purchases at Bear Necessities! Yep, Abigail! She practically cleared out my entire stock, so here's the proceeds to put towards our home.
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.2: {{MarlonorMateo}} is sending a huge shipment of gear over to {{GunnarRandomTown}} because they fore-casted a pretty large increase of surface monsters. That means more money for us and here it is! Spend it on whatever we need.
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.3: There were some travelers passing through the Inn who wanted odd souvenirs, so Rosa sent them my way. They bought all kinds of things that they *probably* won't ever need. Hope this helps out with our expenses.
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.4: I know I've been coming home tired more often lately, but I swear it's worth it. The shop had a great run of business and things can only go up from here. I hope this is enough to help support us.
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.5: The shop didn't have great traffic... Well, I guess I can't win 'em all over. I'll try to get deeper into the mines and get a better haul next time. Here's all of this weeks proceeds though, maybe you'll find a way to make it go farther.
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.6: I struck the mother-lode in the mines this week! Just in time too, Clint wound up having me help him smith up all sorts of gear.^^Since I'm not an apprentice anymore, he paid a bonus out, too. And here it is!
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.Postscript.1: P.S. Do we have any grapes?
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.Postscript.2: P.S. I don't suppose you know where I lost my wallet? It has my ID card in it...
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.Postscript.3: P.S. We should dine out for supper soon!
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.Postscript.4: P.S. You'd tell me if I left the sink running accidentally, right? Right?
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.Postscript.5: P.S. Do you want to get matching pajamas? I think we should.
Gunnar.WeeklyWage.Mail.Postscript.6: P.S. Um, if you see a pile of bombs on your way into town... er, nevermind.
Teren.WeeklyWage.Title: This Week's Finances
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.1: Caroline sent some of her friends my way to cater for a party. She also made sure they paid both the donation cost and the cost of supplies for everything, so I'm giving that to you for safekeeping. It's the least I can do.
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.2: Gus and I have been trialing a lot of recipes lately and he wouldn't accept my 'no' on paying me for the labor. I put a lot of into this season's charity fund but set aside this portion for our home.
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.3: Got a bonus at work today. I guess some of the colonels pushed for it to better reward the veterans on staff. That's surprisingly nice of them compared to how tough they were when I was deployed. Well, anyway, here's that for us.
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.4: Joja Corp gave me a kickback for the charity work since I sell their colas in the shop. I gave most of it to the charity fund but wanted to give some to you for our household. I hope it comes in handy.
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.5: Oh, they paid out some unused holiday time to me this week so I figured I'd hand that all off to you. Maybe it can be put towards the farm? We could get another animal~
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.6: Someone stopped by the shop and paid me for my bread recipe... Which I'm pretty sure I found on a blog like three years ago? So that was kind of awkward... Anyway, it feels weird putting all of that into the charity fund so here's a portion for the house.
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.Closer.4: Thinking about you all the time, Teren
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.Closer.5: Miss you all the time, Teren
Teren.WeeklyWage.Mail.Closer.6: Nothing could keep me away for long, Teren
BearFam.WishYouWereHere.Mail: Hello from the Fern Islands!^Next time you're coming along with us. You're practically a Bear anyway.^Forever your bonus family, The Bears.
BearFam.WishYouWereHere.Title: Wish You Were Here
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_RHTerenSigHouse: Sig and Teren's House along the River
MadDog.BearFam.KrakenlingDescription: The offspring of something ancient and mean. There's malevolent mischief in every wiggle of it's tentacles.
MadDog.BearFam.HafgufaDescription: Unaware of the debris accumulating on it's back, this fish thrives off algae and metal deposits deep beneath the surface.
MadDog.BearFam.LyngbakrDescription: With a name meaning 'leather back', this fish has skin prized for it's durability and luster.
MadDog.BearFam.JojellyfishDescription: This stinging jellyfish species has an unusual aroma of cola. Joja would really prefer that it wasn't named after their signature soft drink.
MadDog.BearFam.ColacrabDescription: These hermit crabs have started making their homes inside of empty Joja cans. They appear to be thriving.
StringsSigurdInn1: The Inn's not as rowdy as the Stardrop, and Rosa doesn't mind my lingering about.
StringsSigurdInn2: Yo, @. Wasn't planning on company, but I guess you're here now, hm?
StringsSigurdInn3: Are you sure you wouldn't rather be at the Saloon? Folks are more chatty there by far.
StringsSigurdLibrary1: %Sig looks at you and sighs.#$b#Hey you. Find something shiny in the mines?
StringsSigurdLibrary2: %Sig is quietly mouthing the lines from the poem he's reading and doesn't even meet your eyes.
StringsSigurdLibrary3: %Sig lifts his eyes from the page.#$b#Hey you. I've this one on loan for the next week if you were looking to borrow it, sorry.
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnA1: Want me to do a little pirouette for you, @? It's not gonna happen, this hem doesn't even reach my *knees*.$9
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnA2: I don't care that I'm wearing a dress, I just can't believe this is the largest size Gudrun could find.$9
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnA3: Honestly, besides how short this getup is, my other complaint is that the tights are really itchy too. It's awful all around.
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnB1: Rosa asked if she should loan me a pair of jeans out of the lost and found - frankly, I'd be shocked if they fit me.$11#$b#...I almost said yes.$9
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnB2: If any of us should wear high-heels in this get up, it's you, Gun.
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnB3: I sent Gun to grab me a snack off the table and the {{BearFamProfanityQ}} ate it right in front of me.$8#$b#I *can't* go get one myself, I have some dignity, {{BearFamProfanityD}} it.$11
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnAy21: Yes the fake ears *are* super soft to the touch. No, I will not lean down so you can pet them.$2#$b#Get your own fuzzy bear ears.$18
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnAy22: Incredibly glad to discover the bear in the game would be allowed pants.$1#$b#I guess technically he doesn't wear any pants but there's no way I'm committing to the bit *that* closely.$18
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnAy23: Honestly, we ought to stop letting Gudrun pick the theme, but at least the source material this time might scare some folks.$1
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnBy21: This suit's awfully hot. It'd be fine if we were out trick or treating -#$b#Hah? I'm not too old for trick or treating, @, don't give me that look.$11
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnBy22: %Sig is fussing at his bowtie.#$b#It's slowly strangling me. No wonder these bear robots started killing people, this is torture.$9
StringsSigurdSpiritsEveInnBy23: I guess I should give these games a try. Maybe after the festival, prime spooking hour.$18
StringsSigurdAuntSondraA1: Don't let her know, but spending time with Auntie's the best part of my day.$1
StringsSigurdAuntSondraA2: I wonder if I oughtta ask Auntie about making a cobbler over the weekend.#$b#I'd go pick the berries myself if she would, but I don't want to bug her.$1
StringsSigurdAuntSondraA3: We spent the other day listening to some of Uncle Wulf's old records. It's always bittersweet but Auntie really loves talking about him.
StringsSigurdAuntSondraB1: Do you think Auntie realizes how often she mentions Gus? I wonder if she's sweet on him...$2
StringsSigurdAuntSondraB2: Apparently the bees aren't cuddly so Auntie's been feeding wild animals. She even asked Eloise for what was safe to leave out for birds.$18
StringsSigurdAuntSondraB3: I don't think I've ever seen Auntie disappointed in me except for the time I burned a hole through a cast iron skillet. Don't ask how.$9
StringsSigurdTerenA1: I dunno why I let Barnes keep talking me into coming into this place. Needs more windows.$11#$b#At least the company makes it worth it.$1
StringsSigurdTerenA2: What are we up to? Barnes thinks it's imperative that we keep practicing getting re-acclimated to civilian life and to him that means being in public.#$b#I'm just here for the beer.$11
StringsSigurdTerenA3: Someone tell Barnes we're not kids anymore, if we do shots this early Gus'll wind up throwing us out with the garbage.$9
StringsSigurdTerenB1: I think Gus looks forward to this if only because he knows he can shove the unpopular brews at me and Teren and we'll polish it off for him.$18
StringsSigurdTerenB2: You'd think Teren would get sick of the more outdated options in the jukebox but he just keeps feeding it coins. What a dork.$18
StringsSigurdTerenB3: %Sig is grinning widely as Teren recalls an encounter with a four star general. He's clearly embellishing the story.#$b#Don't tell Teren I told you, but he {{BearFamProfanityD}} near got docked a month's wages for that stunt.$18
StringsSigurdTerenStoryA1: Did you still get mail from Kaspar and Meridianna?#$b#They're franchising the club now, opened their fourth location last month.$8#$b#And through it all, they're still raking in thousands off dumb soldiers like us.$18
StringsSigurdTerenStoryB1: Meri's cousin flew back in from the capital and has been organizing DJ sets for the chain.#$b#Can't believe that mousy little kid hauls around all that music equipment like it's nothing. She's a beast.$18
StringsSigurdTerenStoryC1: Hey, you know, I threw that match on purpose.$11#$b#I knew you'd all get smug thinking you could beat her - and me by proxy - and she offered me a cut of her profits.$9#$b#Didn't take it but boy did I enjoy sitting back and watching you all lose.$18
StringsSigurdTerenStoryD1: That ceviche that Kaspar made with grouper was out of this world though.$1#$b#I've got the recipe from him and gave it to both Auntie and Gus and neither of them could match it.$8#$b#Wily old fox probably left out an ingredient.
StringsSigurdTerenStoryA2: You see the latest promotional video for ol' Private Wormwood?$8#$b#Even Gudrun mentioned his latest act and I swear she never watches stand-up specials.#$b#That kid only watches animated junk still, but she was spitting the same jokes Wormy used to tell on patrol out of nowhere, suddenly.$11
StringsSigurdTerenStoryB2: I thought the whole point of helping him fake his death was so he could come home to Ferngill.$8#$b#He's done a house tour and he's got himself a nice little cottage outside of the capital.$18#$b#Did the whole video in both languages. Now, where was that fluency when we got all the vehicles stuck in the swamp?$11
StringsSigurdTerenStoryC2: Do you think those self-deprecating jokes work on all those celebrity boytoys of his?$11#$b#God knows the comedy's relatable but {{BearFamProfanityD}} if it doesn't hit *too* close to home.#$b#I Half wanna tell Gudrun to stop listening to it, she's too young to be so cynical.$9
StringsSigurdTerenStoryD2: You always did fall hard for a witty oneliner.$1#$b#%Sig looks solemn for a few moments.#$b#The future, the present and the past walked into a bar.#$b#It was tense.$1
StringsSigurdTerenStoryA3: {{BearFamProfanityJ}}, Teren, digging up the oldest of bones there, aren't you?#$b#%Sig takes a long sip of his beer to avoid answering.#$b#We met up after I got back, yeah.
StringsSigurdTerenStoryB3: Which is *so* weird to me, even all these years later.$11#$b#I hated pulling guard duty with you and I made sure you knew it.$9#$b#But there you were with your big dumb baby deer eyes, askin' if I was okay.$18
StringsSigurdTerenStoryC3: We are friends now.$1#$b#You definitely did your part with all that.$8#$b#Didn't think I'd meet a guy who could out-drink me but you sure did your {{BearFamProfanityL}} to keep up.$18
StringsSigurdTerenStoryD3: We *weren't* besties. You became slightly tolerable, and then you grew on me.$1#$b#Like the kind of horrific, invasive fungus we'd be scraping out of the latrines every other week.$18#$b#%Sig laughs at Teren's sputtering reaction to that comment.
StringsSigurdTerenStoryA4: %Sig is sulking into his beer.#$b#Y'know we can't, right? It's a ceasefire, not a treaty. We're not allowed in because of our military history.#$b#No sense on imagining something that won't happen.
StringsSigurdTerenStoryB4: You drove Mayor Jess up the wall and back down it with your inability to locate camp.$18#$b#Which is mind-blowing, in hindsight, we were stationed there for almost a year and you always needed to be walked back by a townsperson.
StringsSigurdTerenStoryC4: Kinda sounds like you'd get lost and annoy Mayor Jess on purpose just so you could flash those big dumb baby deer eyes of yours at her wife for cheesecake.#$b#Although, it *was* {{BearFamProfanityD}} good cheesecake.$18
StringsSigurdTerenStoryD4: Y'know Mayor Jess would put you to work in a heartbeat. Have you out chasing golden threshers out of her wheat fields til sunset.$18#$b#...It'd be nice to her and Marta again, yeah. Good folks, hope they're doing well.$1
StringsSigurdGreenRain1: It's a good day to stay indoors, @. You probably should've.
StringsSigurdGreenRain2: You can find all kinds of weird moss out there right now... it's not very edible though. Don't ask how I know that.$18
StringsSigurdGreenRain3: The bad thing is it disrupts all the services for the day... gets real boring when you're used to entertainment at your fingertips.
StringsSigurdDTZA1: The selection on tap isn't that great for such a big place... But the cocktails are made well, so I reckon I oughtta stop my complaining, huh?$18
StringsSigurdDTZA2: %Sig is studying the label on his beer bottle.#$b#I think we could get our hands on this back in Gotoro... Small world, isn't it?#$b#Hey Teren, do you recognize this one? Take a sip.$18
StringsSigurdDTZA3: Not gonna lie, @, I absolutely hate it here.#$b#If it weren't for Teren, I'd be lurking around the Scarp.#$b#But no, he can't navigate and he wants someone to dance with him that won't make fun of him.$11#$b#I mean, I'm still going to make fun of him.$18
StringsSigurdDTZB1: Teren tends to treat me like a garbage disposal for drinks.#$b#I don't mind as much as I should but I swear he orders the most bizarre IPAs and cocktails.$9
StringsSigurdDTZB2: Teren thinks he can dance but can't. I *know* I can't dance, and cannot recommend avoiding dancing with either of us enough.$18#$b#Despite those words, Sig appears to be swaying along to the music.
StringsSigurdDTZB3: Anyone, anyone, come dance with my desperate friend. He's so very, very desperate, accepting all offers.$18#$b#Sig appears to be trying to give Teren away to the first interested party.
StringsSigurdCambriaHivesA1: Hm? Even Camie needs a helping hand now and then, despite her insistence on running all over creation for the sake of others.$12
StringsSigurdCambriaHivesA2: Honestly, I'm probably not the best person for this job, but if it makes Castle take a break, I may as well.$12
StringsSigurdCambriaHivesA3: Why don't I come out to %farm to tend to your bees in my spare time? Because I'd steal 'em.$14
StringsSigurdCambriaHivesB1: I've only been stung a few times since I started keeping bees, and it's always Castlegrove's bees that get me.$15
StringsSigurdCambriaHivesB2: Castle's bees are usually pretty set. She's good at what she does, but I don't mind helping. S'not like I do anything with my time.$15
StringsSigurdCambriaHivesB3: Ah, Camie's probably already got some mead set aside for me after this. Always insists on SOME kind of payment, I really don't know why.$14
StringsSigurdCampfire1.true: Try not to bug Professor Moray here too much, he's got a headache forming.#$b#Told 'im he oughtta head home early but he's too stubborn to listen.$18
StringsSigurdCampfire2.true: Sorry, this seat's mine. Called dibs on him - it - ages ago.$18
StringsSigurdCampfire3.true: Need something? Well go bug Eli, he's {{BearFamProfanityD}} hosting this get together, Dylan's just a guest.
StringsSigurdCampfire1.false: I shoulda brought some longer skewers so I wouldn't have to get up. Gun! Gimme a marshmallow!$1
StringsSigurdCampfire2.false: If you catch on fire, I'll dunk you in the sea, don't worry, @.$18
StringsSigurdCampfire3.false: Hey you, glad you made it. Someone needs to entertain Moray for a while. Remember, use small words.$18
StringsTerenCampfire1.true: Hi @! Eli's awfully nice, getting us all together like this, huh?$4
StringsTerenCampfire2.true: Eli forgot to tell me to prepare snacks for every body, but to be fair, we were kind of distracted earlier...$8
StringsTerenCampfire3.true: Oh, if you need something, Dylan's probably free to help out. Eli ought to get to enjoy the fruits of his labors by sitting and relaxing, right?#$b#So bug Dylan instead of him.$3
StringsTerenCampfire1.false: If Gunnar weren't around burning marshmallows for all of us, I don't know how I'd even survive the night.$3
StringsTerenCampfire2.false: Howdy, @! Pull up a seat, the fire's nice and toasty and no one's had to be put out yet.$3
StringsTerenCampfire3.false: It's a specter coming to haunt us all - oh, it's just you, @. I got all excited for nothing.#$b#I'm kidding! I'm always excited to see you, you're very much something.$10
StringsMarriedSigurdDesertFestival1: Make sure you keep cool, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}} and please come back to me if you decide to go cavern diving.
StringsMarriedSigurdDesertFestival2: Want me to win you some eggs? For you {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}, I'll try anything at least once.$18
StringsMarriedSigurdDesertFestival3: I'm must be suffering from heatstroke because there's an impossibly wondrous vision in front of me -$10#$b#Love you, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$18
StringsSigurdDesertFestival1: Everyone knows you're supposed to go all in on Cactus Crawler.$18
StringsSigurdDesertFestival2: Teren wanted to buy himself lunch but bought spicy eel... Think I should warn him? Nah.$18
StringsSigurdDesertFestival3: Robin warned me she was thinking about bringing some wood and stone to sell, but I was woefully over-optimistic about the quantity I'd have to carry.$11
StringsSigurdDesertFestival4: There's no way in {{BearFamProfanityA}} I'm going into that creepy cave. You all are nuts and also on your own.$11
StringsSigurdDesertFestival5: Maybe next time I'll camp out and help with the setup - I'm sure Sandy wouldn't mind the helping hands and it'll keep me busy, at least.$1
StringsGunnarMines1: Testing out something new today. You don't have to buy it, I gotta finish being my own guinea pig first.$10
StringsGunnarMines2: I think Gil might be telepathic or something.#$b#How does he always know when I've been on my phone too much down here?$12
StringsGunnarMines3: Blade sharp? Bag empty? Rock and roll, @. Happy mining!$3
StringsGunnarGuild1: I've forgotten everything Gil told me already so I'm sure I'll pay for that later.$6
StringsGunnarGuild2: Y'llo, @. Got away from %farm for a bit to upgrade with some supplies from Marlon? Nice!
StringsGunnarGuild3: %Gunnar has a slightly glazed over expression on his face - he must've gotten a long lecture from Marlon.
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnA1: I know, I know, we probably look silly. But it makes Gudrun happy, so how could I say no?$6
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnA2: Don't mind Sig. I've been getting him drinks and stuff since he's so worried about his skirt length.#$b#It *is* scandalously short though.$1
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnA3: Next time, I'm calling dibs on picking the theme. Might still make Sig wear a skirt though, heh.$1
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnB1: There's like fifteen bobby pins holding this gigantic hairbow to my head and they all hurt.
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnB2: I bet you'd look killer with high heels instead of penny loafers, Sig.$1
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnB3: Rosa really went all out with the snack selections, I might not have room for anything at the festival later.$6
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnAy21: This is that phantasmal murder bear that only appears sporadically in the games... What do you think Gudrun thinks about me, huh?$6
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnAy22: 'It's me!'#$b#Yeah, I - I don't know. Do the animatronics talk? Besides horrifying screeching?
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnAy23: I'm so hungry I could eat a security guard.$1#$b#What? That's what the animatronics do! They stuff you in a suit, they *eat* you!$6
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnBy21: I can't do the little creepy laugh. I can't make my voice that low, this is devastating.$12
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnBy22: I played some of the games with Gudrun but I still have no idea what the plot of them is.$6
StringsGunnarSpiritsEveInnBy23: What this get-up really does is make me want a pizza. A pizza would be great right now.
StringsGunnarSmith1: I'm pretty sure Clint's only putting up with me because I pay well.$6
StringsGunnarSmith2: %Gunnar's brow is furrowed in confusion.#$b#Giving myself a quick break before I struggle back into the thick of it.$2
StringsGunnarSmith3: %There appears to be flecks of melted metal sticking to the front of Gunnar's shirt.#$b#Hm? Naw, I don't need first aid, I'm fine.$3
StringsGunnarSmithB1: I don't think I dug up enough copper for this project, dang it.$16
StringsGunnarSmithB2: Video games make the idea of crafting a sword look so easy!
StringsGunnarSmithB3: %Gunnar looks a little sleepy but perks up when he sees you.#$b#Hey @! The forge is so toasty, I could just lay down and nap beside it.
StringsGunnarLibrary1: %Gunnar has several books set aside with titles like 'The Ancient Way of the Hammer', 'Slimes Vs The Power of Friendship', and 'Fifty Fun Things You Can Do With Ore!'
StringsGunnarLibrary2: %Gunnar has a battered book that he's hiding under other books. The spine looks like it says 'Beginner Explosives.'
StringsGunnarLibrary3: %Gunnar is putting away books. 'Deep Cave Fish and Where to Find Them', 'Rankings of Royal Serpents', and 'How to Tell if You've Been Cursed' are just a few of the titles.
StringsGunnarSaloon1: It's not quite as fun or hopping at Zuzu, but the Stardrop's got it's own charm for sure.$1
StringsGunnarSaloon2: Hey @! Good to see you, have a drink with me! [346]#$b#And if you don't drink, just pass it on to someone else, no worries$1
StringsGunnarSaloon3: %Gunnar looks a little tired but he raises his drink in a quick toast to you.#$b#Hi @! Atmosphere's not so bad here, is it?
StringsGunnarPractice1: %Gunnar is practicing his sword swings and doesn't seem to interested in chatting at the moment.
StringsGunnarPractice2: Hey @! Just picked up a new sword from Marlon, it feels pretty good so far, not too light or thin.$1
StringsGunnarPractice3: %The grass beneath Gunnar is trampled, he must be working hard today.
StringsGunnarPracticeB1: I'm not great with weapons. As you can probably guess, Sig was trained by the army, so he's great with blades, the jerk.
StringsGunnarPracticeB2: %Gunnar looks exhausted but when he starts falter, he takes a deep breath and pushes forward. Best leave him to it.
StringsGunnarPracticeB3: Hi @! You can come closer, the only person I've managed to hit so far is myself...$6
StringsGunnarPracticeC1: I think I forgot everything Marlon showed me the other day... Well, starting with the basics can't hurt, even if it's a repeat, right?
StringsGunnarPracticeC2: Aw - {{BearFamProfanityD}} -!#$b#%Gunnar narrowly misses hitting himself with the flat of his sword.#$b#Whoa, you really know to move quietly when you wanna, huh?$6
StringsGunnarPracticeC3: %Gunnar's sword looks freshly honed - he must've been working with Clint recently to improve it.
StringsGunnarPracticeD1: I guess I could just meet up with Eli early and spar with him but I don't like getting disarmed instantly, so there's that.$6
StringsGunnarPracticeD2: I gotta wrap up in time to take a shower. I don't like being sweaty and gross around other people, ick.
StringsGunnarPracticeD3: I'm trying my best but I'm just not a natural swordsman like most people I know. Gotta practice, practice, practice.
StringsGunnarPotion1: Hm? This isn't one of the ones that explodes... Well, it shouldn't be!#$b#Oh no... what if it is?$6
StringsGunnarPotion2: I... I forgot what's in here... Hm. Well, it's probably safe.$6
StringsGunnarPotion3: I test out everything I make before I throw it in the shop. I figure if it can't hurt me much, it should be fine... Right?$6
StringsGunnarPotionB1: I try to forage ingredients versus buying them - Jojazon doesn't do the greatest job at sourcing things that are graded properly.#$b#What? Just because I'll eat plants I find on the ground doesn't mean I want to work non-natural ingredients!$6
StringsGunnarPotionB2: Most of the stuff in this one was from a recipe I found as a bookmark. The mystery makes it exciting!
StringsGunnarPotionB3: I'll probably have to trash this one entirely; the way it got hot to the touch so quickly is kind of worrisome.
StringsGunnarBadTest1: %Gunnar mumbles when you check on him but he doesn't seem quite unconscious yet, luckily.
StringsGunnarBadTest2: %Gunnar looks like he's going to be sick. He waves you away when you get too close.
StringsGunnarBadTest3: %Gunnar coughs, unable to catch his breath while shaking his head at the empty potion bottle.
StringsGunnarMakingNotes1: I used to write stuff down on paper but I kept spilling ingredients ON the papers, so now everything's digital.$6
StringsGunnarMakingNotes2: I wonder which ingredient made me lightheaded... hm... huh? I'm fine! It's all part of the process!$6
StringsGunnarMakingNotes3: Do you think the bees mind me working down here? I sure hope not. I don't want to be a bother to them.$6
StringsGunnarRecoveryA1: Sig said if I tried any of my potions while I'm recovering he'd put me in traction just to make sure I'd focus on getting better.$6
StringsGunnarRecoveryA2: It's been boring being 'in recovery' so far. I'm tired, but I also want to be productive, but I can't because I'm too tired all the time.$6
StringsGunnarRecoveryA3: The worst thing is I can't really try anything too new with mixing potions until I'm given the all-clear from Harvey.$6
StringsGunnarRecoveryB1: I thought the fresh air would be a nice change of pace but I still feel too idle.$6
StringsGunnarRecoveryB2: %Gunnar is looking at his hands.#$b#Hm? Hey @... Just worried I'm gonna fall out of practice.$6
StringsGunnarRecoveryB3: I asked Sig for help with some stuff but I hate feeling useless... He doesn't complain any, at least.$6
StringsGunnarPITV1: It's nice seeing Gudrun feel safe and happy.$1
StringsGunnarPITV2: Hey @! I'm just here with Gudrun, she's the VIP today.$1
StringsGunnarPITV3: I'm really proud of my baby sister... she's so much happier now.$1
StringsGunnarGreenRain1: Why's it green? Do you think it'll come in other colors eventually?
StringsGunnarGreenRain2: I... I'm going to collect the rainwater and drink it. It's for science.
StringsGunnarGreenRain3: Okay, update, the moss is technically edible. ...Of course I was going to eat it.$6
StringsGunnarDTZEntrance1: %Gunnar is perusing the posted fliers.#$b#Hm, I'll have to remember that the Crop Top Mafia is playing here next month... Teren likes 'em, I think.
StringsGunnarDTZEntrance2: %Gunnar is perusing the posted fliers.#$b#Y'know, I don't know if I ever heard Teren mention Fifty Flying Featherdusters before... I guess we'll have to catch their next show.
StringsGunnarDTZEntrance3: %Gunnar is writing down dates from a posted flier.#$b#Oh boy, Windy City Warhorses will be stopping in Zuzu, I'll have to tell Teren. He'll be thrilled.
StringsGunnarDTZA1: Bah, why do people come out if they're going to be sourpusses? Some city folks are real rude nowadays...$5#$b#The music's nice and the drinks are cheap, lighten up.
StringsGunnarDTZA2: I used to come here with my ex fiancée a lot while we were both still in college.#$b#I don't think we ever had a bad experience.#$b#Which makes it easier to visit now that she and I are through - there's no negative memories attached.$6
StringsGunnarDTZA3: There used to be a bartender here who would water down drinks...$7#$b#I mean, I don't come out to drink in the first place, but that's such a rude thing to do, just to get people to keep buying more drinks.$2
StringsGunnarDTZB1: %Gunnar checks his phone before looking up at the band.#$b#Hm, I think their album is on Dew-ify.#$b#I'll have to check out their work, sometimes recorded songs are WAY different than the live stuff, right?$1
StringsGunnarDTZB2: Hey @! Make sure you drink water if you're going to be hanging out for a while.#$b#It gets stupid warm with all the extra bodies around and it helps you pace yourself if you choose to drink.$1
StringsGunnarDTZB3: %Gunnar grins at you, swaying along to the band.#$b#Oh, I wasn't expecting you to be here at this hour. Getting a break from the farm life?#$b#This drink's on me, don't worry, it's non-alcoholic!$1#$action AddItem (O)612
StringsMarriedGunnarDesertFestival1: Hello {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}! Wanna see if Marlon will let us go through the Skull Cavern together?$13
StringsMarriedGunnarDesertFestival2: I bet if we hurry {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}, we can get Emily to put us in matching outfits. We'd look awfully cute if we matched~$4
StringsMarriedGunnarDesertFestival3: It's hot enough that tossing you into the oasis and jumping in afterwards sounds downright tempting, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}} - but don't worry, I wouldn't manhandle you without your consent!$6
StringsGunnarDesertFestival1: You shouldda seen the outfit Emily tried to get me into.$6
StringsGunnarDesertFestival2: Gil said I'm not allowed to get my Egg Rating since I helped set up stuff for the Skull Cavern and thus *could* have cheated.$6
StringsGunnarDesertFestival3: Bet all my money on King Sting, hoping for an egg-fall.$1
StringsGunnarDesertFestival4: Aw, Sig ate the last of my snack and I left my wallet on the bus. If you ever get the chance to have a big brother, just - don't.$17
StringsGunnarDesertFestival5: I think Emily should tag in someone else to help run the outfit service. I want to see what getup {{MadDog.BearFam_ReylaOrWilly}} would put me in.
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnA1: I remember watching this cartoon with Gudrun when she was little. It's fun to get dressed up on a theme.$1
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnA2: Do be gentle with Sigurd. The dress isn't made exactly for a man of his stature.$1
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnA3: Hello, @! I'm Professor Utonium. I'm rather fond of the labcoat look on me, maybe I should incorporate it into my daily wardrobe?$1
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnB1: I wonder what other cartoons we could dress up as... I do love matching with my niblings, it's quite fun.$1
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnB2: We should've done villains! They had such fun villains as I recall! A devil, a monkey, a gang of green children... $1
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnB3: Thankfully, as I believe Professor Utonium is a civilian, I am not expected to do any crime fighting today.$1
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnAy21: The children have informed me that the game this outfit is from wouldn't suit my tastes.#$b#That means it'll will scare me to my core, I'm sure.$9
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnAy22: There was also a wolf costume Gudrun recommended, but I think I suit the pretty chicken outfit better.$1
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnAy23: There was an opportunity to carry around a real cupcake, but goodness, the temptation? Poor thing wouldn't last the night, much less five.
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnBy21: %Sondra is humming the Toreador March.#$b#Hello @! Apparently the chicken I am dressed as can be often be found in the kitchen. Perhaps the chicken's a decent cook?
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnBy22: Ah, there's a movie about this game? Oh, it's a horror film? Never mind, I'm sure I'm not missing out on too much fun.
StringsSondraSpiritsEveInnBy23: %Sondra gently smooths down her costume apron.#$b#I could've just worn my real one, it sits much more nicely.#$b#Although it doesn't say 'let's eat' across it, unfortunately.$2
StringsSondraNephewSigurd11: I could never embarrass Sigurd by telling him, but I do adore that he makes time to chat with me.$1
StringsSondraNephewSigurd12: I usually like to plan meals in advance so groceries can be done in one trip, but getting Sigurd to show any preference is like pulling teeth!
StringsSondraNephewSigurd13: I was just telling Sigurd about how kind of Gus it was to share some of his marinade recipes with me. I always appreciate advice from talented chefs.$1
StringsSondraNephewSigurd21: I've been trying to convince Sigurd to pick up an instrument but to no luck.#$b#All Bears receive formal music training as children but I believe my dear Wulf was the only one who stuck with it.$3
StringsSondraNephewSigurd22: I wonder if I should host a proper cooking class. Sigurd would benefit from learning but I don't know if it will stick...
StringsSondraNephewSigurd23: I think I should plan a family vacation - certainly Sigurd's bees can handle being left alone for a bit, right?
StringsSondraShoppingTrip1: Hello dear! I know Sigurd insists he could do the shopping on his own, but I simply can't skip out on catching up with everyone.
StringsSondraShoppingTrip2: Hello @! How's life at %farm? I hope everything is going well for you - I know we Bears certainly benefit from the produce you've sold through Pierre.$1
StringsSondraShoppingTrip3: %Sondra is carefully perusing the stock of candy bars and when she spots you, she winks.#$b#Ah, I know, less sugar is better for me. Do be a dear and say nothing to Dr. Harvey.$6
StringsSondraLedgerAudit1: {{LewisOrLouise}} handles the books quite well but since I'm retired, I volunteer my services as a second set of eyes.$11
StringsSondraLedgerAudit2: Hello @! You know, if you ever need help with taxes I'm happy to assist, free of charge!$11
StringsSondraLedgerAudit3: I believe {{LewisOrLouise}} is forever making miracles with the yearly festival budget, it stretches amazingly well thank to his keen efforts.$11
StringsSondraTownPhoneCall1: Dratted telemarketers.$5#$b#Oh, sorry dear @, didn't spot you there!#$b#Sometimes I wish we as people weren't so easy to reach.
StringsSondraTownPhoneCall2: Hello @! Just had a lovely conversation with an old student of mine. They've become a financial advisor for some up and coming television star, how thrilling!$1
StringsSondraTownPhoneCall3: Ah, my phone ran out of battery in the middle of my call. I'm sure my mother in law's left a dozen messages on the home phone by now.
StringsSondraGreenRain1: I've told everyone to stay indoors for my own personal comfort.$2
StringsSondraGreenRain2: I wish I'd been prepared for this... Maybe I should come up with an emergency weather kit?$2
StringsSondraGreenRain3: Oh dear, it's going to make me miss my show, isn't it?$2
StringsSondraDTZA1: I cannot forget my handbag at the salon today, I absolutely can*not*. Sure it's not that hard to remember my bag!$2
StringsSondraDTZA2: Gudrun my darling, please stay close while we're crossing the streets.#$b#I *know* you're responsible, it's the drivers I fear.$2
StringsSondraDTZA3: Hm, I wonder if I should pick up anything for Sigurd? I know he has a sweet tooth, after all... Ah, sorry, don't mind me, just thinking out loud!
StringsSondraDTZBarber1: It's a lovely day for running errands, I think I'll stop by the bakery and get myself a treat after this.$1
StringsSondraDTZBarber2: Is it finally time to try a different style? Oh, but I'm so terribly set in my ways... Well, it can't hurt to see what's popular right now...
StringsSondraDTZBarber3: %Sondra is flipping through a hairstyle magazine, humming along to the overhead music.#$b#Ah, sorry, I'm almost done browsing this issue!$1
StringsSondraDTZB1: Of course, if we bring home a WHOLE cheesecake there's the terrible battle with one's will... Hm, what should I do?$1
StringsSondraDTZB2: Hm, a quart of bubble gum ice cream DOES sound pretty divine, doesn't it? But a gallon would last longer! Decisions, decisions.
StringsSondraDTZB3: Maybe we'll get both the chocolate cake and some of the Ice Delights to go... They'd make a nice reward after a long day!$1
StringsSondraDesertFestival1: Ohh, the merchant has some lovely bows available... Maybe Gudrun and I should get some matching ones?
StringsSondraDesertFestival2.false: The oasis looks quite refreshing, doesn't it? Maybe Gudrun and I should have our lunch right by the water to cool off.$1
StringsSondraDesertFestival2.true: The oasis looks quite charming, doesn't it? Maybe Gudrun and I should have our lunch right by the water and take some photos together.$1
StringsSondraDesertFestival3: Of course, Shoebiscuit is the way to go *if* one were to bet on the races.$6
StringsSondraDesertFestival4: Teehee~ Emily gave me a sneak peak of today's wardrobe choices... I'm quite optimistic I'll turn out looking glamorous~$1
StringsSondraDesertFestival5: Ah, it's so nice to catch up with Gil - he's quite the charmer once he opens up. It's a shame I never make it up to the Guild to visit, but at least I have today.$6
StringsSondraPoaSB.1: It's a perfect day to take things slow, savor one's breaking of their nightly fast, and enjoy the atmosphere of one's local saloon, isn't it?
StringsSondraPoaSB.2: The pancakes today were simply divine, I don't think I could make a fluffier, airier batch myself if I tried all day and night.
StringsSondraPoaSB.3: Oh dear, I'm becoming one of those old fogeys that just linger for hours at breakfast, drinking too much coffee and generally being a menace, aren't I?
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnA1: %Every time Gudrun turns to look at her brother Sig, she starts laughing hysterically.#$b#I swear I ordered the largest possible dress, I did!$6
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnA2: Yo, @! Check it! Sugar, spice, and everything nice - we're the Powerpuff Bears!$3
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnA3: Sig's probably never going to do the dishes for me again after this.$11
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnB1: Honestly, missed opportunity to dress as Ed, Edd, and Eddy. Sig would make a great Kevin.$1
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnB2: Oooh! Sig's tall enough to be Miss Sara Bellum - now that would've been hilarious!$1
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnB3: If I had to pick a Powerpuff though, I'd be Buttercup, even if Bubbles is the best.
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnAy21: The urge to run down a hallway at mach speed is overwhelming, @. Best make sure the doors are shut tonight.$3
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnAy22: I should have bullied Sig into dressing as Circus Baby, huh? Da - I mean, darn, missed opportunity.$15
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnAy23: If the Inn loses power I'm going all-in on the scary animatronic theme, how could I pass such an opportunity up?$15
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnBy21: I tried the challenge mode but I couldn't beat it...$3#$b#NO! Not because I was scared!$15
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnBy22: %Gudrun is fiddling with her hook. Is it real?#$b#Hello @! I had to take my hook off to try out all the snacks and now it won't stay in place. Oops!$3
StringsGudrunSpiritsEveInnBy23: I think I want to try making a Roxy costume next, she's super cool. Or maybe Mangle? There's too many choices!$3
StringsGudrunPickTrashMountain1: Ugh. Oh hey @! Just picking up cigarette butts and old newspapers, can you believe the nerve of some people?$9
StringsGudrunPickTrashMountain2: I forgot my gloves today; I don't like sorting trash barehanded but I can't just LEAVE it behind.$6
StringsGudrunPickTrashMountain3: I keep reminding myself every little bit counts but sometimes it feels disheartening, you know?$13
StringsGudrunClassroomTime1: Once a week I have to take my school tests outside of the house under observation. Auntie spoke with Mr. Gunther and now I hang out here.
StringsGudrunClassroomTime2: %Gudrun has her brow furrowed in concentration.#$b#Hey @, sorry, I'm trying to finish this essay question before I run out of time. Chat later or something.
StringsGudrunClassroomTime3: I do NOT miss being in a real classroom. Virtual lessons are definitely the way to go, and I get to skip any drama.$6
StringsGudrunShallowsPhotography1: Oh da - er, darn it! Hey @, you didn't hear me say that word.$9#$b#%Gudrun looks away from you to keep trying to get a photo of some creature she spotted.
StringsGudrunShallowsPhotography2: Hm? Oh yeah, I fell in, but I'm alright! I'm a great swimmer, and I didn't scare any of the fishies.$7
StringsGudrunShallowsPhotography3: %You catch sight of Gudrun's phone screen - she has the camera app opened and zoomed in on the tiniest crab she could find.
StringsGudrunPITV1: %Gudrun is beaming excitedly.#$b#Oh! Um, hey @! Good to see you. It's nice here, huh?$1
StringsGudrunPITV2: %Gudrun is giggling happily.#$b#This is... this is really special... I didn't think I'd get this far, strangely enough...$1
StringsGudrunPITV3: %Gudrun looks briefly somber as she studies the flags.#$b#Hey @. Things will keep improving, right? I really... really hope so. For anyone.
StringsGudrunGreenRain1: This is what happens when you drink too much Joja Cola.$6
StringsGudrunGreenRain2: This is what happens when you don't recycle!$6
StringsGudrunDTZA1: %Gudrun is texting away on her phone and chewing gum loudly.#$b#Um, sorry, I'm busy right now.
StringsGudrunDTZA2: I kind of want to see what's available at Molly's, too... Can we just go already, Auntie?
StringsGudrunDTZA3: Whoa, where'd that guy get his driver's license from? The back of a cereal box?$6
StringsGudrunDTZMall1: Hehehe... I'm going get two coffees while Auntie's busy~$1
StringsGudrunDTZMall2: Ughhh, they're totally out of my favorite order right now! This is the worst stop at Stardop Cafe ever!$6
StringsGudrunDTZMall3: Waiting for them to call my order~ This is my waiting for them call my order song~ Lemon drizzle cheesecake, I'm waiting!$1
StringsGudrunDTZB1: It's not too late for me to become a Qinstagram food blogger...$3
StringsGudrunDTZB2: We should get a gallon of Zuzu ice cream... and an extra pint I could have all to myself.$1
StringsGudrunDTZB3: Next time I'm calling ahead to reserve a whole cake for us to pick up.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentA1: %Gudrun waves you off without a word.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentA2: %Gudrun is studying her homework very hard and ignores you.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentA3: %Gudrun shakes her head when you greet her.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentB1: Sorry @, I'm super busy right now, go bug someone else.$13#$b#%Gudrun is ignoring you now.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentB2: Uh, kind of busy here, do you mind?$13#$b#%Gudrun is ignoring you now.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentB3: I'm not free to chat @, find someone else to catch up with.$13#$b#%Gudrun is ignoring you now.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentC1: %Gudrun looks a little worried but doesn't seem like she's too keen on talking.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentC2: %Gudrun looks tired but shakes her head and keeps focusing on her homework.
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentD1: Don't you have farm work to monitor, @?$13
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentD2: Shouldn't you be exploring the mine or something, @?$13
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentD3: I'm sure there's some menial task for someone else you could be doing right now, @.$13
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentE1: It's pretty late to be bugging Haley and Emily, don't you think, @?$13
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentE2: Did you need something? You should probably consider turning in soon, you know.$13
StringsGudrunRunawayCommentE3: Um, if you need Emily, you're talking to the wrong person.$13
StringsGudrunDesertFestival1: Hmm... the sweet bean cake was pretty good, but I wonder if I can get a pizza next time?
StringsGudrunDesertFestival2: Oh yeah, I wanted to go hang out with Jas and Vincent for a little bit. I should probably go find 'em.
StringsGudrunDesertFestival3: Of COURSE I bet on Escar-go! The obvious choice!$6
StringsGudrunDesertFestival4: Aw... I should've made Gun come with so he could carry around my cactus. *I'm* clearly too busy to cart it around everywhere.$6
StringsGudrunDesertFestival5: 'Skull Cavern'? What's next, 'Doom and Despair Cave'? 'You Will Totally Die Here Grotto'? Where's Sandy, I need to find out who does the marketing around here.$6
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnA1: I've knocked over SO MANY things with these wings. Totally worth it though.$1
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnA2: I hope Yoba doesn't smite me for this getup. I don't exactly talk to the being, but this is all in good fun, I swear.$1
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnA3: I was super tempted to try and talk Big Bear into being a devil or something creepy to contrast with me, but I figured wearing a robe in solidarity with his dress was just as a good.$3
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnB1: Auntie suggested we go as the Gangreen Gang next year - I'm so delighted Auntie wants to include me, I could hardly turn down the suggestion.$1
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnB2: %Teren's halos are crooked. Is this an omen?#$b#My headpiece slipped and now, despite my myriad of eyes, I can't see!
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnB3: I almost fell earlier and I think I would've been heartbroken if I broke my plastic wings.#$b#Big Bear could probably fix 'em, he's dead handy at arts and crafts.
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnAy21: You can pull a rabbit out of a hat but you can't pull a hat off a rabbit.$1#$b#But you can probably grab one from one of the Bears.
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnAy22: So Bonnie played bass guitar... do you think *I* should learn bass guitar? I'd make a cute bassist.$1
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnAy23: Don't tell me ANY spoilers about the Security Break game, I haven't seen a single promotional image of Bonnie from it so far.$3
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnBy21: I saw a fascinating video essay on this series a few weeks ago, it's amazing what one silly horror game can spin into, isn't it?
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnBy22: I should make Sig play through the series. He'd probably be great at it, the big jerk.
StringsTerenSpiritsEveInnBy23: I think this franchise is probably the least frightening for me despite all the jumpscares.#$b#I'd much rather play with someone just y'know... for safety. And stuff.$4
StringsTerenHospital1: Good morning @. Just filing paperwork; Dr. Harvey's kind enough to let me fax from his office.
StringsTerenHospital2: %Teren yawns and looks embarrassed when he spots you.#$b#Ah, sorry about that, @. Long night last night, but work never waits, does it?$16
StringsTerenHospital3: Oh, oops, hey @! I didn't even hear you come in. Maybe I need to ask Dr. Harvey to check *my* hearing, huh?
StringsTerenEastScarpInn1: I probably should've stayed home but I can't resist the allure of coffee that someone else made on a dreary day like this.$1
StringsTerenEastScarpInn2: Ah, I thought I wiped my shoes decently enough but I still slipped on the hardwood floor.$7#$b#Luckily only Rosa saw me, and she helped me up in a jiffy.
StringsTerenEastScarpInn3: Mmm, rainy days make me want to sleep in, honestly... Curse adulthood and it's myriad responsibilities.
StringsTerenPondPonder1: Hmmm? Oh, hello @. Yeah, I know I'm being rained on, I just wanted to sit for a bit. I'm okay, I promise.
StringsTerenPondPonder2: %Teren is humming something, probably another emo or indie song from decades ago.#$b#That rain's just a little brisk, isn't it? I'll probably head home soon.
StringsTerenPondPonder3: There's something really peaceful watching the raindrops hit the surface of the water. Washes away all the stress and fear a guy can hold, y'know?
StringsTerenSaloonChef1: Gus says the best way to learn his recipes is through watching and practicing what I see...#$b#I feel like he definitely just tells Aunt Sondra outright though.$1
StringsTerenSaloonChef2: Hey @! Gus is letting me practice in his kitchen by helping prep for the Friday crowd! I should get a little hat.#$b#No, I said 'hat', not 'rat'.
StringsTerenSaloonChef3: I think if I ever wanted to quit my real job, I'd totally come work here full-time. I'm having a blast!$1
StringsTerenOutdoorExercise1: Good morning @! Just trying to get some exercise while the weather's nice!
StringsTerenOutdoorExercise2: %Teren grins at you but almost loses his balance while stretching. Maybe you can stop by later when he's safely distractible.
StringsTerenOutdoorExercise3: Y'know, I thought about sparring with Big Bear or Gun instead, but I'm not that keen on losing.#$b#They'd bruise a lot more than my ego.$16
StringsTerenDockWatching1: Hey, @. I'm just sitting out for a bit, contemplating life.#$b#It's just the usual 'growing older' woes, nothing tragic, I promise.$1
StringsTerenDockWatching2: I like when I can just hear the ocean underneath the music in my headphones... the ambiance makes me feel nostalgic for some reason...$17
StringsTerenDockWatching3: %Teren's music is just faintly loud enough for you to hear although you can't quite make out the lyrics.
StringsTerenSigurdA1: I wonder where Gus gets some of his imported stuff from because I have *never* heard of some of it and it is kind of terrible. Ah, at least Big Bear's buying.
StringsTerenSigurdA2: Big Bear's such a coward. Sure, we'll both viciously regret the hangovers in the morning, but what's a few shots of whiskey between old friends?$3
StringsTerenSigurdA3: Well, he put up an argument like always, but in the end I was able to drag Big Bear out into the public eye.#$b#Don't go scaring him off after all my hard work, @.$3
Strings.TerenCaritasLunch.1: Eek, I already need to clean out the fridge... Man, I gotta be more responsible with this whole 'not eating all my own baking' lunch or else Harvey's really going to get on my case.
Strings.TerenCaritasLunch.2: Aw, Auntie dropped a lunch off when she came by earlier... I'm so lucky! Hehe.$1
Strings.TerenCaritasLunch.3: Hey! You stopping by for lunch? You can dine in or take it with you, either way it'll be hot to go.$3
Strings.TerenCaritasCharity.1: The donations are really flowing steadily... we've helped the community a lot like this!$1
Strings.TerenCaritasCharity.2: Been getting a lot of thank you calls from folks recently. I almost missed a work meeting because I was chatting away, oops.
Strings.TerenCaritasCharity.3: This has been a great week! We've really made an impact with the charity donations.$1
StringsTerenSigurdB1: Any day now Sig will threaten - ahem, I mean *offer* Gus a boatload of funding to remodel the Saloon and get windows.#$b#I am not entirely opposed to that though.
StringsTerenSigurdB2: One of these days I'll get Sig to dance with me.$16#$b#Hm? Oh, he's a GREAT dancer, one of my best partners back in Gotoro.$4#$b#Besides Cavendish, of course. She knew every dance imaginable.
StringsTerenSigurdB3: %Teren is watching Sig with a fond smile as he retells some mysterious encounter they'd had back in Gotoro.#$b#Y'know, for a guy who doesn't believe in magic or Big Foot, Sig sure remembers that cryptid in vivid detail.$1
StringsTerenSigurdStoryA1: Meri still sends me care packages, of course I get mail from them - #$b#What? *Our* club? That little canvas and plywood abomination?#$b#You know what, they deserve every last coin they make off any of us.
StringsTerenSigurdStoryB1: Remember when she beat you in arm wrestling? You were pretty drunk but {{BearFamProfanityD}} if she didn't plant you immediately.$3#$b#Can't believe she charged us for the honor of 'winning a match against the woman who beat Sergeant Bear'.$6#$b#Her business sense is out of this world.
StringsTerenSigurdStoryC1: {{BearFamProfanityE}}, you're just saying that to save your ego now!$3#$b#You absolutely lost on accident, I can *still* picture your shocked face.$6#$b#You looked like a fish plucked fresh from the sea, you were so stunned.$3
StringsTerenSigurdStoryD1: No wait, for real though! I gave my *mom* that recipe and she just shook her head.#$b#Wouldn't even try - told me it wouldn't live up to my memories because she'd never ceviche'd a thing in her life.$6#$b#Ol' Kaspar knew we'd be craving it after going home, that trickster.$1
StringsTerenSigurdStoryA2: I can't believe Wormy's gone as far as he has all because of us!$3#$b#I think I still owe you twenty bucks because I thought the MPs would've tracked him down long before he hit the Playwrights' District.$6#$b#And now he's one of the most popular shows there and no one calls him Wormy anymore.
StringsTerenSigurdStoryB2: Wormy swore he'd be on the first ship out of Gotoro if we helped him!$6#b#I remember him talking about a guy he was sweet on his hometown, how he'd go up to him and tell him how he felt -$4#$b#And now he's on the gossip pages with a new beau every other month. Always the ones you don't expect it from!$1
StringsTerenSigurdStoryC2: Every*one* loves a funny guy though, for sure.$4#$b#But I really appreciate a comedian who's a realist. Cliche jokes about politics and hot button topics can be super grating.$17#$b#Although I guess hating that kind of topic humor makes me a cynic too, huh? Oops.#$b#Ah, well, I've always been a sucker for a good joke though.$1
StringsTerenSigurdStoryD2: I distinctly said a *good* joke, Sig!$3#$b#%Teren is cackling too hard to keep berating Sig for his terrible pun.
StringsTerenSigurdStoryA3: Do you uh...#$b#%Teren looks slightly nervous to be asking this particular question of Sig.#$b#Do you still talk to Wendell, ever?$2
StringsTerenSigurdStoryB3: It's a touchy subject! You were so heartbroken when he broke up with you in that letter.$17#$b#I really worried about you back then!$2
StringsTerenSigurdStoryC3: Well sure, you were a grade-A dick for a guy fresh outta basic, but *I* wanted to get to know you despite that.$2#$b#And it worked out, we're friends now! AND I helped you get over Wendell.$3
StringsTerenSigurdStoryD3: Oh, believe me, I *paid* for it. All I remember is having to hike with a full kit after the third rager.$10#$b#I super thought I was going to die right after we became besties.$6#$b#Teren beams at Sig with the brightest of smiles.
StringsTerenSigurdStoryA4: Suppose we were to go back to Gotoro.#$b#%Teren laughs when Sig scowls.#$b#No, c'mon, spoilsport - not through re-enlistment, but just, like go back. A boys' trip, you and me.$3
StringsTerenSigurdStoryB4: The first thing I'd do is go see Marta and her wife. Jess always used to threaten to put us to work, right? For all the trouble we soldiers caused her.#$b#'Tromping through my town, getting lost all the time and needing directions back to your camp!'$1
StringsTerenSigurdStoryC4: I tried not to get lost, y'know! I did my best! Any*way*, I'd go see Marta to find Jess, and she'd *always* have the most divine cheesecake fresh and ready EVERY time.#$b#I think she was a witch, honestly.
