event-MadDog.BearFam.16192002Bonus.Georg: Which is exactly why *we* should pay this time.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192002Bonus.MadDo: Oh, but I insist, I've got this.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192002Bonus.Quick: You know what, you guys relax, I've got this.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192002Bonus.Gus.2: That's fine by me, the tab's only thirty after all!$1
Ah, perfectly, that'll be thirty gold!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192002Bonus.MadDo: You can't put a price on friendship, after all!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192002Bonus.Evely: Why, back in our day thirty gold would buy three people lunch for a whole week!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192002Bonus.Misse: It's the PRINCIPLE of the matter!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192003.MadDog.Has: Oh drat! That's not quite how it's meant to start, now is it?$5
Oh, darn it all! That's not right, either!$5
Why am I even bothering? It will never sound right.$2
Hello, my dear friend @! Let me just turn this thing off; no need to hear anymore of that cacophony.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192003.QuickQuest: I didn't know you played music yourself.
Good thing you're an accountant and not a musician.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192003.MadDog.Has: Oh, my husband Wulf was the musician!$4#$b#I... tried to learn but it's simply not something that comes naturally to me.$2
Oh, my husband Wulf was the musician!$4#$b#I... tried to learn but it's simply not something that comes naturally to me.$2
That was one of his songs, actually... the last song he ever wrote for me.$2
I don't mind talking about him.
Oh I've never heard it - he wouldn't let anyone listen while he was writing new songs, and after he passed, I could hardly go around asking people to play it.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192003.QuickQuest: Why not? I'm sure others would like to hear it.
I'd help but I can't carry a tune even in a bucket.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192003.MadDog.Has: But other musicians have their own music, I'm sure. I could never impose.$8
We're two peas in a pod, dear @! As you can tell, neither can I.$10
But, enough of that. Would you care for some tea?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192003.Message.17: Despite her grief, Sondra still loves music. You hope she'll be able to hear Wulf's song someday...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192004.Harvey.15: Well, Mrs. Sondra, I think you'll need to take it easy for a long while.$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192004.Harvey.16: Shall I call someone to bring you home?$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192004.Emily.17: I can walk you home, Sondra!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192004.MadDog.Has: Thank you, Emily dear, but I'm sure you've got your shift coming up.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192004.Harvey.19: Well, I'll sit with you until then.$3#$b#I know you can be a bit prideful, Mrs. Sondra, but I can't have you trying to walk home alone in your poor state of health.$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192004.Message.21: Sondra seemed very sad about her condition. Maybe you can try visiting her later to cheer her up?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.01: I'm really glad you're on the mend, Mrs. Sondra.$3
Mom really had me worried when she came home frantic after you collapsed.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.MadDog.Has: I do appreciate you two taking the time to visit. I apologize for not being a very good hostess.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.06: We came to visit you, not be hosted, it's okay!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.MadDog.Has: Good to see you again, dear.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.09: Well, I'd normally save something like this for when you're feeling better...
Spit it out already, Sam.#$b#We still had a jam session even though you weren't able to come by.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.MadDog.Has: Oh, by all means! I'd hate to stifle your creative efforts just because of my old age -$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.14: Practice is going better than ever thanks your support, you know.#$b#But we came up with a GREAT song. Like, I kind of can't believe we wrote it.$8
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.MadDog.Has: That's so wonderful!$1#$b#I'm very proud of you, making such progress with your band.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.17: Well, I brought my guitar... So I'll play it for you and you can tell us what you think!$1#$b#Hey, @, you'll listen too, right?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.QuickQuest: Sure, I've got nothing better to do with my time.
You bet! Rock our socks off.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.20: That's not a no at least.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.23: Didn't bring my amp but I'll try.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.MadDog.Has: Oh that practice is paying off quite a bit! Wonderful work!$3
And to think you were so shy before when you had this talent within you this entire time!$3
Astounding work! You're only going up from here!$3
I loved it! You know what this means, don't you?
You can record a demo album!$1#$b#With this and the other songs you've been working on, I think the band has a great selection to entice listeners!$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Sam.34: I don't know if we ARE ready...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.MadDog.Has: Well, with all this rest time on my hands, I can brainstorm a solution. Leave it to me!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192005.Message.37: It looks like Sam and Sebastian were able to cheer up Sondra after her health scare. You can't wait to see what she comes up with for the band!
Like taking candy from a baby.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192006.Sam.03: I think the poolsticks here are weighted different.$5
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192006.MadDog.Has: Rosa keeps the Inn in lovely shape, Sam, but you're welcome to suggest otherwise to her.$10
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192006.Sam.07: Oh no no no, maybe Welwick read my fortune wrong this morning.$8
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192006.Sam.09: *ANY*way... Mrs. Sondra, you mentioned you had an idea for us to raise funds?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192006.MadDog.Has: Ah, straight to business!$10#$b#Well, the other day as we were checking festival budgets, {{LewisOrLouise}} brought up how much {{LewisOrLouisePronoun11}} love it if we had a touch more tourism. Bring in a bit more funding, you see.
And that made me think of the last music festival I attended back in Zuzu with Wulf.

It was a battle of the bands!$1#$b#People paid for a ticket, businesses sponsored food, and bands battled for a prize.#$b#The funds were split between benefiting the neighborhood and rewarding the champion band!$3
Oh wonderful, I'll put up a special order
Oh wonderful, I'll put up a special order!
No time to be afraid now, you're the face of the band.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192006.Message.26: This idea has a lot of promise! But what if the other bands somehow beat out Sam and the gang?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Lewis.01: What a turnout... I didn't think this would be so lively! Maybe we'll make it an annual affair!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.MadDog.Has: Hello Pelican Town~ Lovely to see everyone today!$3#$b#I think speeches are boring, so let's get this party started~$3
First up from Grampleton, The Blanks!
So very lively~ Thank you, The Blanks!$3#$b#Next up, not to be outdone, we have The Sunshine Valley Band from 'Parts Unknown'!$3
Thank you for that rousing tune, The Sunshine Valley Band!$3#$b#Last but not least we have Pelican Town's very own %band!$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Message.06: Hmm... That song sounded really special.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Lewis.07: Alright, everyone, I hope you picked your favorite because it's time to vote!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Elliott.13: I found the Blanks rather inventive, myself$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Jacob.15: Giving it to our hometown locals, %band.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Maru.16: Give it to %band! They've been practicing *so much* for this!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.QuickQuest: Definitely the first band, The Blanks! Such a cool song!
The Sunshine Valley Band rocked, literally!
Gotta give it to Sam and the gang.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Lewis.20: All three competitors were quite popular with you folks, but our first ever winners are %band!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Lewis.21: It looks like it was a close tie, but %band won this contest!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Lewis.22: And by a landslide, Pelican Town's very own %band!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192007.Message.23: Well, time to get Sam, Abigail, and Sebastian to sign your watering can before they get mega-super-famous.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Abigail.01: Yikes, that was a bad shot.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Abigail.06: It was super nice of {{LewisOrLouise}} to loan us the truck to get to Zuzu City.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Sam.07: I mean, {{LewisOrLouisePronoun1}} didn't let *us* borrow the truck...$2
Well, Pam *mostly* knew what she was doing.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.QuickQuest: Wait, you guys had Pam drive you?
Wait, what did you go to Zuzu for again?
I could have driven us but {{LewisOrLouise}} wanted a trusted adult with us.$5
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Abigail.13: Uhh, recording our demo CD, duh? C'mon @, the contest wasn't that long ago!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.MadDog.Has: So, how have the recording sessions been? Pam's taken you to quite a few sessions now, right?$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Sam.15: Well, it's coming along. It was kind of... daunting, I guess is the best word, to be in a real professional studio with a real producer, though...$8
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Abigail.17: The producer was super cool! She was like, a real rockstar, made records with all the greats!$1
And she had a lot of advice that I'd never heard before. The stuff that's probably industry secrets.$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Sam.19: Yeah and I really think we -
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Gus.20: Oh, sorry there, Willy. Sam's actually got the next play on the jukebox tonight.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.QuickQuest: Huh? This is new on the jukebox!
Wait, isn't this the song from the Battle of the Bands?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Sam.24: Ahh, well... we've been kind of fibbing...
Gus got the fifth copy - the first three went to our parents...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Sam.27: You mean the song that WON Battle of the Bands!$1
It's the first track on the demo... Which we completed actually, heh.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Abigail.29: And we gave Gus the fifth copy after we handed out the copies to our folks!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.MadDog.Has: Oh my goodness! ...But surely you mean the fourth copy?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Sam.33: That fourth copy is yours, Mrs. Sondra. We'd never have gotten this far without your encouragement... You're kind of like... an honorary member of the band.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.MadDog.Has: Oh my goodness, you three! I will treasure this record for the rest of my life.$4#$b#And thank you, for listening to a little old lady talk to you about music.$10
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Sam.35: You're our favorite little old lady!
What else could we do? Run off with your groceries?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16192008.Message.38: Sam, Sebastian, and Abigail made a great demo and now you can hear it on the jukebox whenever you want!
MadDogBearFam.16193000.Gunnar.02: That shouldn't fall down unless I run into it, now.
MadDogBearFam.16193000.Gunnar.03: And a selfie to send back home...
MadDogBearFam.16193000.Gunnar.05: It's a shop! ...Well, it's not *much* of one, but it's here.$6
MadDogBearFam.16193000.Gunnar.06: Ahh, what am I selling? I don't know yet, honestly.$6#$b#I'm going down into the mines to see what I find, and I guess I'll sell whatever I dig up.
MadDogBearFam.16193000.Gunnar.07: But - but don't worry! I'm not going to charge you an arm and a leg.#$b#I took a look at the economic level around the Valley, I made sure to take it into account.#$b#Auntie might be the best math person in the family, but she's not the only one!$1
MadDogBearFam.16193000.Gunnar.08: Oh! Buy things? Yeah, I guess I should, huh? Yeah, I'll buy things from you and other folks, too.$6#$b#And again, yes, I'll make sure it's a fair price, haha.$1
MadDogBearFam.16193000.Gunnar.10: The Bear Necessities, open for business! You can be my first customer, even, if you want!$1
MadDogBearFam.16193000.message.11: A shop? That could be really helpful! Maybe you'll have to do a little shopping, especially if you're mine-bound.
16193001.Warning: Warning: This event contains a bright flash right at the beginning. Please hit skip now if this would disturb you.
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Emily.02: Not only could *you* have gotten hurt, but you could've hurt any number of wildlife.$2
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Gunnar.03: It was an accident. I'm sorry, folks.$6
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Demetrius.04: You're setting off bombs on accident? I heard it all the way from my house!$5
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Gunnar.06: Ah, it's just that... it wasn't even a bomb.$6
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Emily.07: Gunnar, you don't have to lie. We're not mad that you set off a bomb.$3#$b#Just a bit concerned you set it off above ground, where anyone could get caught up in it.$2#$b#What if Linus had been foraging nearby?$6
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Gunnar.08: He'd be smart enough to get of the way, I assume.
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Gunnar.09: Like I said, it wasn't a bomb. It wasn't supposed to explode at all!$7
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Gunnar.11: Oh, boy. So I found an old book in the library, and Mr. Gunther said I could borrow it.$6#$b#It was a recipe book, and maybe I misread it - although honestly, I feel like a lot of things look like coal -$12
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Demetrius.12: ...Coal doesn't look like anything that should go into a food recipe. You made a bomb.$4
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Gunnar.13: You're absolutely correct, Demetrius. I did *technically* make a bomb.$16#$b#But! I learned a lesson! I know where I went wrong and I won't do it again -
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Demetrius.14: Darn right you won't! You take yourself over to the Adventurer's Guild and explain yourself to Marlon and Gil.$4#$b#They'll get you straightened out before you cave in the whole mountain!$4
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Emily.15: I could introduce you, if you'd like? Marlon and Gil are very good at their jobs, I promise they don't bite.#$b#But even if they did, that would be better than you blowing yourself up, right?$1
MadDogBearFam.16193001.Gunnar.16: They already know about the potion...
MadDogBearFam.16193001.message.17: Well, maybe Gunnar just needs to spend some extra time with Marlon and that'll get things back on track.
MadDogBearFam.16193001.message.18: Good news! Gunnar now sells bombs at the Bear Necessities.
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Gunnar.02: It's fire, what do you mean it's too hot?#$b#Fire is hot. That's what it is.
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Clint.03: Your metal will get too brittle and -
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Clint.04: ...And break. It will get too brittle and break.$3
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Gunnar.05: At least you're making money off me, Clint.$12
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Clint.06: I'm not charging enough for the extra level of stress, Gun.$3
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Gunnar.07: I'll... go dig up more ore and stuff. Same time tomorrow?
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Gunnar.09: Oh, hey @! Careful, I kind of... sent molten iron flying everywhere just now.$6
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Gunnar.10: Oh, yeah, we're fine. Wasting resources, but no one's gotten hurt!
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Gunnar.11: Gotta break a few eggs to forge a sword, right Clint?$1
MadDogBearFam.16193002.Clint.13: I don't have the heart to tell the kid that Gil and Marlon gave him those tasks to keep him occupied.$2#$b#He'll never make it into the Guild at this rate.
MadDogBearFam.16193002.message.14: At least Gunnar pays well, even if he does end up leaving Clint's forge a little messier.
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.02: Well, it's part of the monster eradication goals, Em. Keeps the valley safe.$16
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Emily.03: You're a hunter... living in a hunting lodge... and now you're hunting monsters.$5
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.04: I mean, my first priority is the shop, you know that.$12
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.05: Hey, @. I got my first real Guild mission finally. Slaying cave flies and bats.
MadDogBearFam.16193003.quickQuestionFarm: I've seen the eradication list. It's a tall order for a Guild of that size.
Did they rope you into that task, too? I wonder if there's even that many monsters down there?
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.08: And see, I'm not the only one who gets to do the hunting! It's a Guild thing, not a me thing!
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.09: Oh, is that on your to-do list too? I don't think I'll even make it to the bottom of the mine, at this rate.
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Emily.10: Why do you have to hunt everything into extinction in the first place?$2
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.11: It's not like I'm excited about it!$7#$b#I didn't think I'd have a hundred hoops to jump through just to join the Guild.
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.13: I mean, you're probably a better fighter than me, so that makes sense.$6#$b#Oh, you should take on Sig sometime, he's as mean as he looks.$13
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Emily.15: He's your brother! That's not nice.$5
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.17: Sorry, Emily. I'll be *nice*.$1#$b#But - back on topic - we're managing the monster population, not eliminating it. Just enough to keep them from pouring out of the mines.$12
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.18: Besides, could you imagine if Sebastian got caught unaware by a slime?#$b#He'd probably leap into the lake.$1
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Emily.19: Well, I suppose you're right about that.#$b#I just wish there was a better way.$2
MadDogBearFam.16193003.Gunnar.20: ...Maybe once I get officially inducted into the Guild I can find a better way.$12#$b#I still have my University badge, I could see if anyone's researched deeper at Zuzu CU next time I visit.
MadDogBearFam.16193003.message.23: Gunnar has a lot of big plans and ideas. It would be nice to see them become reality, if he keeps working hard.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Clint.03: I think it's just right, actually!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Demetrius: Let's see... You used mango juice in this one, right?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Emily.11: We're doing a taste-and-talk. You should join us!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Demetrius: Are we really going to call it that? I still think 'sip for science' is better.$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Emily.13: We're doing a taste-and-talk. You should join us!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Demetrius: Are we really going to call it that? I still think 'sip for science' is better.$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.MadDog.Ha: Don't worry, everything Emily mixes is non-alcoholic. Too early in the day, right?$1#$b#...Unless you ask for a splash of something extra, of course.$13
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Clint.16: But don't go troubling Emily asking for 'extras'!$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Emily.17: Oh, it's *fine*! I like making drinks!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Emily.18: So, what will it be? I'm not going to tell you the ingredients, but choose from red, neon, or blue.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Message.2: Emily mixes up a round of mysterious red liquid and pours a measure out for all four of you.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.MadDog.Ha: Why's it taste like mint when it's RED, Emily?$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Message.2: Emily mixes up a round of aromatic neon pink liquid and pours a measure out for all four of you.
Emily mixes up a round of sweet smelling blue liquid and pours a measure out for all four of you.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Demetrius: Ah, disguising the heat of capsaicin within a blue liquid - you tried to pull a fast one on us, Emily!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Emily.30: Yay! Then you should stay around and enjoy some more with us!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Emily.31: Oops! I'm sorry, @. You're welcome to stick around though, water's always on tap!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.MadDog.Ha: You're welcome to join us anytime, @.$1#$b#These are our little breaks between work where we relax - well, I guess Emily works through them...$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193003A.Emily.33: This is one of my favorite parts of the job.#$b#And Gun's right, you should definitely join us when you need a break from %farm!$1
MadDogBearFam.16193007.message.01: In the middle of the night, you hear a large explosion echoing from East Scarp.#You have a sinking feeling it was Gunnar's doing.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.MadDog.Ha: O-oh, hey! Er, Mateo? From the beach?$12#$b#Sorry, I was just looking for some ore and got ambushed!$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.03: By what? A skeleton? A golem?$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.MadDog.Ha: By the biggest, slimiest slime I've EVER seen! It was terrifying!$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.05: Well, that's no good! Let's go take a look and see what we're up against, hm?$14
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.06: ...Is that the slime that nearly took your life?$34
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.08: I'm surprised all these loose rocks didn't get you - or the slime - first.$23#$b#Well, let's talk tactics real quick - who knows how big the next one will be, after all.$24
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.10: No can do! Come on, Gunnar, let's flank it!$15
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.MadDog.Ha: You mean *you* got it, Mateo.$6#$b#You do that kind of thing often?$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.13: Rest assured, slimes can catch anyone off-guard, you're not alone in that regard...$12#$b#...But you don't necessarily seem like a swordsman to me.$13
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.MadDog.Ha: Oh, I am *not*... Not really. I mean, my brother taught me what he could but none of it really sticks when I'm in the fray...$16#$b#And while I might be able to whip up some kind of weird potion to get me out of scrapes...$7#$b#Marlon kind of expects his apprentices to be weapons-smart, instead so... Here I am.$12
Anyway... thanks for clearing that thing out!$6#$b#I know it probably wasn't a big deal to someone like you but I unfortunately am like me.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.16: Hey, now. No reason to dunk on yourself. Alchemy is a niche skill - I know I can't make potions.$32#$b#Seems a bit shortsighted of Marlon to focus on swordplay when you've got a different, just-as-valuable skillset.$36#$b#Why don't you tell me more about your potions over drinks? I'm buyin'.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.MadDog.Ha: Really?$6#$b#I mean, sure thing, if you're not busy? And maybe you could tell me how you learned to do that feint with your sword? That was really cool!$18
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.18: I'd love to! You know, I can show you that and other defensive maneuvers if that's more your speed. $36#$b#Honestly, I think what you do is very cool; do you tinker with gunpowder at all-?$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193001A.Mateo.20: You can make a bomb out of what?$20
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.01: Do you realize how many complaints I've received since you moved to town?$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.MadDog.Has: A lot, I guess, otherwise you wouldn't be chasing me down in the middle of the day to yell at me.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.03: I know you lived in Zuzu City for quite a while, but I can't believe you'd get away with these kinds of things there!$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.04: You're setting off bombs outside the mine!$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.MadDog.Has: I keep telling people, it wasn't supposed to be a bomb!$12
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.06: You've practically shattered Clint's nerves with your reckless approach to smithing!$4
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.MadDog.Has: I pay the bill in full each time, plus extra compensation for the trouble.$16#$b#Honestly, I think I'm technically one of Clint's best customers now.$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.08: And the citizens are worried you might be a bad influence with how you brag about hunting down monsters!$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.MadDog.Has: It wasn't even my idea to hunt monsters in the first place!$5#$b#Y'know Marlon and Gil are the ones in charge of the Guild, right? Monster slayers themselves? Adventurers, one might say.$12
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.11: This might be... hard to hear. But not everyone is suited for heroics and adventure. You'll notice your Aunt and your brother have settled into Pelican Town with minimal fuss and drama. You however...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.MadDog.Has: Sig the hero, Gun the spare, huh...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.13: You, rather, *some* people however, are intended for less... glamorous lives.$2#$b#Running a shop is a fine profession.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.15: Maybe change your line up, sell the sort of goods Dr. Harvey imports in, see if Marlon will let you offer his equipment stock -#$b#There's no reason to reinvent the wheel, is what I'm getting at.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Lewis.17: Just, think about what I'm saying. Really take it to heart.#$b#And if that's not something you can find compromise on, maybe... maybe you're better suited for a Zuzu City lifestyle, instead.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.MadDog.Has: Oh, shoot, hey @! I guess you heard all that, huh?
Oh, it's fine. {{LewisOrLouisePronoun12}} right in that I'm a public menace; I can't blame people for losing their patience with me.$6
Oh no, @. Don't tell me you complained about me, too!$12
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.QuickQuest: Of course I didn't complain. I don't think you're *that* bad.
Some of those potions you sold me were pretty sketchy...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.MadDog.Has: Even though I almost poisoned you?$6
Yeah, they sure were, huh? That's my bad, @.$6
Well, I'm still going to try my best on this next step to Guild membership. They wouldn't have assigned it to me if it was impossible, right?$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193004.Message.26: It sounds like Gunnar's getting himself a reputation in town. Hopefully people don't count him out before he can prove himself.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193005.MadDog.Has: Gun! Gunnar!
Any sign of him? How much deeper could he have gotten?$2
I'm not giving up on him yet.$5
Gun's bag!
Gunnar! Gun, can you hear us?$8
...Let's keep looking.
Gun!
...Oh... hey Sig and company... any chance you... brought a snack?$9
Are you hurt? Can you stand?$8
Banged my head when I fell through the floor. Really rang my own bell. Give me a moment...$9
I might need some help...
Well, scaring another ten years off my lifespan is big. You did succeed in that.$11
...You hate caves but you still came after me... I'm really sorry, Sig.$11
I'm not. You're my kid brother. I'd rather suck it up and rescue you over the alternative.#$b#Besides, think about all the cool stories you'll have to tell now.$11
Special occasions only?
The little brother rescue protocol, if you will.$18
How... how many days have I been down here?$9
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193005.QuickQuest: At least seven. That's probably why you're hungry.
Over seven days, Gun. Glad we found you starving instead of anything worse.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193005.MadDog.Has: Bug steak with a side of concussion just isn't the same.$9
Bug steak with a side of concussion just isn't the same. Glad you guys found me too.$9
Yeah, let's get him out of here. This guy's got himself a one way ticket to Doc Harvey.$2
Dr. Harvey charges what? @, say you're joking. That's wild. I can't believe I have to business expense this...$9
Aw, no! My shop!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.MadDog.Has: What are you doing here?$2#$b#And hello, @.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Emily.03: Welcome to Bear Necessities! What can I get for you?$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.MadDog.Has: Pfft. Well, when *someone else* says it, it sounds dumb.$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Emily.05: I think it's cute! Anyway, I'm covering Clint's shift today.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Emily.07: Mmhm! Gil told us you'd be on home rest, recovering.$3#$b#Gudrun helps, too, but it's pretty much been me and Clint.#$b#Oh! Demetrius stopped by a few times to re-stock your potions, too.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Emily.08: Speaking of, I hope you don't mind, but I remade your potion labels. Your handwriting's pretty bad...$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.MadDog.Has: What - but you don't like me being a hunter. And Clint hates the mess I make at the shop. And I - I make too much noise -$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Emily.10: I think you're a little eager with your sword, but I do know there's dangers in the Valley that the Guild protects against.$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Clint.11: And while I might be tired of cleaning up hunks of iron off every surface, I don't hate you.$2#$b#Or the money you pay me. And your last sword wasn't *that* bad, either.$1
Oh, Gunnar? Good to see you up and around again!$1#$b#I'm sure you won't mind terribly, but I copied some of your potions down for my own experiments.#$b#I'm really curious about your nine herbs charm, I couldn't resist.$1#$b#I don't usually dabble in folklore, but I appreciate the research you already put behind it.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.MadDog.Has: I thought... you guys didn't like me! And that Gil and Marlon... were just trying to keep me busy so I didn't waste their time...$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.QuickQuest: I'll help out where I can with the mines and monsters, but I have my farm to manage, too!
It's not that we don't like *you*, just your explosions. I can hear them at the farm, you know.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Emily.22: Gun, @ is right. They have a whole farm to run, and Marlon and Gil are getting up there in age. But you've got free time and you're juggling learning multiple new skills.$1
Exactly! Do you think I hit the ground running when I first started studying the local ecology?#$b#Of course not! I had quite a few screw-ups of my own, you can ask Robin anytime.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Clint.24: It's better to be a jack of many trades than a master of one.#$b#As long as you don't actually bring the mountain down around your ears - or ours - we're going to stand by you until you become a full-time Guildmember.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Clint.29: Maybe you could ask your Aunt Sondra to make us more snacks?$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.MadDog.Has: ...I can do that, absolutely. Thank you guys! For managing things while I was gone... I don't know how to repay you all.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193006.Message.35: It looks like Gunnar's back on his path to joining the Guild! It's nice to know everyone is rooting for him to succeed.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.MadDog.Has: Hello @! Glad you could make it! I know there's probably nothing down here.#$b#But I'm glad to have the back up juuuust in case.$17
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.QuickQuest: Did you know there was a cave under your basement?
I know we said 'no more explosions' but I wonder what else you could blow up and discover.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.MadDog.Has: I forgot the cellar was here until I was told to start brewing potions down here.$6
Look, the explosions aren't intentional. That was SUPPOSED to be drinkable.$12
I test them on me! I'd never give you or anyone else a potion that explodes...$7
Well, are you ready to go?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.QuickQuest: Sure I love mystery caves, let's get going already!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.MadDog.Has: Right, right, it's a little nervewracking, huh? Welp, let's go.$6
That's the spirit! This will be a fun little trip underground!$1
This is fine... probably.
No, no, the tentacles *are* weird. You're right, that's super weird actually.$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.QuickQuest: There's nothing fine about this, Gun.
You have a TENTACLE MONSTER in your basement!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.MadDog.Has: I mean, the cave seems structurally sound?$6
If there is, I didn't put it here!$5
Well... that's a lot of tentacles.
...We should probably leave.$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.QuickQuest: What was that NOISE? Yes, we should leave!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.MadDog.Has: Okay, okay, let's get out of here!$6
Hey, don't leave me behind!$5
Whew!
Nothing's chasing us.
My family's going to *LOVE* this...$6
Oh, I'm *SURE* {{LewisOrLouise}} will let this slide. I'm beside myself with eagerness to tell {{LewisOrLouisePronoun2}}.$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.QuickQuest: Sarcasm doesn't suit you, you know.
This isn't something you should keep secret!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.MadDog.Has: You're right, I'm sorry. Just a little... flustered! About the tentacle monster in my cellar.$7
I wouldn't keep it secret forever! Just... until I stopped panicking about the tentacle monster in the cellar.$12
...Alright, I'll go tell {{LewisOrLouise}}.$6#$b#Uh, @? Thanks for being my back up.$1
See ya around!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193008.Message.34: There's something scary down there! Hopefully the Bears figure out what's going on, because you sure don't want to be involved.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009.TempMadDog: Ya grew on us kid; we don't want you to die.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009.QuickQuest: But wait, can't Gun try again? It can't be just one and done!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009.MadDog.Has: Thanks @, but Marlon and Gil make valid points.$16#$b#It hurts to admit it, but I've failed.$2
The toughest luck, huh? This really... hurts.$2
So that will always hang over me, huh... Fair enough.$16
I've. Uh, got some errands to run for Clint still, so I'm going take off for now.$16#$b#Thanks for your time, Marlon, Gil.$16
Thank you for coming, @. I appreciate the support.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009.Message.12: That didn't go as well as Gunnar, or you, wanted. Hopefully Gunnar will keep trying.
Gunnar.MarlonAssessmentFail.Missed.1: ...And so at this time, as the Guildmaster of Pelican Town's Adventurer's Guild, I cannot induct you as a full member.
Gunnar.MarlonAssessmentFail.Missed.2: You're a talented mind, Gunnar, but the facts are plain. We don't have the resources to rescue you if you're in danger again.
Gunnar.MarlonAssessmentFail.Missed.3: Of course you can attempt another trial in the future. But... I can't just pretend you *didn't* go missing for so long, Gunnar.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009A.Mateo.02: Gunnar! Sorry I'm late, I wanted to be present for that discussion.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009A.MadDog.Ha: Ah, you didn't miss anything... I failed. Not Guild material, officially.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009A.Mateo.04: I knew that would be Marlon's decision... But I wanted to be there at least as moral support, even if Marlon wouldn't take my advice on this one.$21
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009A.MadDog.Ha: Aw, that's okay, Mateo... Marlon made a lot of good points, after all.$6#$b#I'm just not meant to chase that particular dream.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009A.Mateo.06: None of that kind of talk, Gun. Take this as a chance to rest and reset. Marlon's not the only person who sees your efforts.#$b#And *he's* never had one of your potions come in handy in a pinch, besides.$14
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009A.MadDog.Ha: Oh, uh oh, I hope you didn't pick up one of the... ah, explode-y ones...$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193009A.Mateo.08: I'll have you know, I know my way around an explosion or two.$1#$b#But for real, Gun, listen to me on this one. Take a break and come back fighting, okay?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.QuickQuest: What are you doing? Making some new unspeakable concoction?
Your room looks messier than normal. What are you up to?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.MadDog.Has: Oh, hey @! Nothing so dangerous this time!$6#$b#I'm just sorting through stuff I don't wanna hold on to anymore.
Oh, hey @! Just cleaning out stuff I don't want to hold on to anymore.#$b#But I guess I made things worse in the process, oops.$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.QuickQuest: Is this thing one of the items you're getting rid of?
How come you have this ring, anyway?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.MadDog.Has: Yeah, I suppose it should be.$6#$b#I used to be engaged a while back.$2
Oh. Yeah. That. I used to be engaged.$2

Oh, don't sweat it! You're not bringing up bad memories or anything!$6#$b#It was... a marriage of convenience. Kind of had to carry the expectations of our family after Sig deployed.$2#$b#...And that meant making a good marriage match for the family's reputation.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.QuickQuest: That's really gross of your families.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.MadDog.Has: I think after a bit we at least liked each other... But yeah, not for love.$2
It was gross. It *is* gross. We got along though, which is a good outcome for an arranged marriage.$2
Anyway, you're very right. I don't need to hold on to this ring anymore.
Leighton's doing real good for herself, and my family's chosen a new head for the family business, so I think it's okay if I stop holding on.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.QuickQuest: Do you want to be the head of Bjarnarson Holdings?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.MadDog.Has: When Sig deployed and I was chosen, absolutely.$1#$b#But if it means an arranged, loveless marriage and meeting impossible expectations? No way!$2#$b#I'm going to find happiness by my own choices, not anyone else's!$1

Sure, as much as anyone misses a friend they fell out with.$2#$b#But we both wish the best for each other, and I *know* what I want in my future now.#$b#I want to find happiness thanks to the choices *I* make, not what's chosen for me!$1
Speaking of getting rid of my old things, don't suppose you need a bird cage? A multi-room camping tent? A chainsaw?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.QuickQuest: I'm glad you're doing alright for yourself. I hope you find happiness in the future. (PLATONIC)
I'm glad to see you opening up your heart. Maybe we could even find happiness together someday. (ROMANTIC)
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.MadDog.Has: Thank you! I do too, and I hope you find happiness in what you choose, too. @. You're a wonderful friend.$1
I'm glad you're the person I can open up my heart to, @.#$b#You're an amazing person and I do seem to find happiness whenever I find myself around you.$4
Well, I suppose I oughtta clean all this up if I ever want to find *ANYTHING*, huh?$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193010.Message.26: Gunnar never seems to let anything hold him back for too long. His optimism is practically infectious!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Clint.03: Mind if I grab a cola real quick?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Clint.09: *Now* I'm ready, Gunnar! Uh... should I just, put the empty in my pocket for now?$5
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: Uh, just, toss it by that old recycling machine or something, Gudrun'll grab it...$6#$b#@, are you ready?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.QuickQuest: Well, of course I'm ready for adventure, but what's everyone else here for?
Why'd you invite the whole town on your adventure?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Clint.13: I'm here to see what kind of ore might be hiding under the Lodge.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Emily.14: I'm here for the adventure, too! It'll be fun! This is the first time Gunnar's invited me to something like this.$1
And I want to take a look at those 'tentacles' you two saw.#$b#I *think* they might be a type of fungus, but I'm hoping to collect some samples.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: You probably should've brought your hazmat suit for *that*, Demetrius.$6
I'm sure it will be fine, Gunnar. And I'm counting on your swift reaction if things somehow do go awry!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Emily.18: Adventurers should always travel in parties, @, it's more fun that way.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Clint.19: *Some*one needs to do an ore assessment down here, @, and I'm just the blacksmith for the job.$2
Are you kidding, @? I wouldn't miss a discovery like this for anything!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: Just a reminder, I'm not... a member of the Guild. So if things go poorly... I mean - I'll do my best! But...$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.QuickQuest: I've followed along so far, let's see this through as a team, Gun.
Well, if you slip up Gunnar, I'll pick up the slack like usual.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: Oh, I didn't like those sounds *last* time we heard them.$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.QuickQuest: Have you figured out WHAT is down here yet?
Gunnar, you... you brought your sword, right?
An amazing discovery, that's what's down here! I should've brought Maru!$1
I have all the equipment we need to safely and humanely grab a sample, don't worry!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Emily.37: Maybe we should try being civil first?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: I think we might be in for a fight...$12
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Message.41: You're not quite close enough to hit. Emily tries introducing herself. Demetrius jots down some notes. Clint throws a piece of ore at the Kraken. Gunnar readies his sword.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Message.42: You line up a shot. Emily asks for the Kraken's name. Demetrius looks for his pen. Clint checks his pockets for something useful. Gunnar readies his sword.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDogKrak: The Kraken looks like it wants to attack!$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Message.46: You hit the Kraken! Emily is trying to communicate telepathically with the Kraken. Demetrius is sketching the Kraken. Clint is inching away from the water's ledge. Gunnar swings - and hits!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Message.47: You bean it right in the eye! Rude. Emily is trying to pet a tentacle to reassure it. Demetrius has acquired a water sample. Clint nearly slips off the ledge. Gunnar swings - and hits!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDogKrak: The Kraken looks angry and confused.$4
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Message.52: You swing but miss. Emily is frowning at you and Gunnar expectantly. Demetrius backs up. Clint backs up. Gunnar blocks with his sword.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Message.53: Your shot sails over it's big head. Emily flinches for the Kraken. Demetrius backs up. Clint backs up. Gunnar blocks with his sword.
I hate to suggest this, but Gun, any bombs handy?$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDogKrak: The Kraken appears to be waiting for your party's next actions. How polite!$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: Anything that would create a distraction would be really great right now...$7
...Would you look at that? It's calmed down thanks to the Joja Cola of all things!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Emily.62: I *told* you we didn't need to fight it!
No, I think we acted too hastily, you're right, Emily.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: ...Oh boy. Say, Clint? Run up and get some more cola, won't you? I get the feeling we'll be down here for a while...$6
Of course we're going to be here for a while, Gun!#$b#What a discovery!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Clint.66: Do you want to come and help me out, Emily?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.QuickQuest: Anything I can do to help?
...Gun, this isn't the kind of treasure I was hoping for...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDog.Has: You're welcome to stay and help us try to communicate with this thing!#$b#Oh yeah, I almost forgot! Here, for your troubles!
Oh, huh, you're totally right, @!$6#$b#Um, here, this is a good start, right?$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.MadDogKrak: The Kraken seems to be pretty happy with a soda pop in hand - er, in tentacle.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193011.Message.73: What a discovery! Who knew Gunnar had a Joja-addicted Kraken dwelling underneath his basement? Maybe after Demetrius and Gunnar are done with their research, you can introduce yourself to the Kraken.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.01: Thank you all for joining me on this beautiful day!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.04: Ahem... it is not often that we have a hero among us, much less multiple, but I'm quite proud to declare that the truth today.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.05: These fine upstanding citizens of Pelican Town ventured far beneath the earth and encountered a beast like no other - and tamed it!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.06: And so, it is my privilege to honor them all for their bravery!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.07: Demetrius, for your thorough analysis of the threat and the ramifications of it's existence, I and the town thank you.
Well, it was hardly a threat, {{LewisOrLouise}}, more like the discovery of the century -$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.12: Emily, for your dedicated support and attention to detail on the scene, I and the town thank you.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Emily.15: I just didn't think we should try and hurt an innocent animal that had been isolated for so long when communicating with him was an option -$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.17: Clint, for your detailed report on the ore density and profitability of the discovered cavern, I and the town thank you.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Clint.20: Er, I mean, it's still not the town's property and - would you like me to move along?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.22: ...Ah, Gunnar. You were there, too. Good job.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.MadDog.Has: Come on, {{LewisOrLouise}}... The apology should be at least as loud as the disrespect, right?$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.25: You... are right.$2#$b#So I say to you, Gunnar Bear, I'm sorry for not having faith in your abilities.$2#$b#For the task of protecting Demetrius, Emily, and Clint on the scene, as well as Pelican Town as a whole, I and the town thank you.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Abigail.26: Never saw it coming, huh, Gun?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.Lewis.28: Everyone, I am quite happy to say thank you to our *four* new found heroes, and I hope you all join me in saying thank you as well.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.MadDog.Has: Hey @! Glad to see you. Here, take that.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.QuickQuest: Oh, are you sure you want to give this to me?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.MadDog.Has: Yeah, I definitely didn't do much to earn it.
Sorry, sorry, we can ask {{LewisOrLouise}} for a redo so you can get honored?$6
Thanks for having my back through this whole debacle, @. You're one in a million, y'know that?$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.QuickQuest: Anytime, Gunnar. Just... no more explosions... for real this time, huh?
*Some*one has to do things the right way around here, and it's obviously not the guy who blows things up.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193012.MadDog.Has: No more explosions planned - or unplanned - for the future. I promise.
GunnarTheBigOne.MissedThanks.5: Invite me next time! And thank you!
GunnarTheBigOne.MissedThanks.8: Thanks guys, I might've forgotten what for.
GunnarTheBigOne.MissedThanks.12: What else was down there? Thanks folks!
GunnarTheBigOne.MissedThanks.20: I can't believe Gunnar was right!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: Well...
...Mostly I was looking for some first aid because I sort of dropped a potion and it shattered everywhere and - $6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.TempMadDog: Do you ever try to be careful, Gun?
But it was brought to our attention that's not acceptable.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.QuickQuest: Wait, you're not going to give him another chance at all?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: It's okay, @! I totally get why I'm not cut out for the Guild.$6
I don't know if you're for me or against me, @...$6
Wait, so I'm in? Do you mean it? Really? Do you? Mean it?$7
Sorry, sorry! I didn't think this was ever going to happen - I'm so excited!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.QuickQuest: Gunnar... Don't forget to actually 'accept' the offer.
Gunnar... You're totally going to need rescuing again at this rate.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: Oops!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.TempMadDog: Don't jinx the boy right out the gate, @!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: OF COURSE I DO!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.TempMadDog: Eh, we'll see what other trials we can put 'im through later, won't we, Marlon?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Message.17: Gunnar did it! Which means you're no longer the Guild 'rookie'! Maybe you should make him carry your bag.
GunnarMarlon.AcceptV1.Missed.1: ...I suppose you're looking for a second chance, Gunnar.
GunnarMarlon.AcceptV1.Missed.2: You - Gunnar. In the wake of your recent actions, we'd be willing to re-activate your apprenticeship.
GunnarMarlon.AcceptV1.Missed.3: You're starting out as a journeyman, this time, if you choose to accept. This means you'd take on missions without backup, knowing the full cost of failure going forward.
GunnarMarlon.AcceptV1.Missed.5: Don't turn foolish the moment I place my trust in you, Gunnar Bear.
GunnarMarlon.AcceptV1.Missed.6: Do you accept this offer as a journeyman Guildmember, Gunnar Bear?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: Well...
...Mostly I was looking for some first aid because I sort of dropped a potion and it shattered everywhere and - $6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.TempMadDog: Do you ever try to be careful, Gun?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.QuickQuest: Wait, you're not going to give him another chance at all?
That's fair, Gunnar is pretty irresponsible.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: It's okay, @! I totally get why I'm not cut out for the Guild.$6
I don't know if you're for me or against me, @...$6
Understood. @, can we get out of here?$2
It's not all bad, right, @? I mean... {{LewisOrLouise}} kind of thinks I'm alright, sort of.$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.QuickQuest: {{LewisOrLouise}} thinks you're very good, actually, Gun.
I was hoping you'd get promoted so I could have the extra back up.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: Well, I know {{LewisOrLouisePronoun1}} could regret those words come the next explosion.$6
But I mean, even if I think I've come far, I have to listen to the folks who've been in the business longer, right?$16
Oh, sure, make me be your bag boy or something down there, right?$17
But it's alright, @... It's just... I really did try, you know? Tried my {{BearFamProfanityL}}...$16
Doesn't this just beat all?
Mateo! How do you DO that?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Mateo.19: I'm just very light-footed, Gunnar. ...Couldn't help but hear you're having a rough time of things.$13
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: Marlon just reiterated I'm not suited to be a member of the Adventurer's Guild.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Mateo.21: Of his branch, maybe. I, on the other hand, would value and appreciate a skilled medic in my roster.$36
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: Really? Do you mean it? Really? Do you? Mean it?$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Mateo.23: I wouldn't offer if I didn't. You don't ask a fish to climb a tree, Gunnar - just because your skills aren't martial focused doesn't mean your contributions are lesser.$14#$b#I'd be happy to get you whatever resources you'd need to sharpen whatever skills you'd like to hone.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: Mateo, I didn't think this was ever gonna happen, I'm so excited-$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Mateo.25: Gunnar, do you swear under oath...#$b#to study medicine, grow your skills...$12#$b#and to do everything in your power to heal those in need, and tend to the endangered for the Coastal Adventurer's Guild?$32
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: OF COURSE I DO!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Message.27: Mateo hands Gunnar the silver badge off their own belt.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Mateo.28: Then on behalf of Stardew Valley, I hereby officially induct you into the Coastal Adventurer's Guild.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Mateo.29: Let me know how I can support you in your goals, Gunnar.$78
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.MadDog.Has: I will, Mateo! Don't worry, I'll make you proud, I'll do right by this-$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Mateo.31: Don't worry, Gunnar. You already do.$80
event-MadDog.BearFam.16193013.Message.32: Gunnar did it! The Coastal Adventurer's Guild now has their very own medic...
GunnarMarlon.MateoV2.Missed.1: Gunnar, I can't in good conscience give you another shot at conscription. I will not shoulder the responsibility of your recklessness.
GunnarMarlon.MateoV2.Missed.2: I'm sorry, Gunnar. You're just not a suitable combatant, and I don't have it in me to go to Sondra if anything happened to you...$2
GunnarMarlon.MateoV2.Missed.3: Wasn't that YOUR old badge, Mateo?
GunnarMarlon.MateoV2.Missed.4: Yup. I think Gunnar's got a lot of potential... and I know I'm not going to want to run The Guild forever. It would be a privilege to have someone with his heart at the helm one day.$1
GunnarMarlon.MateoV2.Missed.5: ...I suppose you're looking for a second chance, Gunnar.
event-MadDog.BearFam.GunnarFlirtsBackEve: You have a sword for a reason.
What are you doing out here?
What if I happened to be a big bad slime?
Just finished some slime hunting for Gil again, tragically.$6
You ARE a big bad slime, @.$5
Do you want to spar with something ACTUALLY challenging?
You must've done well, I don't see any slimes coming after you. Wanna try and fight me?
Brought Sig with you, did ya?$13
I think you just wanna beat me up, @.$6
Well, let's plan our fight for a future date... I'm already wiped from slime time, as it is.$6
Sure thing. And don't worry, I go easy on people I like. (ROMANTIC)
Okay, but as a quick head's up, I go easy on people I pity.
event-MadDog.BearFam.FlirtAtGunnar.Messa: Gunnar thinks you might be interested in him.
event-MadDog.BearFam.FlirtAtGunnar.MadDo: W-wait, like - is that a, um, a warning or a threat or a -$4
event-MadDog.BearFam.FlirtAtGunnar.Quick: Feel free to interpret that how you want.
event-MadDog.BearFam.FlirtAtGunnar.MadDo: I can't say I'll make the same offer... or maybe I will! Who knows! I'll keep you on your toes somehow!$13
...Well, in that case, I'm going to interpret it VERY positively.$4
event-MadDog.BearFam.FlirtAtGunnar.Messa: Gunnar is now pretty sure you're interested in him.
event-MadDog.BearFam.FlirtAtGunnar.MadDo: Wanna walk with me and we'll plan our upcoming match?$4
event-MadDog.BearFam.BeMeanAtGunnar.MadD: Oh, wow. Look at how tough @ is!$1#$b#At least I got pity going for me. Anyway, hit me up for that fight whenever, I'm still down despite you being all smug over there.
event-MadDog.BearFam.BeMeanAtGunnar.Mess: You head out while Gunnar continues to practice with his weapon.
MadDog.BearFam.GunnarBlacksmithDateDialo: Hi there, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}!
What'd you do to Clint?
I better get a discount since we're dating.

The better question is, 'what is Emily doing to him?'$1#$b#He asked me to cover because she *asked* for him specifically and I'm pretty sure I saw him skipping out the door when I took over the counter.$18
Well, I can see what the snuggle to gold geode-cracking exchange rate is, but times are tough. Might need to take out a loan.$13
Well, I can see what the kiss to gold geode-cracking exchange rate is, but times are tough. Might need to take out a loan.$13
Well, I can see what the kiss to gold geode-cracking exchange rate is, but times are tough. Might need to take out a loan.$13
Well, I know I'm no Clint, but you can trust me with whatever you need smithed, @. I've learned a lot from him.
I'd trust you with pretty much anything.
I'm still balancing my checkbook to make sure I can afford *your* steep prices.
W-what, really? Well, hold on then, let me forge you something. Please?$17
If you think my prices are steep, that just means you're unsure of the quality of my work. Let me show you!$13
Yeah-hah! Looking good! C'mere, please.
Tada!
This looks great! Is it really for me?
Giving me a ring already? Moving kind of fast, but I'm prepared.
Well of course! No one else I wanna forge a ring for, up to and including Dark Lords. You're the one for my one ring, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}.$13
I - wait - hold on - do you - are we at ring status already - I mean - Am I accidentally rushing things?$4#$b#%Gunnar might just babble until he explodes at this rate.
...You know you could ask and I'd do my best to forge whatever you wanted, @... I just want to be able to take care of you... provide for you. Stuff like that.$4
I like you as you are, Gunnar.
If I've told you once, I've told you a thousand times, keep it professional in the workspace, Gun.$2
Wouldn't dream of keeping it anything but!$6
Clint chased you both out shortly after returning from visiting with Emily. His reason? He didn't want to watch you two make googly eyes at each other all day.
MadDog.BearFam.GunnarCollisionDate.Dialo: You tore out of that cave and nearly knocked *me* out.
Well my head hurts a bit... ow - oh no, did I run you over?$12
I ran into you? No wonder my head hurts... I'm sorry, @...$12
I'm glad you were able to get out of the way, at least. I'm sorry for charging at you out of nowhere...$2

Tripping while running away in cowardly fear certainly explains why I'm laying on the ground... but @? Why are y- $6#$b#Ah, you know - you didn't have to stick around and look after me. You don't gotta take care of me.$16
Someone has to look out for you, and I don't want to let anyone else take my spot.
I know you'd return the favor if it were me.
Well, too late, it's happening so you just have to let it happen.
I know I don't 'gotta' but I want to, because it's you.
MadDog.BearFam.GunnarCollisionDate.Route: ...Wait, just like that? It's... really that simple?$7
Just like that. It's that simple.
Well... that's how love's supposed to be, right? Simple?
Just like that... You're one in a million, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}.$4
You're right, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}, that's exactly how it's supposed to be.$4
Hey, @?
Yes, Gunnar?

...I know I probably come off as a real immature dummy who can't do anything right...$2#$b#But with you? I want to try my hardest.#$b#That's what's simple to me. When you're around, I wanna do my best for you.$4
%Gunnar reaches for you hand and places it lightly over his forehead where a bruise is already forming. He smiles up at you bashfully.#$b#...Perfect. You're perfect, just like this. Thank you, @.$4
You two stay like that for awhile, a stolen moment of peace and rest.
There's no way, no how, no possibility, in this reality or any other reality known or unknown to us that someone could EVER take your spot, @!$7
Okay, but what if the me from another reality has eye lasers? Or a battle goat?
Have you already vetted these known and unknown realities? Wow, there's nothing your potions can't do.

%Gunnar looks briefly conflicted. He's always wanted a battle goat.#$b#But I'm in love with the you from this reality right here, so those things wouldn't matter.$4#$b#And Marnie's always going to have goats, besides.$13
Yeah, I have actually. And there's not a single reality that comes to close to being as good as this one, the one that put you and me together in the same time and space.$4

%Gunnar reaches up and takes your hand in his, placing it over his heart, which you can feeling beating steadily despite the armor in the way.#$b#I like and love the you right here, with your hand over my heart that belongs to you... So I don't need another reality or a different you... I just want you to keep looking after me.$4
You two sit for awhile, and every time you look down at Gunnar, he's gazing right at you with pure adoration. This is his favorite reality, because of you.
Ten times over, easily!$1#$b#I'd spontaneously develop telekinesis and levitate you straight to the best bed at Harvey's clinic right then and there.$13
Well now I feel like I'm taking inadequate care of you.
I'll work on that for the next time we run into each other like this.

Wait! No nonono - are you kidding me, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}?$7#$b#No one in the world cares for me like you do! We could even replace Harvey with a healing touch like yours around! And see, I'm already better!$18

Next time? Aw, don't worry, I won't put you through this again, I promise. I mean, I already put you through so much, I should at least be able to avoid another head injury for your sake...$6#$b#But don't worry! I'm already okay thanks you taking care of me!
Gunnar?
This was a bad idea -

%Gunnar reaches up with a trembling hand take one of yours. He squeezes your fingers gently but firmly, as if to say 'I'm right here, I'm still here, I promise'.#$b#...Mm, sorry, @... let me borrow a little more of your strength, please...$2
Take as long as you need.
I'll carry you home if I have to.
Forever? How's forever sound to you, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}?$4
Just carry my heart home with you, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}, that's all I need.$4
Laying with you, holding your hand, Gunnar's wits gradually return to him. But you two linger a little longer after he's recovered, just because you can.
...You're amazing, @... I don't think there's anyone in the whole wide world that's as kind as you are.$4
I'm kind because I'm not letting you rot on the beach?
Well, *you're* kind too, wise guy... Haven't you ever heard that like attracts like?

%Gunnar laughs brightly at your choice of words. He must already be recovering.#$b#Yeah! Even if you don't think you're being kind to *me*, you're being kind to everyone else around by lingering with me so no one gets the jumpscare of their lives thinking I tripped and died in the middle of the beach.$1

Actually I haven't... I've heard 'opposites attract' but -...$7#$b#%Gunnar looks pensive for a long moment.#$b#...I guess *we're* opposites, though, huh? You're cool and talented and nice and helpful and I'm.... kind of the town goofball.$13
That's really how you see me?

How I really see you? ...I see the {{LPJobTitle}} that I love, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}. You just happen to also be the most phenomenal person alive or dead... you know, like it's no big deal or something.$4

You could be probably rob a bank and pour salt all over Evelyn's garden boxes and sell your soul to Joja and I'd still find you wonderful, @... I love you.$4#$b#Although, admittedly, I'm relieved you *haven't* done those things... Feel free to do so though, knowing I'll be in your corner no matter the outcome.$13#$b#%Gunnar takes your hand in both of his and holds on tight.

You two stay seated for a while longer, Gunnar periodically bringing up hypothetical crimes for you to commit against the people of the Valley while you indulge his silliness. The shared joy and love makes the time pass by way too quickly for you both.
You... *want* to? Really? Is it... is it because I'm incredibly danger prone to myself and others?$2
Well, considering I just brained myself in front of you, I probably warrant being called a dummy. You should call me that more often.$6
H-hey! You can't just say that when I've gone and made a fool of myself in front of you again! At this rate you'll never think I'm cool.$6
...You know, no matter what anyone else thinks of me or calls me... your opinion is my favorite, @. I love you, too. Drives me bonkers - or in this case, drives me to bonk my head - sometimes.$4
%Gunnar takes your hand in his own, holding it over his face. You can feel the slightly ticklish touch of his finger tracing the lines of your palm.
Are you going to tell me my future?
It says right here... that Gunnar Bear, being of sound albeit scattered mind, will love you for as long as the sun keeps rising.$13
That seems strangely hyper specific for palm-reading.
Does it now? Well, it also says here that even if Gunnar Bear is a danger prone goofball, he's *your* danger prone goofball.$13#$b#...If you'll keep him.$4
I think I will keep him.
%Gunnar squeezes your hand before lacing your fingers together to keep you close.
You and Gunnar keep each other company for as long you both can spare for the day, sitting comfortably together, hand in hand.
MadDog.BearFam.GunnarProposalEventDialog: Worth it! Terrifying! Oh! -
...Are you okay, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}?$7
...Whoa! You didn't knock me down *and* you showed up right when I was looking for you! (Propose to Gunnar)
When did *you* get so strong? I thought we were both about to eat dirt just now. (Be proposed to by Gunnar)
I didn't! I'm actually really relieved by that, I gotta say.$6#$b#What did you need from me, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}?$1
Gunnar... Will you marry me?
This is really happening!
OF COURSE I WILL!!$18
I mean - ahem - yes, I'd love to be your husband, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}... I've been practicing for weeks so I could ask you!$4
We can tell people you asked me first, if you want.
No we can't, no way! I'm telling EVERYONE you claimed me!$4
Oh, before I forget!
I really was practicing how I'd ask you... so here, this is for you.$4
You and Gunnar are now engaged! Congratulations!
Been working out just for you!$13#$b#Also, I know I can't cook, but I'd *never* resort to feeding you dirt. C'mon, I'm better than that, I swear!$13
...It looks like you dropped something?
It's now or never.
Well. I really wanted to practice this about a thousand more times but -$6#$b#@? Will you marry me?$4
Yes! Of course!
Hey, I was gonna ask that!
Gotta be quicker to beat me!
I've been practicing for a few weeks and, well, I prepared this for you... because, y'know, I love you and stuff, and well, here.$4
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateGoatDial: ...Alright, how's that? Fitting better?$7
I know it's not *perfect* but if you give me a couple of days, I can really fix you up, I promise.$7
...Yeah, I get that. Nice clothes are nice but they're still only a bandaid on the real problem...$2
But it IS a bandaid, so maybe when they're tailored to you, you'll like them better!$12
Oh, hi {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}!
Hi Gun. What's going on?
Gunnar. We're NOT getting a battle goat.
Meet Bugle! I'm keeping him company for Marnie!$1
I'M NOT GONNA BRING HIM HOME!$7#$b#This is Bugle, I'm watching him for Marnie.$19
Why... why are you watching the goat?
Why... why are you watching Bugle?

Well, he's not very good at being a goat according to the family that surrendered him, and he has anxiety.$16#$b#Marnie's talking to Jacob so they can figure out what can be done to help him better acclimate for the future.#$b#He's been too anxious to even look around, so far.$2

...It's probably kind of dumb, but he reminds me of me.$2#$b#So I thought, maybe he'd feel cooler if he had a cool costume. So I dressed him up as a battle goat to try and boost his self esteem, help him be brave.$12
That's... sweet. Although kind of weird.
You are SO weird.
You wouldn't have me any other way, right?$4
Ah... Yeah, I'm... sorry about that.$2

...But don't worry, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}!$19#$b#He's not coming home with us. He needs a support circle and I know how busy things get between Bear Necessities and %farm.$7#$b#I wouldn't put our stability at risk without discussing it with you, of course.$6
Gunnar?
Bugle?
Ble-ea-ea-eh?

Bugle, you look very cool in that outfit. I bet you look cool no matter what you wear. You could probably become king of the barnyard because that's how cool you are - and if you don't want to do that, that's okay too. You're simply a good goat, Bugle.
Aw, @! Would you look at that? I guess your encouragement works on Bears *and* goats... Look at Bugle go!$18
Oh, Bugle! You're exploring!$1
It's all thanks to Gunnar's costume!
Well, costume therapy wasn't my first suggestion... or my second. I'm glad to see him exploring though.
And it's all actually thanks to my wonderful @!$1#$b#Thank you for helping, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}... You bring me and so many other weird little creatures joy.$4

Gunnar couldn't stop smiling as you two headed home after hanging out with Bugle. He was DEFINITELY dropping hints about adopting Bugle - you'll probably need to remind him that battle goats are meant for hypotheticals only.
...Maybe later though, after he's had his fun.
Yes, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}?

You're on of the sweetest people I know. I know it's easy to wallow in anxiety and self-doubt, but watching you overcome it makes me happy to be yours - and makes me happy to call you mine. I hope you never change, Gunnar.
Wow, @... you really know how to make a Bear cry.$8
...I really adore how kind you're being to Bugle. You're just as kind and sweet to me. And I bet Bugle likes it too.
...Bugle, look at you go! You're strutting your stuff like you own this ranch already!$18
It's all thanks to Gunnar's kindness... and maybe a little from the costume.
...Thank you, @. I love you.$4
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCavePrec: Wanted to catch you before I forgot. Do you have time tomorrow or later to visit the Kraken with me?$7
Of course! Anything for you - and him.
Well my schedule's tight, but I'll squid-ink him in.
Thank you! He seems really worried lately so I'd like to help him out.$6#$b#You're the best, @, I love you.$4
Check up on the Kraken with Gunnar tomorrow - or later. But the sooner, the better, for the sake of the monstrosity of the deep - and those innocent folks who reside on the land above him...
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.2: Yeah buddy, we'll figure out what's been creeping down here for ya.$1
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.3: What do you think can scare a Kraken?
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.Cha: Well, I've had loads of time to learn between bringing him cola and working with Demetrius. My accent's kind of bad though.$6
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.Spi: You of all people should know I'm good with my tongue.$13
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.Bot: You of all people should know I'm good with my tongue.$13
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.9: Well, let's go deeper, shall we?
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.10: You know... I'm really glad this adventure is just the two of us, all alone. It's kind of romantic, isn't it?$4
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.11: I mean, it's a dark damp cave... but sure, we can call it romantic.
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.12: Anywhere I get to go with you is romantic.
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.14: Boy there sure is a whole lotta cave underneath the Valley.$6
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.15: Well, business before pleasure. Let's look around, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}!$18
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.16: I know between %farm and the Guild and Bear Necessities, we get pretty busy... But going on these adventures together? Really make things seem easy to get through.
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.17: I wouldn't mind less work sometimes.
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.18: Coming home to you makes things easy to get through, too!
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.19: Maybe I should whisk us away on a vacation soon, huh? We'll fly somewhere fun and pretty and leave our troubles behind.$13
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.20: ...Aw, @! You can't say stuff like that when we're 'working'! Now I'm all misty-eyed.$8#$b#I feel the same way, though. Knowing I get to come home to you? It's like the best dream, and one I hope I never wake up from.$4
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.21: Uh oh. @? You should come here. Quickly!$7
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.23: I can translate that. It said 'die die die die die.'
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.24: What do you think it said?
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.25: Any way there's a chance you misunderstood him? No? I figured.$12
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.26: Maybe something friendly, like 'hello, welcome to my kingdom'? Please?$12
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.31: And... and that's... that's why we should... abolish the monarchy... kings... bad...$9
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.32: You patch up Gunnar with the adventurer's kit he always brings with you on these outings while he rambles and rallies against the skeleton monarchy.
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.33: {{CPGunnarSpouseNameB}}? Are *you* okay? I really thought that guy would get us both...$10
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.34: What a relief! I'd never forgive myself if you were hurt!$3
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.35: Let's go tell the Kraken the good news!$3
MadDog.BearFam.MarriedGunnarDateCave.36: According to Gunnar's translation, the Kraken's going to break down those giant geodes the Skeleton King was guarding and send the goods to you as payment. It begs the question - exactly HOW will the monstrosity of the deep do that?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199000.MadDog.Has: Oh no.
He's not here.
Where am I?
It's by an ocean, right?
There's no ocean.
Oh, hello, hello! This isn't *your*, er, grass that I'm tromping all over, is it?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199000.QuickQuest: No, the grass is free for everyone.
Yes, and I'm afraid I'm going to have to run you out of town now.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199000.MadDog.Has: Haha, next you'll tell me you don't charge for the air around here!$1
Oh boy, I've outrun a person with a pitchfork once before, I think I can do it again.$3
Oh, sorry! My name is Teren, I'm here to visit my friend in East Scarp -
Hah?
Oh, @, is this guy bothering you?
SIG!
You're late! You were supposed to meet me when I arrived!$16
What? I didn't even know you were here!$9
I sent a letter!
Never got it.
...How'd you manage to mail it to the wrong house?$11
I didn't!
Sorry about all this, @. I knew he was bad with directions, but now he doesn't even know how to send letters?$18
I came all this way to visit you and I'm feeling so attacked right now.$2
C'mon, Sergeant, let's get you settled in. Thanks for finding him, @.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199000.Message.24: So that's Sig's mysterious Sergeant Barnes! At least he's a lot friendlier than Sig! Maybe you can say hi to him later at the Bear Lodge.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199001.MadDog.Has: I think you washed it out too soon.$14
The hairdresser takes way longer though... And used gloves.$14
S'not my fault they never learned efficiency.$9
Hey @! Wanna help Sig drown me?$15
I didn't get my hair touched up before I moved, so we're D-I-Ying it.$14
I'm only helping him because he whines too much about going gray prematurely.$18
I'm only going gray because I'm friends with you, Big Bear.$15
The audacity of some former squad leaders.$1
A small part of me always thinks I should just give up the battle and rock the salt and pepper look...$14
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199001.QuickQuest: I don't have the patience to dye my hair.
Oooh, I should dye my hair, that might be fun!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199001.MadDog.Has: Well, you're also crazy busy with %farm, so I can't blame you there.$14
It would be! I'm sure you'd rock any color of the rainbow, @.$15
You could always ask Big Bear for help. He'll do it for free.$15
Well, *I'll* be happy to help. I do great haircuts, too. Just say the word!$14
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199001.Message.19: Sig seems a lot more approachable with Teren around. Maybe Teren just has that effect on people.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199002.MadDog.Has: So the problem is that she *was* trained as a service dog.
That's... a problem? You're like the biggest proponent of service animals that I know.$11
I think it would be lovely for you boys to have a service animal around.$1
Forgive me, Sigurd darling. I mean a more physically capable service animal.$9
So, about that!$7#$b#The thing about Sassy is that -
What the hell, did your dog just -$5
So, she failed her service dog training because while she *can* do things like block, open doors, and turn on lights...#$b#She just does certain tasks whenever she wants.$7
Goodness! What a smart girl she is!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199002.QuickQuest: Oh you have a service dog now?
Smart and adorable? What a combo!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199002.MadDog.Has: Hey @! Not quite, she's just a dog with a whole bag of tricks. Want to meet her?$1
Isn't she the cutest? Come say hi! Sassy, this is @!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199002.TempMadDog: Aroo?$1#$b#%Sassy sniffs you cautiously but waits to see your reaction.$1
Her tongue lolls out and it looks like she's smiling back.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199002.MadDog.Has: I'm glad you made it over to meet her, @. Let me know if she's ever causing you any mischief, I can already tell she's going to be a handful.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199002.Message.21: A dog with free will and service dog skills? Sounds like things will be lively at Bear Lodge going forward!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Jodi.01: Teren, you're really spoiling us today!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Caroline.0: And how long have you been baking, did you say?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Jodi.03: @! Hello, are you here to taste test Teren's baking, too?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Caroline.0: Don't be modest, Sergeant Barnes!#$b#He's bashful, @, but he was quite the handy chef in his Army days.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.MadDog.Has: Would you like to try something?#$b#You have your choice of a rose cupcake, a slice of sesame seed brown bread, or a cornbread muffin.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.QuickQuest: Actually... I have some dietary limitations.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.MadDog.Has: Oh! Oh, my bad, hold on - here!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Message.13: Teren reaches beneath the counter and pulls out some cookies, hot from the oven.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.MadDog.Has: These are gluten and nut free and vegan - the recipe might need a little work still though, right Gus?$6
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Gus.15: You'll get it there with time and practice.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Gus.16: I think once you get used to not rushing because you have to pack up camp, you'll turn into a fine home cook, Teren!#$b#Maybe you could even teach Sig a thing or two.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Jodi.18: I just know Vincent would *love* the cupcakes, Teren.$1#$b#You could come join us for dinner sometime and bring dessert.#$b#Who knows, maybe Sam would take an interest in cooking then!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.MadDog.Has: I hope you liked your choice, @. Don't pull any punches though, I'm a big boy, I handle criticism well.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.QuickQuest: They're just a little mishapen... but tasty!
They're pretty ugly, but I'd probably eat another.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.MadDog.Has: You're too kind! They're a *lot* mishapen, Gus is right that I need to slow down.$6
You're not wrong! My squad always shied away from telling me the truth, but I appreciate the honest review, haha.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Jodi.26: You'll become a great cook in no time, Teren, just stick to it.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Caroline.2: And I'm happy to share some new recipes with you when you're ready for a challenge, Sergeant!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.MadDog.Has: I look forward to those lessons, ladies.$8
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003.Message.32: It was nice of Teren to share the fruits of his labor with you, Jodi, and Caroline. Wonder what he'll bake next?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003Bonus1.Vinc: Are you SURE you didn't HIDE any fish or cauliflower in it?$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003Bonus1.MadD: I would NEVER ruin the sanctity of pizza like that, Vincent. I'm from Zuzu City, the HOME of PIZZA.$3
Oh? We're having pizza tonight, mom?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003Bonus1.MadD: Of course, your mom did all the work despite inviting me over to help.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003Bonus1.Jodi: You know very well I invited you to have dinner, not make dinner.
And @, you'll join us, won't you?$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199003Bonus1.Mess: ...?#Good news! You did NOT get a recipe for largemouth bass and cauliflower pizza.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Caroline.0: Sergeant, you've got such lovely prospects, just tell me the sort of person you're interested in.
@! Hello, glad you could join us!#$b#We're helping Sergeant Barnes shake off his dust and find love!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Abigail.07: Sassy's right! Answer mom's question, Teren. What kind of person are you into?$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.MadDog.Has: That's not what my dog said.
