event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Caroline.1: Someone hardworking? And kind! I know just the person!$1#$b#Abby, do you remember my friend Coralie Mycroft out in Grampleton?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Abigail.12: She's too married and too old for Teren, mom.$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Caroline.1: Not Coralie! But her son, the lawyer! The one you passed on?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Abigail.14: That guy's a total loser, mom!$5
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Caroline.1: Now then, Sergeant. Let me go give Coralie a call and find out how her boy's doing!#$b#I'll be right back!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Abigail.20: @ and I will make up an emergency, get out of here before she starts planning your wedding next!$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199004.Message.23: Abigail did most of the talking when Caroline came back. Good luck to Teren next time he meets up with her for cooking lessons though!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.MadDog.Has: Well... you know how it is. I'm not really doing much.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Caroline.0: Don't be ridiculous!#$b#You have such fun stories for us after all, you're doing plenty.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Jodi.03.fa: I know when Kent returns, I want us to be able to call on you for anything we may run into.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Jodi.03.tr: I know Kent and I would've loved working with you the first few weeks he'd returned.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.MadDog.Has: Aw, thanks Jodi. That's quite flattering.#$b#But those stories aren't even mine, and I don't think there's anything I can do to change that and get my own stories now.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.QuickQuest: What are you guys gossipping about?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Caroline.1: We'll have you know, we're encouraging our dear friend Teren!$3
Just living our average, day to day lives, like usual!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Jodi.13: Although I think Teren here could do with something above average to lift his spirits.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.MadDog.Has: Oh, no, you folks... I'm just complaining, you don't really have to listen to me -$10
It's... well, I like what I do with the veteran reacclimatization program but...$17#$b#I don't really see if I'm making an impact, if that makes sense?$2
And I know - that's not a real valid complaint -$10
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Jodi.19: It's not wrong to want to feel fulfilled by one's work, Teren.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Caroline.2: I think everyone wants to know they've made a positive impact on the world.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.QuickQuest: I mean, I made a positive change by coming to the Valley, and I only moved for my own benefit.
I change something about the world everyday I wake up.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.MadDog.Has: ...But there's not anything I can do now. I guess I could re-enlist...$17
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Jodi.24: Teren! You know you're not just a soldier!$2#$b#You have so much more than that to offer the world.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Jodi.26: Oh, or your love of animals.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.QuickQuest: You should run a bake sale for charity!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Jodi.32: A bake sale! You could host a little bake sale here in town and donate the proceeds to a cause you care about!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.Caroline.3: It could be any cause you wanted!$1#$b#And there's no way your desserts wouldn't sell out, after all.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.QuickQuest: And you'd definitely know you were making a positive impact by donating the money.
Any local charity could use a donation these days.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199005.MadDog.Has: Oh boy, I don't know if I could bake that well...$7
Oh boy, I don't know if I could bake that well...$7
Well... I guess I'll uh, take a look at the logistics... and see what I can come up with?$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.QuickQuest: It looks like you were busy!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.Evelyn.05: Oh, Sergeant Barnes. You stop by next week and I'll show you a few secret tricks to make even better cookies!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.MadDog.Has: Aw, thanks, Mrs. Mullner. I'll be there with bells on!$1
I had *no* idea people would buy so much, so quickly.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.Jodi.08: You're a good person with a good cause.#$b#We love coming together for things like this, you know.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.Caroline.0: Abigail already ate her rose cupcakes. She's going to ruin her supper!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.Caroline.1: As soon as she saw you were raising money for animal adoption, she had her entire allowance spent.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.QuickQuest: I thought you'd be doing something for veterans.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.MadDog.Has: Honestly? There's too many causes in the world to pick just one.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.Jodi.15: Teren does so much for veterans already. I like seeing him branch out and help even more!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.Robin.16: Thanks again, Teren! Demetrius and I are taking the night off - pizza for supper and your brownies for dessert!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.MadDog.Has: Glad I could help! Thanks for coming by!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.QuickQuest: You could probably do this on the regular.
Seems like you made some new fans. Too bad this was a one time thing...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.MadDog.Has: It was a lot of work getting permission from {{LewisOrLouise}} for just this little event.$16#$b#But I would like to do it again, I think. Maybe I could benefit a musical education charity next time?$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199006.Penny.21: I wonder which of these cupcakes Mom will pick? They both look great...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Robin.01: You know you can never have too many silos, @.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Caroline.0: We have a new patron for you!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Robin.04: What are you two getting up to now?$1#$b#@, do you mind while I see what my favorite aerobics partners want with me?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.QuickQuest: I'm just browsing anyway, go ahead.
Sure thing, but you better not give them a discount just because they attend the Tuesday workout sessions with you!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Robin.07: What can I do for you?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Caroline.0: Oh no, not for us, but what you can do for your country~
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Jodi.09: Or rather, one of our country's brightest citizens~
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.MadDog.Has: You both are making a fuss -
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Robin.11: Teren, whatever it is, I *can* build it!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.MadDog.Has: I don't even know what it is -
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Jodi.13: A shop! A quaint little shop in East Scarp!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Caroline.1: Specifically, a quaint little *bakery* shop in East Scarp!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Robin.15: Oh, that's delightful! Now, you *do* need some land over there -
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Jodi.16: Already took care of it with Miss Sondra.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Caroline.1: And that scowling nephew of hers. - Oh, sorry Teren!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.QuickQuest: I'm telling Sig you said that, Teren.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Robin.23: Well, if you have the land, then *I* can assemble a bakery! You'll need a nice kitchen and plenty of windows...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Caroline.2: And a counter to serve his customers at!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Jodi.25: And a cozy little space with tables, for any guests who want to enjoy their dessert there!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.QuickQuest: And a jukebox. But we probably have to let Teren pick the music.
And some displays so he can show off the goods.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Jodi.29: And maybe some bakery displays, too?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Caroline.3: And a jukebox so that Teren can play those strange tunes of his.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.MadDog.Has: What if he thinks I'm trying to compete with him?

event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.QuickQuest: I summoned him when you started freaking out.
Did Jodi and Caroline ask you to come by?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Gus.42: I heard we're building a bakery! And I do believe you'll need my expertise for the commercial kitchen part, Robin.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Robin.43: You're absolutely correct! Let's get this bakery concept off the ground!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.MadDog.Has: But - but, Gus, are you sure -$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.Gus.45: Some folks might call it friendly competition, but I'll be calling it befriending my baked goods supplier.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199007.QuickQuest: Sounds like you better think of a name for your bakery soon.
Breakfast at the unnamed bakery, supper at the Stardrop Saloon.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.MadDog.Has: Um... I'm really sorry... Can you...$12
You - you shouldn't get any closer - I'm kind of a mess to look at - $13
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.QuickQuest: Well, yeah, but didn't you and Sig survive a terrible accident during your time in the Army? Of course you'd be scarred up.
I don't *mind* the view, Teren. I've been through my fair share of scrapes and accidents in the mines on my own after all, I know what it's like to get battered up.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.MadDog.Has: Yeah, but I'm kind of just a pretty face, right? So revealing all this - it's like I'm finally found out as some kind of liar...$12
You're absolutely pulling my leg right now.$25#$b#I've seen all this ugliness every morning in the bathroom mirror, I know better.$12#$b#And you're, y'know, *you*. Everyone's favorite @.$22
Look, let me - ah, let me get dressed real quick before we keep talking -$13
Well... sorry you had to see that.$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.QuickQuest: Don't apologize. I'm not going to freak out.
What are you talking about, Teren? I still see you, you didn't vanish just because you put on a shirt.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.MadDog.Has: You can totally freak out, I know it was ugly...$2
I - I meant the - well, the - the big gaping scar...$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.QuickQuest: People get hurt, Teren. You're one of the lucky ones that survived despite what you went through.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.MadDog.Has: Well... I mind. You've heard of the ugly duckling, now get ready for the hideous gander.$2#$b#You know the worst part? This awful scar wasn't even enough to actually remove me from my service.$5#$b#I had to return to Ferngill still enlisted, relegated to desk work, and finished out my last four months while recovering. I could just... go back at anytime, unlike Sig.$17
Somehow I don't *feel* lucky. I used to think if I had nothing else going for me, at least I had my looks, you know? And now...$2
Are you sure... you're not completely horrified like the townsfolk in Beauty and the Beast though? Even a little?$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.QuickQuest: I'm more like the quippy candelabra and clock, Teren. No fear, all wit.
I'm only horrified by your taste in music, Teren.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199008.MadDog.Has: You're the wittiest {{LPJobTitle}} I know, @.$3#$b#You can have a little freak out later if you want to though.$17
Starting to sound like a real Gaston right now, @. Next you'll start hating books.$1#$b#But... you can totally have a little freak out later if you wanted.$17
Something really broke the mold with you, @. Thanks.$20
TerenRomanceEvent.Missed.1: I'm not going to freak out, Teren.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199009.MadDog.Has: You mean you could have re-enlisted this WHOLE {{BearFamProfanityD}} time? Why the {{BearFamProfanityA}} didn't you?$5
Why the {{BearFamProfanityA}} would I? Do you think I wanted to get reassigned to a whole new squad and manage to lose them, too?$5

You wouldn't lose them. It wasn't your fault in the first place, moron.$11#$b#And we're in a ceasefire anyway, you'd be posted up comfortably in the capital, so who the {{BearFamProfanityA}} even cares if you got new subordinates?$5
I care.$2
I'm not some glutton for punishment, Sig. We already spent eight years deployed. You almost died. Some of our friends DID die. I don't ever want to repeat that experience on purpose. Ever.$5
Barnes, listen to me -

The Army might've been some kind of escape for you, but it was just a means to an end for me.$5#$b#That part of my life - *our* lives - is over. And *I'm* never going back. Do whatever you want, but make peace with that fact.$2
...Well, I screwed that up, didn't it?$2
Gee, thanks.
My fault. I should've...
If I could go back in time and prevent the accident -
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199009.QuickQuest: Impossible. So start fixing the present.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199009.MadDog.Has: I *know* that.
Hate it when you use logic.
Aw, {{BearFamProfanityA}}. I'll figure out something. I'll think on it and get a plan and - and apologize to 'im. {{BearFamProfanityD}} it.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199009.QuickQuest: It had better be a good one, Sig.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199009.MadDog.Has: Yeah, I said I was gonna!$5
You're telling me, @.$2
Might come begging for your help, @.$9
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199009.QuickQuest: I can help but it'll cost you.
You're going to need to do the majority of it all if you wanna make things right, you know.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199009.MadDog.Has: That might be the only {{BearFamProfanityD}} thing I'm good for, @.$9
Enough with the lecture, @, you're worse than my Sergeant that just yelled at me and took off, y'know.$11
I'll send ya a letter once I think up something.
TerenFight.NotRH.Missed.1: Hey, you two - stop fighting. Could practically hear you from outside. You're best friends, aren't you?
TerenFight.NotRH.Missed.2: Which is why I'm so pissed off!$5#$b#You had a promising future through the Army, Barnes! You wouldn't be scraping by all the {{BearFamProfanityD}} time, living in some awful apartment in Zuzu -$5#$b#You could have had so much more!$8
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.QuickQuest: Wow, this is a good turn out!
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.MadDog.Has: I really wasn't expecting this many folks to be here...$16
Nearly too busy! Thankfully the ever lovely Jodi and Caroline were here to help me out.$1
I'm so grateful for this opportunity right now... We're partnered with an animal rehab group, a veteran's support group, and a {{LPJobTitle}}'s emergency fund. It's humbling to say the least.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.QuickQuest: Of course you picked an animal group!
Still sticking with your military routes, huh?
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.MadDog.Has: Animals don't even have thumbs, @! How could I *not* support them?$3
What can I say, I guess I'm the type of guy that takes work home... even after I'm retired.$3

I mean, compared to how *you* have helped me and other folks out? Making sure you have support if the worst were to happen at %farm is the least I can do...#$b#And if it helps others like local farmers or whatever, that's also good!$3
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.Missed.4: I don't even know where to begin to describe how I feel right now...$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.Missed.5: I don't even know where to begin with on what charities we chose!$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.Missed.6: You're amazing Teren... I'm glad I was part of this journey.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199010.Missed.7: No, *you're* breathtaking.$3#$b#Seriously, @ - I wouldn't have gotten this far without you - and Jodi and Caroline... so thank you. All of you. You guys are my favorite part of moving to the Valley.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.MadDog.Has: Great, everything's looking good so far! I'm going to make up the next batch of batter while you guys monitor that, alright?
Hey, @! I'm glad you stopped by! If you have time to stick around, you can be our special guest taste tester!$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.QuickQuest: Well, I guess it's not Gun or Sig's cooking...
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.MadDog.Has: Oh for sure! This should be minimally explosive and next to zero percent poisonous.$3
Aww, come on, @!$2#$b#I promise it can't be near as bad Bear cooking and it *is* free!$3
I'm just going to keep on mixin'...$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.QuickQuest: Can't complain! It's practically paradise for me.
Very strenuous, so I thought a break would help.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.MadDog.Has: You're cool and confident, @. That's awesome to hear.$1
Ouch, I'm sorry to hear that! Definitely stay as long as you'd like your break to last.$2#$b#My doors are always open to you.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.QuickQuest: Teren? You should probably help them.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.MadDog.Has: It's fine. They need to learn without someone nitpicking them every step of the way.#$b#Helps build confidence, too. Cakes can sense when you're nervous.$3
Relax, @, I made sure to keep all the weird, scary ingredients out of sight so they can't veer too off course.$3
...Well, better here than at home, right everyone?$3
As a great friend of mine once said, 'anyone can cook'. We'll just try again, okay?$1
Buck up, folks! We've got this!$1#$b#@, you don't need to stick around if you don't want to.$16
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.Message.29: In the end, the cake was lopsided and mysteriously purple, but it was alright.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.Missed.2: Maybe you should stick to being the cook, Teren.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.Missed.3: Maybe some people just aren't meant to cook.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.Missed.4: ...No, no, I want to see how this ends.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16199011.Missed.5: You said I was the special guest taste tester, I'm staying!
event-MadDog.BearFam.TerenFlirtsBackEven: Well, we're both here with ears wide open if you *did* want to complain.
I know it sounds like an empty platitude, but chin up, @. Things will get better, I promise.$2
Ahem, sorry to interrupt, but Teren? Timer's going off.
He's learning a new recipe today.$1
Aw, come on Teren, how bad is it?
Well, it's not like it's the last meal in the Valley, you can try again.
...Yeah, that's kind of what I thought would happen.$7
Well, tell ya what, let me go get something a little stronger to wash it down with. I'll be right back.
Oh, c'mon Gus. It's probably not that bad.
I mean, if it's YOUR cooking I'll try it, Teren. (ROMANTIC)
event-MadDog.BearFam.AcceptTheMeal.Messa: Teren thinks you're being reckless... but is also now aware that you're interested in him.
event-MadDog.BearFam.AcceptTheMeal.MadDo: I am NOT gonna put you through that, @, but I'm delighted to learn you're so brave.$4
event-MadDog.BearFam.AcceptTheMeal.Quick: I feel like I can trust you.
Keep me in mind for any future meals, then.
event-MadDog.BearFam.AcceptTheMeal.MadDo: Aw, @! Y'know, I feel like I can trust you, too.$8
I'm saving all the best things for you.$4
Seriously, thanks for being a good sport. You're one in a million.$1
event-MadDog.BearFam.RejectTheMeal.MadDo: Well that sure is a resounding review, huh? Don't worry @, I won't hold you down and force feed you it.$7
event-MadDog.BearFam.RejectTheMeal.Messa: You decide to leave before Teren changes his mind.
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.1: Yayyy, you made it, @! We're glad you joined us, right Sassy?$1
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.3: I couldn't miss out on time with you, Sassy!
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.4: I couldn't miss out on time with you, Teren!
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.5: Oh, wow, what am I then, chopped liver?$3
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.6: You sweet talker, you. We're going to make Sassy jealous at this rate.$20
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.7: There she goes again, combing the beach.$1
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.1: What'd you find, girl? Bring it to @!$1
Wow, look at that! She found a stone that's ALMOST as dazzling as you are, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$4
What? Noooo. Sassy's really just that smart! Right girl?$16
Psst, you're blowing our cover, Sassy.
MadDog.BearFam.TerenSassyDate.Dialogue.2: Hey, wait, I'm the one who - er, trained her - $16
Staying busy even in this weather, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}? You're very dedicated, it's one of my many favorite things about you on a list of millions.$1
What do you have there? Everything alright?
Lurking around in the rain all by yourself, handsome?
Yeah, just doing some pondering in optimal pondering weather.#$b#This is my... this is the medal I earned for getting wounded in combat.$2
Oh, you know. Sometimes a person's gotta have their big dramatic realizations out in the rain.$3#$b#I was thinking about how important this combat injury medal used to be to me.$2
If you have the time, you know I always adore your company.$4
I used to think that this is what made people tolerate me... They might not have chosen me, but because I was injured, they *had* to accept me.$2
You better not have been thinking that about me!
And I assume your pondering has made you realize the truth?
There's no such as 'toleration' of you.
...I feel that way sometimes too - that people tolerate me because I'm helpful.
MadDog.BearFam.TerenWorthyDate.Route1.Di: Right? Because - because that's not kind of me, to think something so mean of you.$2#$b#I love you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, why would I ever think you'd be cruel?
It's been a long hard road to understand that - that I was doing you - and anyone else - a disservice.$2#$b#But I'm going to do better, because that's the kind of good you deserve.$4
You deserve good, too. And you deserve to feel like people what you around. *I* want you around, especially.
You better do better! I like you exactly as you are, the kind man with the cute dog, that sees the good in everyone, including me.
How luck for both of us - I want to be around *you*.$4
Why @! I think you only like me for Sassy.$20
All jokes aside.... Thank you for being patient, @. I don't think there's enough adjectives in the world to describe you.$8
%Teren wraps an arm around you. He's warm despite the rain.#$b#I should probably get you - and me - out of this rain before it gets nasty, huh?$4
%Teren wraps an arm around you. He's warm despite the rain.#$b#@, you are astounding, astonishing, amazing, attractive, astronomically out of my league...$20
MadDog.BearFam.TerenWorthyDate.Route2.Di: You're so smart {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. It has!$1#$b#No one asks to see my medal, y'know? I put a lot of my expectations and hopes on it because I told myself it was what I'd been reduced to, but that's not true.
I never even knew about your medal when I met you, and I still fell for you.
I like shiny things, but I'd marry you with paper rings~
Was it my boyish charm? My obsession with animals? My baking?$1
Did you just sing a T-Swift song at me? I *adore* you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$1
I want to be the truest version of me - for myself and for you.$8#$b#And that means not letting myself get boxed in by physical things. ...Well, unless it's you. You can totally box me.$1
...Like in a fight? I'll totally wipe the floor with you.
Oh yeah? Get closer so I can box you - up in my arms.
%Teren shifts close enough that you can feel how damp his clothes are from the rain.#$b#Confidence is SO cute on you, you're my favorite.$20
%Teren shifts close enough that you can feel how damp his clothes are from the rain.#$b#You keep sweet talking me like that and I'm going to follow you home and drip all over your floor.$20
MadDog.BearFam.TerenWorthyDate.Route3.Di: Ooof. Cutting a little too deep with the honesty there, @ -$16
I didn't mean it like that!
You jokester. I meant people MORE than tolerate you.
I know I know! I just gotta tease you a little, it's my job!$1#$b#Especially when I make you sit out in the rain with me like this. Gotta do something right by you, right?
Well, that's nice of people, and I've gotten a lot better at believing it these days...#$b#But more importantly, do YOU more than tolerate me? @, do you like me?$20
Okay, okay, I'll stop my stand-up routine before you decide to push me off the bridge.$1#$b#...I, I *do* like hearing that. I'm working hard on the self-esteem thing, but the boost helps.$4
I might still push you off the bridge. It won't help your self-esteem, but it won't hurt it, either.

%Teren covers his mouth to stifle a laugh, moving his free arm to wrap around you and drip rain water on you.#$b#I love you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. You make me laugh like no other - I think you're my rainbow that hits after every storm.$4

%Teren wraps his arm around you, rain water dripping off his hair all over you shoulder.#$b#I love you, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. You are the feeling when the sunlight breaks through storm clouds - hope and relief and joy all in one.$4
MadDog.BearFam.TerenWorthyDate.Route4.Di: That will forever blow my mind. You're the stuff of folk legends, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, you breathed life and heart back into a small town.#$b#Everyone I talk to speaks of you with admiration and affection... and *you* chose me?$8
What, like it's a hard choice?
You... gossip about how much you like me behind my back?

There's lots of wonderful people out there and somehow they don't turn your head but I do?$8#$b#Yeah, it seems like a hard choice... For me it was easy - there's no one like you in the world so it was easy and joyful to fall for you.$4

I do! We all do!$1#$b#'@ ran this errand for me, I was feeling bad then @ stopped to chat with me, I heard that @ accomplished this'.#$b#These are all things I get to hear - all about you, the one I love - all the time - and it's no wonder that I'm so in love with you.$4
%Teren gently nudges you before pulling you against his side.#$b#You're the embodiment of warmth, @. I'm... really happy you share you warmth with me.$4
You're only saying that right now because we're sitting out in the rain.
Your presence warms me too, so we'll call it even.
%Teren laughs.#$b#I guess we should get out of this storm before it tries to wash our warmth away, then.$1
It could never in a million years.
MadDog.BearFam.TerenWorthyDate.Route5.Di: It's... tough, right? That feeling builds and builds in your stomach, gets tangled up in your throat when you try to speak out - keeps you up at night, tossing and turning.$2

But, as someone who feels that way a lot, I can tell you the same stuff I tell me - that's not true.#$b#That's not how people are. That's not how your friends and loved ones are.#$b#None of them stop at 'tolerate' you, we all choose you and adore you and love you and get excited because we're alive at the same time you are - You're our @. ...You're my @.$4
But what if those feelings exist because I've already done so much to help people?
I *am* yours. And you're my Teren. We'll both work on this self-esteem issue together, huh?
Relationships evolve, @. And that's a good thing. Step one may seem 'transactional' in hindsight...#$b#But step two and beyond was me - and everyone else - keeping you in our lives on purpose.$8
I *am* your Teren. It's a title I bear happily and proudly.$20#$b#And... I'd like that, working through and overcoming these troubled thoughts together...$8
%Teren wraps an arm around your shoulders for a tight hug.#$b#No matter what, remember that you're far more than 'helpful' to all of us. You're @, and you're perfect.$4
MadDog.BearFam.TerenWorthyDate.End.Dialo: Teren takes his medal out again.
I don't need it. I've got Sassy, and Big Bear. Jodi and Caroline. And most important of all, I've got you.$4#$b#I belong here, as I am. No bells, whistles, or medals needed.
I love you too, @.$8#$b#...Now how about I go find that medal and put it away *properly*, before someone finds out I littered?$16

Well. Hopefully that's not a habit you keep when you move in. (Propose to Teren)

Wait, when I move in!?$8#$b#@, do you mean it? Yes! I would love to marry you!$4
Well, we could share each other like an island... for the rest of our lives. @, will you marry me?$4
We're going to get MARRIED~ This is the happiest day of my life!$4#$b#Excluding the fire.$16
Surprisingly, the jukebox was fine despite Teren's fire-causing attempt to hijack it for his emo tunes.

MadDog.BearFam.MarriedTerenDateMysteryBo: Come on out little guy...
Don't be shy...
I'm friendly...
...Teren, are you talking to a cardboard box?
Hi Teren! What *are* you up to?
{{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}! It's not what it looks like! - I mean, it *is*. I am. Well, I -$16
{{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}! I'm so happy to see you! You've got a way with scared little animals, right?$1

*gulp!*

{{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}! What was that sound!$25

{{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}!

I don't want the medals. It's - not right, Teren.$5

This whole thing made Sig really mad.
event-MadDog.BearFam.16191004.vRH.MadDog: Because he was a {{BearFamProfanityD}} good soldier. Spent a lot of effort to learn about Gotoro customs and languages, became a real asset when it came to negotiations.$17
He was by all accounts I've heard an excellent soldier, until the accident...$2
The accident took a lot from us. Good friends, Sig's career...$2#$b#But... it didn't take *him*, and that's something worth celebrating, to me at least.$17
Ever since the Army doctors determined he was unfit for service, Sig's been upset.$2
My dear nephew really had his heart set on being a career soldier... He genuinely loved being in Gotoro, spoke the language, partook in the culture norms there...$2

But when the road collapsed under us... well, things changed a lot. And Sig's been understandably upset ever since.$17#$b#I remind myself it could've been worse - could've lost him too - but he doesn't view things like I do...$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16191004.vRH.QuickQ: The accident was really that bad?
I don't think you'll be able to give him his medals.

And I'm grateful every day that you two did.$2

Y'know @, I'm afraid you might be right. Big Bear and I went through a lot that day, but he's... he's still carrying the weight of it.$2#$b#The only thing that helped me through it was knowing he came home with me. If I have Big Bear, I'm alright, y'know?$17
I'll never stop being grateful you two came home, but my dear nephew still hurts from it all...$2
event-MadDog.BearFam.16191004.vRH.Messag: Life can change in an instant but those changes have lasting effects sometimes. This seems to be one of those cases.

Do you think I ever want to go back without you?$5

Well, too bad, I did it and I'll keep doing it. You don't get to decide what I need.$2

The only person I wanted to be is yours, Sig. We were deployed for eight years and I almost lost you forever. I'm never going to not have nightmares about that day.$2.#$b#And I sure as {{BearFamProfanityA}} wouldn't re-enlist and put you through that same terror -$5
Teren, listen to me -

I love you, Sig. Always have.$17#$b#I know the Army was your great escape, but the only great thing it did for me is introduce me to you. So I'm happy to be out and I'm happy never going back. ...I just want you to be happy about it, too.$2

MadDog.Kraken.Wise.1: We can’t become who we are by remaining what we are.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.2: Remember that some things must come to an end in order for better things to begin.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.3: The past version of you is so proud of how far you've come.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.4: Perhaps we feel empty because we leave traces of ourselves in everything we once cherished.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.5: Everything is better with you. Everything has been better since you came.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.6: This is only a portion of your tale; it is not the entire story.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.7: It is the courage to continue that counts.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.8: What you seek is seeking you.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.9: I am what I am. And only that. At all times.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.10: If trying hard doesn’t work, try softer.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.11: Stop touching the wound to allow it to heal.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.12: Perfection is found in accepting one's imperfections.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.13: Not every day is a good day, and it’s okay to have a rough day.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.14: Anything is possible if you’ve got enough nerve.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.15: Be the kind of person you’d like to meet.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.16: Life is too short to be anything but happy. Choose joy.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.17: The question isn’t who is going to let you; it’s who is going to stop you.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.18: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.19: None of us are getting out of here alive, so do not live like an afterthought.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.20: Be led by the dreams in your heart.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.21: You are an original. You have your own voice. Speak. You will be heard.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.22: There would be no rainbows without both sunshine and rain.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.23: Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget who you are.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.24: If you can't get a miracle, become one.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.25: You were not born on earth to please anyone.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.26: Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.27: Sometimes we simply have to remind the world that we're special and that we're still here.
MadDog.Kraken.Wise.28: It is not needful for our dreams to be very grand nor very big. It is only needful for our dreams to be very shiny.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.1: Did you hear about the red and blue ships that collided? All the sailors were marooned.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.2: Where do surfers learn to surf? At boarding school.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.3: What did the ocean say to the shore? Nothing, it just waved!
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.4: Keep your friends close and your anemones closer.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.5: Where do clams go to borrow money? The prawn broker.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.6: What kind of sharks do you find at a construction site? Hammerheads!
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.7: What kind of music does a boulder like? Rock ‘n’ roll.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.8: What did the shovel say to the sand? “I really dig you!”
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.9: What would happen if you threw all the books in the ocean? It would cause a title wave.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.10: What’s the best kind of music to listen to when fishing? Something catchy.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.11: How did the pirate get his ship for so cheap? It was on sail.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.12: What do you call a fish with no eyes? A fsh.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.13: Where do fish keep their money? In a river bank.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.14: Why did the lobster blush? Because it saw the ocean's bottom!
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.15: What do you call 26 letters that went for a swim? Alphawetical.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.16: Why is cold water so insecure? Because it’s never called hot.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.17: Justice is a dish best served cold. If it were served warm, it would be just-water.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.18: Two goldfish are in a tank. One says to the other, “Do you know how to drive this thing?”
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.19: RIP boiled water—you will be mist.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.20: What do you call two octopuses that look the same? Itenticle.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.21: Did you hear about the aquatic sea mammals that escaped from the zoo? It was otter chaos.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.22: What is the most popular fish in the ocean? A starfish.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.23: My wife asked me to sync her phone, so I threw it into the ocean.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.24: How do you make holy water? You boil the {{BearFamProfanityA}} out of it.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.25: Why do dogs float in water? Because they are good buoys.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.26: Police arrested a bottle of water because it was wanted in three different states: solid, liquid, and gas.
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.27: What do you call a scuba diving cow? A “moo-rine” biologist!
MadDog.Kraken.Funny.28: What is a shark’s favorite sandwich? Peanut butter and jellyfish.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.1: The carnivorous Humboldt squid rapidly flashes red and white when captured, inspiring fisherman to call them 'red devil'.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.2: The largest world catch of the Patagonian longfin squid was 42,505 tons of squid.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.3: Larger specimens of the longfin inshore squid have been observed to exhibit cannibalism.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.4: Neon flying squid have 9 to 27 suckers on their ventral sucker series and 10 to 25 suckers on their dorsal sucker series.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.5: The orangeback flying squid only live for less than a year, with the females lasting roughly two months longer than males.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.6: Pacific flying squid females tend to deposit their eggs in the same location where they themselves were born.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.7: Most vampire squid live 3,000 feet below the surface of cold water areas.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.8: The colossal squid fight sperm whales for survival as sperm whales are currently their only known predator.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.9: Giant squid have eyes as large as basketballs!
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.10: The sepiolid squid is less than one inch long and weighs less than a quarter of an ounce.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.11: Sharks, whales, and seals all enjoy eating shiny bird squid.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.12: The Big Fin Squid species has ten arms while all of the others only feature eight of them.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.13: The magister armhook squid is also known as the commander squid and the schoolmaster squid.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.14: The Dana octopus squid can emit blinding flashes of light from photophores on its arms for combat or for courtship.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.15: The roundear enope squid is a type of fire squid and can use 'counter-illumination', which is when they break up their silhouette with light from photophores for camoflage.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.16: Firefly squid show rare evidence of cephalopod monogamy in their reproductive cycle.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.17: Southern bottletail squid are able to produce slime when threatened.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.18: The little post horn squid also known as the ram's horn squid or the tail light squid is the only extant member of the genus Spirula.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.19: Pygmy squids are are sit-and-wait predators only and grow up to 0.8 inches in mantle width.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.20: The umbrella squid is a type of cock-eyed squid, meaning it's eyes are not symmetrical.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.21: Joubin's squid has six arms longer than even it's two tentacles, all the better for reaching out and grabbing it's unaware prey.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.22: The two-toned pygmy squid weighs 0.00033 grams upon hatching.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.23: The eyeflash squid undergoes a daily vertical migration from deep waters to near the surface.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.24: Crown coleoids, the common ancestor of octopi and squid, likely diverged in the late Paleozoic era.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.25: Squid are believed to be the fastest of all invertebrates in the world.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.26: Some species of squid have been found to live more than 13,000 feet deep in the water.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.27: Squids have three hearts to hold lots of love.
MadDog.Kraken.SquidFact.28: Squids move through the water tail first instead of head first.

MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CopperBomberJacket: A jacket with a copper weave, that smells vaguely explosive.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CowboyBlue.Descrip: This armored poncho is perfect for going through the desert, regardless of the name status of the horse you're riding.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.PotioneerVest.Desc: A sturdy armor-lined vest with many pockets, great for stashing away as many consumables in the event of emergencies.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GathererKnapsack.D: A lightweight backpack made of enhanced iron weave, this won't make you overencumbered.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.BanditBlue.Descrip: A durable, rugged shirt and bandana for an anti-hero caught up in doing the right thing.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.AdventuringKit.Des: This bag is heavy enough to be a weapon on it's own! Perfect for those close calls in the midst of adventure.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.PrismaticMoon.Desc: A shirt printed to resemble a bright night sky.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.PrismaticFlower.De: A pretty flowered shirt that's perfect for every occasion.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.ZuzuNights.Descrip: A souvenir Zuzu City shirt, highlighting the city's vibrant night life scene.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.ZuzuVarsity.Descri: A varsity jacket for Zuzu City University, emblazoned with the institute's logo on the back.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.PrismaticFish.Desc: A souvenir shirt from Zuzu City University's Department of Marine Science. A must-have for any fish appreciator!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Regen_WeakRingI.De: With some knowledge comes some power. Gunnar forged this health ring after much trial and error.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Regen_WeakRingII.D: With a little more knowledge, comes a different power. Gunnar forged this energy ring after new trials and new errors.
Gunnar still isn't too sure what he's doing, but this ring is for health AND energy.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Mjolnir.Descriptio: A replica of Thor's mythical hammer, lightning not included. Sig prefers an axe but a hammer will do in a pinch.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.MilitaryRapier.Des: A Ferngill Republic Army standard issue rapier. Teren thinks wearing the rapier made him look dashing.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.BusterSword.Descri: A cosplay accurate imitation buster sword. Gunnar has almost mastered spinning it around above his head like Cloud Strife.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FishStick.Descript: A wooden bat carved in the shape of a fish. Good for bonking big brothers and/or unwary fishermen. Gudrun really excelled when she took wood-shop back in the city.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.KitchenCleaver.Des: It's an ordinary kitchen cleaver. Sondra keeps her kitchen tidy and organized and that includes sharpening the knives.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Dar: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice dark hue for those dreary melancholic days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Gre: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice green hue for those verdantly lush days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Blu: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice blue hue for those full-of-sky-high-vibes days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Pur: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice purple hue for those mystically mundane days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Red: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice red hue for those apple-pickin' days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Tea: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice teal hue for those cool minty fresh days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Pin: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice pink hue for those vividly hot days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Yel: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery. In a nice yellow hue for those bumblebees and sunshine days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Dar: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice dark hue for those dreary melancholic days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Gre: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice green hue for those verdantly lush days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Blu: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice blue hue for those full-of-sky-high-vibes days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Pur: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice purple hue for those mystically mundane days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Red: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice red hue for those apple-pickin' days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Tea: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice teal hue for those cool minty fresh days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Pin: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice pink hue for those vividly hot days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.CaritasFlannel.Yel: The 'work uniform' of Caritas Bakery over a cropped tee shirt. In a nice yellow hue for those bumblebees and sunshine days. All proceeds go to charity.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.BearFamilyKeyChain: A souvenir keychain the Bears picked up for you on their last family vacation. It has your name engraved on the back of it in your favorite color.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Chakram.BearTraini: A set of simple, worn chakrams that's trying it's best.
Legend has it these chakrams can only be put away after taking a life.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Chakram.Gramr.Desc: Sigurd's legendary chakrams. No, not Sig's.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Chakram.Ulfberht.D: Gunnar's first chakrams to be sold by Marlon, if he sold chakrams in the first place.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Chakram.Tentacular: Chakrams made from a gift from the Kraken. Slimy, salty, and sulphuric!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.PeachJoja.Descript: Not a proper serving of fruits, for the record.
MadDog.HashTagBearfam.PumpkinJoja.Descri: Let's see you do better in the army, with only a pumpkin and a cola.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.HoneyWheatBread.De: A pretty basic bread but the hint of honey makes it pretty darn tasty.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.SesameBrownBread.D: One slice of this and you feel like you could march for hours!.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.CornbreadMuffins.D: Fluffy and light and they smell like heaven!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RoseCupcakes.Descr: How much practice does it take to swirl frosting into such delicate roses?
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.BananaBread.Descri: Finally, all those old bananas have been given new life!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TTBrownies.Descrip: Salted caramel? And cheesecake filling? In the same brownie? You may need to sit down for this one.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RoseysLatkes.Descr: Rosey's homemade latkes, piled high with plenty of sour cream and apple sauce. Who is Rosey? Teren'll never tell.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Cookies: Made of crushed chocolate cookies and handwhipped cream!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Apricot: Apricots are nature’s way of saying, 'Here’s a little burst of sunshine for you.'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Decaden: Cheesecake is the answer, no matter what the question is.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.ZuzuPre: Official Stadium Snack of the Zuzu City Tunnelers!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Hazelnu: Don’t judge a croissant by its shape, it’s what’s inside that counts.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Caramel: You're sure to have a flan-tastic day with this treat!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.RedVelv: Indulge in a little red velvet therapy.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.CherryL: Don’t cherry-pick your friends or your sweets – embrace them all!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Pomegra: Don't take this eclair for pome-granted.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.PDFruit: A Zuzu twist on the quintessential Port Drake fruit scone.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Butterm: A crescent roll in the hand is worth two on the bakery shelf.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.SpringM: Spring has sprung and the macarons are done!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.SummerC: The lesser known older sibling of the cake pop. Hangs out by the pool a lot.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.WinterG: No, not the buttons. Not my gumdrop buttons.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.AutumnP: Carve a pumpkin, frost a pumpkin, regardless, you can count on pumpkins being around.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.HeartHe: Heart shaped and healthy! Gluten free, nut free, dairy free, and egg free! The secret is applesauce and stress-baking at 4 AM.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.PlumRic: A sweet rice dessert with just enough fruit filling to make you feel like you actually listen to Harvey about eating healthier at your annual check up.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenMakes.Mushroo: No, no that kind of steak! A grill mushroom sandwich between two potato patties - potatties, if you will - with a sweet and almost spicy green tomato relish.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenMakes.PeachyL: The 'an average bear eats three peaches a day' factoid is just statistical error. Peaches Sig who lives in East Scarp and eats over ten thousand peaches a day is an outlier adn should not have be counted.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenMakes.TooMuch: Local man quoted as saying "there's no such thing as too much fruit" moments before blender exploded all over his best friend's auntie's kitchen. Tastes good though.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenMakes.TomatoC: A comforting soup with all the right notes of sweet, sour, and savory! Best of all, it's dairy free.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenMakes.JerkVeg: A hardy heaping of veggies in a spicy sauce served with a sweet pineapple salsa along with rice.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenMakes.GarlicS: Squash noodles - squoodles - tossed in a garlic sauce that's sure to ward off vampires for days.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenMakes.VeggieS: Tired of carnivores having all the fun of eating food off little wooden sticks?
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Blueber: With a blend of rice and potato flour and packed with fresh blueberries, this somewhat lump-shaped cake is delightfully moist while being nut-free, gluten free, and vegan to boot.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenBakes.Caramel: A orange-y caramelly roll that melts in your mouth, perfect to pair with a hot cup of coffee.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Eli_Cookie.Descrip: A allergen-safe vanilla flavored crispy cookie perfect for dipping in coffee or tea. Frosted like a dust sprite for extra fun! Named and made for Teren's good friend.
A allergen-safe vanilla flavored crispy cookie perfect for dipping in coffee or tea. Frosted like Soot for extra fun! Named and made for Teren's favorite, Eli.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Dylan_Tea.Descript: A gigantic (see also: Bear sized) mug of allergen-safe spearmint tea made through dubious methods (see also: microwave). Great for soldiers and scholars in desperate need of a break.

A gigantic (see also: Bear sized) mug of allergen-safe spearmint tea made through dubious methods (see also: microwave; don't tell Dylan). Great for soldiers and scholars in desperate need of a break.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.Great: 'I'll be going now. I'll come back when it's all over.'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.Angel: 'Keep it in the back of your mind. Call on us whenever you need to. We'll be waiting.'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.Tides: 'Call me old-fashioned, but I was hoping for a treasure whose worth we could measure.'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.FreeE: 'You don't need a reason to help people.'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.Fanta: 'So, if there's nothing here that can make you forget about your friends... then we have nothing to be scared of! Let's go!'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.Digit: 'Embrace your dreams. If you want to be a hero, you need to have dreams.'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.Glaiv: 'I've served as your Shield through thick and thin. No matter what, I've got your back - now and always!'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.RegenPotions.Nords: 'I am simply myself. No more and no less. And I want only to be free.'
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeachCobble: A peach cobbler made with fresh Fersken peaches, the way to a Bear's heart.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.SlicedPeaches.Desc: Fresh sliced Fersken peaches, drizzled with a simple sweet syrup.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeach.Descr: A plump fuzzy fruit from the Nors region.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeachSaplin: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Fersken Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer and fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
A bright, fruity mead, brought to you courtesy of the Bear Lodge beehives. Drink in moderation.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeach_Honey: A fruited honey made thanks to Sig's lovingly cared for therapy bees.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeach_Mead_: A heavy tankard of peachy mead, just like they used to enjoy in the feasting halls back in the days of yore. Drink in moderation.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.HoneyCakes.Descrip: A slice of crumbly honey cake with a blueberry filling. It's just the right snack to satisfy a Bear or a {{LPJobTitle}}.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Teren_Book.Descrip: Teren's recipe book, battered and held together with duct tape. Is that a bullet hole?
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.KingoftheForest_Wh: The moose is the king of the forest according to Nors legend. And this is the whiskey of the king.
MadDog.Teren_BookReject: Doesn't that belong to Teren? He probably needs that cook book.
MadDog.KingoftheForest_WhiskeyReject: Wasn't this Sig's expensive order? He's probably wondering where it is.
GiftsTerenGiftReactionMadDogTerenBook: Wait - my cookbook! Oh, thanks @! I appreciate it!$1
GiftsSigurdGiftReactionMadDogKotFWhiskey: Probably ought to save this for Teren, huh?$18
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeach_Poten: A fruited mead that's way more potent than anything else in town. Drink it if you dare, but you'll need to sleep this one off.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.BearCrow.Descripti: It's a scare-bear wearing a hat. Or is it a bear-crow? Well, whatever it is, it prevents crows from attacking your crops. It has a limited radius of about 8 tiles.
MadDog.BearFam_VikingHelmet.Description: A helm Gunnar modeled after old family photos. He thinks it's cool. Don't tell him otherwise, you'd break his heart.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Kraken_WarpTotem.D: A totem that will bring you to the Kraken's lair. Make sure you say hi to the Kraken.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeach_Ginge: A Fersken peach and ginger flavored non-alcoholic drink.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.StoneBrambleBerry_: A stone bramble berry and ginger flavored non-alcoholic drink.
A slightly acidic berry from a prickly bramble bush, this berry goes great with sugar, honey, milk, and other berries.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.StoneBrambleBerryS: Grown in Spring and Summer. Takes thirteen days, regrows in three.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.StoneBrambleJam.De: Whoa, Black Betty. A delicious jam made of stone bramble berries and blackberries.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.BrambleBerryPie.De: A piping hot pie made from stone bramble berries and blackberries.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.DronningMaud.Descr: A dessert made of cream, kogel mogel, and chocolate, named after Queen Maud of Nors.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.JojaFloat.Descript: An ice cream float made with Joja Cola - perfectly refreshing on a hot summer's day!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Zuzu_Mule.Descript: A favorite cocktail of storytellers, made from fiery ginger beer, fresh lime juice, and vodka, served in an iconic copper mug. Don't forget the splash of love. Drink in moderation.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Honey_OldFashioned: A new twist on a classic, made with bourbon or rye whiskey, bitters, and honey instead of simple syrup. Garnish with orange peel and a cherry. Drink in moderation.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Citrus_City_Gin_So: A sweet and handsome cocktail made with gin, egg white, and lemon juice, garnished with the bartender's choice of citrus fruit. Drink in moderation.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Raspberry_Flavored: A freshly brewed coffee with one pump of sugar free raspberry syrup. Energizing!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Blueberry_Flavored: A freshly brewed coffee with one pump of blueberry syrup. Invigorating!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Caramel_Flavored_C: A freshly brewed coffee with one pump of sugar free caramel syrup. Vitalizing!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.Chocolate_Flavored: A freshly brewed coffee with one pump of chocolate syrup. Electrifying!
RobinLikeFPPotentMead: Oh thanks, I use it to strip varnish and paint. It really comes in handy!$1
Wizard.AboutGunnarPotions: Oh? One of young Gunnar Bear's recipes? Thank you - I'm sure this is bound to be insightful in ways I can't yet predict.
BearFam.Gifts.Jodi: You can never have enough cook books! Thank you, @~$1
BearFam.Gifts.Caroline: Oh, why thank you! I love trying to get new meal ideas that both Pierre and Abby will enjoy. This should help.
BearFam.Gifts.Gus: No chef worth a lick of salt would turn down more cook books. Inspiration can come from anywhere! Thanks.
BearFam.Gifts.Demetrius: Some of these are really intriguing... and others make me worry over Gunnar's safety. Thanks, @.$1
Marlon.AboutGunnarPotions: Ahh, I see Gun's convinced his concoctions are safe. Thank ye.
Lance.AboutGunnarPotions: Oh I've *heard* stories about Gunnar's potions 'brewing' and the resulting explosions. I'm excited to see what this one does.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TerenRecipes.Descr: A recipe book that will teach you all of Teren's best recipes.
MadDogBearfamTerenRecipesLearned: You've learned all 6 of Teren's family recipes!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.BearRecipes.Descri: This recipe book includes four top secret Bear family recipes.
MadDogBearfamBearRecipesLearned: You've learned 4 recipes from the Bear family!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.GunnarRecipes.Desc: Gunnar's potion notes for his various concoctions.
MadDogBearfamGunnarRecipesLearned: You can now brew all 6 of Gunnar's other potions!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.SondraRecipes.Desc: Sondra's recipes for her seasonal snacks she uses to soothe wild Bears.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161971.Title: Teren's Missing Recipe Book
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161971.Description: Teren dropped his recipe book. He knows he had it when he was looking around the East Scarp beach.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161971.Response: You're my favorite person in the world! Thank you so much for finding this, some of these recipes I only ever wrote down during deployment!$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161972.Title: Sig Needs a Favor
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161972.Description: Sig and Teren got into a huge argument and now Sig wants to make it up to Teren. He says he ordered an expensive whiskey from Gus that he knows will get him back in Teren's good graces.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161972.Todo: Pick up the whiskey from the Saloon.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161972.Response: Thanks for running there and back for me on this one - hope it wasn't cutting into your day too much. Hopefully Teren will talk to me now that I'm armed with this.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161973.Title: Crab Concerns
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161973.Description: Sondra's worried about the local rock crab population. If you slay some, it will put her mind at ease.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161973.Response: I apologize for making you do all that dirty work but I appreciate you making the Valley safer for all of us. You're simply the best, @.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161974.Title: An Explosive Request
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161974.Description: Gunnar wants a piece of explosive ammo for 'reasons'. He refused to say much more about it.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161974.Todo: Bring Gunnar an explosive ammo round.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161974.Response: Oh, hey, this will be perfect! It's still live, right? Great, great, that's exactly what I was hoping for.$19
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161975.Title: Teenager Seeks Pumpkins
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161975.Description: Gudrun wants to carve pumpkins with her family. She's willing to pay a premium price.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161975.Response: YAYYYY! Time for a pumpkin carving party! Thank you SO much!$3
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161976.Title: Crack Open A Cold One With A Boy
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161976.Description: Teren wants to reciprocate and apologize to Sig. Bring him some beer.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.161976.Response: Thanks @! We'll knock these back and make up, just like we always do!$3
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP1: Sassy licks you. She cocks her head to the side as if she wasn't expecting you to taste like dirt. She's not mad though, just disappointed.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP2: Sassy's tail thumps loudly when she sees you.#$b#SYou're pretty sure they can hear it in Grampleton.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP3: AWOOOOO! AWOOO*OOOOOOOOO*!#$b#She's a loud gal just singing a song. You wonder if it's an emo song like her owner prefers to listen to.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP4: As you look into Sassy's sweet brown eyes, you wonder how many light switches she's turned off today.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP5: Sassy is looking for Teren. She whines expectantly as if that will make him magically appear at her side.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP6: Sassy just had a bath today. She didn't like it and she's obviously plotting to roll into the first mud puddle she can find.#$b#Thus the cycle begins anew.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP7: Sassy looks so confused right now. Is it something you said?$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP8: Sassy barks at you once and looks so surprised at her own volume that she forgets to bark again.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP9: There's a mangled chew toy at Sassy's paws but she's trying not to think about that right now.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP10: Sassy looks ready to cause trouble on purpose.#$b#You almost pity Teren.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP11: Now that you take a closer look, you're pretty sure that's a band logo on Sassy's collar. Her favorite or Teren's?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP12: Sassy goes to jump up on you but stops, muddy paws hanging in the air for a minute.#$b#That's awfully polite of her.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP13: Nosing at your backpack, Sassy wants to know if you brought her any treats.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP14: One moment, you're scratching Sassy behind her ear.#$b#The next, she's untied your shoes with her paw.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP15: You ask Sassy if she's a clever girl and her eyes light up with mischief.#$b#Oops. She's definitely going to lock someone out of the house tonight.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP16: Sassy's tongue lolls out as she pants happily, another day of crime under her collar.#$b#She probably flushed the toilet while Teren was still in the shower again.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP17: Is Sassy trying to herd you?$1#$b#You're not a sheep!
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP18: A well-gnawed bone lays at Sassy's paws. When she spots you looking at it, she narrows her eyes in suspicion.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP19: There's a butterfly perched perfectly on Sassy's nose.$1#$b#She doesn't seem to mind her new friend.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP20: There's a ladybug perched perfectly on Sassy's forehead.$1#$b#She doesn't seem to mind her new friend.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP21: There's a bumblebee perched perfectly on top of Sassy's head.$1#$b#She doesn't seem to mind her new friend.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP22: Sassy is staring intently at nothing. She seems pretty offended by her new ghost friend.$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP23: Is it you or does Sassy's bark sound like she's calling for Teren by name?$1
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP24: Sassy paws at the spot in front of you and waits expectantly for a treat.$1#$b#You're not sure if you should trust her though.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP25: There's a rolled up newspaper covered in dog drool in Sassy's mouth.#$b#Sig will probably want that back at some point.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP26: Sassy has her paw stuffed into a catfish shaped slipper.#$b#Where did Gudrun even FIND catfish shaped slippers?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP27: Sondra has tied a bow to Sassy's collar.#$b#It looks lovely on her and she preens when you notice it.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SassydiaMEEP28: Upon closer inspection, Sassy appears to have made off with someone's house-keys.#$b#Probably Gunnar's.
SondraBattleoftheBandsFoodTitle: Battle of the Bands Food Drive!
SondraBattleoftheBandsFoodWords: Gather the listed ingredients and drop them off in Sondra's insulated storage chest.
SondraBattleoftheBandsMaterialTitle: Battle of the Bands Supply Drive!
SondraBattleoftheBandsMaterialWords: Gather the listed supplies and drop them off in Sondra's reinforced storage chest.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_SondraThemeTitle: A Song for Sondra, From Your Wulfram
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_SondraThemeSamVers: A Song for Sondra, From Your Friends
MadDog.HashtagBearFam_BotBSongBTitle: Chillwave Lo-fi Beats to Visit the Valley To

MadDogBearfamPeachTree: Is that Sig, holding an axe, standing just out of view? Maybe you shouldn't cut his tree down.
MEEPSigArmyPhoto: Sig has this photo tucked under his bed. It looks like it's a very young Sig and Teren, when they first joined the Ferngill Republic Army.
MEEPFridgePhoto: On the side of the fridge is a postcard from the Ferngill Zoo. On the back it says 'Xiao, thank you for every kind word along the way!' very excitedly.
MEEPSondraListSig: For Sigurd's birthday, I should get him some fresh peaches or maybe a new battery for his hearing aid... Or if he wants to have a more casual celebration, maybe a cold Joja cola or a beer?
MEEPSondraListGunnar: Hm, Gunnar's a little hard to shop for, he's just fine with getting himself anything he wants... I could get him a nice collectible dwarvish helm or an ancient sword... Or some bait so he can have fun fishing and take a nice little break on his birthday!
MEEPSondraListGudrun: I'll have to make sure to pick out Gudrun's birthday gift and Winter Star gift at the same time so I don't accidentally duplicate them. She might like a pretty rainbow shell or ocean stone this year... Or get her a gift card for a triple shot espresso?
MEEPSondraListTeren: Oh, I know Teren would want something sweet made from scratch for his upcoming birthday but should it be a chocolate cake or a dozen cookies? Of course, I'm sure he'd be delighted with some fresh poppies, too... Too many choices!
YouFoundTheWarpOut: Use in case of emergency! (Trapped in room.)
MadDogStolenWood: You rummage around and snatch some wood. That's a little weird, but you do you. Enjoy the splinter.
MadDogStolenPotion: Was rifling through Gunnar's things worth getting cut by broken glass this time?
MadDog.BrambleBushAttack: Ow! Those brambles sure are pokey!
MadDog.BrambleBushAttack2: Why did you do that? There's no berries in sight.
FreeCookie: Oh, a free cookie. Freshly made! Who is it for though? Well, it's yours now.
FreeCuppaTea: A cup of tea, still hot from the... microwave? Well, you get what you pay for.
FreeBooze: Oh, someone's secret alcohol, stashed away for the weekend! Well, finders, keepers, right?
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GunnarsPendant.Des: The mermaid pendant Gunnar made for you. It reminds you of his eyes.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Hette: The infamous Hettergloss Caverns run coast to coast deep beneath Gotoro, ever-tempting would-be explorers to their doom. 1 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Carne: Carnegiea Desert is filled with towering saguaros reaching up to forty to sixty feet tall. 2 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Giant: This forest contains trees over eight thousand years old! 3 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Sequo: Autumn in Sequoiadendron Forest is a beautiful sight for leaf watchers. 4 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Molte: With wheat fields rippling in the wind as far as the eye can see, it's no wonder these are said to resemble an sea of molten gold. 5 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Elysi: A point of pride for the locals in the area, Elysium Castle is a trove of archaeological discoveries. 6 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Marip: The Mariposa Nature Preserve holds over twelve hundred species of butterflies, along with countless mammals, fish, reptiles, and birds. 7 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Fortu: Deep in the Cassandra Jungle lies the thunderous Fortuneteller Falls. Myths say that one can hear their future spoken beneath the crashing waters. 8 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Erupt: Mount Gotoro erupts every two to three years, but under the watchful eye of the Gotoran Institute of Tectonics, casualties and damage are kept to a minimum. 9 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Gotor: Ships of the Gotoro Merchant Fleet, captained by adept sailors who can weather any storms, keep the nation well supplied. 10 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Hette: The Hettergloss Mountain range, so named because when spring blooms on the mountain, it becomes glossy with heather flowers. 11 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Giant: The tallest mountain in the Hettergloss Mountain range. No one has reached the peak so far. 12 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.FireS: At no point is it advisable to enter a Fire Swamp, but it's easiest to spot quicksand and fire spouts in winter time. 13 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.

Rodents of unusual sizes thrive in the three seasons of hot humid weather in most Fire Swamps, and hibernate during winter. 14 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Palla: Palladium Fortress is one of the older buildings still in use today, although it's more and more becoming a protected tourist site. 15 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.GotoroPhotos.Coeru: Lake Coeruleus has a reputation of being bottomless - and it's also one of the clearest lakes in the world. 16 of 16 in the Gotoro Snapshots Series. This furniture can't be placed outdoors.
