Sigurd.PhoneCalls.1: Hey @. Sorry for the random call outta the blue, but next time you're in the neighborhood, can you bring some flowers for Auntie? She's been feeling kind of sad lately. 'preciate ya.
Sigurd.PhoneCalls.2: %There's noise in the background and a weird sound like a phone hitting the floor before you hear Sigurd swear profusely and hang up.
Sigurd.PhoneCalls.3: Are pumpkins in season yet? You oughtta set aside some good ones for me, if you can. I think I'm going to carve a bear into one this time.
Sigurd.PhoneCalls.4: How's the forage looking south of %farm? I think I've been cooped up for too long, need to get some new sights. Or maybe I'll just lurk around Robin's instead like usual, who knows.
Sigurd.PhoneCalls.5: I think we're fore-casted some pretty nasty weather tomorrow. Make sure you get all your running done early. Wouldn't wanna be a soggy @, after all.
Sondra.PhoneCalls.1: Oh, hello @! I apologize for this random call, but next time you're around, if you happen to have a spare battery, would you mind bringing it for Sigurd? He'd be ever so thankful, and I would be as well.
Sondra.PhoneCalls.2: Hello @! It sure has gotten awfully warm quite quickly this year! I know you're busy with everything at %farm but I implore you to get out of the sun and take some rest in the shade whenever possible. Take care!
Sondra.PhoneCalls.3: Hello dear @! I hate to impose upon you but I had the most terrible fright the other night. Those rock crabs seem to be getting bolder and bolder by each day. I don't suppose you could clear some out next time you're prepped for mines-diving? I'm sure that's where they're coming from!$2
Sondra.PhoneCalls.4: I hope you're having a wonderful week, @! I know you're a busy individual out at %farm but I always worry you're not making time for yourself. Make sure you take plenty of breaks and have some non-work related fun, alright?$10
Sondra.PhoneCalls.5: I think it would be simply marvelous to tour %farm someday. Of course, I'd never want to interrupt your schedule, so I shan't impose. But a gal can certainly dream, right?$6
Gunnar.PhoneCalls.1: %Did... did Gunnar pocket dial you? Is he singing a video game victory fanfare?
Gunnar.PhoneCalls.2: Oh, uh, hey @! Um... this is a big ask, I know, I know... but can you bring me an explosive ammo round? And, er, do you mind keeping this between you and me?$6
Gunnar.PhoneCalls.3: Oh hey @! I hope you're doing well! I've been working on a few new things for the Bear Necessities. Feel free to pop by and stock up. And remember, I buy stuff too if you need to offload after a trip down the mines!$19
Gunnar.PhoneCalls.4: You've been killing slimes! Thank Yoba someone has! This is why you're the greatest, @! Keep fighting the good fight!$1
Gunnar.PhoneCalls.5: Hey @, you know if you've been fishing up a bunch of Joja colas, you can always dump 'em off on me or Sig. We love that junk. I only mention it because my luck's been lousy on both catching fish AND catching colas.$6
Gudrun.PhoneCalls.1: Yo @! I hope things are going nice and stuff over at %farm or whatever. Um, if you find yourself catching a lot of trash, you can just hand it off to me for recycling. Unless you recycle, in which case, I'll take you off the list! Anyway, like, bye.$1
Gudrun.PhoneCalls.2: Um, like, @... So I hate to be a drag and all but Willy seems like he's been really down lately. I dunno, I'm not a weathered fishing captain, so like, I don't get it. But if you see him, could you bring him something to cheer him up? Maybe a pumpkin or a nice fancy mead.$13
Gudrun.PhoneCalls.3: I saw something in the OCEAN! I don't *think* sea monsters are real but I totally saw something. What if it was a mermaid! Oooh, you and Willy better not catch it if it WAS one.
Gudrun.PhoneCalls.4: I know you think you're super cool with your fishing rod and your fancy tackles and junk, but don't forget! There's sharks in the ocean and if scifi has taught us anything, it's that they could someday grow legs and walk on land. So you better watch your back!$6
Gudrun.PhoneCalls.5: Like, hey @! You're super cool, I hope you know that. Although... you'd be WAY cooler if you never ever grew cauliflower that my Aunt would buy and try to trick me into eating, just saying. No pressure.
Teren.PhoneCalls.1: Hey @! I figured I'd call and see how you and %pet were doing. I hope you guys are having a great week. If I had a place like %farm I had have at least eighty dogs and thirty cats, to start with. You have way more self-control than I do.$1
Teren.PhoneCalls.2: Hello, this is Sergeant Teren Xanthos Barnes from the FRA Veteran Outreach Program-#$b#-Oh whoops! Hey @, sorry about that, must've mis-dialed! Ummm... hey, forget you heard my full name, alright? Please? Please?$16
Teren.PhoneCalls.3: %There's incredibly loud emo music playing. Teren probably tossed his phone onto his bed without even making sure it was locked, and it dialed you.
Teren.PhoneCalls.4: Hey @! I wanted to check in and remind you that I'm your favorite resident of Bear Lodge and you should totally let me know ASAP if you have some good pumpkins available. I wish to trade money for goods, no services, this time.
Teren.PhoneCalls.5: *Ya-awn!* Oh, shoot. Sorry @, I was trying to call up Dr. Harvey and must've dialed you instead. And then yawned at you. How rude of me! Oh boy, I hope you'll forgive me. I don't think you're boring. I think you're really awesome. Anyway, gotta get a hold of the doc. Chat later!
BearFam.SigurdWedding.Speak.Sondra.1: The celebration of true love is the most exciting day...$16#$b#And it's even more exciting when it's people as dear to us all as @ and Sigurd.$15
BearFam.SigurdWedding.Speak.Sondra.2: Marriage may be a government institution, but love is not. Love will drive you crazy, throw at you new adversities, and even bring you to tears.$14#$b#But by coming together you will overcome all obstacles and face all woes to come out stronger, more united, and even more in love on the other side.$14
BearFam.SigurdWedding.Speak.Sondra.3: Put your trust in each other and you will experience a happiness that lasts forever.$15
BearFam.SigurdWedding.Speak.Sondra.4: @, Sigurd. It is my greatest joy to pronounce you as partners and soulmates.$17
BearFam.SigurdWedding.Speak.Sigurd.1: I trust you with my heart, @.$22
BearFam.SigurdWedding.Speak.Message.2: ...But what a wonderful change it is!
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.Sondra.1: Love can be found unexpectedly with a simple change of surroundings...$14#$b#And that's exactly what happened with our wonderful @ and Gunnar.$15
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.Sondra.2: Any step taken forward feels even more fulfilling when taken together, hand in hand, stride to stride.$14#$b#If you strive to pursue all that life has to offer together, you will find yourselves overflowing with a wealth of love and joy.$14
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.Sondra.3: Lean on each other in the dark times, and you will bring each other into the light.$15
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.Sondra.4: @, Gunnar. It is my greatest delight to pronounce you as partners and soulmates.$17
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.Gunnar.1: Let me light the way home for you every day from now on, @.$20
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.QuickQuestio: Only if I can light the way for you, too.
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.Message.1: This is the start of a brand new type of adventure...
BearFam.GunnarWedding.Speak.Message.2: ...But one you will be taking together, hand in hand!
BearFam.GunnarWedding.PlusMateo.Speak.So: Love can be found unexpectedly with a simple change of surroundings...$14#$b#And that's exactly what happened with our wonderful @ and Gunnar.$15

Any step taken forward feels even more fulfilling when taken together, hand in hand, stride to stride.$14#$b#If you strive to pursue all that life has to offer together, you will find yourselves overflowing with a wealth of love and joy.$14
BearFam.GunnarWedding.PlusMateo.Speak.Ma: There's more to life than just adventure, as you two know well by now. There's times of peace. Times of rest.$78#$b#Let yourselves rest and know peace, and share it with each other forever more.$80
BearFam.GunnarWedding.PlusMateo.Speak.So: @, Gunnar. It is my greatest delight to pronounce you as partners and soulmates.$17
BearFam.GunnarWedding.PlusMateo.Speak.Gu: Be my safe shelter where I can finally lay down my arms, @, and I'll be yours.$20
BearFam.GunnarWedding.PlusMateo.Speak.Qu: Be my peacekeeper and let me know sanctuary, and I'll be yours.
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.Sondra.1: Love does not rush, does not judge, does not flinch in the light of being found.$14#$b#@ and Teren have learned that on their journey to this most marvelous, splendid of days.$15
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.Sondra.2: Opening one's heart, revealing one's true self, being known - these are unknown terrors no one is ever prepared to face.$14#$b#But finding someone who chooses you, time and time and time again, is an unending, unknown thrill that you now get to experience with each other, as long as you remain willing.$14
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.Sondra.3: Today you choose each other, and now you simply only have to wake up and choose each other again, forever more, and you will know that the love lingers forever more.$15
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.Sondra.4: @, Teren. It is my greatest happiness to pronounce you as partners and soulmates.$17
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.Teren.1: I sure am lucky you chose me, @.$26
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.QuickQuestion: I'll choose you again tomorrow, if you choose me.
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.Message.1: Tomorrow starts a whole new chapter...
BearFam.TerenWedding.Speak.Message.2: ...But what excitement there is the newness of it all!
A cruelty free alternative to the classic smoked turkey leg made with tofu and Gus's secret blend of eleven herbs and spices.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.TurkeyDrumstick.De: A traditional ren faire cuisine; these have been smoked with a combination of hickory and peach wood chips for hours for melt in your mouth goodness!
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.VeggieStew.Descrip: A thick and flavorful broth chock full of all of nature's greatest hits of the vegetable world.
MadDog.HashtagBearfam.BeefStew.Descripti: A tasty stew with tender root veggies and bites of beef simmered to perfection inside a warm flaky bread bowl.
MadDog.VioletMoon.Teren.ShopLine.1: The meals I serve aren’t exactly what I’d call a Jarl’s feast, but they’ll fill your belly.
MadDog.VioletMoon.Teren.ShopLine.2: I’ve food for the hungry, and drink for the thirsty.
MadDog.VioletMoon.Gunnar.ShopLine.2: Got a selection of good things on sale, stranger!
VioletMoon.Sigurd.1: The real question is what's smokier - me over here or Teren's drumsticks? ... Naw, it's me.$18
VioletMoon.Sigurd.2: You won't catch me on one of the horses if only because I'm too {{BearFamProfanityD}} big and heavy and the poor things don't need that kinda weight.
VioletMoon.Sondra.1: Hello, oh most noble @, of the fair and fortunate %farm! We do greatly appreciate you visiting our territory this season, I do hope you find something to treasure on this glorious day~$1
VioletMoon.Sondra.2: %Sondra pantomimes a curtsey.#$b#Hello @! Isn't this such a treat! I've walked around twice already and just had to take a seat to catch my breath. There's simply so much to see!$1
VioletMoon.Gunnar.1: Maybe next year Clint can join us and we can take turns at the forge making kid-safe weaponry.#$b#I mean, every kid should be allowed to swing a sword or spin a dagger, right?$6
VioletMoon.Gunnar.2: I thought about bringing some armor but I figured I'd be the unlucky duck hauling everything back and decided not to risk it.#$b#Actually I'll probably end up bringing home double what I brought!$6
VioletMoon.Gudrun.1: Auntie told me not to sit too close to the forge, MEANWHILE Sig's over there with his awful cigarettes.$6#$b#Life's not faire when you're the baby of the family, @.
VioletMoon.Gudrun.2: I'm sure there's some kind of fish-friendly way to include fish next year, I just need to figure out how big of a tank I can get my brothers to lug up here.
VioletMoon.Teren.1: Honestly, a fish stew would be incredibly easy to add to the menu, but a certain smallest Bear would PROBABLY attack me with one of Gunnar's real weapons.
VioletMoon.Teren.2: Aw, I filled up on my own food while I was up all night cooking... but I want *more* once-a-year treats!
Teleportation and You, The Trick to Being On Time
Barn Raising Tales for Newborn Lambs
Adult Normal Samurai Tortoises, the Graphic Novel Collection
I Will Divorce My Crazy Royal Husband And Raise A Prize Winning Ewe

Gunnar.Random.Marriage.Games.3: Mafia: Like a Seahorse, Brotherhood Edition

Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameSituations.1: I'm going to grind until I make it into the record books for most hours played on nightmare difficulty!
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameSituations.2: It's a harrowing tale of deception and dishonor and I get to do both!
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameSituations.3: Allegedly after it got leaked they rewrote the whole thing!
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameSituations.4: Somebody's already figured out how to speedrun it and set a world record!
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameSituations.5: It's been in production delays for over a decade. I think most folks forgot about it. Not me though!
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameSituations.6: They rebuilt the online multiplayer servers using a whole new never before beta tested system. Surely nothing will go wrong!
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameSituations.7: This is for sure the game that I get one hundred percent of the achievements in, just watch!
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.GameFranchiseSeri: the third sequel to the thirteenth game
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MovieRumors.1: They fell in love on set and you can absolutely see the chemistry on screen the whole time during the chase sequence!$1
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MovieRumors.2: They apparently wore coordinated, thematic outfits for every red carpet appearance since the movie released.
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MovieRumors.3: During filming they literally stumbled across a gold mine and they split the property deed profits with every cast and crew member!$1
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MovieRumors.4: Both of them took a huge paycut to make sure the crew would be paid better for once and never told anyone.
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MovieRumors.5: I met both of them a couple of years back and they're both really humble! I guess it's because they came up in show business together.
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MovieRumors.6: They had a big blow up on set and refused to do the press tour together afterwards!$7
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MovieRumors.7: They each adopted one of their furry co-stars and even brought them to the debut red carpet in little tuxedos.$1

Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MineVisits.3: I dropped my sword in front of
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MineVisits.4: My bag went missing! I think it was stolen by
Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MineVisits.5: I was going to bring home a really good haul of gemstones, but I encountered

Gunnar.Random.Marriage.MineVisitsAndThen: And then I cut myself on my OWN sword!
And then I dropped my phone.
And then I woke up in a heap by the elevator.
And then when I got out, my wallet was missing!
And then I sneezed and woke up a rock crab!
And then my phone alarm went off, telling me I was late to training with Gil!

CT.Sigurd.MadDog.BearFam_KentGotoro.true: Kent and I have been talking about talking a lot. Talking to who? Well that's up to each of us to decide, isn't it? Regardless, it's a start...
CT.Sigurd.MadDog.BearFam_KentGotoro.fals: It's not often Kent asks anyone to help out around the house, but I'm always glad to stop and chat a spell when he needs a steady hand on a household project... A man's gotta talk to somebody, right?
CT.Teren.MadDog.BearFam_KentGotoro.true: I don't think Kent's used to my exuberance yet...$16#$b#But Jodi asked me to come 'round with some of my usual resources and guides for picking the right therapist, so now he's gotta deal with me.$1
CT.Teren.MadDog.BearFam_KentGotoro.false: Oh shoot, I forgot what Kent wanted me to stop by with... I'm bringing some dinner around so he and Jodi can take the night off without making Sam cancel his plans with Abby and Sebastian.
IsLewisMayor1.true: I bet you'd be the most influential person in town if you promised to build a school.
IsLewisMayor1.false: I bet you could overthrow the local government if you promised to build a school.
IsLewisMayor2.true: But hey, that's the fun of being out on the edge of the law, right?
IsLewisMayor2.false: Nothing wrong with a bit of healthy competition, right?
IsLewisMayor4.false: one's in a position of authority
Sigurd.CPSolsticeWinterStar.BeforeSpouse: Just being in your presence makes winter time feel like summer time, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$4#$b#I sure hope I make you feel the same... and don't worry, I didn't make this myself.$18
Sigurd.CPSolsticeWinterStar.Before: Happy Solstice, @. If you like it, I didn't make it... and if you hate it, I might've made it.$18
Sigurd.CPSolsticeWinterStar.AfterSpouse: No pressure {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}, you're welcome to leave it on one of the tables for someone else to try if you're worried it'll taste bad.$18
Sigurd.CPSolsticeWinterStar.After: Not bad right? Well, if it's bad, just toss it. It's the thought that counts, right?$18
Sigurd.CPSolsticeWinterStar.ReceiveGift: Expect the unexpected, huh? Thank you, @.$18
Sigurd.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_coo: Nice, made this yourself? You're a {{LPJobTitle}} of all trades, @.$18
Sigurd.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_fru: And still fresh? {{BearFamProfanityJ}}, you're prepared for literally any occasion, huh? Thank you. Guess I didn't need to wish on the tree after all.$18
Sondra.CPSolsticeWinterStar.Before: I agonized for days on what to cook so I truly hope this brings joy to you, dear @.
Sondra.CPSolsticeWinterStar.After: I hope you enjoy it but don't you be shy about telling me if you didn't! I'll be sure to wow you with a meal if I didn't succeed this time.$1
Sondra.CPSolsticeWinterStar.ReceiveGift: Oh my, an avant-garde choice! Thank you, @!$1
Sondra.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_coo: Oh, this looks simply wonderful @! You're the loveliest chef friend I've ever made. Thank you!$3
Sondra.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_fru: Oh just what I need to help me stave off reaching for all those Solstice pastries, tee-hee!$1
Gunnar.CPSolsticeWinterStar.BeforeSpouse: I feel strangely anxious. Oh boy. @, my {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}, you know I'd never try to accidentally poison you with my cooking, right? Right?$6
Gunnar.CPSolsticeWinterStar.Before: Yeah, of course I paid someone to make this. You don't wanna end up in Harvey's care for the rest of the Solstice, probably.$6
Gunnar.CPSolsticeWinterStar.AfterSpouse: ...Well? I made it under supervision but... Ah, I'm sorry, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}, if you don't like it you can totally throw it away, I promise my feelings won't be hurt none.$6
Gunnar.CPSolsticeWinterStar.After: See? Not bad, right? Emily came in clutch with helping me out, thankfully.
Gunnar.CPSolsticeWinterStar.ReceiveGift: Is this for me? Aww, @... You're the best.
Gunnar.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_coo: I love you food that will come down to the mines with me, you're my favorite...$1#$b#Oh yeah, thank you, @!$6
Gunnar.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_fru: Thank you! I'm always trying to snack on snacks that are bad for me, maybe this'll be the kick in the rear I need to change my habits.$1
Gudrun.CPSolsticeWinterStar.Before: SURPRISE! I'm your secret giver this year~ and DUH! Of *course* I didn't make it, are you nuts?$6
Gudrun.CPSolsticeWinterStar.After: Well, do you like it? I hope so! No fish or innocent bodies of water were harmed in the making of it, I promise!$1
Gudrun.CPSolsticeWinterStar.ReceiveGift: Oh, I totally wasn't expecting this! Well, thanks, @.
Gudrun.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_coo: Thanks @! You're a real good chef-type person, along with being a great {{LPJobTitle}}, huh?
Gudrun.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_fru: Ooh, all natural sugars~ This will still have me bouncing off the walls at the Lodge, but that's my brothers' problem, hehehe.$6
Gudrun.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_fis: What is WRONG with you, @! I bet it wished to STAY IN IT'S HOME!$8
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.BeforeSpouse: {{CPTerenSpouseNameA}}! I hope you enjoy this, I went through a few rounds making sure it would be perfect for you.$8
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.Before: Hiya, @! Well, I know Harvey would want me to offer up something healthy, but I can't resist the call of making holiday treats. I hope you like it!$1
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.AfterSpouse: I hope you enjoy it, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}. You're my favorite person in the whole world to bake and cook for, and I hope I get to do it all year long next year.$4
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.After: Now, remember, if you *don't* like, don't feed it to %pet, because it's really only people safe.$16
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.ReceiveGift: Oh, thanks! You're always a giver, no matter what, @.
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_cook: This looks GREAT! You're wonderful @, thank you picking this out for me.$1
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.category_frui: And Dr. Harvey rejoices as another of his patients eats more fruit. Thanks @, you're a gem.$1
Teren.CPSolsticeWinterStar.banana: Well. Not ideal! But you know what, I can still bake with it!$7
config.ExcludeFromPerfection.name: Exclude From Perfection
config.ExcludeFromPerfection.description: Excludes BearFam items from Perfection tracking. This will not exclude recipes due to the game's code but will exclude the items from the shipping requirements at least. False by default, meaning items/crops count by default.
config.ExcludeFishFromPerfection.name: Exclude Fish From Perfection
config.ExcludeFishFromPerfection.descrip: Excludes BearFam fish from Perfection tracking. This means Bearfam fish won't need to be caught for perfection. False by default, meaning the fish count by default.
config.GingerBeerExcludeFromPerfection.d: Excludes the Bearfam fruit ginger beers added with DestyNOVA's Sword & Sorcery from Perfection tracking. True by default, as in the item is excluded by default. If for some mysterious reason you do not play with DestyNOVA's Sword & Sorcery and also care about perfection, DO NOT uncheck this.
config.IncludeinIntroductionQuest.name: Include in Introduction Quest
config.IncludeinIntroductionQuest.descri: Determines whether Sig and Sondra count for the introduction quest. Default is true; they will count for the introduction quest when added at the beginning of a new game.
config.FarmerJobTitle.name: Farmer's Job Title?
config.FarmerJobTitle.description: Sets the player's job title for more immersive roleplay for users who aren't playing as farmers specifically. Default is 'farmer'.
config.KrakensWords.name: Kraken's Words
config.KrakensWords.description: Is the Kraken speaking wisdom, comedy, or facts? Has no effect than whether you get allegedly wise quotes from the internet, allegedly funny jokes, or mostly verified facts about squids. Default is wise.
config.BearsGiveGifts.name: Bonus Winter Star Gifts
config.BearsGiveGifts.description: Allows the Bear siblings to give extra gifts at Winter Star. True by default; disable if you don't want them to add on to whatever your secret gift-giver is giving you for the year.
config.IncludeExtraLetters.name: Include Extra Letters
config.IncludeExtraLetters.description: Adds some randomized letters from members of BearFam that probably contain gifts. True by default, meaning you may get some random letters.
config.ProfanityFilter.name: Profanity Filter
config.ProfanityFilter.description: Changes profanity to mild non-swears for those who prefer a cleaner game. (Think hell becomes heck, damn becomes darn, etc. etc.) False by default, meaning there may be some profanity in the dialogue by default.
config.SeasonalOutfits.name: Seasonal Outfits
config.SeasonalOutfits.description: Choose how many outfits Bearfam wears in game. Full means Bearfam will have multiple outfits per season, along with unique festival outfits. Lite means they wear a different outfit per season, plus Spirit's Eve and Flower Dance. Vanilla means they wear the same outfit for all of spring + summer + fall, a different outfit for winter, and unique outfits for Spirit's Eve and Flower Dance. Default is full.
config.BearFamStarterGift.name: Welcome Mail?
config.BearFamStarterGift.description: Sends a letter at the start of a new game that welcomes the player with a little starter gift. Default is true, as in you will get a letter within 5 days of starting a new game.
config.SigurdHairColor.name: Sig's Hair Color
config.SigurdHairColor.description: Decide if Sig has black hair like his initial concept or blue hair like his current concept. Default is bluehaired. Note, if you change the configuration while playing, the change takes effect the next day.
config.GunnarHasFreckles.name: Gunnar Has Freckles?
config.GunnarHasFreckles.description: Decide if Gunnar has freckles or no freckles. Only changes portraits. Default is nofreckles. Note, if you change the configuration while playing, the change takes effect the next day.
config.VPRWorldMapFallVariant.name: VPR World Map Recolor - Fall
config.VPRWorldMapFallVariant.descriptio: Are you using VPR to recolor the world map? Wonderful! Choose your fall variant here please. Default is orange.
config.SigRomance.name: Sig Romance
config.SigRomance.description: Adds extra dialogue at 8-10 hearts and beyond that can be chaste/ace-friendly, spicy, or both. Defaults to both, meaning a mix of both types of kinds will be used. Only matters if you choose to romance him. For Sig Bear if a Rival Hearts option is not chosen.
config.GunnarRomance.name: Gunnar Romance
config.GunnarRomance.description: Adds extra dialogue at 8-10 hearts and beyond that can be chaste/ace-friendly, spicy, or both. Defaults to both, meaning a mix of both types of kinds will be used. Only matters if you choose to romance him. For Gunnar Bear.
config.TerenRomance.name: Teren Romance
config.TerenRomance.description: Adds extra dialogue at 8-10 hearts and beyond that can be chaste/ace-friendly, spicy, or both. Defaults to both, meaning a mix of both types of kinds will be used. Only matters if you choose to romance him. For Teren Barnes if a Rival Hearts option is not chosen.
config.BearFamDatingLength.name: Days Between Romance Events
config.BearFamDatingLength.description: Set the delay between the two pre-marriage dating events for Sig, Gunnar, and Teren. Options are 5, 7, 10. Default is 10.
config.SigurdSpouseNickname1.name: Sig's Term of Endearment
config.SigurdSpouseNickname1.description: Sets the player's desired term of endearment if they romance Sig. Each romance option has default names they'd use but players can input their own to personalize it further. His default nickname for his partner is bumblebee.
config.GunnarSpouseNickname1.name: Gunnar's Term of Endearment 1
config.GunnarSpouseNickname1.description: Sets the player's desired term of endearment if they romance Gunnar. Each romance option has default names they'd use but players can input their own to personalize it further. Gunnar notably uses multiple different names. His default nicknames for his partner are sweets, sweetling, and delight.
config.GunnarSpouseNickname2.name: Gunnar's Term of Endearment 2
config.GunnarSpouseNickname2.description: Sets the player's desired term of endearment if they romance Gunnar. Each romance option has default names they'd use but players can input their own to personalize it further. Gunnar notably uses multiple different names. His default nicknames for his partner are sweets, sweetling, and delight.
config.GunnarSpouseNickname3.name: Gunnar's Term of Endearment 3
config.GunnarSpouseNickname3.description: Sets the player's desired term of endearment if they romance Gunnar. Each romance option has default names they'd use but players can input their own to personalize it further. Gunnar notably uses multiple different names. His default nicknames for his partner are sweets, sweetling, and delight.
config.TerenSpouseNickname1.name: Teren's Term of Endearment
config.TerenSpouseNickname1.description: Sets the player's desired term of endearment if they romance Teren. Each romance option has default names they'd use but players can input their own to personalize it further. His default nickname for his partner is darling.
config.FarmhouseSpouse.name: Custom Spouse Rooms/Patios
config.FarmhouseSpouse.description: Use Sig's, Gunnar's, or Teren's custom spouse room and patio, or load empty ones instead. Defaults to Decorated; each spouse room/patio will be customized to the spouse.
config.KidsWithSigurd.name: Have Kids With Sig?
config.KidsWithSigurd.description: Decide how (adopted vs. natural) to have kids (if any) with Sig if romanced. Default is NaturalKids.
config.SigurdCustomToddlerSprite.name: Sig's Toddler Sprites
config.SigurdCustomToddlerSprite.descrip: Decide if Sig's children take after him, with seasonal outfits, the same outfit every season, or if they just use the vanilla toddler sprites. Default is customseasonal.
config.SigurdGunhildrHair.name: Sig's Daughter's Hair Color
config.SigurdGunhildrHair.description: Decide if Sig's daughter has dark purple/black hair like his initial concept or blue hair like his current concept. Default is bluehaired.
config.SigurdRuneHair.name: Sig's Son's Hair Color
config.SigurdRuneHair.description: Decide if Sig's son has dark purple/black hair like his initial concept or blue hair like his current concept. Default is bluehaired.
config.KidsWithGunnar.name: Have Kids With Gunnar?
config.KidsWithGunnar.description: Decide how (adopted vs. natural) to have kids (if any) with Gunnar if romanced. Default is NaturalKids.
config.GunnarCustomToddlerSprite.name: Gunnar's Toddler Sprites
config.GunnarCustomToddlerSprite.descrip: Decide if Gunnar's children take after him, with seasonal outfits, the same outfit every season, or if they just use the vanilla toddler sprites. Default is customseasonal.
config.GunnarSigneHair.name: Gunnar's Daughter's Hair Color
config.GunnarSigneHair.description: Decide if Gunnar's daughter has strawberry blonde hair or blonde hair like Gunnar. Default is blondhair.
config.GunnarLeifHair.name: Gunnar's Son's Hair Color
config.GunnarLeifHair.description: Decide if Gunnar's son has strawberry blond hair or blond hair like Gunnar. Default is blondhair.
config.KidsWithTeren.name: Have Kids With Teren?
config.KidsWithTeren.description: Decide how (adopted vs. natural) to have kids (if any) with Teren if romanced. Default is NoKids.
config.TerenCustomToddlerSprite.name: Teren's Toddler Sprites
config.TerenCustomToddlerSprite.descript: Decide if Teren's children take after him, with seasonal outfits, the same outfit every season, or if they just use the vanilla toddler sprites. Default is customseasonal.
config.TerenFredericaHair.name: Teren's Daughter's Hair Color
config.TerenFredericaHair.description: Decide if Teren's daughter has a darker brown hair that matches Teren or a blonder-brown hair. Default is darkbrown.
config.TerenJaysonHair.name: Teren's Son's Hair Color
config.TerenJaysonHair.description: Decide if Teren's son has a darker brown hair that matches Teren or a blonder-brown hair. Default is darkbrown.
config.Player Pronouns 1.name: Player Pronouns 1
config.Player Pronouns 2.name: Player Pronouns 2
config.Player Pronouns 3.name: Player Pronouns 3
config.Player Pronouns 4.name: Player Pronouns 4
config.Player Pronoun Identifier.name: Player Pronoun Verb Conjugation
config.Player Pronoun Identifier.descrip: Set how you would conjugate the verb "to be" with your pronouns. Would usually be "is" or "are", depending on context. Example: She IS so cool! VS. They ARE so cool!
config.EnableRivalHeartsTerenSig.name: Teren & Sig Rival Hearts
config.EnableRivalHeartsTerenSig.descrip: Activates a rival hearts romance between Teren and Sig if neither are romanced by the player or other rival hearts. Cannot be true while the Eli & Teren or Dylan & Sig Rival Hearts are true. Default is false.
config.EnableRivalHeartsTerenEli.name: Eli & Teren Rival Hearts
config.EnableRivalHeartsTerenEli.descrip: Activates a rival hearts romance between Teren and Eli if neither are romanced by the player or other rival hearts. Cannot be true while Teren & Sig Rival Hearts is true. Requires Eli & Dylan by Tenebrous Nova. Default is false.
config.EnableRivalHeartsSigDylan.name: Dylan & Sig Rival Hearts
config.EnableRivalHeartsSigDylan.descrip: Activates a rival hearts romance between Sig and Dylan if neither are romanced by the player or other rival hearts. Cannot be true while the Teren & Sig Rival Hearts is true. Requires Eli & Dylan by Tenebrous Nova. Default is false.
config.EnableBonusEvents.name: Enable Bonus Events
config.EnableBonusEvents.description: Enables extra events that are not necessarily plot-mandatory, but add to the story of the NPC and/or their platonic relationships with vanilla characters. True/Enabled by default, meaning you can see the bonus events by default.
config.section.General.name: General
config.section.Pronouns.name: Pronouns
config.section.Romance.name: Romance
config.section.Romance.description: Player romance configuration options for Sig, Gunnar, or Teren.
config.section.Children.name: Children
config.section.Children.description: Player children configuration options for if they have romanced Sig, Gunnar, or Teren.
config.section.RivalHearts.name: Enable Rival Hearts?
config.section.RivalHearts.description: Rival heart configurations options for Sig and/or Teren.
config.NoIntroEvents.name: No Intro Events
config.NoIntroEvents.description: Disables the pair of intro events for Sondra + Sigurd and then later Gunnar + Gudrun. Great for if you're adding to an existing save and don't want to feel bombarded with events! False/disabled by default, meaning the intro events will play.
MailGudrun.StoneBrambleBerries.true: Hey @,^^Real talk... have you ever wanted to fight a berry bush?^^Cool, me neither. Anyway, here's some stone bramble seeds. They grow into very tasty berries but they come at a terrible price.^^(Prickly thorns if that's not obvious.) Sorry about how obnoxious my big brothers have been or ever will be to you.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
MailGudrun.StoneBrambleBerries.false: Hey @,^^Real talk... have you ever wanted to fight a berry bush?^^Cool, me neither. Anyway, here's some stone bramble seeds. They grow into very tasty berries but they come at a terrible price.^^(Prickly thorns if that's not obvious.) Sorry for being obnoxious when you stopped by the house earlier.^^See ya around,^^Gudrun Bear
config.SassySpawnMarriedTerenOutdoorX.de: Select the X coordinate for Sassy's MEEP spawn point if you've married Teren for on the farm. Frontier Farm users, use 129.
config.SassySpawnMarriedTerenOutdoorY.de: Select the Y coordinate for Sassy's MEEP spawn point if you've married Teren for on the farm. Frontier Farm users, use 28.
config.SassySpawnMarriedTerenIndoorX.des: Select the X coordinate for Sassy's MEEP spawn point if you've married Teren for in the house. If you're still on House Upgrade Level 1, use 3.
config.SassySpawnMarriedTerenIndoorY.des: Select the Y coordinate for Sassy's MEEP spawn point if you've married Teren for in the house. If you're still on House Upgrade Level 1, use 9.
Sigurd.BetasCrabKill.2: Did you get any on ya?
Sigurd.BetasCrabKill.3: Huh. Didn't even see it scuttling.
Sondra.BetasCrabKill.1: Oh, thank you for getting rid of that!
Sondra.BetasCrabKill.2: It didn't hurt you, did it, dear?
Gunnar.BetasCrabKill.1: Oh, I was gonna get that!
Gunnar.BetasCrabKill.3: Aw, you got it before me!
Gudrun.BetasCrabKill.1: What kinda crab was that - oh!
Gudrun.BetasCrabKill.2: Eek! I didn't even hear it!
Teren.BetasCrabKill.1: Oh sh- shoot! Nice crab kill!
Teren.BetasCrabKill.2: You get paid for pest control, right?
Teren.BetasCrabKill.3: Gotta get them before they get you, right?
BETAS.WearingSigsClothes.1: Decided to wear my hoodie, huh? ...It looks cute on you.$18
BETAS.WearingSigsClothes.2: You look really cozy in that... it suits you, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$18
BETAS.WearingSigsClothes.3: %Sig looks quite delighted by your presence but appears to be trying to stifle it.#$b#You look nice today.$18
BETAS.WearingTerensClothes.1: Aww, @! You look stunning in camo, you know?~$8
BETAS.WearingTerensClothes.2: Oh are you wearing - well, you look like my favorite person in the whole wide world, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$8
BETAS.WearingTerensClothes.3: I wonder what other clothes of mine would look stunning you...$4
BETAS.WearingGunnarsClothes.1: Y-you wore my shirt - I mean, that's why I gave it to you - I just didn't - I mean - you're cute.$4
BETAS.WearingGunnarsClothes.2: OH! Hi - {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}} - um, you look swell today. Not - like, swell, like swollen, like you got stung by a wasp but like nice - well, nicer than nice - uhm - I mean - I like you.$4
BETAS.WearingGunnarsClothes.3: I'll just uh, cross that off my 'sights to see before I die', huh? You take my breath away, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}.$4
BETAS.WearingSondrasGift.1: Oh my, is that the shirt I gave you! You're so sweet, wearing it even if it may not be to your tastes.$3
BETAS.WearingSondrasGift.2: Oh don't you look splendid today, @!$3
BETAS.WearingSondrasGift.3: You're always so considerate to everyone, dear @, but I feel extra special knowing you like to wear that silly shirt I gave you.$3
BETAS.WearingGudrunsGift.2: That's a sweet shirt you got on today, @!$1
BETAS.WearingGudrunsGift.3: Oh, hey - you still have that shirt I gave you? Awesome!$1
BETAS.SmoochingSig.Spicy.1: Don't go startin' something you won't finish, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$18
BETAS.SmoochingSig.Spicy.2: Naw, come back, I could use another dozen...$18
BETAS.SmoochingSig.Spicy.3: You can't just smooch me like that and leave me daydreamin' about more.$18
BETAS.SmoochingSig.Chaste.1: One hug from you makes me feel like nothing's impossible, {{LPSigurdSpouseNameA}}.$4
BETAS.SmoochingSig.Chaste.2: That was just what I needed.$18
BETAS.SmoochingSig.Chaste.3: Well now, once you're trapped in a Bear's arms, you're trapped for good, you know.$18
BETAS.SmoochingTeren.Spicy.1: Your fella could get used to that, y'know~$20
BETAS.SmoochingTeren.Spicy.2: Only one smooch? C'mon, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}, let's make out~$8
BETAS.SmoochingTeren.Spicy.3: If you're going to distract me with kisses, you'll be in for it later tonight, y'know~$8
BETAS.SmoochingTeren.Chaste.1: And just like that, my whole day is made better. You're wonderful, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}.$8
BETAS.SmoochingTeren.Chaste.2: Mmm, why'd you let go? Let's hug for at least an hour, minimum.$20
BETAS.SmoochingTeren.Chaste.3: I always feel safe in your arms, {{LPTerenSpouseNameA}}... I hope you feel safe in mine.$4
BETAS.SmoochingGunnar.Spicy.1: H-hey, y'know I can't think straight when you're kissing me.$4
BETAS.SmoochingGunnar.Spicy.2: Well, there goes my concentration for the day. So let's smooch some more.$4
BETAS.SmoochingGunnar.Spicy.3: %Gunnar gently grabs the hem of your shirt, holding you close.#$b#...One more, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameB}}?$4
BETAS.SmoochingGunnar.Chaste.1: There you are, my favorite person to have and hold.$4
BETAS.SmoochingGunnar.Chaste.2: %Gunnar sighs a little, as if your hug took all his stress away.#$b#You're my favorite, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameA}}.$4
BETAS.SmoochingGunnar.Chaste.3: You know, in your arms is my favorite place to be, {{LPGunnarSpouseNameC}}.$4
BETAS.WearingCaritasUniform.1: Oh no, I'm going to have to pay you now, huh?$3
BETAS.WearingCaritasUniform.2: I should have you be my spokesperson, you make flannel fashionable, @.$1
BETAS.WearingCaritasUniform.3: Hey, that's my favorite color - well, it is today, at least.$1
SigurdCTGrandpaHaunts: I don't know if it was my mean little sister or my absentminded little brother, but one of them has gone and switched all my games and cases around.$11#$b#Every time I open one up, I find the wrong title!$9
SigCTMadDogBearFamMEEPArmyPhotoCT: Hmmm. Feels like someone's been poking around in my room recently, that's kinda weird.$11
SigurdCTYouShotSondra: Did you REALLY shoot my Auntie with an ARROW? What the {{BearFamProfanityA}}, @? You better hope you can outrun me.$5#$action AddFriendshipPoints MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd -5#
SigurdCTYouShotGudrun: She's a literal child, @. Pick on someone your own size... or bigger.$5#$action AddFriendshipPoints MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd -5#
SigurdCTGunnarHasaBomb: You gave my little brother an expired bomb to screw around with, didn't you? I'll remember that, @.$9#$b#%Well that sure was ominous of Sig.#$action AddFriendshipPoints MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd -5#
SigurdCTTerenRecipes: Taking over for Teren now? Nice, nice. Give him some healthy competition.$18
SigurdCTBearRecipes: Oh, now you're in on aaaall the family classics. Congratulations, @. You're practically a Bear now.$18
SigurdCTGunnarRecipes: Ahhh, you've invested in the amateur guide to bomb building... You really going to make and DRINK those things, @?
SigurdCTSondraRecipes: Auntie's been coming up with snacks for all of us niblings for years... I think it's her favorite way to show she cares, you know?$1
SigCTGudrunGrades: I logged in and signed off on Gudrun's last test. She'll make up the grades eventually, no need to make her suffer Auntie's wrath.$18
SigCTSootPocketAdventure: I can't believe Teren kidnapped Moray's little abomination.#$b# I told him there's easier ways to get the man's attention but he got all self-conscious.$18
SigCTDiTRPipoShorts: Cats don't dance, @, and they also don't wear pants.#$b#Oh, wait the first one's already a movie and I just saw Pipo in someone's shorts, so I guess I'm wrong on both those.$8
SigurdCTDiTRUsedExpiredMegaBomb: Aw, did someone get thwarted by the passage of time when they tried to blow something up? Idiot.$18
SondraCTGrandpaHaunts: Ah, @. It's been a long morning - I apparently bought nothing but decaf from Pierre's the other week.$9#$b#Wouldn't you know it, I went to see Rosa for a proper cup of coffee and she'd run into the same issue!$8
